name: Yanh Ratchawat Hotel
description: Located in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Saket, YANH Ratchawat Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Bangkok National Museum is 5.3 km away and Jim Thompson House is 5.3 km from the hotel. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The restaurant at YANH Ratchawat Hotel serves Thai cuisine. The accommodation can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Khao San Road is 4.8 km from YANH Ratchawat Hotel, while Siam Discovery is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: The Quarter Chaophraya By Uhg
description: Situated in Bangkok, 4.2 km from Wat Arun, The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a kids' club, room service and organising tours for guests. Rooms include a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony and some have city views. At the hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. Guests at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. You can play billiards and table tennis at The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG, and car hire is available. Staff speak English, Thai and Filipino at the reception. Wat Pho is 4.2 km from the hotel, while Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from The Quarter Chaophraya by UHG.

name: Voque Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - Sha Plus
description: Situated in Bangkok, 1.6 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus features views of the city. The property is around 4.5 km from Central Embassy, 4.5 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre and 4.9 km from Amarin Plaza. There is an outdoor pool and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms at VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus are fitted with a seating area. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre, sauna and hot tub. You can play mini-golf at VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus. Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 5.1 km from the hotel, while Central World is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 26 km from VOQUE Hotel & Serviced Residence Sukhumvit 51 - SHA Plus.

name: The Salil Hotel Riverside Bangkok
description: Set in Bangkok, 6.1 km from Lumpini Park, The Salil Hotel Riverside Bangkok offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. With a terrace, the property also features a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Jim Thompson House is 6.3 km from The Salil Hotel Riverside Bangkok, while MBK Center is 6.8 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 29 km from the accommodation.

name: Wyndham Bangkok Queen Convention Centre
address: 388 Soi Rim Khlong Phai Singto, Rama 4 Road, Bangkok 10110
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham hotel. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts is an upscale, full-service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world. It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world-class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms, and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more.Wyndham

name: dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok
address: 333 Si Phraya Road, Si Phraya, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500
description: Set in Bangkok, 2.4 km from MBK Center, dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok. Siam Discovery is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Siam Paragon Mall is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from dusitD2 Samyan Bangkok.

name: Adelphi Forty-Nine
description: Situated under a 20-minute walk from Phrom Phong BTS Skytrain Station, Adelphi Forty-Nine provides guests with an ideal base while visiting Bangkok. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace and a swimming pool. This cosy hotel features a range of facilities, including an executive floor, a 24-hour reception and babysitting/child services. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. The air conditioned rooms at Adelphi Forty-Nine offer a flat-screen TV with a DVD player, as well as a private balcony. The bathrooms have a bathtub and a rain shower, and include a hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers. In-house dining options include Mallard Restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. A choice of eating options are also available in close proximity to the property. Adelphi Forty-Nine is close to Thong Lo BTS Skytrain Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Bangkok and its surrounding areas. Benjasiri Park and The Emporium are a brief walk away.Revato

name: Theatre Residence
address: 69/8, Soi Wat Rakhang, Arun Amrin Road, Bangkok 10700
description: Located within Bangkok Old Town, Theatre Residence is situated a 10-minute walk from Siriraj Hospital and Wang Lang Pier. It has an outdoor pool surrounded by greenery and a dining room serving snacks, beverage and a la carte specialties. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain rooms include a seating area for your convenience. Views of the pool, river or city are featured in certain rooms. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and free toiletries. There is free shuttle service at the property. Famous landmarks of the Old Town including the The Grand Palace, Temple of the Emerald Buddha and the Bangkok City Pillar is located across the Chao Phraya River from the residence. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 30 km from the property.

description: Set in Bangkok, 1.4 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, HOMM Sukhumvit34 Bangkok a brand of BANYAN TREE GROUP offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. description: Set in Bangkok, 500 metres from Khao San Road, Siri Grand Bangkok Hotel offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the property also has a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Sukhumvit 20
address: 10, 10/3 Soi Sukhumvit 20, Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoey, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110
description: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 provides a comfortable and convenient option for guests in the center of the Bangkok’s most vibrant commercial and lifestyle district, Sukhumvit. Located close to Bangkok’s central Asok intersection, surrounded by multinational offices, shopping malls, restaurants, bars and nightlife, the family-friendly hotel in Bangkok is the perfect option for business, leisure and "Bleisure" travelers alike. By combining innovative technology with style and comfort, the hotel’s modern and open lobby provides guests with the flexibility to work or relax. The hotel’s Food & Beverage outlets include the lively Reap Factory restaurant, the Twenty & One bistro-inspired hybrid of a coffee shop and wine-lovers lounge, and Cool!t Pool Bar offering tasty drinks and snacks. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout the hotel, and a well-equipped fitness center and rooftop swimming pool will help guests stay refreshed and energized.Marriott

name: De Lux Bangkok Hotel
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, De Lux Bangkok Hotel is set in Ban Khlong Lat Bua Khao, 19 km from Central Festival EastVille and 22 km from Emporium Shopping Mall. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation offers room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At De Lux Bangkok Hotel every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a à la carte breakfast. Central Plaza Ladprao is 23 km from De Lux Bangkok Hotel, while Amarin Plaza is 23 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Conrad Bangkok
address: All Seasons Place 87/3 Wireless Rd., Bangkok 10330
description: Conrad Bangkok is an urban hideaway in the heart of Bangkok. Located in the commercial district, the hotel connects you to renowned tourist attractions, shopping centers, iconic landmarks, and service facilities such as Central Embassy, Lumphini Park, Bumrungrad International Hospital, and Erawan Shrine. We offer a complimentary shuttle bus every 15 minutes to the nearest BTS station, Phloen Chit, which is within easy reach. Conrad Bangkok comprises 391 rooms and suites and provides service facilities to hotel guests such as complimentary WiFi, valet parking, and notable restaurants where we serve authentic Cantonese cuisine as well as international fare. Pamper yourself in our recreational facilities on Level 7, such as BodyWorx, our 24/7 fitness center which features a fully equipped yoga room, steam room and sauna, Seasons Spa with 11 luxurious treatment rooms to enhance your health, beauty, and wellbeing. In addition, an outdoor area with a stunning view of the city includes a temperature-controlled outdoor swimming pool, two tennis courts, kid playground, and a jogging track. Conrad Bangkok also offers a professional events space utilizing the latest technology and is one of Bangkok's most versatile meeting and conferencing venues featuring a one-of-a-kind, 34-meter LED screen and 22 meeting rooms.Hilton

name: Best Western Ratchada Hotel
description: Uncover a new side of downtown Bangkok, Thailand’s dynamic capital city, at the Best Western Ratchada Hotel. This modern midscale hotel puts guests in the heart of the lively Ratchada district, just within a 10-minute walk from shopping department stores and surrounded by commercial towers, international offices, restaurants, and retail destinations such as Fortune Town, Esplanade Ratchada, The One Ratchada, Central Rama 9, and Jodd Fairs. AIA Capital Center is just a short distance away. With excellent connectivity via Phra Ram 9 and Thailand Cultural Centre MRT station, the Sukhumvit district is just a few stops away and the entire city is within easy reach. A choice of fully furnished double, twin or family rooms are available, with breakfast each morning. Guests can unwind in the outdoor swimming pool or work in the boardroom. Uncover a new side of downtown Bangkok, Thailand’s dynamic capital city, at Best Western Ratchada Hotel. This modern midscale hotel puts guests in the heart of the lively Ratchada district, just within 10-min walk from shopping department stores and surrounded by commercial towers, international offices, restaurants, and retail destinations such as Fortune Town, Esplanade Ratchada, The One Ratchada, Central Rama 9, and Jodd Fairs. AIA Capital Center is just a short distance away. With excellent connectivity via Phra Ram 9 and Thailand Cultural Centre MRT station, the Sukhumvit district is just a few stops away and the entire city is within easy reach. Guests can stay in a choice of comfortable and contemporary guest rooms with king- or twin-size beds. Family rooms are available for groups of up to four guests. Each room is fully furnished with a 43-inch Smart TV, in-room safe, fridge, microwave, and electric kettle. Every guest can start their day in style with a choice of international buffet breakfast. Throughout their stay, guests can unwind in the outdoor swimming pool, and business travelers can make use of a boardroom, which is perfect for intimate casual meetings. For guests seeking a new way to experience Bangkok, the Best Western Ratchada Hotel is the perfect option. Hotel opening soon- accepting reservations in advance of opening - May 1, 2023bestwestern.com

name: The Landmark Bangkok
description: Boasting impressive views of Bangkok, this 5-star hotel is a brief stroll from BTS Phloen Chit Station. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Viva Jiva Spa and Fitness First Platinum Health Club. This modern hotel offers a sauna, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. There is also free public parking on site for those with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and a rain shower. They each provide tea and coffee making facilities, slippers and a flat-screen TV. Guests of Landmark Bangkok are welcome to experience international cuisine at Rib Room & Bar, or try Chinese dishes at Sui Sian Chinese Restaurant. Dining options at the hotel include Landmark Bakery & Café and Greenhouse. Other dining options are also available. Located in the lively Khlong Toei area, Hotel The Landmark Bangkok is surrounded by restaurants, bars and night clubs. Guests can also visit Terminal 21, Soi Cowboy and Embassy of the United States.Revato

name: Summit Windmill Golf Residence
description: Summit Windmill Golf Suite Hotel at Suvarnabhumi is located along Bangna-Trad Road, a 40-minute drive to central Bangkok. The hotel features free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, an outdoor pool and a golf course. The air-conditioned units come with private balconies, living area and a kitchen. Washing machines and ironing facilities are provided. The hotel offers a DVD library and laundry services. Other facilities include a 24-hour front desk and free onsite parking. Thai and European cuisines are served at The Café. Golfer’s Lounge provides Asian specialties, international beer and cocktails. Summit Windmill Golf Suite Hotel at Suvarnabhumi is a 15-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

name: Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence
address: No. 51 Soi Sukhumvit 16 (Sammitr) Sukhumvit Rd., Khwaeng Khlong Toei, Khet Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.7 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence - SHA Certified offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a sauna and free shuttle service. All guest rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms also feature a kitchenette with a dishwasher, a microwave and a stovetop. At Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence - SHA Certified the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Emporium Shopping Mall is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Central Embassy is 4.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 27 km from Gardina Asoke Hotel & Residence - SHA Certified.

name: Arnoma Grand
description: Arnoma Hotel Bangkok is conveniently surrounded by 10 shopping malls, with Gaysorn located next door and Central World Plaza located across the road. Just 300 metres from Chidlom Skytrain Station, it features both indoor and outdoor pools. Guests can lounge by the pool’s sundeck or join aerobic and yoga classes. Arnoma Hotel has a fitness centre, hot tub, and sauna. Massage services are available. The air-conditioned rooms at Arnoma Hotel have city views of Bangkok. Each room has cable/satellite TV and a safety deposit box. A fridge and tea/coffee making facilities are also provided. Trattoria Felice Restaurant serves Italian specialities for lunch and dinner, while Ah Yat Abalone Seafood Restaurant serves fresh seafood. Drinks are available at Camelot Wine Pub. Arnoma Hotel Bangkok is 23 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. It is a block away from the Erawan Shrine. Airport shuttle service is available upon request.

name: Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok
description: Located in Bangkok, 3.5 km from MBK Center, Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. At the hotel each room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. At Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok you will find a restaurant serving American, Steakhouse and Asian cuisine. Jim Thompson House is 3.9 km from the hotel, while Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from Grande Centre Point Surawong Bangkok.

description: Set in Bangkok, 1.1 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, The Fig Lobby offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. name: Ascott Embassy Sathorn
description: Featuring a swimming pool and a sauna, Ascott Embassy Sathorn is located in Bangkok and is a five-minute stroll from The Met Skyscraper. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel features comfortable 5-star rooms and a bar. Ascott Embassy Sathorn provides a 24/7 reception, plus meeting rooms and room service. For families Ascott Embassy Sathorn offers a children's play area. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a coffee maker and slippers. Each has a bathroom that provides bathrobes and a hair dryer. Bangkok's attractions, such as Patpong and Empire Tower, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Guests can also visit MahaNakhon and Robot Building.Revato

name: W Bangkok
address: 106 North Sathorn Road, Silom, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500
description: W Bangkok fuels travel appetites with its proximity to the BTS Station for easy access to the rest of the city. Cruise down the Chao Phraya River and take in the sights and sounds of Bangkok. Premier shopping outlets like ICONSIAM and Siam Paragon are within minutes of our 5-star hotel in Sathorn, Bangkok, while spiritual sanctuaries like the Temple of Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho offer quiet retreats. Dive into history at The Grand Palace or dine at our very own The House on Sathorn, a national heritage site, now one of the premier restaurants in Bangkok. The House on Sathorn is known for its modern Thai seafood cuisine. The WET® Deck serves up cocktails and quick bites by the pool. Unwind in our hotel in Bangkok, Thailand's AWAY® Spa or sweat it out in our FIT gym. Host your next meeting in a magnetic venue like the Great Room. Our Whatever/Whenever® service means you get what you need when you need it. The stylish, vibrant rooms and suites make your stay at W Bangkok a memorable one.Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20
description: Novotel Bangkok Sukhumvit 20 hotel is an upscale full-service hotel that offers modern facilities and accommodations. For food loving guests we offer our full executive Sky Club Lounge, on-site GourmetBar and Food Exchange. If you're more into relaxation, come by the Infinity Pool, Kids Club and spa! Being located in the heart of Sukhumvit, Bangkok's shopping and restaurant district, the hotel is just a few minutes walk to Sukhumvit MRT and Asoke BTS station. Just hop onto our hotel Tuk Tuk service!accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Click Sathorn 11 Bangkok
address: 3 Soi Sathorn 11 Yeak 2, South Sathorn Road Kweang Yan Nawa, Bangkok 10120
description: Best Western Click Sathorn 11 Bangkok is nestled on a secluded street just off Sathorn Road, Bangkok’s main financial district, close to the Silom area and Chao Phraya River. This modern midscale hotel offers 119 rooms, a restaurant, and an outdoor pool with city views. Guests can explore the local area, including world-class shopping, dining, and medical care, and the BTS Skytrain puts the entire city within easy reach. For visitors seeking a new way to stay connected in Bangkok, this is a superb option. Best Western Click Sathorn 11 Bangkok is nestled on a quiet residential street, just moments from the soaring skyscrapers of Sathorn Road, Bangkok’s main financial district, and not far from the lively Silom area and Chao Phraya River. This modern midscale hotel features 119 contemporary rooms, each of which is fully equipped with comfortable king or twin beds, a 50-inch Smart TV, in-room safe, mini-fridge, electric kettle, working desk, tea and coffee making facilities, and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi. Guests can dine in style at the fashionable onsite restaurant which serves a refreshing daily breakfast. For complete relaxation, the hotel’s outdoor pool is the perfect place to enjoy a refreshing dip with views of the city. Alternatively, travelers can head out and explore the local area, including Asiatique The Riverfront, diverse dining at a choice of Thai and international restaurants, world-class medical care at Saint Louis Hospital, and breath-taking views from the Mahanakhon Skywalk. Saint Louis BTS Skytrain station is just a short stroll away, putting the entire city within easy reach. For business or leisure travelers seeking a new way to stay connected in Bangkok, Best Western Click Sathorn 11 Bangkok hotel is an outstanding option.bestwestern.com

name: Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok
address: 69 ถนน เย็นอากาศ ช่องนนทรี, Bangkok 10140
description: Situated in Bangkok, Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok is a short drive from Centralworld and provides free private parking on site. It also offers a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. This 4-star property provides a roof garden, a safe and luggage storage. A fitness centre is available to guests wanting to keep active while away. The property also has its very own gym, Shama Gym. Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok provides 136 apartments, each fitted with a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and tea and coffee making facilities. The bathrooms have a shower and offer bathrobes. Shama Yen-Akat Bangkok's on-site restaurant, Brunch Paradiso, is a popular place to enjoy a meal. The property is less than a 45-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Grand Palace and Parliament of Thailand are also a short car ride away.Revato

name: Madi Paidi Bangkok, Autograph Collection
address: 22 Soi Sukhumvit 53, Sukhumvit Road, North Klongtan, Wattana, Bangkok 10110
description: Autograph Collection Hotels brings the art of storytelling to life by curating hotels that are rich in design and character. Created for travelers seeking unique experiences, no two hotels within the collection are the same. Each Autograph Collection Hotel is a solitary treasure that surprises and inspires, offering the promise of individuality with the assurance and benefits of Marriott International and Bonvoy. Madi Paidi Bangkok, Autograph Collection is centrally located in Soi Sukhumvit 53, locally referred to as Paidee Madee, adjacent to Thong Lor. This luxury boutique hotel’s name translates to wishing a pleasant arrival and pleasant journey. Design and service are inspired by contrast and parallelism of its location, touching on the coexisting ways of life resembling Soi Pai Dee Ma Dee's residential charm and the heaving vibrancy of Soi Thong Lor. Discover modern nuances with subtle hints of Thainess and heritage in the details and enjoy being hosted graciously. auto.bkkbh.ays@autographhotels.comMarriott

name: Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit, An IHG Hotel
address: 89/8, 89/9 Sukhumvit 24 Alley,Khlong Tan, Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110
description: Newest hotel on Sukhumvit, Bangkok. A home away from home! Welcome home to Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit where you can experience a break from the travel norm. We are a brand-new hotel located right on Sukhumvit 24, Phrom Phong BTS Station, surrounded by many well-known malls like Emquartier, Emporium, Samitivej Hospital, Asoke, Embassy and many more. Our spacious suites include full kitchenettes, workspace, and living area that you can unwind and recharge your energy and feel “at home”. Put your best foot forward with our complimentary hot breakfast buffet, relax in our Japanese Onsen, sauna and outdoor pool facilities. The Den provides for a great co-working space as well as a space to unwind. Free high-speed Wi-Fi is offered to ensure you always stay connected seamlessly with your loved ones. Our central location makes this hotel a great fit for both business and leisure travel. No matter what brings you to Bangkok, why not make the most of it when you book your stay at Staybridge Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park
description: Indulge in the convenience of a prime hotel location in Bangkok. Discover the perfect blend of comfort and convenience at Crowne Plaza Bangkok Lumpini Park, located in the Silom district of Bangkok. Only steps from Sala Daeng BTS Station and Silom MRT Station, puts you right in the heart of the city. Whether you're visiting for business or leisure, our location ensures easy access to cultural attractions and shopping complexes. Within minutes, you can explore Silom's renowned shopping destinations, such as Siam Paragon, Chinatown, and the Chao Phraya River. Our hotel is the preferred choice for corporate events and customized banquets, boasting eleven meeting venues. Whether you're hosting a conference or planning a special celebration, our dedicated team is here to provide personalized service. Experience a seamless check-in process with the assistance of our dedicated Japanese-speaking guest relations and friendly front desk team located in the lobby on the 23rd floor. Elevating your stay with our newly renovated rooms providing breathtaking views of the vibrant Bangkok cityscape. From international delights to local specialties. Treat your taste buds at Panorama all day dining restaurant. Explore further dining options at Xian Tian Di Chinese Restaurant. Enjoy a selection of premium whiskeys at The Finishing Post Bar, or a glass of craft beer at Tap It. Book your stay with us and make the most memorable trip in Bangkok.IHG Hotels & Resorts

Whether traveling for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard is sure to be comfortable and productive!Marriott

name: The Riski Hotel At Bangphlat Station Sha
description: The Riski Hotel at Bangphlat Station SHA is located in Bangkok, 6.7 km from Bangkok National Museum and 7 km from Temple of the Emerald Buddha. The property is situated 7 km from Khao San Road, 7.6 km from Grand Palace and 7.9 km from Wat Arun. Siam Discovery is 10 km away and Jim Thompson House is 10 km from the hotel. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers American, Asian or halal options. The Riski Hotel at Bangphlat Station SHA offers 3-star accommodation with an indoor pool and terrace. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide guidance at the reception. Wat Saket is 8.1 km from The Riski Hotel at Bangphlat Station SHA, while Wat Pho is 8.2 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Intercontinental Bangkok Sukhumvit
address: 10 Soi Sukhumvit 59, Sukhumvit Road,Klongtan Nua, Watthana, Bangkok 00000
description: Set in the vibrant district of Sukhumvit - the new hot spot for business and lifestyle in Bangkok, InterContinental Bangkok Sukhumvit makes a luxurious and relaxing base for unparalleled experiences. With the Thonglor BTS station a 5 minutes' walk away, enjoy direct access to renowned UNESCO office, commercial hubs and departmental stores.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Salil Hotel Sukhumvit 57 - Thonglor
description: Set only a 5-minute walk from Thong Lo BTS Skytrain Station, The Salil Hotel Sukhumvit 57 - Thonglor offers a comfortable and luxurious accommodation in Bangkok. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurants and cafés along with its rooftop pool. Each room features a flat-screen smart TV, kitchenette and refrigerator. For your comfort, you will find a seating area, bathrobes and a hairdryer. All bathrooms are equipped with electronic toilet seat, bathtub and free amenities. At property, guests can enjoy all-day dining at Bar Storia del Caffè, relax at the The Secret Garden with its outdoor seating or sip high tea at the Mariage Frères Tea Room. The Salil Hotel Sukhumvit 57 is only 1.5 km from the Emporium Shopping Mall and 2.1 km from Camillian Hospital while Samitivej Sukhumvit Hospital is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: The Westin Grande Sukhumvit, Bangkok
description: Recharge at The Westin Grande Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Find us in the Bangkok city center, alongside the BTS Asok Skytrain and steps from the Sukhumvit MRT subway station. Find the ideal event accommodations at our hotel on Sukhumvit Road, whether you're attending an event at Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC), Bangkok International Trade & Exhibition Center (BITEC) or IMPACT Arena. Delight in downtown Bangkok's inspiring culture and nightlife, just minutes away. Stay fit in our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, relax at Vareena Spa or dip in our hotel's rooftop swimming pool. Expect an inspiring experience in our first-class restaurants. Favored by Japanese expats, Kisso has been voted Best Japanese Restaurant in Bangkok. Visit Seasonal Tastes restaurant for our international buffet, filled with delectable dishes, or stop by Zest Bar & Terrace for a quick drink. Our five-star hotel keeps you connected with high-speed internet before you end the day in the comfort of a Heavenly® Bed.Marriott

name: Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa
description: Situated in lush surroundings between Suvarnabhumi International Airport (BKK) and the city centre, Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa is the perfect starting point for discovery in Thailand. From Bangkok's modern nightlife to its ancient temples and palaces, fully immerse yourself in our culture. Sensory experiences are found throughout our five-star luxury resort in Bangkok, from visionary meeting rooms that encourage innovation to restaurants that delight the palate. For hours of leisure and entertainment, visit Explore Spa by Le Méridien, Summit Windmill Golf Club or our outdoor saltwater infinity pool. Delight in unexpected accommodation with your freestanding bathtub, glass-enclosed rain shower, or LM BED with an artistic rendering of a traditional Wai greeting. Every hotel room at our Bangkok luxury resort includes sweeping golf course views from floor-to-ceiling windows and a private balcony or terrace. Change your perspective at Le Méridien Suvarnabhumi, Bangkok Golf Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Suvarnabhumi Airport
description: Our 4 star hotel is the official hotel of Suvarnabhumi airport. Offering 612 guest rooms and suites made with Thai designs, our key focuses are exclusive accommodations and excellent accessibility and convenience. Providing 24-Hour Flexi with no set check-in when our guests arrive at our hotel, you have the luxury to plan your day without worrying about predetermined check-in timings. Our airport hotel also has features 8 restaurants and bars, VOUS spa, a tropical swimming pool with pool bar and more.accorhotels.com

name: Casa Vimaya Riverside
description: Casa Vimaya Riverside provides rooms with free WiFi and rooftop poolside bar in Bangkok, well situated a 5-minute walk from Khao San Road. Popular points of interest nearby include Bangkok City Pillar and Temple of the Golden Mount. The property features a restaurant and Temple of the Emerald Buddha is a 15-minute walk away. All guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom, while certain rooms at Casa Vimaya Riverside also feature a balcony. The rooms at the accommodation include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Guests at Casa Vimaya Riverside can sample Thai dishes at the riverfront restaurant or relax at a rooftop swimming pool. Staff speak English and Thai at the 24-hour front desk. Grand Palace is 1.5 km from Casa Vimaya Riverside. Don Mueang International Airport is 21 km away.

name: Tastoria Collection Sukhumvit - Sha Extra Plus
description: Tastoria Collection Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Bangkok. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is less than 1 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, and within 2.2 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. At Tastoria Collection Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus rooms include bed linen and towels. An à la carte, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Central Embassy is 2.5 km from Tastoria Collection Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok
description: Modern yet inspired by Thai culture, with thoughtful touches in every design decision, The Athenee Hotel, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok is rooted in authentic experiences. Situated in Sukhumvit, one of the most central districts of Bangkok, guests are steps from the Skytrain connecting directly to premium shopping malls and local attractions. Built on the grounds of Kandhavas, the palace of Princess Valaya Alongkorn, daughter of King Rama V, our Bangkok five-star hotel encapsulates elegance and allure. Whether you are savoring curated menus at one of our eight restaurants, indulging in holistic treatments at Athenee Spa, floating in our free-form rooftop pool or enchanting guests from eco-friendly venues, unsurpassed experiences await on Wireless Road. Reserve a pet-friendly room styled after Thai epochs at our luxury hotel in Sukhumvit, or select a suite offering butler services such as private check-in, shoe shining and a personal shopper. The Athenee Hotel welcomes you to Bangkok with distinction.Marriott

name: Mercure Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
description: Conveniently located on the bustling Sukhumvit Soi 11, Mercure Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 is only a few minutes away from Nana BTS station and the entertainment and shopping districts. The hotel's newly renovated 232 rooms feature a breathtaking outdoor swimming pool, club lounge with business centre, modern fitness centre and 2 restaurants and bars.accorhotels.com

name: Plai And Herbs Suvarnabhumi Airport
address: 88 Soi Kingkaew 43,King Kaew Road, Racha Thewa 10540
description: Only a 5-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport, Plai&Herbs, Suvarnabhumi Airport offers accommodation with free WiFi access throughout the property. It features tastefully furnished Thai-style rooms with private balconies overlooking the city. Well-situated in Bangkok’s Bangplee District, Plai&Herbs, Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 25-minute drive from downtown Bangkok. It is about a 30-minute drive from Seacon Square and Central Bangna. Featuring warm shades of red and gold, air-conditioned rooms come with classic wood furnishings, satellite TV and a vanity. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and shower facilities. Recreation options at Plai&Herbs, Suvarnabhumi Airport include a pool table and traditional Thai massages. For convenience, tour and car rental services are available. The property also features a 24-hour front desk. Enjoy casual dining at Plai Garden’s restaurant, which features Thai specialities and an outdoor dining area. After-meal drinks are served at the bar. Room service is available between 09:00-22:00 hrs.

name: Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit
address: 2 Sukhumvit Soi 57, Klongtan Nua, Wattana, Bangkok 10110
description: With Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit, you find the future of travel near Bangkok's shopping, dining, entertainment and tourist attractions, as well as business hotspots such as BITEC. Our hotel near Sukhumvit Road is in the heart of Bangkok's most chic and energetic districts. Rest in well-appointed hotel rooms replete with pillowtop mattresses, marble bathrooms and views of the popular Sukhumvit area. Upgrade to a luxury suite for more five-star perks such as free cocktails and access to an Executive Lounge. Savor some of Bangkok's finest cuisine at our award-winning steakhouse and rooftop bar or indulge in sweet bites at our hotel's in-house dessert shop. Use our onsite dining to cater meetings, weddings and social affairs in 10,700 square feet of flexible event space, enhanced by expert planners. At Bangkok Marriott Hotel Sukhumvit, we help you feel confident when you are on the road and especially when you're on Sukhumvit Road.Marriott

name: Loft 202 Hotel
description: Situated in Bangkok, 19 km from Central Festival EastVille, Loft 202 Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and an ATM. The hotel has family rooms. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The hotel offers some rooms with city views, and rooms are fitted with a balcony. All units have a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. An American breakfast is available each morning at Loft 202 Hotel. Emporium Shopping Mall is 22 km from the accommodation, while Central Plaza Ladprao is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 9 km from Loft 202 Hotel.

name: lebua at State Tower - SHA Plus
description: Awarded the 2021 Top Hotel in Bangkok by Condé Nast Traveler Readers' Choice Awards, the luxurious Lebua at State Tower is home to one of the highest rooftop bar in the world with stunning views of the city. This modern property is ideally located in Silom and is within walking distance of Saphan Taksin BTS Station. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. Amenities include complimentary wireless internet access, a swimming pool and a sauna. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Swimming Pool. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and a private balcony. They all offer an in-room closet, slippers and a flat-screen TV. Lebua at State Tower boasts convenient dining options, including French dishes at Chef’s Table - Two-Michelin-Star and international and Mediterranean meals at Sirocco - Dining under the stars. Additionally there is an elegant cocktail bar on-site, which has an impressive cocktail list. Guests can also relax with a drink at Distil Bar. Lebua at State Tower is within walking distance of the Bangkok Folk Museum, the Taksin Bridge and Si Lom. For those wishing to eat out, the hotel is close to a variety of local cafés and restaurants.Revato

name: Dwella Suvarnabhumi
description: Set in Lat Krabang, 18 km from Mega Bangna, Dwella Suvarnabhumi offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel has a terrace and a restaurant. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer and slippers. A continental, Full English/Irish or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Bangkok International Trade and Exhibition Centre BITEC is 24 km from Dwella Suvarnabhumi, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 26 km from the property. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi, 3 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: 41 Suite Bangkok
address: 2/39-41 Soi Sukhumvit 41 (Pirom) Klongton Nua, Wattana, Bangkok 10110
description: Situated in the heart of Bangkok City’s Sukhumvit area, this non-smoking boutique property is surrounded by entertainment options. It offers a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and rooms with free Wi-Fi access. 41 Suite Bangkok is within 500 metres of Prompong Skytrain Station, Benjasin Central Park and Emporium Department Store. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Featuring wooden flooring and wall art, modern air-conditioned rooms at 41 Suite are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. In addition to a personal safe, a minibar and a light meal are included. 41 Club Restaurant serves a variety of Thai specialities and European favourites. Refreshing drinks are also available here.

name: Winning tower
description: Winning tower features inner courtyard views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Bangkok, 4.5 km from Emporium Shopping Mall. All units come with a terrace with pool views, a kitchen with a fridge, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower. A an indoor play area is also available at the aparthotel, while guests can also relax in the garden. Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 6.9 km from Winning tower, while Central Embassy is 7.5 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

name: Galleria 10 Sukhumvit Bangkok by Compass Hospitality
description: Located under a 10-minute stroll from Asok BTS Skytrain Station, Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality offers guests an ideal base when in Bangkok. Offering free wireless internet, a restaurant and an outdoor pool, the hotel is within a 10-minute walk of Terminal 21. Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality has a gym with a swimming pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. Just a stone's throw from nearby clubs and bars, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and a rain shower. Each has a bathroom that provides a bathtub and slippers. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning at Galleria 10 Hotel Bangkok By Compass Hospitality, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. The in-house restaurant, Nomad, serves Asian, American and European cuisine. Located within walking distance of BTS Nana Station, the hotel offers a tour desk with information on what to see in Bangkok. Guests can also visit Soi Cowboy.Revato

name: Villa De Pranakorn
description: Set in Bangkok, less than 1 km from Wat Saket, Villa De Pranakorn offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel provides an indoor pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at Villa De Pranakorn can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Khao San Road, Temple of the Emerald Buddha and Wat Pho. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 26 km from Villa De Pranakorn, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sleep With Inn
description: Value-for-money accomodation accompanied with beautiful Thai decor can be enjoyed at Sleep Withinn. Conveniently located near Bangkok's popular Khaosan Road, it has a rooftop pool and a 24-hour front desk. Sleep Withinn is a 5-minute walk from the Grand Palace and Temple of the Golden Mount. Suvarnabhumi Airport is about 28 km from the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms are stylishly decorated with unique hand-made artwork and come with en suite bathrooms. Each is equipped with a satellite TV and personal safe. Guests may enjoy a cool dip at the outdoor swimming pool or send an e-mail home with the Wi-Fi internet access available. Day trips can also be arranged at the tour desk.

name: Mövenpick Hotel Sukhumvit 15 Bangkok
description: Located in the heart of Bangkoks Central Business District. The hotels key features are its personalized service, and comfortably appointed accommodation with 363 rooms, surround lush tropical foliage replete with cascading waterfall, hanging gardens and an iconic central Plumier Lelawadee tree. Also featured is an elegant all day dining restaurant with live cooking station preparing beautiful Thai and international delicacies and a breathtaking rooftop bar and pool offering panoramic views over Bangkok.accorhotels.com

name: Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Bangkok
description: Experience unrivaled luxury and sophistication at Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, a Luxury Collection Hotel, ideally located on Sukhumvit Road. With direct access to the BTS SkyTrain and close proximity to the MRT station, the city’s best experiences and tourist attractions are only a few stops away. Escape the bustling city life and enter a world of serenity at our free-form swimming pool and The Grande Spa. Indulge in a world of culinary delights from the finest local authentic flavors to delectable international cuisines at our award-winning restaurants that promise an unforgettable culinary experience. Our 420 spacious guest rooms and suites showcase the essence of local culture with a luxurious twist and our latest technology and connectivity, ensure you stay up to date and connected with loved ones or business clients. Discover the pinnacle of luxury Bangkok hotels at the Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit, where every moment is an exquisite revelation.Marriott

name: Pathumwan Princess Hotel
address: 444 Mbk Center, Phayathai Rd., Wangmai, Bangkok 10330
description: Blending Thai hospitality and stylish décor, the award-winning 5-star Pathumwan Princess Hotel - SHA Extra Plus Certified - SHA Certified is located just next to MBK Shopping Centre and opposite Siam Square. It offers 10 dining options, an outdoor pool and a tennis court. Pathumwan Princess Hotel - SHA Extra Plus Certified - SHA Certified is 24 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport. The hotel is directly connected to National Stadium BTS Skytrain Station and a 5-minute walk from Siam BTS Skytrain Station. With beautiful dark wood flooring, spacious rooms at Pathumwan Princess have floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views of the Bangkok skyline. Each room comes with a flat-screen cable/satellite TV and modern glass bathrooms. Pathumwan Princess Hotel - SHA Extra Plus Certified - SHA Certified features relaxing massage treatments and meditation rooms. Rooftop tennis courts and a jogging track are available at The Olympic Club Fitness Centre. Meetings and events can be arranged at Pathumwan Princess. Dining options at Pathumwan Princess include Italian, Korean, European and Thai dishes. Sandwiches and coffee are available at t@Lobby Café. Studio Bar offers jazz music and cocktails.

name: Parinda Hotel
description: Parinda Hotel is an excellent choice for a CLEAN and COMFORTABLE stay in Bangkok’s prime shopping and business area. This modern-style hotel takes pride in delivering top notch cleanliness and comfortable rooms. Guests consistently rate 9.3 out of 10 on cleanliness and comfort. Guests return because the hotel is clean, rooms are large, and once you step inside the hotel it is peaceful. All rooms are non-smoking and spacious at 36 sqm. with a king-size bed, 3-seater sofa, and bathrooms have a shower and bathtub. Another added convenience is free parking for guests. The hotel has a fully equipped gym and an outdoor swimming pool. But if you prefer to exercise outdoors, we are a 3-minute walk from the newly landscaped Benchakitti Forest Park with over 118 acres to explore by bicycling, jogging, or walking. Location-wise, Parinda Hotel is easily accessible with exits to both Sukhumvit and Rama4 road. The hotel is a 15-minute walk to the main Sukhumvit road for access to the Nana or Ploenchit BTS stations where popular shopping and dining areas are just 1-2 stops away. Don Mueang Airport and Suvarnabhumi International Airport are a 35-minute ride away.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok
description: Enjoy having Thailand at your doorstep from our downtown Bangkok hotel. JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok is a 5-star oasis with modern spaces and luxury amenities that pamper and inspire. Multilingual hotel associates provide signature Marriott service at every moment, ensuring a visit that is nothing short of extraordinary. Unwind with indulgent spa treatments, lounge in a designer chaise by the palm-tree-framed tiled pool or refresh in our hotel's modern fitness center. Our beautifully appointed hotel rooms and suites blend downtown Bangkok views with impeccable design and 5-star perks. Superb hotel dining ranges from a fashionably cool New York Steakhouse to authentic Chinese and Japanese delicacies, and cozy cafés for casual sipping and socializing. For a memorable wedding or impressive meeting in Bangkok, take advantage of 14,412 square feet of sophisticated event space, fully customizable to meet your vision. JW Marriott Hotel Bangkok is where exceptional luxury emerges in the heart of Bangkok, Thailand.Marriott

name: Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok
description: Set on the East Bank of the mighty Chao Phraya River, Chatrium Hotel Riverside Bangkok offers the perfect escape in the heart of Bangkok for travellers looking for a 5-star hotel in Bangkok. This award winning hotel is designed with the needs of the discerning modern globetrotter in mind, our spacious and newly renovated rooms feature cutting edge technology and stunning views of the river or city. Guests also have access to versatile function spaces perfectly suited for corporate meetings or grand social functions. Foodie adventures await at our six restaurants and bars, while the infinity pool, Fitness Center, Chatrium Club Lounge and Nemita Spa will help you unwind to make your stay truly unforgettable.Official Hotel Information

name: Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok
address: 865 Rama 1 Road, Opp. National Stadium, Bangkok 10330
description: Located in Bangkok, Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok is within walking distance of MBK Center and provides a rooftop terrace and an infinity pool. It offers city views and free Wi-Fi. Those staying at the hotel can start their day at Swimming Pool, or use the various fitness and leisure amenities, including fitness classes. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Fitness Center. Part of the quality service at Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok includes gifts such as a complimentary fruit bowl in each of the rooms. They are air conditioned and offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to enjoy breakfast at Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok's in-house eateries, then later sit down to Thai and Asian dishes at Taan or international cuisine at Chim Chim. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail at Paradise Lost. Siam@Siam Design Hotel Bangkok is conveniently located for sightseeing in Bangkok, with the Jim Thompson House only a stone's throw away. It is also within walking distance of Siam Centre, Siam Square and Siam Paragon.Revato

name: Marsi Hotel @ Bangchak
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, Marsi Hotel @ Bangchak is set in Bangkok, 5.7 km from Bangkok International Trade and Exhibition Centre BITEC and 5.9 km from Emporium Shopping Mall. The property is situated 7.4 km from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre, 9.3 km from Lumpini Park and 10 km from Central Embassy. The hotel offers city views, a year-round outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Amarin Plaza is 12 km from Marsi Hotel @ Bangchak, while Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit
description: Located in the Khlong Toei district of Bangkok, Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus Certified provides accommodation with a bar and free WiFi. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is a 3-minute walk from Emporium Shopping Mall and a 12-minute walk from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus Certified have a TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a seating area. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, American or Asian breakfast is available daily at the property. The accommodation offers an outdoor pool. Samitivej Sukhumvit Hospital is a 14-minute walk from Hyatt Place Bangkok Sukhumvit - SHA Extra Plus Certified. Suvarnabhumi Airport is 20 km away.

name: Chillax Resort
description: Chillax Resort is 0.6 km from Khoasan Road. Boasting an infinity pool, the hotel features free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Free private parking is available on site. The hotel is 1.1 km to Democracy Monument. Grand Palace is located 1.4 km from the hotel, while Wat Pho Temple is 1.8 km away. Each air-conditioned room features a TV, minibar and en suite bathroom with shower facilities and free toiletries. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. The hotel also includes baggage storage and safe. A fitness centre is also available. A wide range of Thai and Western cuisine can be enjoyed at Pranakhon Restaurant. Guests can also sit back and enjoy refreshing drinks, snacks and soothing music at the Kappu Lounge.

name: Pullman Bangkok King Power
description: Pullman Bangkok King Power is a lifestyle hotel in the heart of the city where travelers can experience a true 'resort in the city', inspired by Pullman's unique 'Bleisure' concept, a space in which business and leisure blend seamlessly together. Whatever your reason for being in Bangkok, our Bangkok city hotel is ideally located for both business or leisure travelers, and the property is only moments away from Victory Monument BTS Skytrain Station and within easy reach of the Phaya Thai Airport Rail Linkaccorhotels.com

name: Tints Of Blue Hotel
description: Nestled in the vibrant Sukhumvit of Bangkok, Tints of Blue Hotel's neighbourhood is yet peaceful and convenient, only 700 metres from MRT Sukhumvit Station and Asoke BTS Skytrain Station. This thoughtfully designed hotel offers cosy guestrooms with balcony, an outdoor pool, and free WiFi. Appointed with minimalist-style furniture and decor, each guestroom at Tints of Blue has ample amount of natural light, a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a safety deposit box. All units include a kitchenette, a dining area and an en suite bathroom supplied with free toiletries. For guests' additional convenience, Hotel Tints of Blue provides shuttles, luggage storage and laundry services. During the stay, guests can take advantage of the sun terrace and fitness centre. Guests can easily access the upper floor by lifts. Emporium Shopping Mall is 900 metres from Tints of Blue Hotel, while Seafood Market is 1.2 km away. Suvarnabhumi Airport is situated 21 km from this accommodation. You can find various night entertainment sites as well as a range to dining outlets in the property's surroundings.

name: Siam Champs Elyseesi Unique Hotel
description: Centrally situated, Siam Champs Elyseesi Unique Hotel offers easy access to Bangkok's popular hot spots. Guests can also make the most of free internet access in all areas. This historic hotel offers massage services, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. For families Siam Champs Elyseesi Unique Hotel offers a children's play area. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They each provide a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a desk. Siam Champs Elyseesi Unique Hotel houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day. For those preferring to dine out, the local area features several bars and restaurants with a selection of varied cuisines. Bangkok's attractions, such as the Giant Swing and Wat Saket, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Chao Phraya River is also a short drive away.Revato

name: Casa Nithra Bangkok
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and garden, Casa Nithra Hotel offers accommodation in Bangkok. The property is 1.3 km to Khao San Road and 2.5 km from Grand Palace. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. All air-conditioned rooms include a seating area and flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each has a bathroom with shower and free toiletries. Some rooms have a bathtub. The Sirin Dining Room serves Thai cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Casa Nithra Hotel is 7.5 km from Patpong and 35.6 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport. The property offers free parking on site.

name: Tower Club at lebua
description: Situated in Silom, Tower Club at Lebua offers 5-star accommodation and a sauna, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Spa and wellness centre and Fitness centre. Guests on business can benefit from the hotel's executive floor, photocopier and meeting rooms, plus enjoy views of Bangkok. For trendy travellers a vodka bar provides a delightful setting for an after-meal drink. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. All rooms feature a modern décor, air-conditioning and a private balcony. Bathrooms are stocked with necessities like bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Tower Club at Lebua's elegant bar has a varied drinks menu, while the in-house restaurant serves Mediterranean and international dishes. Alternatively, there are a variety of other eating options in the local area. Tower Club at Lebua is just a short walk from Chao Phraya River and State Tower. For those travelling by car, the hotel offers free private parking on site.Revato

name: Syama Suite Sukhumvit 20
description: The 4.5-star Syama Sukhumvit 20 Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Bangkok. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, Wi-Fi in public areas, business center. Television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, outdoor pool. Discover all Bangkok has to offer by making Syama Sukhumvit 20 Hotel your base.priceline.com

name: Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11
description: Discover an oasis in Sukhumvit, Bangkok. Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 is an urban gem in a stimulating travel destination. Our hotel in Sukhumvit features loft-inspired rooms and suites with tech-smart features, free Wi-Fi and panoramic views of the Bangkok cityscape. Our hotel's prime location in Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok, places the excitement of Soi 11 at your doorstep, you can also take advantage of our complimentary hotel shuttle to the Nana BTS SkyTrain and Sukhumvit MRT subway stations for access to celebrated attractions. Bring your vision to life in versatile event spaces designed for productive corporate gatherings and flawless social affairs. Unwind at our pool after a busy day of work or exploring Bangkok with cocktails or enjoy a live entertainment at our W XYZ Bar. Aloft Bangkok Sukhumvit 11 has everything you need for Thailand business trips or vacations.Marriott

name: Ploykhumthong Boutique Resort
description: PloyKhumThong Boutique Resort is a 10-minute drive away from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Offering modern air-conditioned rooms, the resort features free Wi-Fi. The resort is a 5-minute drive to The Paseo Shopping Avenue and Ladkrabang Airport Rail Link Station. It is a 10-minute drive to King Mongkut's Institute of Technology Ladkrabang. Mahanakorn Floating Market is a 15-minute drive away. Colourful rooms at PloyKhumThong Boutique Resort are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and a refrigerator. An en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. Tours and air tickets can be booked at the tour desk while laundry service and currency exchange can be arranged at the 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy a great selection of international dishes at the resort’s restaurant.

name: Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13
description: In a prime location in the centre of Bangkok, Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13 provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool and to a sauna. The property has a garden, as well as a restaurant that serves American and Mediterranean cuisine. At the hotel, every room has a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13 can enjoy an à la carte or a continental breakfast. The accommodation offers a children's playground. With staff speaking English and Thai, guidance is available at the reception. Central Embassy is 2 km from Floral Court Hotel & Residence Sukhumvit 13, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 2.2 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 25 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bliston Suwan Park View
address: No9 Soi Tonson, Ploenchit Rd, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330
description: Bliston Hotel offers a luxurious and tranquil retreat in Bangkok, a 3-minute walk from Chidlom Skytrain Station. It provides spa treatments, an outdoor pool and a restaurant offering foie gras. Bliston Suwan Park View - SHA Plus hotel is a 30-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Popular shopping areas like Central World Plaza and the Pratunam Wholesale Market are about 1 km away. Spacious with wooden flooring, the air-conditioned apartments offer ample seating area. They have well-equipped kitchens and modern home entertainment systems with cable TV. Bathrooms come with a bathtub. Relaxation options at the Bliston Suwan Hotel include a rooftop swimming pool surrounded by sun loungers and a steam bath. The fitness centre provides professional trainers to assist guests. Spa@Tonson specialises in Thai massage. Offering a fine dining experience, Artur Restaurant features prime steaks, as well as, fresh seafood. The restaurant is well-known for its Caesar salad and extensive martini menu. The hotel offers room service, babysitting and laundry services. Car rentals are also provided for added convenience.

name: The Okura Prestige Bangkok
address: Park Venture Ecoplex, 57 Wireless Road, Bangkok 10330
description: This 5-star hotel offers modern accommodation in Bangkok and is a short stroll from BTS Phloen Chit Station. Guests also have exclusive access to the The Okura Spa and Cantilevered Swimming Pool. Guests staying at The Okura Prestige Bangkok Hotel can enjoy taking a dip in the infinity pool, working out in the fitness centre or unwinding with a drink at the on site bar. Amenities include free Wi-Fi and a sauna. It also features a sun deck with impressive city views. The Okura Prestige Bangkok Hotel has air conditioned rooms with luxury toiletries, a rain shower and a pillow menu. They feature a refrigerator, a mini bar and converters/voltage adaptors. The hotel boasts convenient dining options, including Japanese cuisines at Yamazato Restaurant and international meals at Up & Above Restaurant. Elements, Inspired by Ciel Bleu offers a fine dining experience, serving French cuisine in a award-winning setting. Situated in Siam, The Okura Prestige Bangkok Hotel is close to popular nightlife destinations. Big C, Centralworld and the Erawan Shrine are a brief stroll away.Revato

name: At Residence Suvarnabhumi Hotel
description: At Residence Suvarnabhumi offers comfortable rooms with lift access to all floors, as well as the convenience of a restaurant and a laundry service. Guests enjoy free WiFi, which is available throughout the residence. Suvarnabhumi International Airport and Airport Rail Link Lat Krabang Station are a 10-minute ride from At Residence Suvarnabhumi. The Paseo Mall and a local Thai market are a 10-minute walk away. Other shopping options, such as Paradise Park, Seacon Square, Mega Bangna Shopping Mall and Rot Fai Market (Train Market) are a 25-minute drive away. Rama IX Public Park is a 15-minute drive away. Modern air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and key-card access. En suite bathrooms are fitted with a rain shower and free toiletries. For meals, sample a variety of Thai and Chinese favourites served at At Home Cafe&Eatery, open daily from 07:00-21:00 hrs.

name: Oakwood Suites Bangkok
description: Located 300 metres from Emporium Shopping Mall, Oakwood Suites Bangkok offers 5-star accommodation in Bangkok and has a shared lounge, a terrace and a restaurant. Located around 3.3 km from Central Embassy, the hotel with free WiFi is also 2 km away from Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre. The property features a year-round outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. All units at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms are fitted with a kettle, while some rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. At Oakwood Suites Bangkok every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking both English and Thai, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Amarin Plaza is 3.7 km from Oakwood Suites Bangkok, while Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from the hotel.

name: The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality
description: Located in Bangkok, 1.5 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a snack bar, as well as a restaurant serving American cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel each room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality offers certain rooms with city views, and the rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or Full English/Irish options. The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality offers a terrace. Central Embassy is 4.7 km from the hotel, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 28 km from The Quartier Hotel Phromphong - Thonglor by Compass Hospitality.

name: Lamphu Tree House Boutique Hotel
description: Lamphu Tree House Boutique Hotel is located in the Bangkok Old Town district in Bangkok, 600 metres from Khao San Road. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Some rooms have a seating area where you can relax. Lamphu Tree House Boutique Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is featured. Lamphu Tree House Boutique Hotel has 2 buildings. All facilities including the 24-hour front desk, swimming pool, bar and restaurant are available at the main building. The second building is located approximately a 5-minute walk away. Temple of the Golden Mount is 800 metres from Lamphu Tree House Boutique Hotel, while Bangkok City Pillar is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 21 km from Lamphu Tree House Boutique Hotel.

name: Chatrium Grand Bangkok
description: Situated a short walk from Siam BTS Station, Chatrium Grand Bangkok is an ideal base when in Bangkok. It also provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a butler service. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including an executive floor, facial treatments and body treatments. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Chatrium Grand Bangkok offers air conditioned rooms with slippers, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each have tea and coffee making facilities, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. The hotel boasts convenient dining options, including international dishes at Savio and Mediterranean food at Casia. Each evening, guests can wind down in the lounge bar. Bangkok's attractions, including Siam Paragon, Siam Square and Centralworld, are within easy walking distance of Chatrium Grand Bangkok. It is also within walking distance of Big C and the Erawan Shrine.Revato

name: Dewan Bangkok
description: Conveniently situated, Dewan Bangkok allows for easy access to Bangkok's best sightseeing areas. It also provides free Wi-Fi, massage services and an outdoor pool. Luggage storage and a 24-hour reception are just some of the available services at the hotel. A lift and a designated smoking area are also provided. Dewan Bangkok offers air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a rain shower. They all offer tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a refrigerator. The hotel is located in the heart of Bangkok’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. Chao Phraya River is nearby.Revato

name: Grande Centre Point Ploenchit
description: Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit provides elegant accommodation in Bangkok and is a few minutes on foot from BTS Phloen Chit Station. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Let's Relax Spa and Swimming pool. This 5-star hotel offers an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and a sauna. There is also free private parking on site for those with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private balcony, slippers and a refrigerator. They each have a private bathroom, a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Guests staying at Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally situated for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Room service is also available during limited hours. Grande Centre Point Hotel Ploenchit is close to shops, dining and Bangkok's nightlife. The Erawan Shrine, Centralworld and Central Chidlom are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok
description: Located in Bangkok, Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok - A Chatrium Collection is within a 30-minute drive of Suvarnabhumi Airport and provides a plunge pool and a saltwater swimming pool. It offers city views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. All rooms are air conditioned and boast their very own seating and dining area. They feature a full kitchen, plus a private bathroom with a hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. Room service is also offered during certain times. Maitria Hotel Sukhumvit 18 Bangkok - A Chatrium Collection is close to Asok BTS Skytrain Station, making it easy for guests to explore Bangkok and its surrounding areas. Benjasiri Park, Soi Cowboy and Terminal 21 are a 10-minute walk away.Revato

name: Night Hotel Bangkok - Sukhumvit 15
description: A 5-minute walk from Sukhumvit MRT station and Asok BTS station, Night Hotel Bangkok is located on Sukhumvit 15. It offers a rooftop swimming pool and rooms with 42-inch flat-screen TVs. Free WiFi access and parking are available. Night Hotel Bangkok is Pet-Friendly. The stylish rooms at Night Hotel Bangkok are spacious and come with modern décor. Each room features Egyptian bed-sheet cotton and allergen-free pillows. Other amenities include a filled minibar, tea&coffee making with boiler and bathroom amenities on-demand. The hotel offers laundry and dry cleaning services. Currency exchange services are also available. Flava Restaurant offers views of Bangkok city, and serves up a wide spread of Italian and Thai dishes. The Flava Lounge provides a comfortable venue for guests to sip their cocktails. Night Hotel Bangkok is 25 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport and Don Mueng Airport. Walking distance 450 metres from Terminal 21 and Robinson Shopping Malls. Arnabhumi Airport is 31.1 km from the property.

name: The Mulberry Bangkok Khaosan Road
description: Rikka Inn is conveniently located in the popular Khaosan area. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, convenience store, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, wake-up service, desk. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include outdoor pool, garden. For reliable service and professional staff, Rikka Inn caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Sivatel Bangkok
description: Live the high life at Sivatel Bangkok Hotel, a 5-star luxurious hotel with free Wi-Fi, 2 dining options and an infinity pool. It is centrally located in Bangkok's Ploenchit area in Pathumwan district. Sivatel Bangkok Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station and less than 1 km from shopping at Central World Plaza and Pratunam Market. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is 40 km from the hotel. The modern rooms are equipped with a 40-inch flat-screen TV, iPod dock and Apple TV systems. A minibar and personal safe are also included. Spacious bathrooms feature a bathtub and floor-to-ceiling windows with beautiful city views. The Porch offers international cuisine and fine wine in an elegant setting. Other dining options include coffee at Cafe Jardin. Recreation choices include working out at the fitness centre, or enjoying a massage at the spa. The hotel also provides a business centre, tour desk and concierge services.

name: Skyview Hotel Bangkok
description: With a short walk from Phrom Phong BTS Station and a few steps from The Emporium Shopping Mall, SKYVIEW Hotel Bangkok offers accommodation with complimentary WiFi throughout and free private parking on site. Boasting floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking skyscrapers or a park, all rooms are equipped with a complete range of in-room facilities. Each unit is highly secured by a key card access system and the room temperature can be adjusted by guests individually. The flat-screen TV offers cable channels for guests' enjoyment. A living room and a fully-fitted kitchen are available in some room types. Extras include an electric kettle, coffee/tea facilities and free bottles of water. The en suite bathroom comes with either a shower or a bathtub and is equipped with premium amenities, including dental kits. Liquid is one of the nicest pool bars in Bangkok, where guests can savor refreshing drinks and cocktails. The outdoor salt water swimming pool is designed for indulgence and casual swimming. The sunbathing terrace is a perfect place for guests who simply love to get tanned. The fitness is open daily for 24 hours and features several professional grade machines to keep guests healthy during their stay. Friendly staff are standby at the front desk throughout the day and night to assist all guests whenever possible. Surcharged airport shuttle services can be arranged upon request. The hotel allows easy access to transportation services to get around Bangkok. Several shopping centres and recreational attractions are located within a walking distance. The EmQuartier Shopping Mall can be reached in a 5-minute walk. Suvarnabhumi International Airport and Don Muang International Airport are 30 km and 31 km respectively from SKYVIEW Hotel Bangkok.

name: Feung Nakorn Balcony Rooms and Cafe
address: 29 Soi Fueang Thong, Fueang Nakhon Road, Kwang Watratchabopit, Phranakorn, Bangkok 10200
description: No description found

name: 137 Pillars Residences Bangkok
description: The luxurious 137 Pillars Residences Bangkok offers comfortable residence-style suites with plush furnishings, white marble and free WiFi.
