Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel features rooms with hand-crafted furniture and bathroom amenities from the hotel’s spa. Each air-conditioned room comes with a cable TV, minibar and DVD player. Massages, facial and body treatments are offered at the Nakara Spa. Internet access is available at the hotel’s library. The hotel provides free parking. Guests can enjoy Asian food including traditional Thai cuisine at Ping Nakara Restaurant open daily from 11:00 until 22:00 hrs. Room service is available. Drinks are served at the Lobby Bar. Ping Nakara Boutique Hotel And Spa is a 5-minute walk to the Night Bazaar. Also within walking distance is the Ping Riverside Garden.

name: The Inside House
description: Attractively situated in Chiang Mai, The Inside House features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. With an outdoor swimming pool, the property also has a garden, as well as a terrace. Guests can grab a bite to eat in the in-house restaurant or relax in the bar. At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe. Rooms include a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast pool views. The rooms in The Inside House are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. An American, Asian or vegetarian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Round-the-clock advice is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Thai. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Chedi Luang Temple, Wat Phra Singh and Chiang Mai Gate. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International, 3 km from The Inside House, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Basic Line Hotel @ Loikroh
address: 14/2 Loikroh Road Soi 1, T. Changklan, Chiang Mai 50000
description: The 2-star Basic Line Hotel at Loikroh offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Chiang Mai. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are just some of the facilities on offer. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, wake-up service. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as spa, massage. For reliable service and professional staff, Basic Line Hotel at Loikroh caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Tai Resort
description: Situated in San Pa Tong, within 16 km of Grand Canyon Chiang Mai and 23 km of Central Plaza Chiang Mai Airport, Tai Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a garden, the property is located within 26 km of Chiang Mai Gate. The guest house has family rooms. Featuring a private bathroom, some units at the guest house also feature a terrace. Tai Resort offers an à la carte or Asian breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and free use of bicycles is available at the accommodation. Wat Phra Singh is 26 km from Tai Resort, while Chedi Luang Temple is 26 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 21 km from the guest house.

name: T Heritage Hotel
description: T Heritage Hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Chiang Mai. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 200 metres from Chedi Luang Temple, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. T Heritage Hotel provides certain rooms with city views, and each room includes a balcony. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Popular points of interest near T Heritage Hotel include Three Kings Monument, Chiang Mai Gate and Wat Phra Singh. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: Veranda High Residence
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a spa and wellness centre, Veranda High Residence is located in Hang Dong. It boasts luxury accommodation and the convenience of on-site parking. Free Wi-FI is available throughout the residence. Veranda High Residence is 3.2 km from Chiang Mai Night Safari and 7 km from Royal Flora Park. Chiang Mai Airport is 8 km away. Featuring floor-to ceiling glass doors and a private balcony, each air-conditioned unit is equipped with a sofa seating area and a flat-screen TV with a DVD player. Extras include a refrigerator and a minibar. An en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Slippers and bathrobes are provided. Guests can work out at the well-equipped fitness centre. Other facilities include kids' club and luggage storage. Meeting facilities are available on site. For meals, enjoy European dishes at The Higher Room. Other dining options include Rabiang Cha Restaurant, which serves a fusion of Lanna Thai cuisine. A range of beverages and healthy smoothies are available at Lobby Bar.

name: Stay with Nimman Chiang Mai
description: This comfortable hotel in Chiang Mai offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as a swimming pool and an airport shuttle. It is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai Zoo and provides free public parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. They all have an in-room safe, a seating area and an in-room closet. Guests are able to unwind with a beverage at Stay with Nimman Chiang Mai's bar and dine on European and Thai style food in the restaurant. The hotel also serves breakfast each day. Stay with Nimman Chiang Mai is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Doi Suthep-Pui National Park by car. Chiang Mai University and Wat Phra Singh are easily accessible by car.Revato

name: Lanna Oriental Hotel - Sha Extra Plus
description: Well situated in Chiang Mai, Lanna Oriental Hotel - SHA Extra Plus offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel has a fitness centre, year-round outdoor pool and terrace, and guests can dine in the restaurant. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a balcony. The rooms feature a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Chang Puak Market, Wat Phra Singh and Three Kings Monument. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International, 4 km from Lanna Oriental Hotel - SHA Extra Plus, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Goldenbell Hotel Chiangmai
description: This comfortable hotel in Chiang Mai offers free wireless internet, as well as a swimming pool and a 24-hour reception. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. A wide range of personalised services are available for guests of Golden Bell Hotel Chiang Mai, such as a 24-hour business centre, a concierge and 24-hour security. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Golden Bell Hotel Chiang Mai offer bottled water, slippers and a private bathroom. All provide a telephone, an in-room closet and a desk. Those in search of a meal and wanting to stay close by needn't look any further than Golden Bell Hotel Chiang Mai's on-site restaurant, which is ideally open each day for lunch. The hotel is less than a 10-minute car trip from Chiang Mai International Airport. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Chiang Mai.Revato

name: Villa San Pee Seua - SHA extra plus
description: Stop at Villa San Pee Seua to discover the wonders of Chiang Mai. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, garden, water sports (non-motorized), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. For reliable service and professional staff, Villa San Pee Seua caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Yantarasri Resort
description: Located in Chiang Mai’s Nimmanhaemin area, Yantarasri Resort offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and private bathrooms. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, a restaurant and free parking. Yantarasri Resort is a 5-minute walk to various shopping, dining and nightlife outlets in Nimmanhaemin. It is a 5-minute ride from Chiang Mai University and a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Night Bazaar is a 20-minute ride away. Yantarasri features rooms with a cable TV, minibar and a safety deposit box. Free toiletries and shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage during their stay. Other services include a travel desk, laundry and dry cleaning.

name: Feel Nimman Boutique
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, Feel Nimman Boutique features an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Built in 2017, the property is within just 300 metres of Nimman Haemin and 1.7 km of Ton Payom Market. Located in the Nimmanhaemin district, the hotel is within 2 km of Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre. Accessed via stairs only, guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Every room includes a private bathroom with a shower and a hair dryer, while selected rooms come with a terrace. The units include a wardrobe. Chang Puak Market is 2.4 km from the hotel, while Suan Dok Gate is 3 km from the property. Chiang Mai International Airport is 5 km away.

name: The Core Street By Stay Now - Sha Plus
description: The Core Street By Stay Now - SHA Plus features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Chiang Mai. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 3.4 km from Chang Puak Market. At the hotel each room is equipped with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms have a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. At The Core Street By Stay Now - SHA Plus all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. Chiang Mai International Convention and Exhibition Centre is 3.6 km from The Core Street By Stay Now - SHA Plus, while Chang Puak Gate is 4.2 km away. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Puripunn Hideaway
description: Located in Chiang Mai, Puripunn Hideaway Baby Grand Boutique is a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. The hotel features a spa, cafe and rooms with free WiFi. Puripunn Hideaway Baby Grand is 900 metres from the Wat Kate Temple Museum and a 10-minute walk from Chang Klan Street. The hotel offers free shuttle services to the Night Bazaar and Warorot Market. Rooms at the Puripunn Hideaway Baby Grand feature a flat-screen TV and a terrace that overlooks the swimming pool. A minibar, safe, and tea/coffee making facilities are also provided. Shower facilities and a bathtub are included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a massage at the Sala Spa or work-out at the fitness centre. The hotel offers laundry and dry cleaning services. Guests can access the upper floors by stairs. The on-site Punna Café serves traditional Thai, Northern Thai and European dishes. Other dining options include the Pool Lounge, which provides light snacks and drinks.

name: Sripat Guesthouse Sha Extra Plus
address: 16 Soi 7 Moon Muang Rd., Sri Phum, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Sripat Guesthouse SHA Extra Plus is a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. It offers an outdoor pool and a tour desk. Free Wi-Fi is offered in the entire residence. The property is located in the Chiang Mai Old City Area. Night Market and Sunday Walking Street are within a 5-minute walk from Sripat Guesthouse SHA Extra Plus. All rooms have air conditioning, a cable flat-screen TV and a fridge. Free toiletries are offered in en suite bathrooms. The guest house has a tour desk to help guests with travel arrangements. Guests can relax at the garden with leisure activities. Bicycle and car rental services are available. A range of both Thai and international restaurants are only a 5-minute walk from the residence.

name: Baan Chai Thung Resort
description: Located in the beautiful Doi Saket of Chiang Mai, Baan Chai Thung Resort offers spacious villas with free Wi-Fi in the middle of peaceful surroundings. Guests can take a dip in an outdoor swimming pool or relax with massage services. Baan Chai Thung Resort is a 1 hr drive to Doi Suthep, the city’s most famous landmark. It is a 20-minute drive to the city centre and a 30-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Fitted with dark tone wooden interiors, the villas are adorned with modern and traditional-inspired decorations. Each air-conditioned villa is equipped with a private balcony, a TV and a refrigerator. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. The hotel features a large garden where guests can roam around and feel the fresh air of Chiang Mai. A chargeable airport shuttle is available upon request. Baan Chai Thung specialises in Thai and European cuisines. The hotel’s bar also serves light snacks and beverages.

name: De Chai Colonial Hotel & Spa
address: 6/3 Thapae Soi 4, Changklan Maung, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Stylish colonial design is the trademark of De Chai Hotel, with its indoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Located along Thapae Road, it is a 5-minute walk from the Sunday Walking Street. De Chai The Colonial Hotel is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. Local attractions such as the popular Night Bazaar and historic Kad Luang Market are within a 10-minute stroll from the hotel. Fully air-conditioned and extra spacious, rooms at De Chai are equipped with 37-inch flat-screen TVs, DVD players and iPod docks. Beautiful city views can be enjoyed through the clear floor-to-ceiling windows. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Guests may indulge in a traditional Thai massage or arrange a day trip at the tour desk. For convenience, the hotel also provides laundry services and free parking. Shuttle service can be provided at additional charge. The Colonial De Chai Hotel’s restaurant serves a wide selection of authentic Thai and European dishes. A daily buffet breakfast is also available there. Limited parking available.

name: Diamond River Ping Petch-Ngam Hotel
description: Featuring free WiFi in public areas, Diamond River Ping Petch-Ngam Hotel is located east of Chiang Mai's city centre, along the Ping River. It features an outdoor swimming pool. Each room at this hotel is air-conditioned and has cable TV. There is also a refrigerator. The private bathroom comes with a shower and free toiletries. Local Thai meals can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant. Other facilities include meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free on-site parking. Diamond River Ping Petch-Ngam Hotel is a short walk from the Iron Bridge and Chiang Mai Night Bazaar. Tha Phae Gate is a 1.5 km walk away, while Chiang Mai International Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Sakulchai Place
address: 10 Soi. Plubplung T.Changhuak, Muang, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Located on Huay Kaew Road in downtown Chaing Mai, Sakulchai Place provides comfortable accommodations with easy access to tourist attractions, an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Sakulchai Place is a 5-minute walk to Kaad Suan Kaew Mall and a 10-minute drive to Wat Phra Singh and Wat Chedi Luang. Chiang Mai International Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Rooms at Sakulchai Hotel are spacious and air-conditioned. They are equipped with a cable TV, fridge, minibar and coffee/tea maker. They come with private bathrooms with hot/cold shower. Services at Sakulchai Place include laundry services and car rental. There is also a tour desk at the hotel, massage services and drivers enjoy free parking. Klau Skulchai Restaurant provides Thai and western dishes. Room service is also provided for the convenience of guests.

name: Rachamankha Hotel
description: Rachamankha a Member of Relais & Chateaux is located by the Old City Wall in Chiang Mai, only 100 metres to the Sunday Market. The hotel offers free WiFi, an outdoor pool and flat-screen TVs. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with DVD players, a personal safe and a minibar. En suite bathrooms come with a hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel features laundry services, a tour desk and massage services at Pool Spa. Computers and internet access are available at the hotel's library. The courtyard restaurant serves a daily breakfast and offers Asian, Chinese, European and American cuisines. Rachamankha a Member of Relais & Chateaux is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport.

name: Cross Vibe Chiang Mai Decem
description: No description found

name: 137 Pillars House
address: 2 Soi 1 Nawatgate Road, Tambon Watgate, Chiang Mai 5000
description: 137 Pillars House is a luxurious 30-suite hotel established around a colonial teak homestead built in the early 1880s. It is located in a lush tropical residential enclave that is within walking distance to the historical Wat Gate Khar Rham Temple, Ping River and trendy boutiques on Nimmanhaemin Road.iHotelier/iStay

name: B2 Mountain Pano Residence Chiang Mai
address: 306 Moo 3, T.Chang Phueak, Mueang, Chiang Mai 50300
description: The 3.5-star B2 Mountain Pano offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Chiang Mai. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the B2 Mountain Pano. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. B2 Mountain Pano combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Chiang Mai unforgettable.Agoda

name: Hotel Sensai Nimman Chiang Mai
address: Soi Sai Nam Phueng, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Set in Chiang Mai, 1.6 km from Wat Phra Singh, Hotel Sensai Nimman Chiang Mai offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Certain units at the property feature a terrace with pool view. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Hotel Sensai Nimman Chiang Mai all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Chang Puak Market is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Three Kings Monument is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 5 km from Hotel Sensai Nimman Chiang Mai.

name: Tao Garden Health Spa & Resort
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Doi Saket, Tao Garden Health Spa & Resort promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with slippers, towels, closet, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary). Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Chiang Mai, Tao Garden Health Spa & Resort will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: The Chimes Chiangmai Old City
address: 55/2 Rachamankha Rd., Tambon Phra Singh, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Chiang Mai, The Chimes Chiangmai Old City features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. With an outdoor swimming pool, the property also has a garden, as well as a terrace. Guests can enjoy Thai dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms have a kettle, while certain rooms are fitted with a patio and others also boast city views. All units will provide guests with a fridge. With staff speaking English and Thai, round-the-clock advice is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near The Chimes Chiangmai Old City include Chedi Luang Temple, Chiang Mai Gate and Three Kings Monument. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: Nok Resort & Hotel
address: 192 Thung Khao Tok Mai M. 8, Chiang Mai 50220
description: Set in Ban Thung Khao Tok, 13 km from Mae Jo University, Nok resort & hotel offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Asian cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nok resort & hotel all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Chiang Mai Bus Station is 16 km from Nok resort & hotel, while Tha Pae Gate is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 27 km from the resort.

name: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai
address: 502 Moo 1, Mae Rim-Samoeng Old Road, Chiang Mai 50180
description: Four Seasons Resort Chiang Mai overlooks rice fields and mountains in Mae Rim Valley. It features luxurious bungalows with outdoor living spaces. A spa and outdoor swimming pool is available. Four Seasons Chiang Mai offers bungalows decorated with original paintings and Siamese art pieces. It has polished teak floors and rich Thai cotton fabrics. Private bathrooms overlook the garden and feature a separate dressing area. The resort features a well-equipped fitness centre. Guests can also make use of the tennis court or head for a soothing massage. Free bicycle rentals are provided. Other facilities include yoga and cooking classes and babysitting service, which are available with an additional cost. Guests can dine al fresco on the home-style Italian cusine at the open-air Terraces Restaurant while enjoying views of the surrounding rice paddies and distant Doi Suthep. For a more relaxed afternoon and evening, head over to the Ratree Bar and Lounge to enjoy fine wines and signature cocktails. Private dining experiences and a 24-hour room service are also available. Four Seasons offers free shuttle service from Chiang Mai City, which is approximately a 1-hour drive away.

name: Paraiso Hotel Chiangmai
description: Ideally situated in the centre of Chiang Mai, Paraiso Hotel Chiangmai features free WiFi throughout the property, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking for guests who drive. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Chang Puak Market, 1.5 km from Chiang Mai Gate and 1.1 km from Chang Puak Gate. The property offers car hire and features a garden and sun terrace. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also feature a city view. At Paraiso Hotel Chiangmai the rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Wat Phra Singh, Three Kings Monument and Chedi Luang Temple. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 3 km from Paraiso Hotel Chiangmai.

name: Mövenpick Suriwongse Hotel Chiang Mai
description: Close to the famous Night Bazaar, perfectly located for exploring Chiang Mai's many cultural sights and shops, the hotel caters to cultural adventure seekers, embraced by the warmth of local treat combined with Swiss quality service. Its contemporary interior is in perfect harmony with the traditional Thai Lanna style architecture to create a unique and refined ambience. In a buzzing and vibrant atmosphere, we present exciting dining with interactive show kitchens.accorhotels.com

name: Lanna Palace 2004 Hotel
description: Lanna Palace 2004 is located 800 metres from Night Bazaar. It offers air-conditioned rooms with city view and free Wi-Fi. The property features a pool, 24-hour front desk and shuttle service. The property is 3 km from Wualai Walking Street and Chiang Mai International Airport. Rooms are fitted with a cable TV, minibar and seating area. A bathtub and free toiletries are included in an en suite bathroom. The property has Thai and Chinese restaurants. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Gategaa Village
description: Boasting free bikes, garden, terrace and free WiFi, Gategaa Village is set in Chiang Mai, less than 1 km from Chiang Mai Night Bazaar and 1.8 km from Tha Pae Gate. The property is located 2.7 km from Chiang Mai Bus Station, 3 km from Three Kings Monument and 3.1 km from Chedi Luang Temple. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Gategaa Village the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. Speaking English and Thai, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Chiang Mai Gate is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Chang Puak Gate is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 6 km from Gategaa Village.

name: Chiang Mai Orchid Hotel
description: Located on Huay Kaew Road, Chiang Mai Orchid is next to Central Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre. The hotel features a terrace swimming pool, spa and 4 dining options. Free WiFi access is available. The air-conditioned rooms at the Chiang Mai Orchard feature a private bathroom, minibar and cable TV. Bath robes and slippers are provided. Guests can work-out at Chiang Mai Orchid’s fitness centre, unwind in the sauna or enjoy the variety of treatments and massage therapies at the spa. Car rental and laundry services are also available. Guests can park for free at the hotel. Thai and Western dishes are served at Maerim Coffee Shop. Other dining choices include Phuping Restaurant that offers Chinese food. Chiang Mai Airport is a 9-minute drive away. A free shuttle service to the Sunday walking street and Chiang Mai Night Bazaar is offered.

name: The Chateau Chiangmai Residence
description: The Chateau Chiangmai Residence is located in Chiang Mai, only 200 metres away from Saturday Walking Street and 300 metres from Chiang Mai Gate Market. This self-catering accommodation offers bright and airy rooms, soothing massage treatments and a relaxing spa. During the stay, guests have an access to free WiFi. Featuring a private balcony and mountain views, each air-conditioned apartment is complete with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a dining table. An eclectic kettle and a refrigerator are equipped in all units. Guests can make use of a shower and free toiletries in the en suite bathrooms. For guests’ convenience, Chateau Chiangmai also provides lift and free parking space. Airport shuttle service can be arrange at an additional cost. Centrally located in the popular area, you can find Chiang Mai Gate (320 metres), Chedi Luang Temple (730 metres) and Sunday Walking Street (900 metres). Chiang Mai International Airport can be reached under 3 km. Within a short stroll from the property, you can find a wide range of dining options and night entertainment sites.

name: The Chaya Resort and Spa
address: 141 Suandok Road, T. Suthep, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Offering various soothing spa menu and an outdoor pool, the The Chaya Resort and Spa is set in Chiang Mai, 1.27 km from Nimman Haemin and 2 km from Chiang Mai International Airport. Guests have an access to free WiFi throughout the stay. Featuring a four-posture bed, each Thai-style guestroom at The Chaya is complete with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. All units include an en suite bathroom equipped with a shower, a bathtub and free toiletries. At The Chaya Resort and Spa, guests can make use of a fitness centre, laundry service and a 24-hour front desk. Additional conveniences for all guests are currency exchange, ticketing, and trip planning, all of which can be made at the on-site tour desk. The popular Chiang Mai Night Bazaar is situated 3.3 km from this accommodation; while Doi Suthep can be reached under 2.4 km. A range of traditional Lanna-Thai can be sampled at the resort's restaurant. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets are available within 1 km of this stylish resort.

name: Chiangmai Gate Hotel
address: 11/10 Suriyawong Road, Haiya, Muang, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Chiang Mai Airport, Chiang Mai Gate Hotel offers value-for-money accommodation and a range of leisure facilities including traditional Thai massage and a swimming pool. Located in Wua Lai, an old silverware manufacturing community, Chiang Mai Gate hotel is close to several shopping malls, attractions and is just a 10-minute drive from the Night Bazaar. Rooms are decorated in traditional Lanna style and equipped with air conditioning, television and en-suite bathroom. Lounge and soak up the sun by the swimming pool or pamper yourself with a traditional Thai massage. Other facilities at Chiang Mai Gate Hotel include a tour desk, tailor shop and a restaurant serving authentic Thai food.

name: Eastin Tan Hotel Chiang Mai
description: Eastin Tan Hotel Chiang Mai is located in Chiang Mai and features free Wi-Fi. It also offers a sauna, a swimming pool and a kids club. The hotel provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. Welcoming and helpful team members are available 24 hours a day. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. Eastin Tan Hotel Chiang Mai features 128 air conditioned rooms. Each has a bathroom that provides bathrobes and a shower. The hotel's on-site restaurant, T Station Bar & Restaurant, is a popular place to have a meal. A wide selection of dining options are also available in close proximity to the property. Eastin Tan Hotel Chiang Mai is close to the area's well-known sightseeing attractions, including Wat Jed Yot, which is a short walk away. Chiang Mai Night Bazaar is just an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Bed Chiangmai Gate- Adults Only
description: Located near Chiang Mai Gate, BED Chiangmai Gate Hotel offers comfortable accommodation with free WiFi access. The property has a garden with a pool and a sundeck. Guests enjoy complimentary water, tea, espresso and seasonal fruits during their stay. With plenty of local attractions within walking distance, BED Chiangmai Gate Hotel is close to the popular Saturday night walking street. Chiang Mai International Airport is 3.5 km away. All air-conditioned rooms come with a 42-inch flat-screen cable TV, a complimentary minibar and a safety deposit box. A shower, hairdryer and free toiletries can be found in the en suite bathroom. Facilities and services at this hotel include a 24-hour reception and free private parking. Guests may also want to make use of the free bicycles to explore the old town area.

name: B2 Riverside Premier Resort
address: 233 Charoan Rat Road, T. Wat Gate, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Stop at Riverside Floral Inn to discover the wonders of Chiang Mai. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, postal service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Carpeting, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink can be found in selected guestrooms. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, fishing, garden. Riverside Floral Inn combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Chiang Mai unforgettable.Agoda

name: Anodard Hotel Chiang Mai
address: 57-59 Ratchamanka Road, Tambon Phra Sing, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Anodard Hotel Chiang Mai is located in the heart of Chiang Mai, 400 metres from Tha Pae Gate and 1.14 km from Chiang Mai Night Plaza. This property also features a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi, which is available in all areas. Featuring a fan or air conditioning, all cosy units of Chiang Mai Anodard Hotel are supplied with a satellite TV, a seating area and a wardrobe. Each has a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. For guests’ additional convenience, the hotel provides lockers, luggage storage and laundry services. Guests can also make use of a shared lounge and a lift. Anodard Hotel Chiang Mai less than 340 metres from Chedi Luang Temple and Sunday Walking Market. Chiang Mai International Airport can be reached under 3 km from this property. For meals, a variety of local and international dining outlets are under a 5-minute walk from this accommodation.

name: Nuan Boutique Hotel
address: 36/1 Soi Wua Lai 1, Wua Lai Rd., Chiang Mai 50100
description: Located in Chiang Mai, 300 metres from Chiang Mai Gate, Nuan Boutique Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and room service. The hotel offers a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Nuan Boutique Hotel each room comes with bed linen and towels. American and Asian breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Nuan Boutique Hotel include Chedi Luang Temple, Central Plaza Chiang Mai Airport and Three Kings Monument. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

description: Located upon the bank of Ping River, The Chiang Mai Riverside employs Lanna-Thai style architecture, decorations and surroundings. This hotel is 3.5 km from Central Plaza Chiang Mai Airport, The Chiang Mai Riverside boasts an outdoor pool and terrace. Each room includes a private bathroom. The Chiang Mai Riverside features free WiFi. There is free shuttle service at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Ton Payom Market is 3.8 km from The Chiang Mai Riverside, while Suan Dok Gate is 5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai Airport, 2 km from the property.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a picnic area. Property Location Located in Doi Saket, Jasmine Hills Villas & Spa is on a lake, a 4-minute drive from Wat Phra That Doi Saket and 13 minutes from Bo Sang Handicraft Centre. This hotel is 8.3 mi (13.4 km) from Saa Paper & Umbrella Handicraft Centre and 9.1 mi (14.7 km) from San Kamphaeng Hot Springs. Dining Enjoy Malaysian cuisine at Jasmine Restuarant, a restaurant where you can take in the garden view, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). name: Mountain Creek Wellness Resort Chiang Mai
description: Set in a prime location of Chiang Mai, Mountain Creek Wellness Resort Chiang Mai puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, 24-hour security, wheelchair accessible, fax machine are there for guest's enjoyment. Mountain Creek Wellness Resort Chiang Mai combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Chiang Mai unforgettable.Agoda

name: Little Shelter Hotel Chiangmai
address: 208/25 Lampoon Road T. Watgate, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Located in Chiang Mai, 2.6 km from Chiang Mai Night Bazaar, Little Shelter Hotel Chiangmai SHA Plus provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. At the hotel, each room comes with a balcony with a city view. Guest rooms at Little Shelter Hotel Chiangmai SHA Plus are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and Italian options. Tha Pae Gate is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Chiang Mai Bus Station is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International, 6 km from Little Shelter Hotel Chiangmai SHA Plus, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: La Seine City Resort Chiang Mai
address: 75 Thanon Chiang Mai-Lam Phun, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, less than 1 km from Chiang Mai Night Bazaar, La Seine City Resort, Chiang Mai features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At La Seine City Resort, Chiang Mai rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. La Seine City Resort, Chiang Mai offers a sun terrace. Tha Pae Gate is 1.8 km from the resort, while Chiang Mai Bus Station is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 6 km from La Seine City Resort, Chiang Mai.

name: Royal Peninsula Hotel
description: Centrally located in Chiang Mai City, Royal Peninsula Hotel Chiangmai offers modern studios with free Wi-Fi.Thai massage are available. It is just 15 minutes' drive from the famous Night Bazaar. Fully air-conditioned, all studios are equipped with a cable TV and a personal safe. Some rooms have a fridge and tea/coffee making facilities. En suite bathrooms are provided. Royal Peninsula Hotel Chiangmai is 1 km from Sompet Fruit Market and 7 km from Chiang Mai Railway Station. It is a 30-minute drive from Chiang Mai Airport. Guests can make use of the business centre and laundry services. The hotel also provides a 24-hour front desk and free parking. Palm Tree Restaurant serves international and local dishes, as well as a daily breakfast. Wine and cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar.

name: Tri Yaan Na Ros Colonial House
address: 156 Wualai Road, T. Haiya, A. Muang, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Tri Yaan Na Ros Colonial House is located in Chiang Mai, a 10-minute walk to the Old City and Wualai Road Night Market. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and parking. Rooms at Tri Yaan Na Ros Hotel are furnished with teak furniture. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen cable/satellite TV, minibar and coffee/tea maker. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and library. Other facilities include bicycle rental and dry cleaning services. The Dining Room Restaurant offers al fresco dining overlooking the pool. Tri Yaan Na Ros Colonial House is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai Airport.

name: Eurana Boutique Hotel
address: 7/1 Moonmuang Rd., Sol 7 Sriphum Muang, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Within a 10-minute walk from Wat Chedi Luang and Sunday Walking Street, Eurana Boutique Hotel features accommodation fusing European and modern Northern Thai décor. A spa and pool are available. Guests enjoy free WiFi access. Hotel Eurana is a 2-minute walk from Fresh Market. Night Bazaar and Chiang Mai International Airport are a 15-minute drive away. Colourful rooms at Eurana Boutique comes with a cable TV, a minibar and a safety box. Shower facilities are in an en suite bathroom. Guests can workout at the hotel’s fitness centre or relax at the reading and internet corner. The hotel provides tour arrangement services. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also available. Thai and European cuisine can be enjoyed at The Violet Restaurant. For desserts and tea, Grandmama’s Bake is another dining option.

name: Baan U Sabai Boutique House
address: 213/7 Mahidol Road, T. Changklan, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Baan U Sabai House offers a cultural experience showcasing rooms with 14 different styles of Thai architecture. The hotel has a pool and a spa pool for guests. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are provided. Baan U Sabai Boutique House is a 3-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. It is a 15-minute drive to Night Bazaar. Doi Suthep and Chiang Mai Zoo are a 30-minute ride away. Rooms feature teak wood décor and come with a balcony and outdoor seating area. Each is fitted with a DVD player and flat-screen TV with cable channels. A minibar and tea and coffee-making facilities are provided. A tour desk assists in car rentals and sightseeing arrangements. Laundry and dry cleaning can be done in the hotel. Guests can request for luggage storage, available at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Jomkitti Boutique Hotel
description: Located in Chiang Mai, 90 metres from Chedi Luang Temple, Jomkitti Boutique Hotel provides accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Featuring a sun terrace, this property is set a short distance from Three Kings Monument, Chiang Mai Gate and Wat Phra Singh. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Jomkitti Boutique Hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tha Pae Gate, Chang Puak Gate and Chang Puak Market. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 4 km from Jomkitti Boutique Hotel.

name: Vc@suanpaak Boutique Hotel & Service Apartment
address: 61 Moo.3, Airport Road, T.Suthep, Chiang Mai 50200
description: VC@Suanpaak Boutique Hotel & Service Apartment is conveniently located within a 7-minute walk from Chiang Mai Airport. Offering non-smoking modern Thai-Lanna rooms with free Wi-Fi, the hotel comes equipped with an outdoor swimming pool and a sauna. VC@Suanpaak is a 10-minute drive from Wat Chedi Luang and a 15-minute drive from Wat Phra Singh and the trendy Sunday Walking Street. The city’s iconic landmark, Wat Phrathat Doi Suthep, is a 20-minute drive away. Furnished with wooden interiors and traditional-inspired décor, each air-conditioned room features a private balcony overlooking the pool, a 32-inch cable flat-screen TV and a refrigerator stocked with minibar. Shower facilities and a bathtub are included in an en suite bathroom. Free toiletries, a bathrobe and a hairdryer are provided. For convenience, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help guests organise sightseeing tours or arrange massage services. Other facilities include laundry service, meeting facilities and a chargeable shuttle service. Suanpaak Restaurant serves excellent selections of Thai and International cuisine. For a healthy menu, Salad House offers a variety of fresh salad dishes. VC@Suanpaak Boutique Hotel & Service Apartment provides delicious breakfast and noodle dishes between 11:00-21:00.

name: Chiang Mai Marriott Hotel
address: 108 Chang Klan Road, Tambol Chang Klan, Amphur Muang, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Blending European design with Lanna Thai charm, the luxurious Le Meridien is located in downtown Chiang Mai on Changklan Road with a short walking distance from Tha Pae Gate and Warorot Market. The hotel has a pampering spa, an outdoor swimming pool and 4 dining outlets. Free parking is available. Featuring views of Doi Suthep mountain or the city, all elegant rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The spacious en suite bathroom is fitted with a separate bathtub and hot-water shower facilities. Room service is available for 24 hours. The 5-star Le Méridien Chiang Mai - SHA Extra Plus is located in the centre of famous Chiang Mai Night Bazaar. It is 7 km from Chiang Mai International Airport and 25 km from Doi Suthep Temple. The Spa features a relaxing menu of body massage and herbal treatments. Guests can also exercise at the gym or arrange a day trip at the tour desk. There is also an on-site shopping arcade. Favola serves popular Italian dishes with a modern spin, while Latest Recipe offers international buffet spreads from its interactive open kitchen. Snacks and cocktails can be enjoyed at Latitude 18 or the poolside Plunge terrace.

name: The Bridge An Eclectic Luxotel
address: 32 Charoen Muang Rd, Wat Ket, Chiang Mai 50000
description: Located in Chiang Mai, less than 1 km from Chiang Mai Night Bazaar, The Bridge An Eclectic Luxotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Bridge An Eclectic Luxotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Tha Pae Gate is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Chiang Mai Bus Station is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 6 km from The Bridge An Eclectic Luxotel.

name: Shewe Wana Suite Resort
address: 290,292 Charoen Muang Road, T. Watket, Chiang Mai 50000
description: This intimate boutique property offers restored Thai-style suites with colonial influences and attentive service. Nestled in tropical greenery, it features 2 outdoor pools, and free WiFi throughout. Boasting a spa bath and fine teak fittings, tastefully furnished suites are surrounded by tropical greenery and landscaped gardens. They come with a flat-screen TV and private balcony. Shewe Wana Suite Resort is only a 10-minute walk from the local night bazaar and shops along the Ping River. It is a short walk from San Pa Khoi Market where northern Thai food and fresh fruit can be sampled. It is a 20-minute walk from Chiang Mai Old City and a 20-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. The resort also provides a tour desk, laundry services, and free parking lot. Aside from a daily breakfast, the 2 on-site restaurants serve a variety of vegetarian, Thai dishes. The restaurants also feature garden views and various customized menus like gluten-free meals, which is available upon request. Guests who wish to use airport transfer service are kindly requested to inform the hotel in advance. There is an extra charge to add on to the transport. This can be noted under "Special Requests" during booking or by contacting the property by using the contact details found on the booking confirmation. Guests who wish to check in after 23:00 hrs are kindly requested to inform the property in advance for check-in arrangements.

name: Chada Mantra Hotel
address: 18 Moonmuang Rd., Soi 6, Sripoom, Muang, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Located in the Chiang Mai Old City of Chiang Mai, 700 metres from Tha Pae Gate and 1.1 km from Wat Chiang Man, Chada Hotel offers accommodation with free WiFi and a garden. Some accommodation includes a balcony, a cable TV and a seating area. Guests can also enjoy outdoor pool. Chada Hotel is located 1.2 km from Chang Puak Gate, while 1.3 km away from Warorot. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 6 km from the property.

name: See You Soon Chiangmai
description: See You Soon is conveniently located in the popular Old City area. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, complimentary tea, mirror, private entrance to ensure a restful night. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, spa. For reliable service and professional staff, See You Soon caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Bossotel Chiang Mai - Sha Plus
description: Just a few minutes from the well-known Night Bazaar, Bossotel Chiang Mai - SHA Plus offers a budget accommodation and an outdoor pool. It is right by Chiang Mai Railway Station. The hotel 1 km from Night Bazaar and 2 km from Thapae Gate. Chiang Mai Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Bossotel Chiang Mai - SHA Plus provides rooms with views, free Wi-Fi Internet access and fully contained bathrooms. There is an on site restaurant serving international cuisine. Guests can make use of a wide selection of services and facilities such as outdoor swimming pool, snooker, beauty salon, and relax with a massage.

name: Le Naview @Prasingh
address: 12 Samlan Rd, Tambon Prasingh Muang, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Located in Chiang Mai, 400 metres from Wat Phra Singh, Le Naview @Prasingh provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 500 metres from Chedi Luang Temple, and within 500 metres of the city centre. Guests at the hotel can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Le Naview @Prasingh include Three Kings Monument, Chiang Mai Gate and Chang Puak Market. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Maninarakorn Hotel
address: 99 Sridonchai Rd. T. Changklan, Chiang Mai 50100
description: Maninarakorn Hotel is located in Chiang Mai, less than 700 metres from the Night Bazaar and Thapae Gate. The hotel offers an outdoor spa pool, free Wi-Fi and a spa. Rooms at Maninarakorn come with locally handcrafted furniture and air-conditioning. Amenities include a cable TV, minibar and attached bathrooms. Kinnari Spa features traditional Thai massage and foot reflexology. Guests can relax at the sauna and steam rooms or exercise at the on-site jogging track. ZENZA Restaurant serves a selection of Asian and Western dishes. Children under 8 years old dine an American breakfast for free. Freshly brewed hot drinks are available at the Coffee Shop. Maninarakorn Hotel is approximately 3.5 km from Chiang Mai International Airport and Nimman Haemin Area.

name: Shangri-La Chiang Mai
description: Five-star Shangri-La Hotel offers luxurious accommodation with free wired internet in culturally-rich Chiang Mai, just 10 minutes' drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. A free-form pool and spa are available. Reflecting comfort and elegance, air-conditioned rooms feature beautiful Northern Thai decor and charm. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and minibar. A pillow menu and feather duvets are also included. Shangri-La Chiang Mai is about 1.5 km from the famous Night Bazaar, Tha Pae Gate and Sunday Walking Street. It is about 2 km from Chiang Mai Railway Station. The hotel's signature CHI, The Spa provides private spa suites and relaxing beauty treatments. Guests can also exercise at the fitness centre, enjoy a game of tennis or arrange day trips at the tour desk. Kad Kafe serves a selection of all-day international dishes and a buffet breakfast spread. Authentic Szechuan and Cantonese dishes can be sampled at the chic and modern China Kitchen. Drinks can be enjoyed at Dhala Pool Bar while afternoon tea can be found at the Lobby Lounge. The hotel can also arrange vegetarian and Halal meals.

name: The Grand Napat
description: Decorated with neutral colours and wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and sofa. Selected apartments come with a kitchenette and bathtub. The Grand Napat is a 5-minute drive from JJ Market Shopping Centre and a 15-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. The Sunday Walking Street is about 2 km away. Free parking is available on-site. Guests can enjoy a refreshing workout at the gym, or make use of the ticketing services at the 24-hour front desk. Laundry and ironing services are also available. The hotel's restaurant serves a daily American breakfast. Local Thai dishes and Western food can also be found on the menu.

name: B2 Riverside Premier Hotel
address: 195/1 Charoen Rat Road, Wat Gate, Chiang Mai 50000
description: B2 Riverside Premier Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Chiang Mai. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk are readily available for you to enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, slippers, towels, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include outdoor pool, garden. Convenience and comfort makes B2 Riverside Premier Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Chiang Mai.Agoda

name: Kodchasri Thani Hotel Chiangmai
description: Offering 4-star boutique accommodation in the Old City of Chiang Mai, Kodchasri Thani Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Night Bazaar. An outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and free bicycle rentals are available. Traditional Thai decor, Oriental wooden furnishings and unique curved built-in wardrobe give rooms an elegant feel. Rooms also come with a flat-screen TV and minibar. All rooms are equipped with an ionic air purifier. Guests enjoy daily turn down service and herbal tea. Kodchasri Thani Hotel is a 10-minute drive from Chiang Mai International Airport. A 5-10 minute walk will take guests to various attractions like Wat Chedi Luang, Wat Phan On and the Three Kings Monument. It also includes Saturday & Sunday Walking Street and Thapae Gate. Guests can exercise at the fitness centre or spend time at the special pet play area. Sightseeing tours can be arranged at the tour desk. Authentic Thai dishes, as well as Western cuisine, are served at the hotel’s restaurant. In-room dining is available with room service.

name: Solar Ville
description: No description found

name: Kireethara Boutique Resort
description: Kiree Thara Boutique Resort is a 4-star elegant contemporary Lanna design surrounded by the high green mountains of the significant Doi Suthep. Inspired by the nature with the breathtaking setting of panoramic green mountain and lake. Kiree Thara blends the charm of the Norther Thai style living with the modern living. We offer our guests stunning views from 21 beautifully decorated rooms which makes you feel, relax and individual living, a perfect getaway from noisy downtown. Kiree Thara is vacation discoveries, only 10 minutes from Chiang Mai international Airport, 5 minutes to the nearest golf club, 3 kilometers from Chiang Mai Zoo, 2 Kilometers from 700th Anniversary Chiang Mai Sports Complex and a few minutes from Chiang Mai international Convention Center. The most amazing trips is a variety of recreational activities surrounded by spectacular natural attractions with Lake & Mountain View that you can choose. > DooDoi Café’ and Restaurant, specialized in Thai and Western cuisine > Free Bike Rental, let your bike around for free > Jogging Lane, jogging around the Lake on a road 6 meters wide Kiree Thara Boutique is an idyllic destination that will make you want to come back and explore even more!

name: Green Lake Resort
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, the peaceful Green Lake Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified boasts an outdoor pool and comfortable guestrooms fitted with a private balcony. Free parking on-site and free WiFi in all rooms are provided. Simply furnished, all rooms are air-conditioned and come with a seating area, a refrigerator and an electric kettle. Fitted with a bath and shower, the private bathroom also includes free toiletries. At Green Lake Resort - SHA Extra Plus Certified, both meeting and banquet facilities are available for a surcharge. Activities such as cycling can also be enjoyed around the property. The 24-hour front desk can assist guests with airport transfer services as well as transfer services to the nearby attractions. The property is 1.6 km from Chiang Mai International Convention and Exhibition Center and 1.8 km from Chiang Mai Lanna Golf Course. For shopping and dining, guests can also check out Nimman Haemin and Kad Suan Kaew Shopping Centre, located approximately a 15-minute drive away. Guests can enjoy a selection of Thai cuisines at the Mountain View Restaurant that overlooks the nearby pond.

name: The Grand Wipanan Residence
address: 7/8 Soi Kulawongutid, Changphuak Rd., Chiang Mai 50300
description: The Grand Wipanan Residence features stylish rooms with full facilities and modern interiors. It boasts an outdoor pool and a fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire property. Thapae Walking Street is a 15- minute drive from Grand Wipanan Residence. Chiang Mai Night Market and Chiang Mai International Airport can be reached within a 25-minute ride away. Each stylish room comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a private balcony, and a seating area. Free toiletries and hot shower facilities are in the en suite bathrooms. For meals, enjoy a variety of local dishes at many restaurants located around the property. For convenience, the residence offers laundry services and a coin-operated washing machine. On-site parking is available.

name: InterContinental Chiang Mai Mae Ping, an IHG Hotel
address: 153 Sridonchai Road, Chang Klan, Chiang Mai 50110
description: InterContinental Chiang Mai The Mae Ping is located in the heart of Chiang Mai's old city, and a short drive from the international airport. Experience a hotel created with rich story of Lanna Heritage featuring the handiwork of local artisans, while offering a contemporary escape.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Noble Place Chiangmai
description: Located in front of Central Robinson Department Store and just only a 5-minute ride from Chiang Mai International Airport, Noble Place Chiangmai offers free Wi-Fi throughout the property. A 5-minute drive to the City Center, Night Bazaar and Airport Driving Range, Noble Place Chiangmai is a 10-minute drive to Saturday Walking Street and 15-minute drive to Sunday Walking Street and Central Kad Suan Kaew. Chiang Mai Bus Station and Chiang Mai Train Station are a 30-minute ride away. Featuring a balcony, air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and minibar. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. Free private parking and free luggage storage is available. A soothing massage can be enjoyed at the spa. Guests can arrange a sight-seeing trip at the tour desk or rent a bicycle to explore the town. A range of Thai and International cuisine is available at Noble Place Restaurant.

name: Amalthea Hotel
description: No description found

name: Malabar Pool Villa Phuket
address: 1/6 Moo1 Ratchada T, Muang Phuket, Phuket City 83000
description: Located in Phuket Town, 1.8 km from Siray Bay Beach, Malabar Pool Villa Phuket provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation offers a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast is available daily at the property. Koh Sirey Beach is 3 km from Malabar Pool Villa Phuket, while Thai Hua Museum is less than 1 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 33 km from the accommodation.

name: Ang Pao Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Ang Pao Hotel - SHA Extra Plus features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Phuket Town. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and free WiFi. Prince of Songkla University is 8.6 km away and Two Heroines Monument is 9.3 km from the hotel. An American breakfast is available daily at the hotel. Thai Hua Museum is 4.5 km from Ang Pao Hotel - SHA Extra Plus, while Chinpracha House is 4.6 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 27 km from the accommodation.

name: Villoft Zen Living Resort
description: Located in Thalang, 6.2 km from Wat Prathong, Villoft Zen Living Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a sun terrace and to a hot tub. The hotel also offers free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Selected rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave, a stovetop and a toaster. At Villoft Zen Living Resort each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. Khao Phra Thaeo National Park is 7.4 km from the accommodation, while Two Heroines Monument is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 15 km from Villoft Zen Living Resort.

name: Melia Phuket Mai Khao
address: 233 Moo 3, Tambon Mai Khao, Phuket City
description: Located in Mai Khao, Melia Phuket Mai Khao is within a 10-minute drive of Phuket International Airport and provides a saltwater swimming pool and a sauna. There is also a gym with cardiovascular equipment, a saltwater swimming pool and core/stability training equipment. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa, YHI SPA. Guests can also enjoy free public parking on site. Wireless internet is also provided. The resort provides 5-star rooms with large windows that overlook the garden. They are air conditioned and offer slippers, a private terrace and a mini bar. To start the day, guests are able to enjoy breakfast at Melia Phuket Mai Khao's on-site restaurants, then later sit down to Asian and international meals at SASA or fusion cuisine at GAIA. Elyxr Café offers fusion options and is available for supper. The resort has easy access to Sirinat National Park. Those wanting to discover the area can also visit Thalang, located within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: The Little Nest Phuket
address: 98 Ranong Road Talat Nuea, Mueang, Phuket City 83000
description: Located just 200 metres from Chinpracha House and 400 metres from Thai Hua Museum, The Little Nest Phuket Hotel offers a restaurant, bicycle rentals and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel provides comfortable rooms with air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Guests can access to free WiFi at the public areas. Complete with tile floorings, each cosy room at The Little Nest comes with wooden furniture, a flat-screen cable TV and a refrigerator. An electric kettle is provided in all units. Guests will find a hairdryer and free toiletries in each en suite bathroom. At The Little Nest Phuket, guests’ facilities include luggage storage, a terrace and car hiring service. Staff at the on-site tour desk can help arrange interesting trips and ticketings. Parking space is available nearby. Being situated in Phuket Town, you can admire Chino-Portuguese architecture just a few steps from the property. For enjoyable work-out, try a course at Tiger Muay Thai and MMA Training Camp (5.4km). You can reach Phuket International Airport under 26 km away from the hotel. Guests can sample tasty local southern-Thai dishes as well as other menus at the in-house restaurant. Alternatively, head to more dining options available just a few minutes away.

name: Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort
address: 29 Soi Karon Nui, Tambon Karon, Amphur Muang, Phuket City 83100
description: A luxurious beach getaway like no other awaits you on a secluded cove against a canvas of sand and sea in Thailand. Le Méridien Phuket Beach Resort offers bold new discoveries with top-rated hotel and resort facilities for land and water adventures, a rejuvenating spa, inspired cuisine and forward-thinking services exceeding your wildest desires. The resort's 416 rooms and 54 luxury suites blend the creative and the elemental with authentic Thai accents against a soothing tropical setting. Style coupled with superb amenities allows for a stay of limitless exploration and renewal on the beach. All rooms and suites at our beach resort in Phuket offer unique views, and 67% offer either pool or ocean views.Marriott

name: Le Méridien Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort
address: 81 Moo.3 T.Maikhao A.Thalang, Mai Khao, Phuket City 83110
description: Welcome to Le Méridien Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort, where relaxed elegance awaits. Our newly opened family-friendly oasis is nestled along the shores of Mai Khao beach, offering a tranquil escape where you can bask in the natural beauty of Phuket. Guests can take their pick from 15 unique rooms and suite types, each with expansive balconies that offer scenic vistas of the pools, sprawling gardens or the Phuket coastline. For an extra touch of indulgence, select accommodations come with private terraces and direct pool access. The resort is conveniently located just a short drive away from Phuket International Airport, ensuring a seamless journey to paradise. Boasting a timeless design that fuses mid-century modern aesthetics with local craftsmanship and natural materials, Le Méridien Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort offers a relaxed yet sophisticated retreat. From the moment you arrive, you'll be enchanted by the stunning beachfront setting and embraced by the warm hospitality that Phuket is renowned for.Marriott

name: Marina House Muaythai Ta-Iad Phuket
address: Soi Taeiad Tambol Chalong, Muang, Phuket City 83130
description: Situated in Chalong, within 2.7 km of Chalong Temple and 4.5 km of Chalong Pier, Marina House MUAYTHAI Ta-iad Phuket features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The hotel has family rooms. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Some rooms include a kitchenette with a microwave. The rooms have a wardrobe. Chinpracha House is 6.5 km from Marina House MUAYTHAI Ta-iad Phuket, while Thai Hua Museum is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 36 km from the accommodation.

name: The Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket
description: Five-star luxury awaits in Phuket, Thailand at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, Phuket. Overlooking Siray Bay near Phuket Town, our luxurious Phuket beach resort provides an ideal locale for quiet getaways, romantic holidays and corporate retreats. Find us moments from pristine white-sand beaches and local watersports. Take advantage of our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, three outdoor pools, the Westin® Kids Club and Heavenly Spa by Westin™. Sample tantalizing cuisine and refreshing beverages at our six Phuket resort restaurants and bars, many of which boast water views. If you are planning an event in Phuket, choose one of our elegant indoor or outdoor venues. Enjoy room amenities like Heavenly® Beds, rainforest showers, spacious desks, free Wi-Fi and LCD televisions. Admire panoramic sea views or relax on a furnished balcony. Select suites and resort villas include plunge pools and generous entertaining spaces. Find your sanctuary on the beach at the Westin Siray Bay Resort & Spa, PhuketMarriott

name: Amari Phuket
description: A stone’s throw from Patong Beach, the luxurious Amari Phuket enjoys spectacular views of the Andaman Sea from its private beach. It boasts 2 outdoor pools, a first-class spa and 2 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas. Located in southern Phuket, 1.5 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Mall, Amari Phuket provides free shuttle services to Kata Beach. It is a 55-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Bright and airy, rooms come with private balconies and beautiful views. Amenities include a satellite TV, DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Breeze Spa features a wide range of beauty treatments. Relaxing massages and therapies can be enjoyed from sea-facing pavilions. The hotel also provides an outdoor spa pool and a fitness centre. La Gritta serves Italian dishes featuring gourmet pizzas, fresh pasta, delectable desserts along with an extensive wine list. Seaside international dining is available at Rim Talay and the spectacular Jetty Restaurant. Drinks and quick bites are served at both the Rim Talay Pool and Samutr Bars.

name: Bella Nara Phuket Naiyang Beach
address: 55 Moo 5, Sakoo Subdistrict, Thalang District Phuket, Sakhu 83110
description: No description found

name: Chanalai Garden Resort, Kata Beach
description: Moments from Kata Beach, Chanalai Garden Resort is a coastal retreat with a swimming pool. Those staying at the property also have access to free Wi-Fi and on-site parking. This modern resort offers a coffee bar, a kids pool and a kids club. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms and a 24-hour business centre. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all have an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and slippers. Chanalai Garden Resort's on-site restaurant, Morakot, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. A wide selection of eating options are also available nearby. Chanalai Garden Resort provides a convenient place to discover Nai Harn Beach and Karon Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The resort's multilingual staff will ensure that every traveller has an enjoyable visit.Revato

name: Cape Sienna Gourmet Hotel & Villas (SHA Plus+)
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus features stunning sea views. It has 4 dining options, fitness center and an outdoor pool. Wi-Fi and parking are free. Spacious guest rooms feature modern interiors. They are equipped with air conditioning, a private shower room and flat-screen TV. Some rooms are fitted with a spa bathtub. Guests of Cape Sienna Gourmet can dine at the Poolside Bar & Restaurant, which serves both Asian and international dishes. Plum Prime Steak House at the center of your experience is the charcoal oven. Sienna Rocks Cafe serves Italian Coffee specialties, creative sandwiches & salads. Probably the Best ‘Egg Benedict’ and ‘Oeuf a la cocotte with Gruyere’ can be found. Drinks can be sipped while playing a game of snooker at Vanilla Sky Bar & Lounge, which offers views of Kamala Bay. Facilities provided include manicure, pedicure, spa treatment rooms and 2 swimming pools. Travel arrangements can be made at the hotel’s tour desk. Airport shuttle and car rental services are also available. Cape Sienna Phuket Gourmet Hotel & Villas - SHA Extra Plus is a 1-hour flight from Bangkok City, followed by a 40-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The hotel provides free shuttle services to Kamala Beach.

name: Hubtel Patong Suite
description: Hubtel Patong Suite features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and restaurant in Patong Beach. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a balcony. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, the units at Hubtel Patong Suite have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a seating area. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options. Popular points of interest near Hubtel Patong Suite include Patong Beach, Kalim Beach and Patong Boxing Stadium. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 34 km from the hotel.

name: Hyton Leelavadee Hotel (Sha Extra Plus)
description: Patong Leelavadee Hua Ting Holiday Inn Phuket features a fitness centre, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Patong Beach. This 4-star resort offers room service and a business centre. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer pool views. At Patong Leelavadee Hua Ting Holiday Inn Phuket each room has bed linen and towels. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Chinese and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Patong Leelavadee Hua Ting Holiday Inn Phuket include Patong Beach, Phuket Simon Cabaret and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the resort.

name: Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa (SHA Plus+)
description: Indulge yourself at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa on Phuket Island, Thailand. Our Phuket beachfront resort offers a variety of on-site restaurants and bars. Sample exquisite Thai cuisine, global comfort food and specialty coffee drinks or sip handcrafted cocktails at our beachfront bar and eatery. Cap off a day at the beach with a rejuvenating massage or wellness treatment at the famous Quan Spa. Maintain your workout at our luxury resort in Phuket's fitness center or swim in our refreshing resort outdoor pool. If you're planning a business, wedding or social gathering in Phuket, host your event in one of our contemporary venues with help from our dedicated planning and catering teams. Retire to a luxury hotel room or beachfront villa that features stylish decor, plush bedding and sleek bathrooms with robes, slippers and deluxe toiletries. Unwind under the warm Phuket sun in tropical resort villas with private plunge pools. Your next great adventure awaits at Renaissance Phuket Resort & Spa.Marriott

name: The Top Patong Resort
description: THE TOP PATONG RESORT. Features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Patong Beach. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a patio with pool view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms have a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near THE TOP PATONG RESORT. Include Patong Beach, Kalim Beach and Patong Boxing Stadium. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 34 km from the accommodation.

name: Patong Merlin Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Merlin Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach and 1 km from Bangla Road and Jungceylon Shopping Centre. It features 4 outdoor pools, a spa and Thai cooking classes. Patong Merlin Hotel offers modern rooms with a touch of tropical tranquillity. Offering balconies, they come equipped with minibars and tea/coffee makers. En suite bathrooms have toiletries and a hairdryer provided. A fitness centre is available for the health-conscious guest. Alternatively, pampering massage services await. Hotel Merlin has a tour desk that assists with sightseeing arrangements. Asian classics and vegetarian delights can be enjoyed at Coconut Coffee Shop while the outdoor Seaside Garden serves themed buffet dinners. For a relaxing session over drinks, guests can head to Café Del Mar, Sunset Bar or Lobby Lounge.

name: The Pace Phuket Boutique Resort
address: 88/17 M.7 Soi Saiyuan, Wiset Road, Rawai 83130
description: A full-service spa, an outdoor pool, and 10 beach bars are available at this hotel. Free buffet breakfast and free WiFi in public areas are also provided. Other amenities include a bar/lounge, a swim-up bar, and spa services. Weekly housekeeping is available.Expedia

name: Yanud Residence
address: 39 Soi Lak Kong Si Ratsada Mueang, Ko Kaeo 83000
description: Located in Ratsada, this welcoming apartment brings it all within your reach. Jump into your car and make short work of the 4-minute drive to Phuket Weekend Market or the 4-minute drive to Limelight Avenue Phuket (and enjoy the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime).
