Relax by the outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!) or sip a drink on the terrace of this apartment, which also features outdoor furniture and a kid's pool. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into the place, you'll find a safe, air conditioning, a desk, and a water dispenser. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and towels. For your convenience, there's a mini-fridge and paper towels.Expedia

name: Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort
description: Nestled along the picturesque Kamala Bay, Hyatt Regency Phuket Resort cascades down a lush tropical hillside, offering a serene and idyllic setting for a seafront getaway. With breathtaking views overlooking the Andaman Sea, our resort provides a tranquil ambiance that invites relaxation and rejuvenation. Featuring 201 spacious and contemporary rooms and suites, each offering private balconies with spectacular sea and sunset views, our resort ensures a memorable stay. Indulge in culinary delights at our three restaurants and bar: Pool House Kitchen, an all-day dining venue with international and Asian cuisine; Mizu, offering a premium Teppanyaki experience; 180 Degrees, a poolside bar with private cabanas and sun loungers; and Casa Boho, a clifftop three-story restaurant and bar with its own entertainment lounge and infinity pool. At Casa Boho, immerse yourself in the bohemian ambiance, witness breathtaking sunsets at Kamala, and indulge in bold Latin American flavors and expertly crafted cocktails. Experience three unique dining options, including a rooftop bar with stunning views of Kamala Bay, poolside dining, and a gaming Den, all set amidst our distinctive boho-style design. Our resort offers a range of recreational facilities, including the Nahm Spa, Camp Hyatt poolside kids club, a dive center with sustainability initiatives, snorkeling and diving at the house reef, a hilltop Regency Club, a 24-hour fitness center with wellness activities, and the largest seafront infinity pool in Phuket. For meetings and events, we provide modern facilities such as White Canvas, the only fully air-conditioned, seafront glass marquee event space in Phuket, offering beautiful sea views.

name: 77 Patong Hotel & Spa
address: 155/8 Phang Muang Sai Kor Pa Tong, Kathu District, Patong 83150
description: 77 Patong Hotel & Spa features an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Patong Beach. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The rooms have a safety deposit box and selected rooms will provide you with pool views. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. 77 Patong Hotel & Spa offers a continental or Asian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Patong Beach, Jungceylon Shopping Center and Patong Boxing Stadium. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from 77 Patong Hotel & Spa.

name: Thames Tara Pool Villa Rawai Phuket (SHA Plus+)
address: 71/112 หมู่ 4 ตำบล ราไวย์ อำเภอเมืองภูเก็ต, Rawai 83130
description: Set in Rawai Beach, 1.9 km from Chalong Beach, Thames Tara Private Pool Villa Rawai Phuket - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. 2.4 km from Chalong Pier and 5 km from Chalong Temple, the property provides a shared lounge and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Thames Tara Private Pool Villa Rawai Phuket - SHA Extra Plus all rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, American or Asian options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Chinpracha House is 11 km from Thames Tara Private Pool Villa Rawai Phuket - SHA Extra Plus, while Thai Hua Museum is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 41 km from the hotel.

name: Golden Paradise Hotel
description: Situated in Karon Beach, 1.3 km from Karon Beach, Golden Paradise Hotel - SHA PLUS features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Some rooms have a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. At Golden Paradise Hotel - SHA PLUS the rooms include bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Kata Beach is 2.5 km from Golden Paradise Hotel - SHA PLUS, while Phuket Simon Cabaret is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 43 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Boathouse Phuket
description: The Boathouse Phuket is located at Kata on Phuket's west coast. Boasting an outdoor pool, a restaurant, bar and a 24-hour front desk, It provides free WiFi and parking. The Boathouse Phuket come with both guestrooms and suites. Some units feature views of the Andaman Sea. All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar, an expresso coffee machine as well as tea making facilities. There are also a working desk, a flat screen TV and and en suite bathroom. Guests at this hotel can relax at a swimming pool or engage in water recreations like surfing. The hotel offers beachfront Thai cooking classes and a tour desk. Arrangements can also be made for an airport shuttle, babysitting and dry cleaning. The seafront restaurant, Boathouse, is an award winning restaurant, serving local and international cuisines with matching wine choices from The Boathouse's wine cellar. Boathouse is a 60-minute drive from Phuket Airport and a 20-minute drive from the stunning sunsets at Promthep Cape.

name: Sala Phuket Mai Khao Beach Resort (Sha Plus+)
description: Situated along quiet Mai Khao Beach, SALA Phuket Resort features lush garden, 2 beachfront pools and villas with private pools and sundecks. A spa with sauna and steam bath facilities is offered. SALA Phuket Resort & Spa is a 20-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. The scenic Phang Nga Bay is a 25-minute ride away. SALA’s rooms and villas offer flat-screen cable TVs and DVD players. Its villas offer outdoor bathrooms with free-standing tubs overlooking the pool. Free Wi-Fi is provided. SALA Spa features 3 beachfront massage terraces which provide respite for tired bodies. A gym is available for fitness-conscious guests. SALA Phuket offers rooftop dining featuring panoramic beach views. Seafood, international and Thai cuisine is served. Guests can sip cocktails and wines at the beachbar and lobby bar while soaking in the calming atmosphere.

name: Impiana Private Villas Kata Noi
description: This luxury property in Karon provides complimentary wireless internet, as well as a butler service and 24-hour room service. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned villas. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Guests can also enjoy on-site parking. After an eventful day exploring the area, Swasana Spa offers an ideal place to relax with massage services. Villas at Impiana Private Villas Kata Noi are well-appointed and provide superior amenities including a power shower and luxury toiletries. They feature a private balcony, a private terrace and an iPod docking station. In-house dining options include The Living Room, which is a convenient place to enjoy a meal. The property also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a variety of popular eateries in the area to discover. Impiana is a short stroll from Kata Beach. For guests with a car, parking is available and Phuket Town is within easy driving distance of the property.Revato

name: Keemala (SHA Plus+)
description: Keemala - SHA Plus is nestled amidst lush flora atop rolling hills overlooking Kamala Village and the Andaman Sea. This resort boasts a spa and wellness centre, soothing massage treatments and a restaurant. Kamala Beach is 2 km away. Guests are provided with free WiFi access throughout the stay. Featuring a private pool, each tastefully unit is complete with multimedia, seating areas and a terrace, which enhances stunning views of the below woodlands and the glittering sea. Complimentary soft drinks and snacks are available in the minibar. En suite bathrooms are all supplied with a bath and free charming toiletries. For added conveniences, Keemala - SHA Plus provides a 24-hour front desk, laundry service and luggage storage. Guests can arrange day trips or ticketings at the on-site tour desk. Guests can also enjoy working out in the fitness centre or getting extra sweats in sauna room. The property is a 5-minute drive from Phuket FantaSea and a 15-minute drive from the bustling nightlife on Bangla Road in Patong. Phuket International Airport can be reached under 19 km from the resort. Open for all-day dining, the in-house restaurant serves Thai and international cuisines prepared from the fine, fresh produce and ingredients. In-room breakfast and special diet menus can be arranged upon arrival.

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Karon Beach Resort
description: Pullman Phuket Karon Resort is set in 75 acres of beautiful lush tropical gardens. Set near the Big Buddha and along the golden sands of peaceful Karon Beach, with 8 dining outlets for all tastes, 24 hour fitness center, 3 tennis courts and 2 squash courts for our active guests. With 5 outdoor swimming pools one sporting a water slide for kids, this resort is perfect for families or couples. The large pillar less Grand Ballroom, additional meeting rooms and outside space are perfect for hosting events.accorhotels.com

name: The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only (SHA Extra Plus)
description: Featuring an infinity pool, The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus is situated in Karon and offers luxury accommodation. Guests also have exclusive access to the Serenity Spa and Fitness centre. The resort has a fitness centre with an infinity pool. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. The resort also has its very own fitness centre, Sea Pool. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has air conditioned rooms with a mini bar, slippers and a coffee maker. They feature an in-room dining area, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. To start the day, guests are invited to have breakfast at The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus's on-site restaurants, then later sit down to international dishes at The Harbor or Thai cuisine at Param Para. Eateries at the resort include The Nest Beach Club and Romantic in Villa. A selection of dining options are also available in the surrounding area. The Shore At Katathani - Adult Only SHA Extra Plus has easy access to Kata Beach and Kata Viewpoint. Guests are able to visit Rawai and Patong, situated within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: The Surin Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Surin Phuket offers a tropical getaway on Pansea Beach’s white sands. This beachfront property offers cottage-style accommodation surrounded by coconut trees. It features an outdoor pool and a spa. Guests enjoy free welcome drink and complimentary use of non-motorized sport facilities. Our hotel’s design is classy and elegant. Built into the tropical bay and verdant environment, while no elevators are installed, guests can appreciate the nature through a series of stairs and walkways that connect the resort Patong’s vibrant nightlife is a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Phuket Town is a 40-minute drive away. Rooms come with spacious outdoor lounge areas with garden and beach views. Amenities include a satellite TV. Guests can try various water sports. The sundeck on the beach offers a beautiful view of the Andaman Sea, especially at sunset. The hotel’s dining outlets offer Thai, Western and Asian menus. Barbecue and seafood specialities are also available.

name: Centro One Patong
description: Situated in Patong Beach, 600 metres from Patong Beach, Centro One Patong features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a shared lounge. The property is around 2.4 km from Kalim Beach, 500 metres from Jungceylon Shopping Center and 1.2 km from Patong Boxing Stadium. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Centro One Patong rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, American and halal options. Phuket Simon Cabaret is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Prince of Songkla University is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from Centro One Patong.

name: Elite Atoll Condotel
description: Located 1.7 km from Chalong Beach, Elite Atoll Condotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. Accommodation is fitted with air conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen with a dining area, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. A fridge, a microwave and stovetop are also provided, as well as a kettle. Mu Ban Tan Khu Beach is 2.8 km from the aparthotel, while Chalong Pier is 4.1 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 43 km from Elite Atoll Condotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Wyndham Grand Phuket Kalim Bay (SHA Plus+)
description: Nestled on the edge of cliff with sweeping views of the Andaman Sea, Wyndham Grand Phuket Kalim Bay is a 5-star resort with an outdoor swimming pool, sauna and an on-site restaurant. Families with children can enjoy afternoon at the Kid's Zone while adults can relax at the sauna. The 194 non-smoking guest rooms are well-appointed with modern amenities and comfort. They include a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an in-room safe. A bathtub or shower, along with free toiletries, can be found in the en suite bathrooms. Spacious suites with a private pool on the terrace are also available. A variety of cuisines, cocktails and other refreshments can be sampled at the restaurant and bar. Fresh coffee and refreshing drinks can be enjoyed at the cafe. The centre of Patong, which includes the famous nightlife on Bangla Road and the shopping paradise of Jungceylon Shopping Centre, is a 10-minute drive away. Kamala Beach is 4 km away. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute drive from Wyndham Grand Phuket Kalim Bay and airport transfers can be arranged for an additional fee.

name: COMO Point Yamu, Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Located at the tip of Cape Yamu overlooking the Andaman Sea and Phang Nga Bay, COMO Point Yamu, Phuket features accommodation with interiors designed by an Italian designer Paola Navone. Offering an outdoor pool, it also houses a spa and wellness centre. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. COMO Point Yamu, Phuket is a 20-minute ride from Bangtao Beach. Phuket International Airport is 27 km away. Guests who drive can enjoy free on-site parking. Fitted with floor-to-ceiling glass doors, each well-designed unit features air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. Most rooms have private terraces with sea or mountain views, while the suites boast a private pool. Their en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities and a hairdryer. The residence boasts treatment rooms, Thai massage alcoves, plus separate male and female steam rooms, a spa pool and a fitness centre. Other activities include yoga lessons. Guests can visit nearby attractions with help from the tour desk. Restaurants here offer a choice of Italian, Thai or healthy cuisines. They also serve local seafood. In-room dining is possible with room service.

name: Gp House Phuket Patong Beach
description: Situated in Patong Beach and with Patong Beach reachable within 300 metres, GP House Phuket features a restaurant, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers room service. Private parking is available on site. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kalim Beach, Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 34 km from GP House Phuket.

name: CC's Hideaway
description: Boutique and chic, CC's Hideaway is located in Karon and offers a saltwater swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. Guests also have exclusive access to the Escape Massage and Belove Yoga Rooftop Studio. CC's Hideaway Karon offers free wireless internet and on-site parking. It provides an express check-in and check-out feature and a sun deck, as well as pilates classes. Hideaway Karon offers 42 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with a mini bar, cable/satellite channels and a flat-screen TV. The relaxed bar is an ideal place to relax with a beverage after a meal at the restaurant, which serves Asian, Thai and local dishes for lunch, dinner and supper. Breakfast is available every day and room service can be requested. A variety of cafés and restaurants can also be found in the surrounding area. The hotel is a convenient base to explore nearby Patong Beach and Kata Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It is also an easy car ride from Patong and Chalong.Revato

name: The Casita Phuket (Sha+)
description: Situated in Ban Bo Sai Klang, 2.2 km from Sai Kaew Beach, The Casita Phuket (SHA+) features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and room service. Guests can enjoy pool views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Thai. Splash Jungle Water Park is 3.3 km from The Casita Phuket (SHA+), while Blue Canyon Country Club is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Lime Hotel
address: 267,269,271, Rat-U-Thit 200 Pee Rd., Patong, Kathu, Patong 83150
description: No description found

name: Centara Villas Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Centara Villas Phuket provides a modern setting when in Karon. In addition to free private parking on site, the property offers comfortable 4-star villas and a bar. Centara Villas Phuket has a fitness centre with a waterfall pool. Popular amenities include an outdoor pool and wireless internet in public areas. It also has its very own wellness centre, Centara Spa. The villas at the property are air-conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and a pillow menu. They come with tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Centara Villas Phuket boasts convenient dining options, including Asian and Mediterranean dishes at The Cliff Restaurant and Thai and international meals at The Bayview Restaurant & Bar. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the villas. The property is a convenient place to discover nearby Kata Beach and Karon Beach. It is also an easy car ride from Patong and Phuket Town.Revato

name: Amatara Welleisure Resort - Sha Extra Plus
description: Amatara Welleisure Resort presents a timelessly fresh, effortlessly Thai and bespoke resort experience, and features one of South-east Asias best ocean-view spa and wellness facilities. With a personality all of its own and benefitting from one of the regions most incredible locations, Amatara Wellness Resort offers an unrivalled way to explore and enjoy Southern Thailand, an endlessly popular and world renowned leisure and tourism destination.iHotelier/iStay

name: Sunwing Kamala Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Providing a shuttle service to Phuket International Airport, as well as free Wi-Fi, Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is a comfortable place to stay in Kamala. It also provides water slides, a kids club and a swimming pool. The resort offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. It also provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids pool and a playground. The rooms are air conditioned and include a kitchenette, a refrigerator and a private balcony. All provide a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and slippers. Guests of Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ are welcome to experience European, Asian and Thai cuisine at Som's Kitchen, or try Thai, Asian and European meals at Fino. Sunwing Kamala Beach SHA Plus+ is close to Kamala's well-known attractions, with the Phuket FantaSea only moments on foot from the property. Guests can also visit Kamala Beach.Revato

name: Bandara Villas, Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Located on Panwa Beach and 2.5 km from Panwa Cape, Bandara Villas, Phuket offers private villas with sea views. Most of the villas here boast a private pool, while some come with a shared infinity pool. This property features a restaurant and a fitness centre. During the stay, guests have access to free WiFi. Within a short drive, guests can find Phuket Aquarium (2.1 km), Khaokhad View Tower (2.5 km) and Chalong Bay (5.17 km). For outdoor enthusiasts, head to Phuket Shooting Range (6.50 km). Phuket International Airport is located 34 km from the property. Offering sea and pool view through the glass wall, each villa is complete with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a sofa set. A terrace with outdoor furniture is available. Featuring a shower, en suites bathroom are equipped with a bathtub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. At Bandara Villas, guests can make use of the shuttle service from or to the airport at additional costs. For the guests' additional convenience, the property provides room service. The on-site restaurant serves local and international cuisine, whilst the bar can cater for fine selection of specials cocktails and drinks.

name: Hotel Clover Patong Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Set in a prime location of Phuket, SURF Hotel Patong puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, ticket service, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, clothes rack, complimentary tea, mirror, slippers. Access to the property's fitness center, outdoor pool, pool (kids) will further enhance your already satisfying stay. SURF Hotel Patong combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Phuket unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Sugar Marina Resort-Surf-Kata Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Decorated in a nautical theme, Sugar Marina Resort - SURF - Kata Beach offers free WiFi access in all areas. Complete with an outdoor pool, guests can work out in a fitness centre. Free private parking is available at the property. Located in a quiet neighbourhood of Kata Village just a 10-minute walk to Kata Beach, Sugar Marina Resort - SURF - Kata Beach is 1.5 km from Big Buddha and 3.1 km from Kata Viewpoint. Phuket Airport is 31 km away. Featuring a big private balcony, each unit at Sugar Marina Resort provides 3 different themes including a classic look, a loft design and a retro style. It has air-conditioning, a seating area with a sofa bed and a cable TV. An en suite bathroom has either a shower or a bathtub. A hairdryer, free toiletries and towels are offered. At Sugar Marina Resort, guests will find an on-site restaurant, a 24-hr front desk and a room service. Guests enjoy sunbathing at a sun terrace and a laundry service.

name: Pacific Club Resort
description: Perched upon a hilltop and only a 10-minute walk from Karon Beach, the uniquely-designed boutique Pacific Club Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spectacular views and spacious accommodation with private balcony. Free WiFi is accessible in the entire premises. Pacific Club Resort - SHA Extra Plus is a 10-minute drive to Patong Beach and a 5-minute drive to Kata Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 1-hr drive away. Featuring Tuscan Travertine bathrooms made with real travertine and granite, all rooms come with air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. The property has an electronic locking system for guests' safety. Select rooms have well-equipped kitchenettes and private living and dining areas. The swimming pool at Pacific Club Karon Beach Resort offers a 360-degree view of Karon Beach. Guests can relax in the spa bath and enjoy massages and body treatments at the spa. The hotel also provides a well-equipped gym. The Dining Room restaurant offers an international menu for the convenience of guests.The delectable cuisine can be served anywhere in the resort.

name: Tuana Hotels Casa Del Sol
description: Located in Kata Beach, 1.1 km from Karon Beach, Tuana Hotels Casa Del Sol provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to a restaurant and to a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a balcony. Guest rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Tuana Hotels Casa Del Sol. Kata Beach is 1.1 km from the accommodation, while Kata Noi Beach is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 45 km from Tuana Hotels Casa Del Sol.

name: Hotel Baya Phuket
description: Situated in Patong Beach and with Patong Beach reachable within less than 1 km, Hotel Baya Phuket features a tour desk, non-smoking rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is around 400 metres from Phuket Simon Cabaret, 1.9 km from Jungceylon Shopping Center and 2.7 km from Patong Boxing Stadium. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Baya Phuket the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. The area is popular for fishing, and car hire is available at this 3-star hotel. Prince of Songkla University is 11 km from Hotel Baya Phuket, while Chinpracha House is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 36 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Coco Paradiso Phuket Sha
address: 19/36 Moo 4 T.Chalong Muaeng Phuket, Phuket City 83130
description: Set in Phuket Town, 2.2 km from Chalong Beach, Coco Paradiso Phuket offers accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to a garden and to a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All units at the hotel come with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. All guest rooms at Coco Paradiso Phuket feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a à la carte or American breakfast. Chinpracha House is 8 km from Coco Paradiso Phuket, while Thai Hua Museum is 9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: The Memory at On On Hotel
address: 19 Phangnga Road, Tambon Talad Yai, Phuket City 83000
description: Located in the heart of Phuket Old Town, The Memory at On On Hotel provides comfortable private rooms with free WiFi. It features a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk as well. The Memory at On On Hotel is located 5 km away from Central Festival Phuket Shopping Mall. Patong Beach is a 20-minute drive away, while Phuket International Airport can be reached within a 30-minute drive from the hotel. The rooms are provided with cable TV and an en suite bathroom. A range of local and international restaurants are located within a 5-minute walk away.

name: The Naka Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified is a 10-minute ride from the white sands of Patong Beach and various entertainment options. Offering unique-designed villas with private balconies, the property also boasts an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Phuket Town is approximately a 20-minute drive from The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified. A 40-minute drive takes guests to Phuket International Airport. Stylish villas are tastefully decorated and offer modern facilities such as a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a safety box. En suite bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests of The Naka Phuket -SHA Plus Certified can laze by the pool or enjoy pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and meeting facilities. For meals, sample a variety of both Thai and international cuisines served at The Wiwa, an all-day dining restaurant located just 5 steps away from the beach. With particular views of the sea and the sunset, The Nana offers refreshing beverages until late night. The Meka provides guests with a wide range of healthy dishes and drinks.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: Plan a luxury escape to Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin Beach. Whether you’re visiting Thailand for a family holiday, couple’s getaway or business trip, our five-star resort in Phuket’s location on the sands of Tri-Trang Beach provides a spectacular backdrop. Stay minutes from the entertainment hub of Patong Beach and Phuket Old Town. Take advantage of family-friendly resort amenities, including a 24 hour fitness center, three pools, children's activities and a day spa. Relax at our swim-up bar and sample delicious cuisine at one of the ten restaurants and bars at our Phuket, Thailand, resort. If you're hosting a meeting, choose from over 8,000 square feet of event space, including poolside and beachside settings and one of the largest ballrooms in Phuket. Unwind in rooms and suites featuring plush bedding, flat-screen TVs, mini-refrigerators, work desks, free Wi-Fi and private balconies with pool, garden, beach or sea views. A sophisticated stay awaits at Phuket Marriott Resort & Spa, Merlin BeachMarriott

name: Jasmine Village
description: No description found

name: Chanalai Flora Resort, Kata Beach
description: Moments from Kata Beach, Chanalai Flora Resort is a coastal retreat with a swimming pool. Those staying at the property also have access to free wireless internet and on-site parking. This charming resort offers an express check-in and check-out feature, a kids pool and a kids club. It also provides family-friendly amenities, with room layouts and services for families of all sizes, as well as babysitting/child services and highchairs. The rooms are air conditioned and include a coffee maker, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all have bottled water, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. Chanalai Flora Resort houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax of an evening. Breakfast is available daily and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. A wide selection of dining options are also found close by. Chanalai Flora Resort provides a convenient base to discover Patong Beach and Karon Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. The resort's multilingual staff will make sure that every traveller has a hassle-free stay.Revato

name: Hotel Verdigris
address: 154 Yaowarat Road Phuket Old Town, Phuket City 83000
description: Located in Phuket Town, 700 metres from Thai Hua Museum, Hotel Verdigris provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Providing a bar, the property is located within less than 1 km of Chinpracha House. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, Asian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Hotel Verdigris offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Prince of Songkla University is 5 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Temple is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 30 km from Hotel Verdigris.

name: Art Mansion Patong Hotel
description: Situated in Patong Beach, 1.8 km from Patong Beach, Art Mansion Patong Hotel features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers an ATM and a tour desk. The accommodation offers a shared kitchen, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Kalim Beach is 2.5 km from Art Mansion Patong Hotel, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 35 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Anona Beachfront Phuket Resort
description: Situated in Patong Beach, a few steps from Patong Beach, Anona Beachfront Phuket Resort-SHA EXTRA PLUS features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is set 2.7 km from Patong Boxing Stadium, 11 km from Prince of Songkla University and 14 km from Chinpracha House. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms come with a kettle, while certain rooms have a patio and others also boast city views. At Anona Beachfront Phuket Resort-SHA EXTRA PLUS rooms include bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Anona Beachfront Phuket Resort-SHA EXTRA PLUS offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kalim Beach, Phuket Simon Cabaret and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from Anona Beachfront Phuket Resort-SHA EXTRA PLUS.

name: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club (SHA Plus+)
description: Marriott's Phuket Beach Club welcomes you to Thailand with contemporary comfort and style. Our family-friendly vacation ownership resort is ideal for relaxation, with a great location on Phuket Island and full access to all the luxurious facilities at the adjacent JW Marriott Phuket Resort and Spa. Explore the area from our beachside resort, where we place you minutes from notable attractions and the pristine sands of Mai Khao Beach. Relax with your family by one of the resort pools or break a sweat in the on-site fitness center before spoiling yourself with a spa treatment or drink at the beachfront bar. Satisfy your appetite at our resort's array of restaurants, including a modern steakhouse, Japanese fare and an Italian eatery with pizza delivery. Our spacious two-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, full kitchens, master suites with soaking tubs, washers, dryers and furnished balconies so you can spread out during your time in Thailand. Your dream getaway awaits at Marriott's Phuket Beach Club.Marriott

name: Avista Grande Phuket Karon - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
address: 38 Soi Luang Phor Chuan Soi 1, Phuket City 83100
description: Experience the enchantment of Phuket's Sino-Portuguese past just steps from Karon Beach. Our 5-star boutique resort offers 159 spacious rooms and suites, starting at 53sqm, with mountain, pool, or sea views and modern design inspired by the island's tin-mining heritage. Indulge in suites with direct pool access or a private whirlpool bath on the terrace.accorhotels.com

name: Four Points by Sheraton Phuket Patong Beach Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Kick back for a relaxing stay at Four Points by Sheraton Phuket Patong Beach Resort. Just steps from the sea, our Phuket beachfront resort is ideal for couples, friends and families getting away from it all. Enjoy delicious local food and Best Brews™ at our five restaurants and bars or chill out at the Deck Beach Club as your young ones run free at 'Little Sea Gypsies Kids Club' and playground. Host conferences, social events and wedding parties in 1,200 square meters of function space, including two ballrooms and 1,000 square meters of outdoor event space. Themed coffee breaks and cocktail events are paired with a tropical garden with sea views. When the day is done, retreat to one of our 600 modern rooms and suites with direct access to one of three outdoor pools. Leisure travel finds a home at Four Points by Sheraton Phuket Patong Beach Resort, the newest resort in Patong.Marriott

name: Zenmaya Oceanfront Phuket, Trademark Collection by Wyndham
description: Thank you for choosing our Wyndham hotel. Wyndham Hotels and Resorts® is an upscale, full-service brand with properties located in key business and vacation destinations across the world.  It offers the comfort and amenities you would expect in a world-class hotel, including beautifully appointed public areas, thoughtfully detailed guestrooms and distinct dining options. Business locations feature meeting space flexible for large and small meetings, as well as business centers and fitness centers. Many resorts offer golf, tennis, beautiful beaches, spas and more.Wyndham

name: Little Loft Hotel
address: 59 Vichitsongkram Rd., M. 5, T. Vichit, Phuket City 83000
description: Situated in Phuket Town, 1.5 km from Chinpracha House, Little Loft Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a tour desk and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Thai Hua Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Little Loft Hotel provides some rooms with mountain views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Prince of Songkla University is 3.4 km from Little Loft Hotel, while Chalong Temple is 7.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 31 km from the hotel.

name: Homa Phuket Town
description: Located in Phuket Town, 3.6 km from Thai Hua Museum, HOMA Phuket Town provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a business centre. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a microwave, a stovetop, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At HOMA Phuket Town every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. HOMA Phuket Town offers a terrace. You can play billiards at the hotel. Chinpracha House is 3.7 km from HOMA Phuket Town, while Prince of Songkla University is 5.6 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 30 km from the accommodation.

name: Trimiracle Kata Beach Side
address: Tri Miracle Kata Seaside, Opposite Kata Garden,Kata beach,Muang,Phuket,Thailand, Phuket City 83000
description: No description found

name: Novotel Phuket Kamala Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: Located on Kamala Beach, Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachis a 3-minute drive from Phuket FantaSea. Offering modern air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony, the hotel is equipped with a spa, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Situated in the quiet end of the beach, the hotel is only a 3-minute drive from Kamala Village and a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 30-minute drive away. Rooms at Novotel Phuket Kamala Beachare fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. An electric kettle and a hairdryer are provided. An en suite bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower facilities. Children can enjoy different activities at Kid’s Club. The hotel features a business centre, a 24-hour front desk and concierge service. It also provides luggage storage facilities and currency exchange service. International dishes (Western, Thai and Indian) are served at Soul Kitchen. Drinks can be order at The Bar or at the swim up bar called Lilo. For light snacks and cocktails, guests can head to On the Roof Bar. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Hotel Midtown Ratsada
address: 62/9-20 Rasada Rd, T. Taladyai, Phuket City
description: Located along Ratsada Road, Hotel Midtown Ratsada provides modern accommodation with a 24-hour front desk and several on-site shops. Free parking and Wi-Fi are provided. Air-conditioned at Hotel Midtown Ratsada feature a cable TV, safety deposit box and minibar. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms come with a kitchenette. Hotel Midtown Ratsada is a 35-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated in Karon, Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel SHA Plus+ provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as an infinity pool, a sauna and a rooftop terrace. The multiple facilities this contemporary hotel has to offer include fitness classes, massage services and a 24-hour reception. There are a range of amenities available to guests of Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel SHA Plus+, such as luggage storage, porters and a tour desk. Airport transfers, a laundry service and a wake-up service are available on request. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, a private balcony and a coffee maker. Each has a bathroom that has bathrobes and a rain shower. 7th HEAVEN Sky Bar is a relaxed place at Sugar Palm Grand Hillside Hotel SHA Plus+ to relax with a beverage before dinner. A wide choice of eating options can also be found in the area. The hotel is just a stone's throw from Kata Beach and within a 10-minute car trip from Karon Beach. Guests can also visit Kata Noi Beach and Kata Day Spa.Revato

name: Sri Panwa Phuket Luxury Pool Villa Hotel (Sha Plus+)
description: Sri panwa enjoys an idyllic setting within 40 acres of lush tropical rain forest, perched high atop Cape Panwa. With each private pool villa carefully designed to showcase the true beauty of its coastal environment, this secluded resort has been hailed as one of Thailands greatest venues, situated 40 - 60 meters above the sea level, commanding breathtaking views of the surrounding Phuket islands and Andaman Sea.All the luxurious pool villas offer panoramic ocean views, while some boast full and uninterrupted 300-degree ocean views, a total of 52-pool villas range from one to five bedrooms. The interiors embrace the essence of Tropical Contemporary design by integrating its natural jungle and ocean surroundings with the modern comforts of luxury living.Services and facilities include a panoramic sea-view Beach Pool set just over Sri panwas beach, gym & fitness facilities, play room, business center & library, steam rooms, tennis courts, Cool Spa, Baba Dining Lounge and Baba Poolclub.iHotelier/iStay

name: Marco Polo Phuket Poshtel & Bistro
description: Marco Polo Phuket Poshtel & Bistro features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in Phuket Town. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a business centre, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, an oven, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. The rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at the hostel can enjoy an à la carte breakfast. Thai Hua Museum is 1.1 km from Marco Polo Phuket Poshtel & Bistro, while Chinpracha House is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 31 km from the accommodation.

name: Paresa Resort Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Treating guests to a superb infinity pool overlooking the sea, Paresa Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Kamala and features a plunge pool. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests of the resort can start their day at The Spa by Paresa, or enjoy the various leisure facilities, including fitness classes. Complimentary Wi-Fi is available for those guests wishing to stay online while travelling. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is well-equipped to make guests comfortable and has a private balcony, a marble bathroom and direct pool access. They all have a pillow menu, an in-room dining area and a private terrace. Large windows provide panoramic views over the sea. Serving local cuisine, Paresa Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s restaurant offers a romantic setting for a satisfying meal. Room service is also available during certain times. Phuket International Airport is less than a 45-minute drive from the resort. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Kamala.Revato

name: Cassia Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Cool markets, fresh seafood, Andaman's awesome beaches and a trendy island vibe - all at Cassia Phuket. Get comfy in our fantabulous serviced apartments, each with stylish living and chef-perfect kitchens, daily buffet brekkie, free WIFI and swanky hangou t spots in the resort or beyond laguna complex. Socialise with like-minded global nomads across the world. Come and live the best of both worlds here at Cassia Phuket.accorhotels.com

name: Tajh Pool Villas
description: Situated in Chalong, 1 km from Chalong Temple, Tajh Pool Villas features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service. Rooms come with a balcony with views of the pool. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Certain rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a microwave. The rooms have a wardrobe. An à la carte, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Chalong Pier is 5.6 km from Tajh Pool Villas, while Prince of Songkla University is 8.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 38 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Acca Patong
description: The 3-star Acca Patong offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Phuket. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, room service are there for guest's enjoyment. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, slippers, sofa, closet. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Acca Patong the perfect choice for your stay in Phuket.Agoda

name: La Vista Patong Hotel
description: Situated in Patong Beach and with Patong Beach reachable within 500 metres, La Vista Patong Hotel features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At La Vista Patong Hotel rooms are equipped with a seating area. The daily breakfast offers à la carte, continental or American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kalim Beach, Jungceylon Shopping Center and Patong Boxing Stadium. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 36 km from La Vista Patong Hotel.

name: Z&Z Resort
address: Ban Saiyuan, Rawai Beach 2,88 Soi Lucky Lek, Rawai 83130
description: Located in Rawai Beach, less than 1 km from Chalong Beach, Z&Z Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property is around 2.2 km from Mu Ban Tan Khu Beach, 3.4 km from Chalong Pier and 6 km from Chalong Temple. In addition to free WiFi, the property also features a terrace as well as a hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Z&Z Resort every room has bed linen and towels. Chinpracha House is 12 km from the accommodation, while Thai Hua Museum is 12 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 42 km from Z&Z Resort.

name: Burasari Phuket Resort & Spa (Sha Plus+)
description: Burasari Phuket Resort & Spa Sha Plus+ provides 4-star accommodation in Patong. Guests also have exclusive access to the Spa by Burasari and Swimming pool. The resort offers free wireless internet in public areas, as well as a garden for guests to relax in. Amenities include facial and body treatments, plus a sun deck and reflexology. The rooms at Burasari Phuket Resort & Spa Sha Plus+ are air-conditioned and include a mini bar, a refrigerator and a coffee maker. Each includes its very own bathroom with a hair dryer and bathrobes. Kantok, Burasari Phuket Resort & Spa Sha Plus+'s in-house restaurant, provides international, local and Thai dishes, plus live entertainment. Guests can also order from the drinks menu at Misty Bar. The resort is close to shops, dining and Patong's nightlife. It also provides an ideal location to explore nearby Karon and Kathu.Revato

name: Mövenpick Myth Hotel Patong Phuket
address: 27/9 Rat U Thit 200 Pee Road, Phuket City 83150
description: The Hotel transports guests back in time to an era of elegance, refinement and style. Weaving King Rama V's legacy with the island's Sino-Portuguese history, the hotel is a celebration of Thailand's cultural diversity. Standing tall within one of Patong's most spirited and vibrant roads, Movenpick Myth Hotel Patong Phuket is truly a pampering, delightful shelter that exudes both character and luxury. With 235 rooms and suites, art-deco inspired restaurant and lobby bar, and swimming pool.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Resort and Suites Phuket
description: Situated around an outdoor pool with a waterslide, Radisson Resort and Suites Phuket offers luxurious rooms with a separate lounging area and a 32-inch flat-screen cable TV. A minute walk to the peaceful Kamala Beach, the property features the magnificent the Serenity Spa and a 24-hour fitness centre. Radisson Resort and Suites Phuket is a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. It is within 8 km of Jungceylon Mall and Phuket FantaSea Cultural Park. Fitted with polished wooden floors and warm lighting, rooms are elegantly decorated with modern furnishings. Each room comes with a private balcony, a DVD player and minibar. Free toiletries, a bathrobe and a hairdryer are included in an en suite bathroom. The property is well-equipped with meeting facilities and a business centre. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with laundry services and currency exchange. Families with children can enjoy a variety of fun activities at Kid’s Club. A wide range of international dishes are served at the cafe, while refreshing drinks can be enjoyed at Splash pool bar.

name: Ayara Kamala Resort & Spa (Sha Plus+)
description: Boasting stunning views of the Andaman Sea from stylish rooms, Ayara Kamala Resort offers luxurious stays with a first-rate spa and 5-star fitness facilities. It provides free Wi-Fi and parking. Ayara Kamala Resort & Spa occupies a prime hilltop location overlooking scenic Kamala Bay. Offering airport transfer service and a free beach shuttle, it is a 35-minute drive from Phuket International Aiport. Featuring spacious interiors, modern Thai-style rooms at Ayara Kamala feature light wood flooring and furnishings. They come with a comfortable seating area, a flat-screen TV and large bathroom with a bathtub. Relax at the sauna or with a soothing Thai massage after an active workout at the tennis courts. Other leisure options include a well-equipped fitness centre and water sport activities. Enjoy sunset views and a spread of international and Thai dishes at Ayara’s restaurant. Meals can also be served in rooms.

name: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket
description: Holiday Inn Resort Phuket is an oasis in the heart of Patong, Phuket’s most famous beach. Please keep in mind that the Busakorn Wing has a separate swimming pool for the exclusive use of Busakorn guests if you wish to use this pool, please book one of our Premium rooms. Phuket reopened and you can now see the beautiful natural surroundings of Phuket. Blue skies, revitalised beaches, clean seas with lots of active marine life, cleaner air and green lush National Parks beckon. Phuket also has a lot of culture and experiences. There are many beautiful temples to explore, like Wat Chalong. Make a visit to a fresh market, get up close and personal with elephants or just take in the view from above at the famous Big Buddha. Holiday Inn Resort Phuket is part of the world’s most recognised brands, separated into two distinctive wings. The main wing is popular for its kids and family-friendly rooms and facilities. The newly refurbished Busakorn Wing Premium rooms with Thai designs offer a fabulous resort within a resort experience, with a tranquil pool with a swim-up bar. Holiday Inn Resort Phuket is well known for its excellent breakfast and great value cuisine in the resort’s three restaurants including, Thai cuisine, prime imported steaks and flavourful Italian cuisine. At the heart of Patong, Holiday Inn Resort Phuket offers guests a warm Thai welcome, friendly service and total ease. It is simply Patong’s best choice.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Patong Sunbeach Mansion
description: Just a 5-minute ride to Patong Beach, Patong Sunbeach Mansion features free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Boasting an outdoor pool, the hotel offers free private parking. Junceylon Shopping Centre is a 7-minute drive away, while a 20-minute ride takes guests to Karon Beach. Phuket International Airport is a 50-minute drive from the hotel. Each air-conditioned room is fitted with a fan, satellite TV, fridge and safe. A balcony, seating area and minibar are provided. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. A trip to various attractions can be planned at the on-site tour desk. A garden is included. Guests can sample a wide variety of Thai and European cuisine at Restaurant Du Jura. A broad selection of drinks can be enjoyed at the bar.

name: Chalong Miracle Lakeview
description: Chalong Miracle Lakeview offers self-catering accommodation with WiFi access in the unit, while free private parking is available on site. Located in Chalong, Chalong Miracle Lakeview is 400 metres from Tiger Muay Thai and MMA Training Camp. It is 950 metres from Chalong Temple and 9.5 km from Chalong Pier. Phuket International Airport is 37 km from the property. All units feature a private balcony, a seating area and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Chalong Miracle Lakeview, guests will find a daily maid and ironing services. A trip can be arranged at a tour desk. Airport shuttle service is provided at an additional charge.

name: Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach (SHA Plus+)
address: 92, 92/1 Moo 3, Tambol Sakoo, Amphur, Talang, Phuket City 83110
description: Expect the ultimate comfort at Phuket Marriott Resort and Spa, Nai Yang Beach. Ideal for families, couples and business travelers, our Nai Yang beach resort inspires relaxation with beachfront rooms and private villas, each featuring plush bedding, marble bathrooms, mini-refrigerators, flat-panel TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Elevate your stay in a scenic beach villa with a private garden and a 400-meter pool. Relax on our resort's private beach or try out the exciting water activities at Yacht Haven and Royal Phuket Marinas. Reserve one of our dynamic meeting venues, enhanced by cutting-edge AV services, custom catering and skilled event planners. End your day in Phuket, Thailand, with a swim in our lagoon pool, a rejuvenating treatment at our resort spa or delectable fare and creative cocktails at our restaurants and bar. Set on the sands of Nai Yang Beach, minutes from Phuket International Airport, our scenic resort offers guests a serene haven in one of the world's most beautiful destinations.Marriott

name: Indochine Resort & Villas
description: Situated on a tropical hillside overlooking Kalim Bay, this resort offers studios and villas with a fully equipped kitchen. It features a beach club with rooftop terrace and outdoor pool. Indochine Residence & Resort is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Offering free parking, the resort is only 2 km from Patong Beach. Fitted with wooden flooring, spacious rooms at Indochine feature contemporary decor. Each room also comes with a private balcony and cable TV. Villas come with a private plunge pool. Guests may play a game of tennis at the resort. Alternatively, a fitness centre with views of the sea is available. IndoChine Waterfront restaurant offers Asian dishes. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed at the Deli Café and pool bar. Alternatively, the option of in-room dining is available.

name: Peace Blue Naiharn Naturist Resort Phuket
description: Located in Rawai Beach, 2 km from Nai Harn Beach, Peace Blue Naiharn Naturist Resort Phuket SHA Extra Plus provides an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free WiFi access. The property has a pool bar, all day dining, roof top restaurant and bar, fitness centre, outdoor swimming pool, massage room and sauna and taxi and tour service. The units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hair dryer, while certain rooms have a kitchen fitted with a microwave. Guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area. A continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rawai Beach, like cycling and hiking. Free shuttle service to Naiharn beach is available. Around-the-clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Thai. Phuket Seashell Museum is 3.5 km from Peace Blue Naiharn Naturist Resort Phuket SHA Extra Plus. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Phuket Town
address: 1 Soi Surin, Talat Yai, Phuket City 83000
description: Immerse yourself in the energy of your surroundings at Courtyard Phuket Town. Ideally located near Phanga Road in the city center of Phuket Old Town, our hotel places you near cultural attractions, as well as local dining, shopping and entertainment. The hotel's design concept incorporates traditional Thai arts and crafts, cleverly contrasted with modern amenities. Take a cooling dip and enjoy a meal amidst awe-inspiring views at our pool and bar. Test your Thai boxing skills and keep up with your workout routine at our well-equipped hotel fitness center. Host a memorable wedding or successful meeting in our flexible event spaces, enhanced with modern audiovisual technology and personalized catering services. After a day spent working or exploring Phuket Old Town, unwind in the comfort of your spacious hotel room or suite with plush bedding, a sleek work desk, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. We look forward to making you feel at home at Courtyard Phuket Town.Marriott

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Offering a private beach and an outdoor pool, this 5-star hotel is located in Karon. Its premium amenities include a sauna and a fitness centre. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, SPA Cenvaree. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and feature a mini bar, a telephone and an in-room safe. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+'s bar and try international and Asian cuisine in the restaurant. Dining options at the hotel include Lobby Lounge and COAST Beach Club & Bistro. Centara Grand Beach Resort Phuket SHA Plus+ is just a stone's throw from Karon Beach and a short car ride from Patong Beach and Kata Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Karon.Revato

name: Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only, Kata Beach - Sha Plus
description: Close to Kata Beach, Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only Kata Beach Phuket offers modern 4-star accommodation in Karon. This elegant resort also provides a swimming pool, and is located within easy driving distance of Phuket Town and Patong. Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only Kata Beach Phuket has a gym with core/stability training equipment, a swimming pool and cardiovascular equipment. The 24-hour front desk provides services such as car rentals and luggage storage, and on-site parking is also available. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All offer a flat-screen TV, slippers and bottled water. The on-site restaurant offers international, Italian and Thai dishes in a relaxed setting. A wide choice of dining options can also be found close by. Chanalai Romantica Resort - Adults Only Kata Beach Phuket is close to Kata Day Spa. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Karon.Revato

name: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas (Sha Plus+)
description: Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas is set on Phuket, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Popular facilities, such as outdoor tennis courts and free Wi-Fi, ensure a satisfying stay in Mai Khao. The property offers a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Facilities include facial and body treatments, plus a beauty centre and a kids club. Villas at Anantara Mai Khao Phuket Villas feature a rain shower, a complimentary fruit bowl and a coffee maker. All are air conditioned and offer a private terrace, a marble bathroom and an iPod docking station. They also have a private garden, luxury linen and a pillow menu. Surrounded by the natural beauty of Sirinat National Park, the property provides a selection of outdoor activities, such as fishing, canoeing and snorkeling. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mai Khao.Revato

name: Kata Poolside Resort
description: Just a 2-minute walk away from the golden sands of Kata Beach, Kata Poolside Resort SHA Plus offers rooms with a private balcony. It features a pool area with a swim-up bar and kiddie pool. Kata Poolside’s rooms have dark wood furnishings and modern Thai décor. Each room has satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. The en suite bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and shower. Guests can relax on the sun loungers around the pool and enjoy mountain views. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist with tour bookings, transportation arrangements, and laundry services. Lobster & Prawn Restaurant serves local, international and fresh seafood dishes. More dining options, as well as convenience stores, can be found around the resort. Kata Poolside Resort SHA Plus is located along Kata Road. It is a 25-minute drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Anantara Layan Phuket Resort (Sha Plus+)
address: 168 Moo 6, Layan Beach Soi 4, Choeng Thale 83110
description: This modern hotel in Thalang provides free wireless internet, as well as a butler service and a saltwater swimming pool. A swimming pool and a limousine service are just some of the deluxe amenities on offer to guests during their stay. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the pool bar. There is an in-house day spa to relax at, which features a beauty centre and a sauna, as well as a range of body treatments. The hotel also has its very own gym, Lakeside Pool. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. All offer an in-room safe, a ceiling fan and a seating area. Guests of Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ are invited to sample Thai and local cuisine at Dee Plee, or try Japanese dishes at Zuma Pop-up Restaurant. Room service is also available any time of the day. Anantara Layan Phuket Resort SHA Plus+ offers free private parking on site for guests with a car. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Thalang.Revato

name: Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: "Located just 12 minutes from Phuket International Airport, this Phuket resort commands panoramic views of the Andaman Sea, a peaceful paradise offering ultimate privacy. Pullman Phuket Arcadia Naithon Beach Hotel is situated on Naithon Beach and surrounded by Sirinat National Park, a beautiful harmony of nature and 5-star luxuries. Lounge by one of our two pools, or pamper yourself at the hotel's award-winning Spa. Dine at our restaurants, bars and deli offering a fusion of Thai and Western cuisine. "accorhotels.com

name: Katathani Phuket Beach Resort (SHA Extra Plus)
description: Restful beach holidays await at the award-winning Katathani Phuket, with 6 pools and 6 dining options. Located across from Kata Beach, it features a first-rate spa and tennis courts. Featuring private balconies overlooking landscaped grounds, Katathani’s spacious rooms are fitted with Thai-style furnishings and wooden flooring. Each comes with cable TV and a glass-walled bathroom. Enjoy soothing massages and treatments at Tew Son Spa after an active workout at either of the 2 fitness centres. Other leisure options include water sport facilities, a games room and library. Offering international fare, the 6 dining options at Katathani Phuket range from casual beachside barbecues to fine dining. It features a range of cuisines including traditional Thai, authentic Italian, fresh seafood and oven-baked pizzas. For drinks and small bites, guests can head over to any of the 5 on-site bars.The resort also provides a 24-hour room service and conducts cooking lessons. Katathani Beach Resort is an hour’s drive from Phuket International Airport and a 15-minute walk from entertainment spots. Shuttle services to Phuket Town and Patong Beach are available.

name: Oceanfront Beach Resort
description: Set in Patong Beach, a few steps from Kalim Beach, Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus features some units with sea views, and every room is fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus can enjoy an American breakfast. You can play billiards and squash at the 5-star resort. Patong Beach is 1.3 km from the resort, while Nakalay Beach is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 31 km from Oceanfront Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Mandarava Resort And Spa, Karon Beach (Sha Plus+)
description: Mandarava Resort and Spa, Karon Beach - SHA Extra Plus, Karon Beach is conveniently located within a 10-minute drive from Patong Beach, the vibrant nightlife on Bangla Road and Jungceylon Shopping Centre. This resort boasts 5 swimming pools, 5 pool bars, fitness facilities and indulgent spa services. Guests enjoy free shuttle service to Karon Beach, located 700 metres away. The property is a 30-minute drive from Phuket Town. It is a 45-minute drive to Phuket International Airport. All villas at Mandarava Resort and Spa, Karon Beach - SHA Extra Plus are built separately from each other and furnished with contemporary decor. They feature free Wi-Fi, a private balcony and a 40-inch flat-screen cable TV. A minibar and a safety deposit box are provided. An en suite bathroom comes with a separate bathtub and a shower. Guests can arrange sightseeing trips at the on-site tour desk. Other conveniences include a meeting room, a convenient store and a salon. Chom Talay Restaurant serves a wide range of international and local dishes all day. Guests can indulge in home-cooked meals along with breathtaking views of the ocean.

name: The Marina Phuket Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated in Patong, The Marina Phuket Hotel is located an easy drive from Phuket Town and Kathu. Some of the facilities on offer at this 4-star hotel include free on-site parking and wireless internet. Those staying at The Marina Phuket Hotel are invited to take advantage of the relaxation amenities, which include a swimming pool. The hotel has 200 well-appointed rooms that are accompanied by a range of essential facilities to ensure guests have a comfortable stay. The Marina Phuket Hotel's restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides a suitable place for those who wish to stay close to everything the property has on offer. The hotel has easy access to Patong Beach. Banzaan Fresh Market, Soi Bangla and Jungceylon Shopping Center are a short walk away.Revato

name: Karon Sea Sands Resort
description: LOCATION Phuket, also known as ‘the pearl of the Andaman Sea’, is one of the most famous holiday spots in the world. The hotel lies by the white sand of Karon beach, surrounded by gardens and close to Patong beach, as well as the nearby leisure centres. ROOMS All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. A mini-fridge and tea and coffee making equipment are provided as standard. Convenient features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. RESTAURANT Navrang Mahal restaurant serves traditional Northern Indian dishes, while Thai and Chinese dishes are available at Tom Yam Kung. Refreshing beverages are offered at the Lobby Lounge and Pool Bar AMENITIES The establishment comprises a total of 87 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Active guests can make use of the bicycle hire service to explore the surrounding area (for a fee). The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. The sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great place to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options at the establishment include golf, a gym, a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, massage treatments.WebBeds

name: Kamala Beach Estate
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Kamala Beach, Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spacious suites with private balconies which overlook the Andaman Sea or garden. It has three pools and a private beach for you to choose from. Free WiFi is available in rooms and the lobby. Suites at Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus feature a living room, kitchen and dining room. Each suite is equipped with air conditioning, a private bathroom and satellite TV. A seating area and sundecks are provided. Although Kamala Beach Estate Resort does not have a restaurant we provide grocery shopping services. The team can also order quickly from many of the restaurants nearby, for breakfast, lunch or dinner to suit any budget. Guests can rent a kayak or take a dip in Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus's garden pool. The resort offers laundry services and free parking. Staff can arrange trips and activities for guests. Located between Bang Tao Beach and Patong Beach, Kamala Beach Estate Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 35 km from Phuket International Airport.

name: Sino Inn Phuket Hotel - Sha Plus
description: Just a 10-minute drive from Phuket Old Town, Sino Inn provides stylish private and dormitory rooms with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The hotel features a tour desk, which organises excursions to tourist attractions. Sino Inn Phuket Hotel is located a 5-minute drive from Rang Hill and 30 minutes from Patong and Kamala Beaches. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. All rooms are fitted with a balcony, a cable TV and an en suite bathroom with hot shower facilities. They provide air conditioning and a free minibar as well. For guests’ convenience, the hotel provides luggage storage facilities.

name: Sugar Marina Resort - Art - Karon Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: Sugar Marina Resort - Art - Karon Beach SHA Plus+ is situated in Karon and offers free wireless internet. It provides a gym, as well as an outdoor pool, a sun deck and a kids club. The hotel treats guests to a range of leisure amenities, including a playground and Swimming Pool. There is also free public parking on site for those travelling with a car. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator and a hair dryer. Start each morning with an American breakfast, and enjoy international and local meals at Kiri Burger & Grill. A variety of cafés and restaurants are also found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Wat Suwan Khiri Khet, and a 20-minute drive from Patong. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Karon.Revato

name: Sai Rougn Residence - Sha Extra Plus
description: Stop at Sai Rougn Residence to discover the wonders of Phuket. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, grocery deliveries, daily housekeeping, 24-hour security, taxi service are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, golf course (on site), golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, spa. Sai Rougn Residence combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Phuket unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Maiiam Bungalows Kata Beach
description: Maiiam Bungalows Kata Beach has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a restaurant and bar in Kata Beach. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 400 metres from Kata Beach. At the hotel the rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with pool view. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Kata Noi Beach is 1.1 km from Maiiam Bungalows Kata Beach, while Karon Beach is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 45 km from the accommodation.

name: Avista Hideaway Phuket Patong - MGallery (Sha Plus+)
description: Discover serenity at a tranquil hillside sanctuary near Patong Beach. 150 Thai-inspired rooms & suites offer pool, Andaman Sea & mountain views. This boutique Accor Phuket Patong hotel features a rejuvenating spa with free wellness classes, multiple dining options, including two rooftop restaurants & bar, and three pools with swim-up bars. Craft your Stories that Stay and discover the best 5-star resort in Phuket and Accor Phuket accommodation close to Phuket's best beaches, nightlife and sightseeing.accorhotels.com

name: Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated in Mai Khao, Maikhao Dream Villa Resort and Spa Centara Boutique Collection SHA Plus+ provides stylish 4-star accommodation, as well as a private beach, a swimming pool and a sauna.
