A free scheduled shuttle service to the popular Patong Beach area is available. Beautifully decorated rooms have air conditioning, a cable TV and a private balcony. En suite bathrooms offer free toiletries and slippers. Guests can workout in the fully-equipped gym or relax with pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, the resort offers a 24-hour front desk, meeting facilities and library. The on-site restaurant serves international cuisine, while a variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the wine bar. Room service is available around the clock.

name: My Style Resort Hotel
description: Located in Patong Beach, 1.2 km from Patong Beach, My Style Resort Hotel -SHA Plus provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. My Style Resort Hotel -SHA Plus features certain rooms with sea views, and every room comes with a balcony. All units include a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Kalim Beach is 2.6 km from My Style Resort Hotel -SHA Plus, while Patong Boxing Stadium is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Phuket Chinoinn-Shaplus Certified
description: Located in Phuket Town, 1.4 km from Thai Hua Museum, Phuket Chinoinn-SHAPlus Certified provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a restaurant. Built in 2015, this 3-star hotel is within 1.3 km of Chinpracha House and 5.8 km of Prince of Songkla University. The hotel features an indoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Phuket Chinoinn-SHAPlus Certified offers an American or Asian breakfast. Chalong Temple is 8.4 km from the accommodation, while Chalong Pier is 9.2 km away. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 32 km from Phuket Chinoinn-SHAPlus Certified.

name: Paripas Patong Resort (Sha Plus+)
description: Situated less than a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach, Paripas Patong Resort boasts two outdoor pools, a sun terrace and a fitness centre. Free WiFi is also provided in all areas for guests to stay connected. Rooms at Paripas Patong Resort comes with air conditioning, Cable TV and a safety deposit box. Extras include a refrigerator and a balcony with city or mountain views. Each room also come with an en suite bathroom fitted with shower facilities and free toiletries. Guests will be welcomed by the helpful staff at the 24-hour front desk. Sightseeing trips, car and motorbike rentals as well as taxi services can all be arranged by the on-site staff for an extra charge. Laundry services are available upon request. Located in the centre of Patong, guests can visit many attractions within a short walk from the property. It is 1.1 km from Jungceylon Shopping Center and only 1.3 km fro the lively Bangla Road. Phuket International Airport is approximately a 1-hour drive away.

name: Byd Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Patong Beach, BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus offers stylish serviced apartments surrounded by shopping and nightlife options. It features a rooftop pool and free WiFi in the entire property. BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus is within a 10-minute walk or a 2-minute Tuk Tuk drive of Jungceylon Shopping Mall and Bangla Road. It is a 40-minute drive from the Phuket International Airport. Well-furnished modern apartments at BYD Lofts - Boutique Hotel & Serviced Apartments - Patong Beach, Phuket - SHA Plus feature a separate living area with a 4K - 55-inch Smart TV and iPod docking station. Extras include home theater system and internet TV. For convenience, the European kitchen is equipped with cutlery, crockery and pans. An espresso coffee machine is also available in the room. Guests can relax with the massage treatments provided or take a dip in the outdoor rooftop swimming pool. A tour desk provides information on local attractions and car rental service. Enjoy hot meals at Restaurant Bistro and Bar@BYD Lofts. Alternatively, an extensive selection of wines, cold cuts and cheese are available at Wine Connection Deli Shop.

name: Park 38 Hotel - Sha Plus
description: With a stay at Park 38 Hotel in Wichit, you'll be within a 10-minute walk of Phuket International Hospital and Central Festival Phuket Shopping Center. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: 7Q Patong Beach Hotel
description: Modern yet affordable, 7Q Resident is located in the heart of Patong, just 2 minutes' walk from Patong Beach. Aside from an infinity pool, it also has free Wi-Fi and parking. 7Q Resident is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Jungceylon Shopping Centre and nightlife options at Soi Bangla are a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Fully air-conditioned, the stylish rooms at 7Q are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Each also comes with a personal safe and tea/coffee making facilities. The tour desk helps guests with travel arrangements. Car rental and chargeable shuttle services make it easy to get around Phuket. International and Thai specialities can be sampled at the restaurant, while refreshing drinks can be enjoyed at the Pool Bar. A daily buffet breakfast is also available.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Phuket Banthai Resort (SHA Plus+)
description: Step into tranquility when you check in to DoubleTree by Hilton Phuket Banthai Resort. Set in the heart of Patong, directly opposite the white sandy beach and turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea, we offer close proximity to the lively local area while providing a calming retreat from the hustle and bustle. Explore local markets, shopping malls, and the famous Patong nightlife, or relax inside and soak up the soothing resort ambience. Feel welcomed with a warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon arrival, then relax in your spacious room or suite. All rooms offer a private balcony or terrace area overlooking lush tropical gardens and one of the three hotel pools. Thoughtful amenities include an HDTV, WiFi, mini-refrigerator and tea and coffee-making facilities, and all bathrooms feature an elegant bathtub shower or walk in shower. Leisure options abound at DoubleTree by Hilton Phuket Banthai Resort. Enjoy a workout in our 24/7 fitness center, or take a dip in one of three outdoor pools, featuring swim-up bars with submerged seating. When you’re ready to be pampered, relax with a treatment in our deluxe spa. Our hotel in Patong offers great dining options. Enjoy the freshest seafood and local Thai and international cuisine at Port Restaurant, or chill at the laid-back al fresco Blah Blah bar with an ice-cold beer. Unwind at Lobby Bar with light snacks and handcrafted cocktails, or dine in the comfort of your room with 24/7 in-room dining.Hilton

name: Chabana Kamala Hotel
description: Located a 5-minute walk from the beach, Chabana Kamala Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and free WiFi access in public areas. With shops, bars and restaurants nearby, this hotel is 1 km from Phuket FantaSea. The bustling centre and nightlife of Patong is a 15-minute drive across the hill. Phuket International Airport is a 40-minute drive away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a desk and a safety deposit box. They also have a minibar and an electric kettle. A shower and free toiletries are provided in the en suite bathroom. Services and facilities at Chabana Kamala Hotel include a laundry and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy a pampering treatment at their spa. Thai and international dishes are served at the hotel's restaurant.

name: Odin Andaman Hotel
description: Located in Patong Beach, Odin Andaman Hotel features 3-star accommodation with private balconies. Featuring a bar, this 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Odin Andaman Hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a hot tub and sun terrace. Free private parking and a business centre are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Odin Andaman Hotel include Patong Beach, Phuket Simon Cabaret and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 36 km from the hotel.

name: The Front Hotel and Apartments
description: Featuring an outdoor pool facing the ocean, The Front hotel and apartments is situated just across the street from a peaceful spot on Patong Beach. It offers modern sea-facing room and free Wi-Fi. The spacious air-conditioned rooms and apartments feature cement finishes, a flat-screen cable TV and DVD player. Some rooms have a private balcony. They come with daily cleaning and bottled water. Steps from the Patong Beach beachfront, The Front Hotel and apartments is an easy stroll from the nearest minimart. It s a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy a relaxing poolside massage or explore Phuket with a day trip. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide concierge and childcare services. Light meals and refreshing cocktails are served at the pool bar. Room service is also available.

name: Kamala Beachfront Apartment
description: Located on Kamala Beach, a 5-minute walk from Phuket Fantasea, Kamala Beachfront Apartment offers well-appointed apartments. It boasts a saltwater pool with a hot tub and panorama views of the Andaman Sea. The Kamala Beachfront Apartment is a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport and 10 minutes from Kamala Village. It takes 30 minutes by car to Phuket Town. Apartments are luxurious with fine beddings and facilities like DVD players, air conditioning and an electronic safe. They all come with an open-concept living room with a dining area. They have well-equipped kitchens with microwave and a fridge. The hotel provides massage services, as well as, a tour desk for guests who wish to explore the area. Babysitting services are provided for convenience. Prime Kitchen is the hotel’s beachfront restaurant, which serves traditional Thai food. Meals can also be enjoyed in the comfort of guests’ rooms.

name: Outrigger Surin Beach Resort
description: Located in Cherngtalay, Manathai Surin Phuket provides modern 4-star accommodation, as well as an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The various facilities this stylish hotel offers include massage services, a coffee bar and a 24-hour reception. This cosy hotel provides family facilities, such as babysitting/child services. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. Rooms have a modern décor, air-conditioning and bottled water. There are a variety of cafés and restaurants near Manathai Surin Phuket, and Kamala and Patong are an easy car trip away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Cherngtalay.Revato

name: Princess Seaview Resort & Spa
description: Providing a free half-hourly shuttle to Karon Beach, Princess Seaview Resort & Spa in Phuket offers a rooftop outdoor pool. Its spacious rooms have a private balcony with views of the sea or Karon Town. Fully air-conditioned, rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and free bottled water. See-through glass bathrooms come with a separate bathtub and hot-water showers. Princess Seaview Resort is a 15-minute drive from Patong Beach and a 20-minute drive from Phuket Town. It is a 45-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Free parking is available. The large outdoor pool is surrounded by sun loungers, where guests can suntan while enjoying a cocktail or burger from the pool bar. For guests' convenience, there is also a fitness centre and laundry services. Princess Restaurant & Bar serves a daily buffet breakfast, as well as international, Thai and seafood specialities.

name: Hotel Sole
description: Hotel Sole is 300 metres from the city centre. It is a 5-minute walk from Jungceylon Shopping Centre and a 10-minute walk from Patong Beach. Offering a spa bath and restaurant, it features modern, Thai-style rooms with free Wi-Fi. Air-conditioned rooms are also fitted with tiled flooring and Thai-style wooden furniture. Cable TV and a minibar are provided. Some rooms come with a private balcony. En suite bathrooms offer a non-slip tile and a rain shower. The Hotel Sole’s restaurant serves Italian and Thai dishes and offers room service. The bar serves a variety of drinks in a relaxing atmosphere. Travel arrangements can be made at Sole’s tour desk. Alternatively, motorbike rentals are available for guests who wish to explore the area. Drivers can park for free here. Beach towels are also provided for free.

name: Sugar Marina Resort - Nautical – Kata Beach (SHA Plus+)
description: A 5-minute walk from the white sands of Kata Beach, Sugar Marina Hotel - NAUTICAL - Kata Beach - SHA plus Kata Beachoffers cosy accommodation with modern facilities and private balconies. It boasts an outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and on-site parking service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort. Sugar Marina Hotel - NAUTICAL - Kata Beach - SHA plus Kata Beach is a 20-minute ride from the well known Patong Beach. It is a 35-minute drive from Phuket Town and a 50-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Stylish air-conditioned rooms at this resort are provided with a flat-screen TV, a sofa seating area and tea/coffee making facilities. En suite bathrooms offer a bathtub with views and separate shower facilities. Mamarine Restaurant offers delightful a-la-carte menus of Thai cuisine.

name: Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas (Sha Plus+)
address: 887 Moo 3, Tumbon Mai Khao, Amphur Thalang, Mai Khao 83110
description: Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ is situated in Mai Khao and features free Wi-Fi. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel offers comfortable 5-star rooms and a bar. Recreational facilities at Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ include a swimming pool and a pool table. For those travelling with children Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ offers babysitting/child services, a kids club and a children's play area. Rooms at the hotel include a rain shower and a private balcony. Meals can be made in the equipped kitchenette and enjoyed in the dining area. Avani+ Mai Khao Phuket Suites & Villas SHA Plus+ boasts convenient dining options, including international and Thai cuisines at La Sala and Japanese meals at Tree House. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Just a short drive from Nai Yang Beach and Phuket International Airport, the hotel provides an airport shuttle service. It is conveniently situated just moments from Sirinat National Park.Revato

name: Phuket View Coffee and Resort
address: 56/10 Moo. 5 Baan Nai Trok Road, Chalong 83130
description: Situated in Chalong, 4.8 km from Chalong Temple, Phuket View Coffee and Resort features accommodation with a terrace, free private parking and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can enjoy mountain views. At the hotel, the rooms include a balcony with a sea view. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, all rooms at Phuket View Coffee and Resort have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a patio. The accommodation offers an American or Asian breakfast. Phuket Simon Cabaret is 8.2 km from Phuket View Coffee and Resort, while Chalong Pier is 8.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 38 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Anda Beachside Hotel
description: Stop at Anda Beachside Hotel to discover the wonders of Phuket. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Anda Beachside Hotel. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, cleaning products, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Phuket has to offer by making Anda Beachside Hotel your base.priceline.com

name: Cape Panwa Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Cape Panwa Hotel where a long, sandy, private beach and the nearby shade of the hillside coconut plantation enhance a truly tropical feel. Relaxing in the generous comfort of your fully-appointed suite or simply strolling hand-in-hand next to gently rippling wavelets, feel the stresses and strains of everyday life just melt away. Cape Panwa Hotel, a former haunt of royalty and current favorite of ‘A’-listers, retains the warmest of welcomes where everyone can feel treated like a very special visitor, thanks to the care and attentions of a staff of whom we are truly proud. A short hop from Phuket town, Cape Panwa Hotel offers all the services and facilities you would expect of a Cape property, with a range of restaurants to suit all tastes and the renowned Cape Spa. It is also an ideal venue for weddings or other celebrations under the caring and expert guidance of our dedicated Function Planner and the team. This is the venue to get back in touch with nature, with each other or just with yourself. Whether for a short family break or a working holiday, Cape Panwa wins hands-down every time.

name: Layalina Hotel
description: Right on Kamala Beach, Layalina Hotel offers spacious rooms with sea views, a minibar and a bathtub. Traditional Thai massages and an outdoor pool are featured. Free WiFi is provided throughout the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms at Layalina Hotel feature a striking wood-and-white decor. Each comes with a flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy magnificent sunrises over the Andaman Sea, then unwind in Phuket’s perfect weather on the hotel’s sun terrace. Patong Beach is 4 km away, and the hotel is a 45-minute drive from Phuket Airport.

name: Rosewood Phuket (SHA Plus+)
description: Located in Tri Trang Beach in Phuket, Rosewood Phuket features an outdoor pool and water sports facilities. The resort boasts views of the sea, and guests can enjoy contemporary dining experiences at an Italian inspired restaurant. Rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain units include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Every room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for cycling. Emerald Bay are 600 metres from Rosewood Phuket, while Jungceylon Shopping Center is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 40 km from Rosewood Phuket.

name: Grand Orlov
description: Situated in Patong Beach, a few steps from Patong Beach, Grand Orlov features accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Guests can enjoy city views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Grand Orlov provides some units with mountain views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Grand Orlov include Kalim Beach, Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 35 km from the hotel.

name: Ozo Phuket (Sha Plus+)
description: Boasting a swimming pool, OZO Phuket SHA Plus+ is located in Karon and offers comfortable accommodation. Some of the popular facilities provided at this 4-star resort include complimentary on-site parking and wireless internet. There are a range of amenities available to those staying at OZO Phuket SHA Plus+, such as a kids pool, a 24-hour reception and supervised child care/activities. Airport transfers, a dry cleaning service, babysitting/child services and a laundry service are available on enquiry. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and a hair dryer. All provide a seating area, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Guests staying at OZO Phuket SHA Plus+ can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay close at mealtime. The resort is within a short walk of Kata Beach. Karon Beach is also nearby.Revato

name: The Nai Harn (SHA Plus+)
description: Set in Rawai, The Nai Harn is a five-minute walk from Nai Harn Beach and offers an infinity pool, outdoor tennis courts and a sauna. Featuring views of Promthep Cape, it also provides a variety of amenities, including a butler service, a rooftop terrace and valet parking. Those staying at this 5-star hotel can plan excursions with the assistance of the tour desk. It also offers babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. The rooms at The Nai Harn have air conditioning and offer a private balcony, a coffee maker and a mini bar. They each include converters/voltage adaptors, a flat-screen TV and bottled water. The hotel offers a variety of in-house dining options with Cosmo all-day-dining restaurant & Rock Salt beach restaurant and Reflections "sprawling infinity-edged rooftop bar". Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Phuket International Airport is a 70-minute drive from The Nai Harn. Karon and Chalong are also a short drive away.Revato

name: Seven Seas Hotel
description: Seven Seas Hotel is located on the quiet end of Patong Beach, just 50 metres from the seashore. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Air-conditioned rooms at Seven Seas come with a private balcony offering views of the hillside, seaview or the pool. Each room has cable TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. Private bathrooms provide a hot and cold shower. The hotel offers car rentals, while day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with laundry and fax services. Guests can enjoy local and Western dishes at the restaurant. Hotel Seven Seas is a 10-minute walk from the restaurants and shops in Patong. Phuket International Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: Andaman Beach Hotel Phuket - Handwritten Collection
description: Discover Andaman Beach Hotel Phuket - Handwritten Collection, a captivating island retreat celebrated for its breathtaking beaches, vibrant culture, and boundless adventures. Immerse in beauty, savor flavors, and craft cherished memories in this tropicalsanctuary. Welcome to your unforgettable experience.accorhotels.com

name: C.A.P Mansion
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and a restaurant with all-day dining, C.A.P. Mansion Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV. It has free wired internet in public areas and sauna facilities. C.A.P. Mansion is less than a 5-minute walk to the weekend market and a 5-minute drive to Phuket Central Festival. Chalong Pier is a 20-minute drive away. It is a 35-minute drive to Phuket International Airport. Free parking is available. Boasting a private balcony, rooms offer spacious layouts, a fridge and dresser. An attached bathroom comes with shower facilities. For leisure, guests can rent a motorcycle from the front desk to explore the surrounding region. Added conveniences include airport shuttle and laundry services.

name: Three Monkeys Villas
description: Boasting a year-round outdoor pool, Three Monkeys Villas in Patong Beach features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The accommodation is air conditioned and features a hot tub. The villa provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a microwave, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. A balcony with mountain views is offered in each unit. Three Monkeys Villas offers a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Patong Beach, Patong Boxing Stadium and Jungceylon Shopping Center. The nearest airport is Phuket International, 35 km from Three Monkeys Villas, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Aquarius Gay Guesthouse & Sauna
description: The 3-star Aquarius Gay Guesthouse and Sauna offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Phuket. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, private check in/check out, daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour security. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, linens, mirror. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Aquarius Gay Guesthouse and Sauna.Agoda

name: Phuket Island View Hotel (SHA Plus+)
description: Situated on Karon Beach, Phuket Island View offers rooms with private balconies amidst a tropical garden. The hotel features 3 outdoor swimming pools, a spa and a restaurant. Island View Phuket is a short stroll from the shops and nightlife of Karon and Kata Central. The lively Patong Beach is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Decorated in a contemporary Thai design, rooms are spacious and bright. They feature tiled flooring and air-conditioning, and are equipped with satellite TV and a fridge. Guests at Island View can relax in the hot tub or unwind with a massage and body treatment. The hotel offers a tour desk and car and motor bicycle rental services. The Seabreeze Restaurant offers outdoor dining, serving local and Western food. Snacks and refreshments can also be enjoyed at the Beach Bar and the Pool Bar.

name: Anda Sea Tales Resort
description: Situated in Ao Nang Beach, 1.3 km from Nopparat Thara Beach, Anda Sea Tales Resort-SHA Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 4-star resort offers a kids' club, room service and free WiFi. The resort has a terrace and mountain views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the resort rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. The rooms come with a safety deposit box and certain rooms are equipped with pool views. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, American or Asian breakfast is available each morning at the property. With staff speaking English and Thai, round-the-clock advice is available at the reception. Ao Nang Beach is 2 km from Anda Sea Tales Resort-SHA Plus, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Pakasai Resort
address: 88 Moo 3, T. Ao Nang, A. Muang, Krabi
description: Located amidst a tropical garden setting near Aonang Beach in Krabi, Pakasai Resort by Tolani - SHA Extra plus offers comfortable accommodation and a range of facilities. Rooms feature wooden flooring and a large balcony with views of the lush greenery. It also offers air conditioning, an en-suite bathroom with shower and a DVD player amongst other amenities. Relax and leave your troubles behind when you take a dip in Pakasai's rooftop freshwater infinity-edge pool. With views of the sea, lounge around with a cool drink from the pool cafe. To further ease your stress and soothe your body, visit the Adora Spa, which offers a selection of massages, aromatherapy and body treatments that will rejuvenate you. Other facilities at Pakasai Resort by Tolani - SHA Extra plus include a full equipped fitness centre with juice bar, a small library and mountain bikes to explore the area with. Guests will sample daily traditional Thai sweets and herbal tea and participate in on-site activities including demonstrations of how to make Thai handicraft and enjoy a Thai folk dance. Enjoy a buffet spread of Thai and international favourites when dining at Dalah Restaurant. It also serves the freshest seafood and the specialities of southern Thailand.

name: Panan Krabi Resort
description: Panan Krabi Resort provides 4-star accommodation in Krabi. There is also a gym with a swimming pool. There are a variety of amenities at the resort on offer to guests, including meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and a fitness centre. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The rooms at Panan Krabi Resort are air-conditioned and offer a mini bar, a refrigerator and a private balcony. The private en suite includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers and bathrobes. Panan Krabi Resort features a variety of places to dine, including D-Plee Restaurant and Catch Up Sky Lounge - Wine & Pool Bar. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Krabi International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the resort. The staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Krabi.Revato

name: Bluesotel Smart Krabi Aonang Beach - Adults Only
description: When you stay at BlueSotel SMART Krabi Aonang Beach - Adults only - SHA Extra Plus in Krabi, you'll be by the sea, a 1-minute drive from Ao Nang Beach and 5 minutes from West Railay Beach. Featured amenities include a computer station, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Krabi? This hotel has facilities measuring 3321 square feet (308.5 square meters), including conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Newly Opened - Blu Monkey Hub and Hotel Krabi Town
address: 90 Maharaj Road Pak Nam, Mueang Krabi, Krabi 81000
description: No description found

name: Sofitel Krabi Phokeethra Golf & Spa Resort
description: The luxury resort in Krabi offers 276 elegant styled rooms and suites set within a beautiful tropical garden. Guests at the beach resort enjoy the largest lagoon swimming pool in Krabi, a spa, restaurants serving Thai, Italian and Indian cuisine, and luxury speedboat tours to nearby islands. You also get to pamper your kids with fun activities and kids meals with MyKids package.accorhotels.com

name: Bhu Nga Thani Resort And Spa
address: 479 Moo 2, Railay East, Ao Nang, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: This luxurious resort on East Railay Beach in Krabi is surrounded by the exotic mountain landscape and emerald waves of the Andaman Sea. A 15-minute boat ride from Nam Mao Pier, it has an outdoor pool and rooms with views. The rooms at Bhu Nga Thani Resort feature dark wood furnishings. Each room includes a flat-screen TV with DVD player. Internet access and a balcony with outdoor daybed are included. Bhu Nga Thani Resort Railay - SHA Extra Plus enjoys a location with limestone beaches and mangrove forests nearby. It is a 25-minute boat ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 45-minute long tail boat ride from Krabi Town. Activities such as snorkelling and island hopping are available and can be arranged via the resort’s tour desk. There is also a well-equipped gym. Bhu Nga Sari Dining Room serves a selection of Thai and western cuisines, seafood and wines.

name: Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach, An IHG Hotel
description: Situated amidst a tropical garden, Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation on a hillside of downtown Ao Nang. It is within a 5-minute walking distance to Aonang Beach and provides easy access to the city's main attractions. The elegant rooms at the resort feature Thai décor and a private balcony that overlooks lush gardens. Rooms are fitted with 49-inch flat-screen Smart TV and free WiFi access for guests' convenience. Guests can enjoy a meal at the Rakhang Thai Bistro and Bar, which specializes in Thai and European cuisines. Chao Nang Spa offers massage treatments for guests to unwind. Staff at the resort’s tour desk can arrange snorkeling excursions. Guests traveling with children can make use of a kids' playground. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 25 km from Holiday Inn Resort Krabi Ao Nang Beach - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Nakamanda Resort & Spa
description: Overlooking the mountain landscapes of Khao Phanom Bencha, the luxurious Nakamanda Resort and Spa- SHA Plus is located directly on Klong Muang Beach. Offering an outdoor pool and fitness centre, it also has spacious villas with free Wi-Fi. Surrounded by mangrove forests and plantations, villas are decorated in a tropical Thai style. Featuring a balcony or terrace, all come with a day bed, satellite TV and tea/coffee maker. Large bathrooms have a plunge bathtub and separate showers. Nakamanda Resort is a 20-minute drive from Ao Nang Beach and a 40-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. Via speedboat, it is 15 minutes from Hong Island and 1 hour, 45 minutes from Phi Phi Island. The Naga Spa has beautiful views of the Andaman Sea, and provides rejuvenating beauty treatments. Guests can read a book in the library, arrange day trips at the tour desk, or enjoy scenic strolls by the beach. The beachfront Kitchen Restaurant serves Thai and Western dishes. English high tea and refreshing cocktails are offered at The Living Bar.

name: Varana Hotel Krabi
address: 258 Moo 3 Tambol Nongtalay Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180
description: No description found

name: Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi
description: Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi is situated in Krabi and features free Wi-Fi. It has a fitness centre, as well as a swimming pool, water slides and a kids club. The resort treats guests to a variety of leisure facilities, such as billiards, a playground and Kids Club. Amenities include a 24-hour reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The resort also has its very own fitness centre, Swimming Pool. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a mini bar, slippers and a flat-screen TV. They have an en suite bathroom with a hair dryer and bathrobes. Those staying at Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi can sample seafood cuisines at the on-site restaurant, suitably located for those who want to stay close for a meal. There is a variety of breakfast options available each day. Krabi's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi, with Hat Noppharat Beach only a 10-minute walk away. Krabi International Airport is within a 35-minute drive.Revato

name: Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi
description: Set in Ao Nang, this traditional hotel provides a swimming pool, a sauna and a private beach. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a range of facilities available to guests of Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi, including fitness classes, a kids club and free Wi-Fi. The hotel's amenities, such as photocopier, airport shuttle and business centre, babysitting services and children's play area, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The comfortable rooms at Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi include a private balcony, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. There are also a number of rooms especially designed for families. A cooked breakfast is available at Lotus Court and Suan Bua every morning before guests venture off to sightsee in the local area. For guests on the go, Hagi offers breakfast, or for those travelling at a more leisurely pace, COAST Beach Club & Bistro serves a sit-down lunch. A wide variety of dining options are also found in close proximity to the property. Centara Grand Beach Resort & Villas Krabi is surrounded by the area's popular sightseeing attractions, including Ao Phra Nang, which is a short walk away. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Sugar Marina Resort - Cliffhanger - Aonang
description: Situated a 15-minute walk from the beach, Sugar Marina Hotel CLIFFHANGER Aonang - SHA Extra Plus offers stylish rooms and a year-round outdoor pool. Free WiFi is featured throughout. The stylish rooms features wooden details and are fitted with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. There is a electric kettle. The private bathroom is fitted with a hot shower, bathrobes and free toiletries. Guests will be greeted by the 24-hour front desk. Meals can be enjoyed at the on-site restaurant or in the privacy of their own rooms. Other dining options are also available within a short walk. Nopparat Thara Beach can be reached within a 10-minute drive. The nearest airport, Krabi Airport is approximately 25 km away.

name: The Pin Boutique Pool Villa Krabi
address: 445 Moo 5, Ao Nang, Mueang Krabi District, Krabi, Krabi 81000
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, 2.3 km from Nopparat Thara Beach, The Pin Boutique Resort Krabi provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. The property is around 1.8 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium, 11 km from Gastropo Fossils The World Museum and 15 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram. The property features a hot tub, evening entertainment and room service. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Pin Boutique Resort Krabi offers certain rooms with pool views, and every room is equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Dragon Crest is 15 km from The Pin Boutique Resort Krabi, while Thara Park is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 21 km from the resort.

name: Zeavola Resort
description: Zeavola is the definition of barefoot luxury and one of the most sustainable hotels in Thailand: This charming retreat is a jungle resort and themed to be a Thai Village from over 30 years ago, without missing all the amenities and services of a typical 5 Star Hotel. Grass-roofed teakwood villas blend with traditional Thai influences and a charming feel rustic. You won't find golden faucets and white marble here. Together with the tropical jungle, its sand paths, and the authentic Zeavolians is what will spark the magic. Zeavola is located on Phi Phi Don’s northeast coast and is only reachable by boat. Away from the hustle and bustle of Tonsai, the main village, and pier of Phi Phi Islands. There are no streets, cars, or motorbikes. Zeavola’s, Zann Zanook Activity, and 5 Star Padi Dive center offer professional diving. They also guided island-hopping and snorkeling tours. The Activity Center provides complimentary sports equipment so guests can play volleyball or frisbee on the beach or enjoy free kayaks. Before booking, ensure that your flights are in line with our boat transfers. The resort recommends that international travelers plan a day before and after departure on the mainland. This will help to ease your travel stress and any weather-related timeline changes. Insider Tip: Stay a minimum of two nights to get the feel and the understanding of what the Zeavola is trying to create What to bring: Mosquito spray, sun blocker, your positive energy For more information, please visit our official website or contact us directly. Emails and messages on online platforms will be replied to within 24 hours. In urgent matters call +66 75 627 000

name: B2 Krabi Premier Hotel
address: 1155 Moo 2, Soi Ao Nang 11, Ao Nang, Krabi 81180
description: No description found

name: Thip Thip Hotel
description: A stay at Thip Thip Hotel places you in the heart of Krabi, within a 15-minute walk of Krabi Hospital and Nakharin Hospital. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Vacation Village Phra Nang Inn
description: Experience a tropical paradise at Phra Nang Inn, located on Ao Nang Beach. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it has an outdoor pool, spa and open-air bar offering views of the Andaman Sea. Featuring hardwood flooring and furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms at the Phra Nang Inn are decorated with seashells. A satellite TV, safe and minibar are included. Traditional Thai herbal massage and other body treatments are offered at the Wareerak Hot Spring Spa. A tour desk and transport services are available for guests. A wide selection of Thai and European dishes are featured at Phra Nang Kitchen, steps away from the beach. Fresh seafood and steaks are offered as well. Guests enjoy cocktails served at Beach Bar. Phra Nang Inn is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. It is just a short stroll from the shopping and dining strip of Ao Nang Beach.

name: Loy Chalet
description: Set in Krabi town, less than 1 km from Klong Muang Beach, Loy Chalet offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and organising tours for guests. The units at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Loy Chalet provides certain units with pool views, and rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. A à la carte, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Koh Kwang Beach is 2.2 km from Loy Chalet, while Dragon Crest is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 30 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Tup Kaek Sunset Beach Resort
description: Tup Kaek Sunset Beach Resort-SHA Plus is located along Tab Kaek Beach in Krabi, about 14 km from Phra Nang Cave. The resort offers an outdoor pool and restaurant. The tropical cottage-style rooms at Sunset Resort Tup Kaek come with a TV and minibar. En suite bathrooms and amenities are provided. The hotel features 3 spacious suites with an outdoor Thai steam room and rain shower facilities. Guests can swim at the outdoor pool with spa pool or enjoy water sports by the beach. Sunset Restaurant serves fresh seafood, Western and local Thai dishes. The beachfront Red Leaf Bar serves snacks and drinks. Tup Kaek Sunset Beach Resort-SHA Plus is approximately 26 km from Krabi Airport.

name: Nap Krabi Hotel
description: Set in Krabi town, 2.4 km from Krabi Stadium, NAP KRABI HOTEL - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation provides a shuttle service, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. NAP KRABI HOTEL - SHA Extra Plus offers an American or Asian breakfast. Wat Tham Sua - Tiger Cave Temple is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 8.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 4 km from NAP KRABI HOTEL - SHA Extra Plus.

name: Bluesotel Krabi Aonang Beach- Sha Extra Plus
description: Featuring free WiFi, a spa centre and an outdoor pool, BlueSotel Krabi is located in Aonang, about 2.3 km from Nopparat Thara Beach. Rooms boast stunning views of the surrounding limestone hills. Appointed with wooden furniture, cosy rooms at Krabi BlueSotel come with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Some units also have a seating area or a balcony. All rooms have a private bathroom with a bathtub and free toiletries. During the stay, guests can take advantage of a 24-hour front desk, a business centre, room service, and free parking space. Staff at the on-site tour desk can take care of travel arrangements along with shuttle services. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 2.1 km from BlueSotel Krabi, while Nopparat Thara Beach is 2.3 km away. Krabi Airport can be reached within 19 km of the property. Featuring 2 spacious dining outlets, guests can enjoy delectable Thai and international dishes and night entertainment. Additionally, refreshing drinks and light meals are served at its pool bar as well as at the lobby bar.

name: Chermantra Aonang Resort & Pool Suite (Sha Plus)
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 5.2 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium, Chermantra Aonang Resort & Pool Suite offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Chermantra Aonang Resort & Pool Suite provides certain units with city views, and every room has a balcony. The units feature a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 7.4 km from Chermantra Aonang Resort & Pool Suite, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 14 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Sabai Hotel Aonang
description: Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, terrace, restaurant and free WiFi, Sabai Hotel Aonang is set in Ao Nang Beach, a few steps from Ao Nang Beach and less than 1 km from Nopparat Thara Beach. The property is located 1.5 km from Pai Plong Beach, 3.2 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium and 7.4 km from Gastropo Fossils The World Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, and organising tours for guests. The units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at Sabai Hotel Aonang have a city view. Wat Kaew Korawaram is 17 km from the accommodation, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Sabai Hotel Aonang.

name: Aonang Princeville Villa Resort and Spa
description: Aonang Beach is an exclusive boutique resort on Ao Nang Beach and offers traditionally-decorated rooms and an open-air restaurant just a few minutes' from the beach. Aonang Princeville's rooms have Thai-style décor and are spacious, surrounded by tropical gardens, and enjoy pool views. The resort offers an outdoor swimming pool, which includes a children’s pool. Special massage treatments are available at the resort's Princeville Spa. The resort's White Orchid Restaurant is a Halal Restaurant serving Thai and International dishes. Guests can enjoy fresh seafood from the local fishery market and snacks and drinks are available daily at the poolside bar. Aonang Princeville Resort is about 40 minutes' drive from Krabi International Airport.

name: Aonang Sea Valley Resort
description: Situated in Ao Nang Beach, 1.7 km from Ao Nang Beach, Aonang Sea Valley Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a terrace. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Aonang Sea Valley Resort rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Pai Plong Beach is 2.2 km from the accommodation, while Nopparat Thara Beach is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from Aonang Sea Valley Resort.

name: Marina Express - Fisherman - Aonang
description: Marina Express-Fisherman Aonang has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in Ao Nang Beach. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at Marina Express-Fisherman Aonang can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Pai Plong Beach, Aonang Mosque and McDonald's, Aonang. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 18 km from Marina Express-Fisherman Aonang.

name: Jr Place
description: Set in Klong Muang Beach, 700 metres from Klong Muang Beach, JR Place offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the resort every room includes air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. JR Place features certain units with pool views, and every room is equipped with a kettle. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Koh Kwang Beach is 2.1 km from JR Place, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 6.9 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 30 km from the resort.

name: Blue Tara Hotel Krabi Ao Nang
description: Buri Tara Resort - SHA Extra Plus certified, chic accommodations with blue elegance, and you will find the best place for workcation that will inspire your valuable weekend. Buri Tara Resort is located near the beach, only 3 minutes from Nopparattara beach and 5 minutes from Aonang beach and is close to many shops and restaurants. The properties have a restaurant that serves authentic Thai and international cuisine, as well as a swimming pool where you can relax and have enjoyable. Buri Tara Resort is a boutique resort with private balconies, separate bathtubs, high-speed wifi, and outdoor furniture seating. Buri Tara is a 30 -minute drive from Krabi International Airport, a 20-minute drive from Krabi Town and a 2-hour drive from Phuket International Airport.

name: Tinidee Hideaway Tonsai Beach Krabi
address: 1057 Moo 2, Tambon Ao Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Tinidee Hideaway Tonsai Beach Krabi is situated in Ao Nang, just 40 minutes from Krabi International Airport. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Those staying at the hostel are invited to benefit from the relaxation amenities, which include a swimming pool. For those wanting to get outdoors the hostel has a wide variety of activities, such as hiking and rock climbing. Rooms at Tinidee Hideaway Tonsai Beach Krabi are comfortable and feature a ceiling fan. Tinidee Hideaway Tonsai Beach Krabi's restaurant is open for breakfast and dinner and is a convenient setting for those who wish to stay close to everything the property has on offer. Tinidee Hideaway Tonsai Beach Krabi is a stone's throw from Ton Sai Beach. Ko Poda is only an easy car ride from the hostel.Revato

name: Krabi Boat Lagoon Resort
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a sun terrace, Krabi Boat Lagoon is located in Nue Khlong in the Krabi Province Region. Thara Park is 30 km away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The accommodation is air-conditioned and comes with a seating area and private bathroom. Selected units also has a dining area and/or a balcony. There's also a kitchenette fitted with a fridge and basic cooking appliances. The apartment offers free private parking on-site Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. Bike hire is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and canoeing. Krabi pier - Klong Jirad is 28 km from Krabi Boat Lagoon, while Pakasai Golf course is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 15 km from Krabi Boat Lagoon.

name: Aonang Villa Resort
description: Steps from Ao Nang Beach, Aonang Villa Resort - SHA Extra Plus features spectacular views of the Andaman Sea, a spa and 2 large freeform outdoor pools. It offers free afternoon tea and free Wi-Fi. The Aonang Villa Resort - SHA Extra Plus is about 30 km from Krabi International Airport. Rooms are bright and spacious, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows and private balconies with views of the Andaman Sea or cliffs. Some rooms are just steps from the swimming pool. Guests can exercise at the fitness centre or relax at the hot tub. Traditional Thai massage and body wraps are available at The Villa Spa. The hotel can arrange for airport shuttle, car rental and excursions to nearby attractions. Offering an outdoor dining setting, nestled within tropical gardens, Kiang Le serves a varied buffet breakfast and an international menu for dinner. Kiang Tarn Lobby Bar provides magazines and newspapers for a light read with refreshments.

name: The Pelican Residence & Suite Krabi
description: The Pelican Krabi luxury apartments offer a self-service experience that combine the service and quality of a beach destination hotel with the freedom and privacy of apartment living. Klong Maung Beach is located just 50 meters away across the street from the property. Guests can enjoy the beautiful nature of Krabi while dining at the beachfront restaurants or hike up to explore a bar with a mountain view. Located in a quite area of Klong Maung beach, our modern and spacious apart-hotels are a hidden gem for couples, families, and long term stay guests, who expect a little bit more from their accommodation. These apartments have been designed to offer a real home away from home feel and are available for daily rentals, weekend getaway, short breaks and long term monthly/yearly rentals. The comfortable suites feature a separate living room, dining area, bedroom, bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, and large balcony. Fully furnished, the air-conditioned units come with a flat-screen TV, a sofa and views of the ocean or pool. Some units have a private swimming pool and a shower or bathtub, which can be found in the private bathroom. The Pelican Krabi also have other common facilities such as the Fitness Centre, working lounge, common pool, and kids’ corner. Free private parking is also available on-site. The property is a 15-minute drive from Ao Nang and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi International Airport is a 40-minute drive from The Pelican Krabi.

name: Slumber Party Krabi
description: Slumber Pool Party Ao Nang Krabi features a garden, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Ao Nang Beach. This 2-star hostel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and free WiFi throughout the property. Each room includes air conditioning, and certain rooms at the hostel have a balcony. Guest rooms include bed linen. Ao Nang Beach is 1.6 km from Slumber Pool Party Ao Nang Krabi, while Pai Plong Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Tetris Hotel
description: Tetris Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Krabi, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, taxi service, 24-hour front desk, are at hand. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, clothes rack, mirror, sofa, towels to ensure a restful night. Access to the hotel's outdoor pool will further enhance your satisfying stay. Tetris Hotel combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Krabi unforgettable.Agoda

name: Chanpailin Omarzaa
address: 477 Moo2, Nong Thale, Mueang, Krabi, Krabi 81180
description: Situated in Krabi town, Chanpailin Omarzaa features 2-star accommodation with private balconies. The property is around 2.5 km from Klong Muang Beach, 6.6 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium and 8.2 km from Dragon Crest Mountain. There is an outdoor pool and guests can make use of free WiFi and free private parking. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 17 km from Chanpailin Omarzaa, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 29 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mw Krabi Beach Resort
address: 112, Ao Nang, Amphur Muang, Ao Nang 81000
description: Surrounded by the beauty of Krabi National Park and Noppharat Thara Beach is Krabi Success Beach Resort, offering free internet access in public areas and a swimming pool. The beach and Ao Nang city centre is only a short stroll away from Krabi Success Beach Resort. Rooms are comfortably furnished with a Thai touch. They feature a private balcony with deck chairs. Krabi Success Beach Resort offers bicycle and limousine rentals. It also has an on-site restaurant offering European, Thai and continental cuisine. There is also a coffee shop and pool-side bar.

name: Boon Siam Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Krabi’s shopping district, the Boon Siam Hotel offers a Karaoke room and a massage room. Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are also available. Rooms at the Boon Siam have a TV with satellite channels and air conditioning. The Maya Restaurant serves Thai, Chinese and European dishes prepared with locally-sourced ingredients. The restaurant also features live entertainment. Guests can enjoy the Karaoke room, or have a relaxing Thai massage.

name: The Beach at Klong Muang
description: Located in Klong Muang Beach, 600 metres from Klong Muang Beach, The Beach at Klong Muang provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel features family rooms. At the hotel, each room has a balcony. Guest rooms in The Beach at Klong Muang are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. The accommodation offers an Asian or halal breakfast. Koh Kwang Beach is 2.1 km from The Beach at Klong Muang, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 30 km from the hotel.

name: Krabi Home Town Boutique
description: Situated in Krabi Town, Krabi Home Town Boutique offers air-conditioned rooms, and free internet access in public areas. There are also free shuttle to the city daily. An outdoor swimming pool is provided. Rooms are equipped with satellite TV, minibar and private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Room service is available. Krabi Home Town Boutique's swimming pool has a spa bath. Free parking, a tour desk and a motorbike and car rental service are offered. Guests can also enjoy a massage. Krabi Airport is located just a 15-minute drive from the property.

name: Sai Rung Resort
address: 185 Moo 3, Huay Yung, Nua Klhong, Krabi 81130
description: Sai Rung Resort features an outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Ban Nua Khlong. The property is located 15 km from Krabi Stadium, 16 km from Wat Tham Sua - Tiger Cave Temple and 21 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Guest rooms will provide guests with a microwave. Guests at the resort can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Thara Park is 22 km from Sai Rung Resort, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 33 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 4 km from the accommodation.

name: The Shellsea
address: 999 Moo 6, Sai Thai, Muang, Krabi, Ban Ao Nam Mao 81000
description: Beautifully set next to the beach in Ao Nam Mao, The Shell Sea offers stylish accommodation in a convenient area of Krabi. Boasting an unsurpassed spa experience and sauna for guests' casual enjoyment, the resort features an outdoor pool overlooking the views of the sea. Delectable and fresh seafood dishes can be sampled daily at the on-site restaurant, while refreshing drinks are served at the bar. All guests have an access to free WiFi in public areas. Free private parking is also available for those who drive. The rooms here are equipped with an air conditioning and come with a flat screen TV. Selected units are fitted with a spacious seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub, bathrobes and premium amenities. Friendly staff are 24-hour available to assist all guests at the front desk. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 1.4 km from the property, while Thara Park is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 26 km from The Shell Sea.

name: Krabi Heritage Hotel
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, within 600 metres of Ao Nang Beach and 1.5 km of Pai Plong Beach, Krabi Heritage Hotel - SHA Extra Plus provides accommodation with a fitness centre and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 7.8 km from the hotel and Dragon Crest Mountain is 17 km away. At the hotel every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Krabi Heritage Hotel - SHA Extra Plus offers certain units with city views, and each room includes a kettle. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, à la carte or American breakfast is available daily at the property. Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.7 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 24 km from Krabi Heritage Hotel - SHA Extra Plus, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: ibis Styles Krabi Ao Nang
address: 725 Moo2 Ao-Nang, Nopparat Road Muang Krabi, Krabi 81000
description: Located in Ao Nang and only 25 km from the airport, the hotel offers a perfect base to explore the natural beauty of Krabi province and easy access to the city's must-see destinations including the beautiful beaches, stunning islands and lush national parks. Step into one of our modern and stylish rooms and escape the stresses of the day with a wide range of amenities including free Wi-Fi. The hotel's outdoor swimming pool and children's playground are ideal places to relax.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort, Krabi - Sha Extra Plus
address: 123 Moo 3 Ao Nang, Muang, Krabi -, Krabi 81180
description: Located on the coast of Thailand, Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort, Krabi - SHA Extra Plus Certified, Krabi is a spectacular boutique resort situated on the white sands of Ao Nang Beach. It has rooms that open up to a large freeform pool. Set amidst breathtaking tropical landscaped grounds, Holiday Ao Nang Beach Resort, Krabi - SHA Extra Plus Certified, Krabi offers luxurious rooms with private terraces. Rooms are also fitted with a DVD player, elegant bathroom and WiFi access. Enjoy a peaceful day at sea by renting a yacht or cool off with a swim in the swimming pool. InnAsia, the hotel’s rooftop restaurant, serves fresh seafood and authentic Thai cuisine. A selection of refreshing beverages and spectacular beach views are enjoyed at the Wave Restuarant & Bar.

name: Red Ginger Chic Resort
description: Red Ginger Chic Resort by Tolani - SHA Extra Plus is 5-minute walk to Ao Nang and Nopparat Thara Beach in Krabi. It offers spacious accommodation, an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. The resort is 20 km from the city centre. It is a 40-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Railay Beach is 15 minutes away by longtail boat. Red Ginger's air-conditioned rooms have a tea/coffee maker, TV with DVD player and minibar. Private bathrooms have a bath and shower. Guests can work-out at the fitness centre or make arrangements for trips and activities at the tour desk. Red Ginger Chic Resort by Tolani - SHA Extra Plus's restaurant serves Thai and international dishes. In-room dining is also available.

name: Mild Garden View Resort
description: Mild Bungalow, an ideal choice for those looking for space and calmness, is located a 5-minute walk from Krabi's Ao Nang Beach. An outdoor pool and Thai massage are offered. Ao Nang, with its vibrant nightlife and seafood restaurants, is a 10-minute drive from the resort. It is 20 km from Krabi Airport. The air-conditioned villas of Mild Bungalow blend beautifully into the lush, tropical nature. They are daily serviced, airy and cosy, and equipped with all necessary amenities, including a fridge and cable TV. Guests may arrange day trips at the tour desk or rent a bicycle to explore the area at leisure. For convenience, Mild Bungalow also provides free parking and a 24-hour front desk. Mild's restaurant serves local and international dishes. A continental breakfast is also available every morning.

name: Aonang Hill Krabi-Sha Extra Plus
description: Located only a 4-minute drive to the beach, Aonang Hill Krabi-SHA Extra Plus boasts comfortable accommodation, ranging from a dormitory room to a villa. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. The rooms at this property come with parquet flooring, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Each unit has a private garden and a balcony. The bathroom is fitted with a shower and certain rooms is equipped with a bathtub. Staff are 24-hour standby at the front desk to assist all guests with everything they need. Aonang Hill Krabi-SHA Extra Plus also offers a surcharged airport shuttle upon request. Refreshing drinks are served at the bar. Ao Nam Mao is just a 10-minute drive from the property, while Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is a 15-minute drive away. Krabi Airport is a 35-minute drive from Aonang Hill Krabi-SHA Extra Plus.

name: Phitharom Pp Resort
description: Phitharom PP Resort is located on Loh Dalum Bay, 500 metres from Ton Sai Pier. The property offers free WiFi and an outdoor swimming pool. Each air-conditioned room comes with a refrigerator. Private balconies overlook the Andaman Sea and surrounding jungles. Phitharom PP Resort is 1 hour 30 minutes by ferry to Phuket or Krabi.

name: The Capuchin Hotel
description: A short drive from Aonang and Nopparat Thara Beaches, The Capuchin Hotel Krabi, Ao Nang Beach - SHA Plus offers modern rooms with daily minibar and free WiFi access in all areas. It is 800 metres from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Rooms provide air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and a balcony. There is also a refrigerator and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At The Capuchin Hotel Krabi, Ao Nang Beach - SHA Plus you will find a 24-hour reception, on-site shops and laundry service. Meals, snacks and drinks can be ordered at the restaurant. Free public parking is available.

name: Rayavadee
address: 214 Moo 2, Tumbon Ao-Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Luxurious beachfront accommodation along Krabi's Andaman Coast is provided at the 5-star Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus, just next to Krabi Marine National Park. It has a full-service spa, 4 dining options and an outdoor pool. Surrounded on all sides by tropical gardens and beaches, Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus features free-standing 2-storey pavilions and beachfront pool villas. Each room has a terrace, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Via speedboat, Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus is a 25-minute journey from Bamboo Island and a 35-minute journey from Phi Phi Island. It is less than 2 hours’ driving from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy the resort’s natural setting, which is home to wildlife like monkeys and exotic birds. Massages, facial and body treatments are available at The Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus Spa. Designer items and souvenirs are available at Rayavadee- SHA Extra Plus Boutique. Fresh lobster and Western dishes are served at the Raya Dining Restaurant, while Krua Phranang offers traditional Thai fare. Raitalay Terrace features international dishes and views of Railay Beach.

name: Thara Bayview Villa
description: Situated in the mountains, this welcoming villa brings all of Krabi within your reach. Thanks to the convenient onsite parking, you can either leave your vehicle behind and let your feet make short work of the 14-minute walk to Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium, or easily tackle the quick 8-minute drive to Ao Nang Beach. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!), or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a balcony. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi, TV, and computer. A sitting area, a dining area, a sofa bed, and a BBQ grill are featured at this 5-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental. In addition, there's a jetted tub, along with free toiletries, towels, and a hair dryer. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, a microwave, and cookware. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Aonang Silver Orchid Resort
description: A 3-minute drive from Aonang Beach, Aonang Silver Orchid Resort offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The resort features a pool, tour desk and meeting rooms. Free public parking is possible on site. The resort is a 5-minute drive to Noppharat Thara Beach. It is a 20-minute drive from Krabi Town and Krabi International Airport. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, electric kettle and refrigerator. They also have a hairdryer and safety deposit box. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For guests’ convenience, the resort provides shuttle service, laundry and luggage storage. The resort’s restaurant serves Thai, international and Halal dishes. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Wake Up Aonang Hotel
description: Wake Up Aonang Hotel- SHA EXTRA PLUS is a short walk from the Ao Nang Beach and free WiFi is available. Guests can enjoy meals at the on-site restaurant. Each room at this hotel is air-conditioned and has a flat-screen cable TV. You will also find a kettle, refrigerator and a desk in the room. The en suite bathroom offers a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Laundry services are available and a daily maid service is provided. Wake Up Aonang Hotel- SHA EXTRA PLUS is surrounded by shops, restaurants and tour operators. Nopparat Thara Pier, where guests can catch a ferry to Phi Phi Island, is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, a 35-minute drive from the property.

name: Doo Dee Boutique Resort by Swiss Chalet
address: Klong Hang Soi 2 100/1 Moo 3, Ban Khlong Muang 81180
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, 500 metres from Nopparat Thara Beach, Doo Dee Boutique Resort by Swiss Chalet provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, an ATM and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can use the hot tub, or enjoy garden views. At the hotel every room has air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a patio with pool view. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Doo Dee Boutique Resort by Swiss Chalet offers a barbecue. The area is popular for hiking and snorkelling, and bike hire is available at this 3-star hotel. Ao Nang Beach is 2 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 100 metres away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 23 km from Doo Dee Boutique Resort by Swiss Chalet, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hula Hula Resort Ao Nang
description: Situated on the peaceful hill overlooking the Andaman Sea, Hula Hula Resort, Ao Nang -SHA Extra Plus Beach boasts four outdoor swimming pools including one main pool, one kids' pool and two private pools, an on-site Thai art and crafts centre and free WiFi. Both Ao Nang and Nopparat Beach can be reached within 3 minutes, using the resort's free shuttle bus or 12 minutes on foot. All guests are welcomed by exotic seasonal fruits and tropical drinks. Guests can also enjoy views of the pineapple field at the back of the resort. Decorated with pineapple-themed pillows and tropical colours, the rooms features genuine wood furnishings. It has a flat-screen TV, a minibar and an electric kettle. The en suite bathrooms include slippers and free toiletries that offer the fragrance of frangipani. Rooms come with a balcony or a patio with direct pool access. Special features include unique art pieces created by local Krabi painters. Guests staying at Hula Hula Resort can enjoy pampering massage treatments. The Hula Hut restaurant serves tasty Thai meals, including of pineapple juice and special dishes cooked from pineapples. The outdoor pool also comes with a relaxing plunge pool and a kids pool. There is also a tour desk, free parking and a 24-hour front desk. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, a 30-minute drive from Hula Hula Resort, Ao Nang -SHA Extra Plus Beach.

name: Le Passe-Temps
address: 73 Moo 3, Ao Tha Lane, Ban Thalane, Ban Tha Lane 81000
description: Situated in Tha Lane Bay, a few steps from Thalane Beach, Le Passe-Temps features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a bar. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Rooms have a safety deposit box, while certain rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also boast sea views. At Le Passe-Temps all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or Asian breakfast. At Le Passe-Temps you will find a restaurant serving Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and gluten-free options can also be requested. Tha Pom Klong Song Nam is 18 km from the hotel, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 28 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 35 km from Le Passe-Temps, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sea Seeker Krabi Resort
address: 963 Moo 2, Tumbon Aonang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Sea Seeker Krabi Resort - SHA Extra Plus features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Ao Nang Beach. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a kids' club and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. Breakfast is available daily, and includes American, Asian and vegetarian options. Ao Nang Beach is 800 metres from Sea Seeker Krabi Resort - SHA Extra Plus, while Pai Plong Beach is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: The Pano Hotel & Residence
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Ao Nang, The Pano Hotel And Residence promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, valet parking, car park, room service are on the list of things guests can enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, mirror, sofa, towels. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Krabi has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at The Pano Hotel And Residence.Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Railay Great View Resort
address: 588 Moo 2, Tambol Ao Nang, Ao Nang 81000
description: Railay Great View Resort and Spa is located on the beaches of East Railay, 26 km from Krabi Airport. It features free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and rooms with flat-screen TVs. All rooms at the Railay Great View features wooden furnishings and are equipped with a safety deposit box and minibar. The en-suite bathrooms come with hot shower facilities. A hairdryer and slippers are also provided. The resort provides massage and sea kayaking activities. Other good relaxation activities include taking a stroll along the private beach. Guests can enjoy outdoor dining at the Lae Lay restaurant, which serves a variety of traditional and contemporary Thai and Western dishes. Railay Great View Resort and Spa is a 10 minute boat ride to Ao Nam Mao Pier.

name: Ao Nang Orchid Resort
description: Aonang Orchid Resort - SHA Extra Plus is located within walking distance of Ao Nang Beach. It offers comfortable rooms featuring a private balcony. Guests can relax by the resort’s outdoor swimming pool. Guests have access to free WiFi at the business centre. All rooms at the Orchid Resort Aonang have air conditioning and are equipped with a tea/coffee maker, refrigerator and minibar. They are also fitted with a safety deposit box and cable TV. Guests can enjoy the use of a spa pool at the resort. Aonang Orchid also provides bicycle/car rentals. The resort’s tour desks offers assistance with trip planning. The on-site restaurant serves a range of international and traditional Thai dishes. Breakfast buffet is available. Aonang Orchid Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 20 km from Krabi Airport. An airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request.

name: Andamanee Boutique Resort Aonang Krabi
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 50 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private lanais.
