Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Guests can catch a ride to the beach or shopping on the complimentary shuttle. Property Location Located in Krabi, Andamanee Boutique Resort Krabi is a 2-minute drive from Nopparat Thara Beach and 8 minutes from Ao Nang Beach. This eco-friendly hotel is 5.2 mi (8.4 km) from Khlong Muang Beach and 7.6 mi (12.2 km) from Tubkaek Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Noppranang, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Cash Breakage deposit: THB 2000 per stay We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for cooked-to-order breakfast: THB 200 for adults and THB 200 for children (approximately) Airport shuttle fee: THB 800 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 4) Airport shuttle fee per child: THB 800.00 (one-way), (from 1 to 10 years old) Late check-out fee: THB 1000 (subject to availability) Crib (infant bed) fee: THB 200.0 per night Rollaway bed fee: THB 1000.0 per day Credit card charges are subject to a surcharge of 3 percent The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Guests must contact the property with arrival details 24 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. The front desk is open daily from 7:30 AM - 10:00 PM. If you are planning to arrive after 10:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. name: Krabi Home Resort
address: 205, Moo 3, Nongtalay, Mueang, Krabi, Ban Khlong Muang 81180
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, Krabi Home Resort puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, Wi-Fi in public areas, restaurant, are at hand. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like flat screen television, mirror, closet, internet access wireless (complimentary), smoking policy non-smoking available. Take a break from a long day and make use of the canoe. Krabi Home Resort is an excellent choice from which to explore Krabi or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Rapala Rock Wood Resort- Sha Plus
description: Rapala Rock Wood Resort- SHA Plus offers feel-like-home accommodation. Free WiFi is accessible throughout. At this property, guests can also sample authentic Thai dishes freshly cooked and served at the outdoor restaurant. Each bungalow is fitted with a mosquito net and a comfortable bed. The area is popular for diving and canoeing. Princess Lagoon is 400 metres from Rapala Rock Wood Resort- SHA Plus, while Railay Rock Climbing Point is 550 metres away.

name: Baan Ban Dalay
description: Located just 300 metres from Ao Nang Bay, this hotel in Krabi offers a spa, a sauna and massage rooms. Free WiFi and free private parking are available. The stylish rooms at the Baan Ban Dalay have air conditioning and a minibar and are non-smoking. Some rooms have a spacious seating area and a balcony with sea views. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai and western cuisine at the Café Delmar. The hotel also offers the Anyana Spa, which features Thai and Swedish massages, as well as aromatherapy.

name: Phulay Bay, A Ritz-Carlton Reserve
description: Beyond the limestone mountains, lush rainforests, and crystal clear waters of southern Thailand, a secluded paradise awaits you in one of the most spellbinding locations. Embark on a voyage of discovery at Phulay Bay, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve, where glistening sands and blue skies converge with the Andaman Sea to reveal one of the most captivating Krabi beach resorts. Here, the charm and natural beauty of the country blend with an aura of serenity and luxury, and nature unveils its power to inspire the senses. This personalized escape combines a refined, casual setting, indigenous flavours, and the most individualized service as you are immersed in the culture and beauty of the surrounding landscape. For those who appreciate luxurious sanctuaries tucked away in exquisite corners of the world, Phulay Bay, a Ritz-Carlton Reserve is a magnificent revelation.Marriott

name: Family Tree Hotel
description: Family Tree Hotel is located in Krabi town, 400 metres from Wat Kaew Korawaram and 1.5 km from Thara Park. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Family Tree Hotel offers certain rooms that include a balcony, and each room has a kettle. Continental and Italian breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. At Family Tree Hotel you will find a restaurant serving American, Chinese and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Krabi Stadium is 6.4 km from the hotel, while Wat Tham Sua - Tiger Cave Temple is 9 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 12 km from Family Tree Hotel.

name: Peace Laguna Resort & Spa
description: Peace Laguna Resort and Spa is located along Krabi’s Ao Nang Area. The hotel offers free parking, 3 swimming pools and a restaurant. All rooms come with private balconies or terraces. Each air-conditioned room comes with a satellite TV, personal safe and a minibar. Private bathrooms come with bathtub and shower facilities. Room service is available. The hotel features a fitness centre, business centre and a library. Guests can enjoy massage services at the spa. Thai and International cuisines are available at the hotel’s restaurant. Peace Laguna Resort and Spa is approximately 40 minutes by car to Krabi Airport.

name: Rocco Aonang Krabi
address: Rocco Ao-Nang Soi Klong Hang, Ao Nang 81180
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach in the Krabi Province region, with Nopparat Thara Beach and Ao Nang Beach nearby, Rocco Aonang Krabi provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The apartment provides guests with a terrace, city views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also featured, as well as a kettle. Rocco Aonang Krabi offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room and year-round outdoor pool. Pai Plong Beach is 2.1 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Rocco Aonang Krabi.

name: Krabi Tipa Resort
description: This resort is conveniently positioned in Ao Nang and offers a swimming pool. Those staying at the property also have access to complimentary wireless internet and on-site parking. This 4-star resort offers a coffee bar, a kids club and an executive floor. It also provides family-friendly amenities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, as well as a kids pool and babysitting/child services. The rooms are air conditioned and include a telephone. There are also several rooms especially for families. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. A wide selection of cafés and restaurants are also available in the area. Tipa Resort is moments from Ao Phra Nang. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Krabi Inn Resort
description: Located in Ao Nam Mao, 7.3 km from Gastropo Fossils The World Museum, Krabi Inn Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Each accommodation at the 3-star resort has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a terrace and to a restaurant. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort each room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a shower and a hairdryer. Krabi Inn Resort offers certain rooms with pool views, and the rooms are fitted with a balcony. All units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 8.5 km from Krabi Inn Resort, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 17 km from the resort.

name: The Elements Krabi Resort
description: Located beside Klong Muang Beach, Elements Krabi Resort offers 4-star rooms with air conditioning and private balconies. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool and sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available. The Elements Krabi Resort - SHA Plus has well-appointed rooms with tea and coffee makers, satellite TVs and bathrobes. Room service is available. The Sea-Breeze Restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. It serves a mix of Thai cuisine and international dishes. Meals can be enjoyed outside while overlooking the turquoise swimming pool. Elements Resort Krabi is situated approximately 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach, the Princess Lagoon and Phra Nang Cave. It is also located approximately 37 km from Krabi International Airport and an airport shuttle can be arranged by request.

name: Aonang Buri Resort
address: 118 Moo 3, Tumbol Aonang, Aumphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Aonang Buri Resort- SHA Extra Plus certifies, Krabi is a spectacular boutique resort located beachfront Nopparattara beach and is only 5 minutes from Aonang beach. The hotel has a family-friendly concept and is surrounded by natural elegance and good beach wind. A beautiful sunset will be nearby. The hotel’s restaurant serves authentic Thai cuisine. And let’s cool off with the large swimming pool. The contemporary rooms at Aonang Buri have dark wood furnishings and air conditioning. There is a private balcony with free high-speed wifi. A tea and coffee maker are provided. Room service and a minibar. The resort features well-equipped rooms that are spacious and airy. High-quality furnishings are used to offer you a sense of comfort.

name: A Little Villa
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Krabi Town, A Little Villa promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at A Little Villa.Agoda

name: Hidayah Grand
description: With a stay at Hidayah Grand in Krabi, you'll be near the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Ao Nang Beach and Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Paradis Vert
description: Situated in Ban Khao Thong, 12 km from Tha Pom Klong Song Nam, PARADIS VERT features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a garden. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Thai cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a mountain view. All rooms have a safety deposit box. PARADIS VERT offers a continental or Asian breakfast. The area is popular for hiking and fishing, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 18 km from PARADIS VERT, while Krabi Stadium is 19 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: Baan Gecko
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. With convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 13-minute drive to Ao Nang Beach or the 10-minute drive to West Railay Beach. Relax by the outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!) or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a balcony or patio and outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi, TV, and DVD player. This 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. You can also use the deep soaking bathtub, plus other bathroom amenities like free toiletries, towels, and shampoo. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with a stovetop and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, a microwave, and cookware. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Vipa Tropical Resort
description: Surrounded with majestic mountains, Vipa Tropical Resort is a 5-minute drive to the beautiful Ao Nang Beach of Krabi. Guests can admire the beauty of nature while taking a dip into the pool or indulging in a pampering session of massage. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby area. The property is a 25-minute drive from the city centre. It is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Furnished with simple decor, each room at Vipa Tropical Resort is completed with a private balcony and a fan. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Selected rooms come with air-conditioning. Staff can offer assistance with car and motorbike rentals as well as a shuttle service. For convenience, the resort provides laundry services for all guests. BBQ facilities are available for guests to enjoy. There are plenty of restaurants located nearby the resort.

name: Diamond Beach Resort
address: 242 Moo 5, Ao Nam Mao, Tambon Saithai, Krabi 81000
description: A 5-minute walk to Nam Mao Pier, Diamond Resort offers cosy rooms with air-conditioning and a private balcony. The resort features free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour front desk. The property is a 10-minute walk from nightlife options. It is a 10-minute boat ride from Railay Beach. Krabi Airport is located a 40-minute drive away. Fitted with tiled flooring, comfortable rooms at Diamond Resort come with a satellite TV, a minibar and a seating area. An en suite bathroom includes shower facilities. Sightseeing tours and travel arrangements can be organised at the on-site tour desk. For guests’ convenience, the hotel is equipped with meeting facilities, laundry services and safety deposit boxes.

name: Krabi Klong Muang Bay Resort
address: Klong Muang Beach, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Surrounded by gardens, Krabi Klong Moung Bay View Resort is 260 m from Klong Muang Beach and a 10-minute drive from Tub Kaek Beach. It features air-conditioned rooms and a tour desk, which organises excursion to tourist attractions. Free WI-Fi is available in all areas. Krabi Klong Moung Bay View Resort is a 20-minute ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 2-hour ride from Phuket International Airport. The property offers free parking. Bright and airy rooms feature a private balcony with a seating area. They are provided with a flat-screen cable TV, an electric kettle and a refrigerator. Their en suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. For meals, enjoy Thai and European dishes at the on-site Bay Restaurant.

name: Chanapha Residence
address: 196 Moo 6 Tambon Nong Thale, Nong Thale 81180
description: No description found

name: Phu Dahla Residences
address: 216 Moo 3 Klonghaeng Rd., Aonang District, Amphur Muang, Krabi, Ao Nang 81180
description: Boasting an outdoor pool surrounded by lush gardens, Phu Dahla offers highly-secured accommodation with free WiFi throughout. A complimentary shuttle service to the beach is available. With its modern design, each room is fitted with a flat-screen TV and an en suite bathroom that comes with a shower. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided. Guests will also find a kitchenette equipped with a microwave and a refrigerator. You can engage in various activities, such as diving, fishing and canoeing. Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.8 km. from Phu Dahla Residences, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Baan Habeebee Resort
description: Baan Habeebee Resort offers wooden bungalows built in the traditional Lanna style, all fronting the outdoor pool. It provides free tuk-tuk service to Nopparat Thara and Aonang Beaches, a 5-minute ride away. Featuring free Wi-Fi, the air-conditioned bungalows are surrounded by tropical gardens and come with private terraces. Each room has a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with rain shower. Located in Krabi, Bann Habeebee Resort is around 40 minutes’ drive from Krabi International Airport. Guests can take island-hopping trips, or rent a car or bicycle to explore Krabi. Massage services can be arranged. Laundry and dry cleaning services are provided. The on-site restaurant serves breakfast. Guests can choose to order food delivery from the nearby restaurants.

name: Baan Manu Chang
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. Khao Ao Nam Mao is an easy 14-minute walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 8-minute drive to Ao Nang Beach. Relax by the outdoor pool or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a patio and a BBQ grill. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi, TV, and DVD player. A sitting area, a dining area, a safe, and air conditioning are featured at this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental. You can also use the rainfall showerhead, plus other bathroom amenities like towels and a hair dryer. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, a microwave, and cookware.Expedia

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. A private bathroom with a shower features complimentary toiletries and a hair dryer. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and an indoor pool. Additional features at this apartment include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Property Location Located in Krabi, this apartment is a 2-minute drive from Nopparat Thara Beach and 6 minutes from Ao Nang Beach. This apartment is 2.9 mi (4.6 km) from Spirit Mountain and 8.7 mi (13.9 km) from Tubkaek Beach. Dining Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6 AM to 10 AM for a fee. name: The Tama Hotel
address: 340 Moo 5 Sai-Thai, Muang, Krabi, Ban Ao Nam Mao 81000
description: Offering an outdoor pool, The Tama Hotel- SHA Plus is located in Ao Nam Mao. Free WiFi access is available. Modern rooms here provide guests with a flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is also a sofa seating area, a minibar and a safety deposit box. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The beach is 800 metres away and local restaurants are within a few minutes' walk.

name: Mountain Villa Aonang Krabi
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. Spirit Mountain is an easy 14-minute walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 6-minute drive to Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium. Relax by the outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!) or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a picnic area and a balcony or patio. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 7-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a BBQ grill, a safe, air conditioning, and a portable fan. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and towels. The kitchen is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as an electric kettle, a microwave, and cookware. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Heaven View Krabi
description: Set in Ao Nam Mao, 1.5 km from Ao Nam Mao Beach, Heaven View Krabi SHA offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service, a tour desk and free WiFi. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a sea view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Heaven View Krabi SHA provides some units with lake views, and rooms come with a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Railay East Beach is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from Heaven View Krabi SHA.

name: J Holiday Resort
description: Located in Krabi town, less than 1 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram, J.Holiday Inn Krabi provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a shared lounge. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Certain rooms at the property include a terrace with a city view. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Guest rooms feature a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at J.Holiday Inn Krabi. Thara Park is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Krabi Stadium is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 12 km from J.Holiday Inn Krabi, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mukrada House
address: 50 Moo 3, Nong Thalay, Muang, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: No description found

name: Aonang Viva Resort
description: Offering a restaurant and a bar, Aonang Viva Resort - SHA Plus is located in Aonang Beach. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. It is a 5-min walk to Nopparat Tara beach and 700 metres from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium. This resort also features a 24-hour front desk, airport shuttle, luggage service and free parking. Each unit at Resort Aonang Viva is fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a balcony. A fridge and a coffee maker are also provided. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. International and Thai food and drinks can be sampled at the on-site bar and restaurant.

name: Krabi Front Bay Resort
description: Overlooking where the Krabi River meets the Andaman Sea, Krabi Front Bay Resort is located at the southern end of Krabi Town. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. The accommodation provides a flat-screen cable TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is also an electric kettle and a minibar. Featuring a shower or a bath, the en suite bathroom includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. The on-site restaurant serves local Thai dishes and Halal-friendly cuisine. Additional local restaurants in the town are a short ride away. At Krabi Front Bay Resort, there is an outdoor pool with views of the sea, a tour desk and laundry services. Free parking is available. A 24-hour transfer service to Ao Nang is offered for an additional charge. The property is 600 metres from Klong Jirad Pier and 2 km from the weekend night market. Krabi Airport is approximately a 25-minute drive away.

name: Holiday Style Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi
description: Featuring an outdoor pool, Holiday Style Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi is situated in Krabi and offers comfortable accommodation. In addition to free private parking on site, the resort features comfortable 4-star rooms and a bar. Those staying at Holiday Style Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi can begin their morning at Outdoor Swimming Pool, or enjoy the various fitness and leisure facilities, such as fitness classes. Those staying at the property have access to express check-in/check-out, around the clock reception and a meeting room. All rooms are air conditioned, soundproofed and equipped with a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private balcony. The private en suite includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers, a shower and bathrobes. Those staying at Holiday Style Ao Nang Beach Resort Krabi can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably based for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Krabi's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to the resort, with Hat Noppharat Beach just a short walk away. Tours and travel arrangements can be organised at the tour desk.Revato

name: Aonang Cliff View Resort Sha Extra Plus
description: With Ao Nang’s famous cliffs as a backdrop, Cliff View offers Thai-style bungalows nestled in tropical greenery. It features free shuttles to Ao Nang Beach and an outdoor pool. Aonang Cliff View Resort SHA Extra Plus is 5 km from Phra Nang Cave and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Free parking is provided. Featuring private balconies, charming wooden bungalows come equipped with a safe and bottled water. En suite bathrooms have shower facilities. Leisurely afternoons can be spent with relaxing Thai massages or a sightseeing trip to Tiger Cave Temple. Other amenities include a fitness centre and tour desk. Featuring Thai specialities, hearty buffet breakfasts are available at the open-air restaurant. Meals can also be served in rooms.

name: Phanom Bencha Mountain Resort
description: Set amidst tropical gardens, Phanom Bencha Mountain Resort features cosy bungalows with mountain views. The resort is equipped with an outdoor pool and parking facilities. All day and half day treks can be arranged for guests. Phanom Bencha Resort is a 15-minute drive from Tiger Cave Temple and a 20-minute ride from Krabi Airport and Krabi Bus Terminal. Ao Nang Beach is a 50-minute ride away. Featuring a private balcony, each comfortable bungalow is provided with a fan and an en suite bathroom. Free toiletries are provided as well. Guests can enjoy a variety of Thai and western favourites served at Phanom Bencha Mountain Restaurant.

name: Vacay Aonang Hotel
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, Vacay Aonang Hotel provides a restaurant, city views and free WiFi, 1.2 km from Ao Nang Beach and 1.6 km from Pai Plong Beach. Some units include a balcony and/or a patio with sea or mountain views. The apartment offers a year-round outdoor pool. Guests will find a 24-hour front desk, a business centre and housekeeping service at the property. A car rental service is available at Vacay Aonang Hotel. Nopparat Thara Beach is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from Vacay Aonang Hotel.

name: Aonang All Seasons Beach Resort
address: 162 Moo 3, Tambol Ao Nan Amphur Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Aonang All Seasons Beach Resort is located 30 metres from Aonang-Noparathara Beach. Its large outdoor swimming pool and hot tub are surrounded by sun loungers and umbrellas. Onsite parking is free. The air-conditioned rooms at Aonang Beach Resort have satellite TVs, private balconies or terraces and bathroom toiletries. Room service is available. The open-air restaurant serves an American breakfast each morning. For lunch and dinner, Thai and international cuisine is offered. Krabi town centre is a 30 minute drive from the All Seasons Beach Resort. Within a 10 minute walk of the resort, guests can find shops, restaurants and bars. Krabi International Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Baan Ari
address: 409/1-2 Chonlanda Hills Village Moo 2, Ao Nang 81000
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. Jump into your car and make short work of the 10-minute drive to Ao Nang Beach or the 8-minute drive to West Railay Beach (and enjoy the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime). After you return, you can unwind by the outdoor pool or sip a drink in the garden; you may also like the balcony or patio and BBQ grill. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and flat-screen TV. This 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a living room, a dining area, premium bedding, and a safe. The kitchen is stocked with a refrigerator (on request) and a microwave. And you can even travel light because you'll have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Amatapura Beach Villa 15
address: Villa 15 Moo.5 T. Sai Thai A. Muang, Krabi 81180
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. Ao Nam Mao is an easy 8-minute walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 6-minute drive to Phra Nang Beach. After you return, you can unwind at the beach, chill by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink in the garden; you may also like the picnic area. When you come inside, connect to the free WiFi or get cozy in front of the LCD TV (premium channels available). This 4-bedroom rental features a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and towels. The kitchenette is equipped with an oven, a stovetop, and a freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: BB Poolvilla
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. With convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 20-minute drive to Ao Nang Beach or the 6-minute drive to Krabi Town Weekend Night Market. Relax by the outdoor pool or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a picnic area and a furnished patio. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. In addition, there's a deep soaking tub, along with free toiletries, towels, and a hair dryer. The kitchenette is equipped with a stovetop and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And you won't have to pack extra clothes, because you'll also have access to laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Aonang Phu Petra Resort Krabi
address: 521 Soi 11 Moo 2, Tumbol Ao Nang, Krabi 81000
description: Located in Krabi, Aonang Phu Petra Resort is set amidst mountains and natural surroundings. The resort features spacious villas and suites located by the pool or hill. Guests can enjoy swimming in the outdoor pool. Aonang Phu Petra Resort, Krabi - SHA Plus, offers beach and airport transfers. Krabi Airport is a 30-minute drive away while Aonang Beach is 10 minutes’ away by car. A free scheduled shuttle service from the property to Ao Nang City Centre is available. Modern rooms feature classic dark wood furnishings and spacious balconies. Each has a cable/satellite TV and coffee-making facilities. hairdryer is provided. Massage services are offered at the resort Motorbikes can be rented for convenience.

name: Aonang sweet blue sea
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and air conditioning. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, free toiletries, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with a stovetop and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave.Expedia

name: Golden Beach Resort
description: Offering outdoor pool and tour desk, Golden Beach Resort is located in Aonang Beach. The property is 2.2 km from Nopparat Thara Beach, the resort offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi in public areas. The property is 58 km from Phuket Airport. Rooms come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and electric kettle. They have a safety deposit box. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. A hairdryer and slippers are provided. Laundry and massage services can be arranged at the 24-hour front desk. Free public parking is possible on site. Guests can enjoy Thai dishes at the restaurant. Dear Valued Guest Until 31 Mach 2022 the hotel will be make new room near by the swimming pool room. At 10.00am. - 16.00pm. As this above mention will be use some heavy equipment. For more information please contact at Front desk. We do apologize for any inconvenience may cause. Hotel Management

name: Whalecome Aonang Resort
address: 926, Moo 2, Soi Ao Nang 6, Aonang, Muang, Ao Nang 81180
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 400 metres from Ao Nang Beach, Whalecome Aonang Resort-SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 3-star resort offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The resort features pool views, a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. At the resort every room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Whalecome Aonang Resort-SHA Extra Plus provides certain units with mountain views, and every room is fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at Whalecome Aonang Resort-SHA Extra Plus can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. At the resort you will find a restaurant serving American and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and kosher options can also be requested. Pai Plong Beach is 1.4 km from Whalecome Aonang Resort-SHA Extra Plus, while Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 24 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Parlour Krabi
address: 66 Moo 3, T. Nongthalay, A. Mueang Krabi, Ao Nang 81180
description: Facing the beachfront, The Parlour Krabi offers 2-star accommodation in Klong Muang Beach and has a garden, bar and private beach area. Located around 200 metres from Koh Kwang Beach, the hotel with free WiFi is also less than 1 km away from Klong Muang Beach. The accommodation offers room service, babysitting service and currency exchange for guests. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. Laem Bong Beach is 1.7 km from the hotel, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 5.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 32 km from The Parlour Krabi, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Krabi Forest Homestay
address: 68 Moo 3 Nopparat Thara Road, Ao Nang 81000
description: Located in Ao Nang, The Krabi Forest Homestay is within walking distance of several local attractions, including Hat Noppharat Beach. It also offers rooms with either a private terrace or balcony where guests can appreciate views of the garden. Homestay Krabi Forest provides free Wi-Fi and free public parking on site. It features a beauty centre and body treatments, as well as a diving centre. The Krabi Forest Homestay offers 45 air conditioned rooms. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite / cable channels, as well as a private en suite. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous cafés and eateries close by. Room service is also available during limited hours. Homestay Krabi Forest is within walking distance of Ao Phra Nang. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Ban Sainai Resort
description: Nestled amidst lush tropical gardens, Ban Sainai Resort- SHA Extra Plus Aonang's Green Resort features cosy cottages and an outdoor pool, a 5-minute ride from Ao Nang Beach. It has a tour desk and free Wi-Fi, which is available in all areas. Ban Sainai Resort- SHA Extra Plus Aonang's Green Resort is a 15-minute drive from Nopparat Tara Beach. Krabi Airport is a 30-minute ride away. On-site parking in available for drivers. Boasting a private balcony with garden views, each cottage comes with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. An electric kettle and a fridge are included. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities and a hairdryer. Breakfast is served 06:30 - 10:30 hrs at Sai Nai Restaurant daily.

name: Melina Beach Front Bungalows
address: 108/1 Moo 3 Ao Thalane Tumbol Khaotong, Ban Tha Lane 81000
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, Melina's Beach Front Bungalows puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, grocery deliveries, private check in/check out are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of the boats, canoe, dart board, badminton court, hiking trails. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Krabi has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Melina's Beach Front Bungalows.Agoda

name: Cosi Ao Nang
address: 1125 Moo 2, Soi Ao Nang 15, Ao Nang, Ao Nang 81180
description: COSI Krabi Ao Nang Beach is situated in Ao Nang, just 40 minutes from Krabi International Airport. It has a gym, as well as free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a 24-hour reception. This modern hotel provides a range of amenities, including a terrace, a concierge and a tour desk. There is free private parking nearby for guests with a car. The rooms at COSI Krabi Ao Nang Beach are air-conditioned and include a private bathroom, a refrigerator and a flat-screen TV. They are all soundproofed and include a telephone and an in-room safe. COSI Krabi Ao Nang Beach has a convenient in-house café where guests can grab a bite to eat before heading out to explore the local area. The hotel provides easy access to Ton Sai Beach and Nopparat Thara Beach. It is also a brief car ride from Khlong Muang Beach and Ko Poda.Revato

name: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort
description: Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offers a modern setting while in Krabi. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort boasts luxurious amenities, including a limousine service and Spa Krabi. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families both large and small, plus a kids club and a kids pool. The rooms at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort offer a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. All provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a kitchenette. Those staying at Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort can indulge in a drink at Cocovida Pool Bar, before savouring a meal at Mangosteen’s. Places to dine at the resort include Toh Kin Khaw and Limoncello Italian Restaurant. Dusit Thani Krabi Beach Resort is within walking distance of Khlong Muang Beach. Ao Phra Nang and Tup Kaek Beach are within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Dee Andaman Hotel
description: Located in the centre of Krabi Town, Dee Andaman Hotel offers spacious non-smoking rooms with a private balcony. This 3-star hotel features rooftop restaurant and free Wi-Fi. Overlooking the mountains or city, elegant rooms at Andaman Hotel offer modern décor and have plenty of natural light. All well-appointed rooms have a flat-screen TV, minibar and bathroom with shower facilities. Guests can enjoy a relaxing body massage or rent a car to explore the town. With a 24-hour front desk, the hotel provides ticketing services while travel bookings can be made at the tour desk. Andaman Dee Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Night Bazaar and a 20-minute drive from Krabi Airport.

name: Aree Tara Resort
description: A 10-minute walk away from Ao Nang Beach, Aree Tara offers spacious accommodation with a private balcony and a flat-screen TV. It houses an outdoor pool and a multi-cuisine restaurant. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Just a 5-minute walk from a variety of shopping options and eateries, Aree Tara Resort Aonang Krabi is 5 km from Phra Nang Cave and 20 km away from Krabi International Airport. Contemporary rooms at Aree feature rich dark wood furnishings and air conditioning. They also come with private bathrooms with a hairdryer. A tea/coffee maker and a minibar are included, along with room service. Guests can relax with a massage or let the hotel arrange for activities such as kayaking or horse riding. Aree Tara Resort Aonang Krabi provides free parking for those who drive.

name: Timber House Ao Nang
description: Located on Aonang Beach, Timber House Aonang offers spacious rooms with private balconies and views of the outdoor pool or tropical garden. It features a restaurant, a spa bath and free parking. Situated within landscaped gardens, air-conditioned rooms at Timber House feature wood furnishings and cable TV. A safe and free tea/coffee making amenities are provided for guests’ convenience. Private bathrooms have toiletries and a hairdryer. Relaxing beauty treatments and facials await guests at C Spa. Leisure activities like fishing and diving trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Guests can lounge by the landscaped outdoor pool. Featuring views of the garden, Fish Restaurant serves grilled seafood dishes and buffet spreads with Thai and European dishes. Meals can be enjoyed in rooms. Timber House Aonang is within walking distance of the night market and several entertainment options. It is a 30-minute drive from Krabi International Airport.

name: Krabi Success Beach Resort
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 77 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and separate sitting areas. Property Location With a stay at Krabi Success Beach Resort in Krabi, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Ao Nang Beach and Nopparat Thara Beach. This hotel is 6.3 mi (10.2 km) from Khlong Muang Beach and 8.5 mi (13.7 km) from Tubkaek Beach. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/café. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Deposit: THB 100 per accommodation, per stay A 1.00 percent city/local tax will be charged We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Breakfast fee: between THB 250 and THB 500 for adults, THB 150 and THB 300 for children (approximately) Housekeeping is available for an additional fee Rollaway bed fee: THB 1000 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted If you are planning to arrive after 7:00 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals not allowed General instructions No elevators Essential workers only - NOViajes Exito Hotels

name: Poonsiri Resort
description: Poonsiri Resort Aonang-SHA Extra Plus is situated among tranquil mangroves and sheer limestone cliffs. Surrounded by a lagoon, Thai-style rooms feature a balcony with outdoor furniture. Guests can enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool or take a kayak to explore the area. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. The on-site restaurant serves local Thai dishes from 07:00 to 21:00 hrs. A 24-hour convenience store is located 400 metres away. The air-conditioned accommodation provides guests with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a safety deposit box. All rooms also include a dining area and minibar, while some room types include a kitchenette with a microwave. Free toiletries and a bathtub or shower can be found in the en suite bathroom. At Poonsiri Resort Aonang-SHA Extra Plus, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help arrange tours, shuttles and laundry services. The property offers free parking and a free round-trip shuttle between the property and Ao Nang Beach. Nopparat Thara Beach and Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium are 1.5 km away. Krabi city centre can be reached within a 5-minute drive. This resort is a 45-minute drive from Krabi Airport.

name: Avani Ao Nang Cliff Krabi Resort
description: Set against a backdrop of lush green hills, Avani Ao Nang Cliff Krabi Resort in Krabi features spacious accommodation with views of the tropical landscape. Featuring wood panelling, rooms provide various amenities that include a balcony with a sitting area, internet access and a rain shower in the bathroom. Room service is also offered for your comfort. Cool off with a dip in the swimming pool, or sunbathe with a refreshing drink from the pool bar. For some fun in the sun, Aonang Beach with its white sands and blue waters is just a 5-minute walk away. A fitness room is also available for those needing to recharge after a long day. Enquire with the tour desk for activities and day trips to explore the island. Enjoy both local and international flavours at Ao Nang's Cliff Beach Resort's all-day dining restaurant, which overlooks the Andaman Sea. Buffet breakfast is served at The Cliff REstaurant, while The Orchid Bar & Bistro offers refreshing drinks and cocktails.

name: Andaman Pearl Resort
description: Andaman Pearl Resort offers accommodation in Aonang, a 5-minute drive from the beach and nightlife. The resort has an outdoor pool and views Krabi's famous limestone hills. WiFi is free in public areas. Meals can be enjoyed on-site or within a short drive. Krabi Airport is a 30-minute drive from the property. Every room at Andaman Pearl Resort is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV. There is also a refrigerator and a balcony or patio with outdoor furniture. Rooms include a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Free private parking is available on site.

name: Anyavee Ao Nang Bay Resort
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 500 metres from Nopparat Thara Beach, Ao Nang Bay Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has garden views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Ao Nang Bay Resort features certain units with city views, and every room includes a balcony. The units feature a wardrobe. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. Ao Nang Beach is 500 metres from Ao Nang Bay Resort, while Pai Plong Beach is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort
description: Located along Tubkaek Beach, Anyavee Beach Resort offers rooms and villas with views of Ao Nang Bay from the balcony. It also features a swimming pool and beachfront restaurant. Rooms at Anyavee Tubkaek are decorated in a modern Asian design. Offering an LCD TV, they also have a coffee/tea maker, minibar and large bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can have a refreshing swim in the pool, which also has an attached children's pool. To relax, massage services are available. Anyavee Tubkaek Beach Resort- SHA Plus is a 40-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. The tourist centre of Ao Nang Beach is just 20 minute drive away. Half and full day tour arrangements can be made at Anyavee, along with car rentals. Free private parking is offered.

name: Railay Bay Resort And Spa
description: Stretching across the white sands of Railay Beach, Railay Resort & Spa offers spacious cottages set in tropical landscapes. It features free WiFi throughout, a beachfront outdoor pool and a restaurant. Offering free parking on the mainland at Ao Nam Mao Pier, Railay Bay Resort & Spa-SHA Extra Plus is a 20-minute boat trip from Ao Nam Mao Pier or Ao Nang Beach to Railay Pier. Featuring private balconies, tropical-style cottages at Resort Railay feature casual cane and wood furnishings. In-room comforts include DVD player, a safe and a spacious bathroom with a bathtub. For leisure, guests can relax with soothing massage at Railay Spa or try activities like paddle canoeing and rock climbing. A tour desk offers help with trip planning. Cool sea breezes accompany seafood and pizza specialities at Railay’s restaurant. Room service is also available.

name: Railay Princess Resort & Spa
description: Just a 5-minute walk to Phranang Cave beach on the peaceful East Railay Bay, this hotel offers 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness centre. Rooms at the Railay Princess Resort & Spa-SHA Extra Plus have Thai-style furnishings and include a satellite TV, a seating area and a private balcony with garden and pool views. Guests can enjoy a relaxing Thai massage at the Waree Spa. Other facilities include kids' club and laundry service. The Princess Restaurant serves Thai and international dishes prepared with seasonal ingredients. The Phranang Lagoon and the Phranang Cave are 5 minutes away by foot. Krabi Airport is 32 km away and an airport shuttle service can be arranged at an additional charge. Free private parking is available on the mainland at the Ao Nam Mao office.

name: Villa Cha-Cha Krabi Beachfront Resort
description: Situated in Ao Nam Mao, a few steps from Ao Nam Mao Beach, Villa Cha-Cha Krabi Beachfront Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The property has a bar, as well as a restaurant serving American cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. Guest rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Villa Cha-Cha Krabi Beachfront Resort have a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes Italian, American and Asian options. Fossil Shell Beach is 2.4 km from the accommodation, while Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 22 km from Villa Cha-Cha Krabi Beachfront Resort.

name: Viangviman Luxury Resort, Krabi
address: 313 Moo 5 Tambol Ao Nang, Ao Nang 81180
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, Viangviman Luxury Resort, Krabi is located in a quiet area surrounded by mountains. Ao Nang Beach is a short drive away. Free WiFi access is available in this resort. Decorated in Thai-Lanna style with tropical teak wood, the accommodation will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV, a seating area and air conditioning. There is also a minibar and a safety deposit box. Featuring a shower, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. You can enjoy garden view from the room's balcony. At Viangviman Luxury Resort you will find a 24-hour front desk, a bar and room serivce. Other facilities offered at the property include laundry services. The property offers free parking. It is 3 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium and 3.6 km from Nopparat Thara Beach.

name: Apple A Day Resort Krabi Aonang Beach
address: 234 Moo 3,Ao Nang Soi 8, Tambol Ao Nang, Amphur Muang, Krabi 81180
description: A 5-minute walk from Nopparat Thara Beach, Apple A Day Resort offers modern air-conditioned rooms and an outdoor pool. Free WiFi access is available at this hotel. It is 10-minute walk from Ao Nang and a 25-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi International Airport is a 25 km drive away from the property. The hotel rooms are all equipped with a flat-screen TV, minibar and a seating area. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. There is also a private balcony or a patio with pool access. Meals can be ordered at the on-site restaurant. Alternatively, guests will find a variety of restaurants, bars and shops within walking distance. Facilities and services at Apple A Day Resort include a fitness room, a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. Free parking is available.

name: The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort
description: Nestled within abundant greenery, The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers beachfront accommodation on Tubkaak Beach. Offering spacious rooms, it also features a full-service spa and an outdoor pool. Tubkaak Boutique Resort’s rooms feature wooden interiors, giving them a cosy feel. Guests can sit and enjoy mountain views from the balcony. Each room has an outdoor, tropical-style bathroom. With oversized armchairs and a collection of books and magazines, the library is great for quiet reading. Sun loungers are provided on the beach and by the pool. The resort also offers tour arrangements and cooking classes. The Arundina restaurant serves Thai and European dishes. Surrounded by water lily ponds, it boasts a relaxing atmosphere with ocean views. Private meals on the beach can also be arranged, while drinks are available at the library’s bar. The Tubkaak Krabi Boutique Resort - SHA Extra Plus is 20 minutes’ drive from Ao Nang Beach. Krabi Airport is a 45-minute drive away.

name: The Orange Resort
description: Orange Mansion offers affordable accommodation with free parking and free Wi-Fi access. Surrounded by various minimarts and restaurants, it is a 5-minute tuk-tuk ride from the beautiful Nopparat Thara Beach. Air-conditioned guestrooms are equipped with cable TV and a refrigerator. Fitted with a private balcony, each room has a private bathroom with shower facilities. Mansion Orange can help arrange for tuk-tuk services upon request. There is a 24-hour front desk to attend to guests’ needs. Orange Mansion is a 15-minute walk to the nearby market and a range of Thai restaurants. It is a 45-minute drive from Krabi Airport.

name: Leelawadee Garden Resort
description: A short distance from sailing, scuba diving, and more, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. Jump into your car and make short work of the 2-minute drive to Ao Nam Mao or the 7-minute drive to East Railay Beach (and enjoy the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime). Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool (enjoy the sun loungers!), or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a picnic area. When you come inside, connect to the free WiFi or get cozy in front of the LCD TV (premium channels available). As you settle into this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a living room, a BBQ grill, luggage storage, and air conditioning. In addition, there's a rainfall showerhead, along with free toiletries, towels, and slippers. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a minibar. And because there's access to laundry facilities, you can go a bit lighter on your packing.Expedia

name: Machorat Aonang Resort
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 500 metres from Ao Nang Beach, Machorat Aonang Resort at Aonang Beach Krabi offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers room service, an ATM and free WiFi. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a fridge. An American, Asian or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Machorat Aonang Resort at Aonang Beach Krabi. Pai Plong Beach is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Machorat Aonang Resort at Aonang Beach Krabi.

name: Aonang Suite Pool Villa
description: Providing sea views and free WiFi, Aonang Suite Pool Villa provides accommodation well set in Krabi town, within a short distance of Ao Nang Beach, Nopparat Thara Beach and Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium. Fitted with a terrace, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A fridge and microwave are also provided, as well as a kettle. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 10 km from the lodge, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Aonang Suite Pool Villa.

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Aonang Krabi
description: Welcome to Days Inn by Wyndham Aonang Krabi, a contemporary hotel just steps from the shores of the Andaman Sea. We put you minutes from the gorgeous sands of Aonang Beach and Noppharat Thara Beach, as well as restaurants and shops. Our hotel is also within driving distance of Krabi Airport. While you are here, make the most of your stay with high-speed WiFi, our outdoor pool, and an on-site restaurant.Wyndham

name: Krabi La Playa Resort
description: 150 metres from the Ao Nang & Noppharat Thara Beaches, Krabi La Playa offers 4-star accommodation featuring a large outdoor spa pool and fitness centre. Free parking is available. Spacious rooms at La Playa feature private balconies with outdoor seating and DVD players. They are fitted with cable TV and a safe. For convenience, tea/coffee making amenities and a fridge are provided. The outdoor pool features several individual spa baths and poolside pavilions where guests can enjoy traditional Thai massage. The fitness room is available throughout the day. A quiet moment can be enjoyed in the landscaped gardens. Views of the pool and surrounding lotus pond accompany Thai and Western dishes at The Spice. Vegetarian dishes are available in our menu. Barbecue dinners are served by the pool.

name: The Cliff Elegance Resort
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, The Cliff Aonang Resort puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, airport transfer are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, mini bar. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, massage. The Cliff Aonang Resort combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Krabi unforgettable.Agoda

name: Krabi Apartment Hotel
description: Krabi Apartment-SHA Extra Plus is located in Leela Valley, a 4-minute drive to Ao Nang Centre. The hotel offers free internet access, an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. The air-conditioned apartments come with a living room, kitchen and private balcony. A cable TV, hot water showers and views of the pool are available. The hotel features airport shuttles, motorbike rentals and laundry services. Other facilities include a tour desk and massage services. Krabi Apartment-SHA Extra Plus is approximately 18 km from Krabi International Airport.

name: Boutique Village Hotel
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 4.6 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium, Boutique Village Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The rooms come with air conditioning, and some units at the hotel have a terrace. All guest rooms at Boutique Village Hotel come with a seating area. The daily breakfast offers Full English/Irish, Asian or vegetarian options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ao Nang Beach, like cycling. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 11 km from Boutique Village Hotel, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 19 km from the hotel.

name: Chom By The Sea
address: 251 หมู่ 5 อ่าวน้ำเมาบีช หมู่ 5 ต.ไสไท อ่าวน้ำเมา, Ao Nang 81000
description: Situated in Ao Nam Mao, 1.4 km from Ao Nam Mao Beach, Chom By The Sea features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has garden views and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is located 3.9 km from Gastropo Fossils The World Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Chom By The Sea provides some rooms with city views, and rooms come with a balcony. The rooms have a wardrobe. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes American, Asian and vegetarian options. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 8 km from the accommodation, while Wat Kaew Korawaram is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 22 km from Chom By The Sea, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Deevana Plaza Krabi
address: 186 Moo 3, Aonang Soi 8, Aonang Beach, Aonang, Muang, Krabi 81180
description: Boasting 3 outdoor swimming pools, Deevana Plaza Krabi Aonang - SHA Extra Plus offers chic accommodation in contemporary low-rise buildings. It is a short distance from both Aonang and Noppharat Thara Beaches. Free WiFi is available and guests may enjoy a restful and rejuvenating spa. The property features a restaurant and bar, a children's pool and a meetings and event facility. Kingfisher Restaurant serves authentic Thai and international dishes. A swim-up bar and 24-hour room service are also available. Decorated in neutral colours and warm lighting, each room has a private balcony, a flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. The see-through glass bathrooms are equipped with a refreshing rain shower. Deevana Plaza Krabi Aonang - SHA Extra Plus is located a 30-minute drive from Krabi International Airport, a 20-minute drive from Krabi Town and a 2-hour drive from Phuket International Airport. It is close to many seafood restaurants, fascinating local markets and vibrant nightlife. Krabi's beautiful islands and beaches can easily be reached with a short boat ride.

name: Centara Ao Nang Beach Resort & Spa Krabi
description: Located in Krabi, Centara Ao Nang Beach Resort & Spa Krabi offers 4-star accommodation, as well as a swimming pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the Spa Cenvaree and Swimming Pool. There are a variety of facilities at the resort that guests can enjoy, such as free Wi-Fi, body treatments and a fitness centre. Staff are available 24/7 and can assist with booking tours and tickets. This resort provides rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all offer a refrigerator, a mini bar and an in-room safe. Centara Ao Nang Beach Resort & Spa Krabi provides a varied dining experience with Veranda Brasserie and Coco Pool Bar. A selection of dining options are also found in the area. After a day spent at the beach, guests are invited to enjoy a relaxing massage back at the resort. It is also a short car ride from Ko Poda and Khlong Muang Beach.Revato

name: Kokotel Krabi Oasis
description: Set 1.1 km from Ao Nang Beach, Kokotel Krabi Oasis offers 3-star accommodation in Ao Nang Beach and features a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property is fitted with an outdoor pool and is situated 1.2 km from Nopparat Thara Beach. The hotel offers an American or Asian breakfast. Pai Plong Beach is 2.7 km from Kokotel Krabi Oasis, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 1.1 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from the accommodation.

name: Anana Ecological Resort Krabi
address: 1004 Soi Suan Tu Rian, Ao Nang 81140
description: Featuring 5-star accommodation, Anana Ecological Resort Krabi-SHA Extra Plus is set in Ao Nang Beach, 3.3 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium and 9 km from Dragon Crest Mountain. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service and luggage storage for guests. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All units at the hotel are equipped with a seating area, a minibar and a flat-screen TV. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with free environment-friendly toiletries, while certain rooms come with a terrace. All rooms include a desk. Anana Ecological Resort Krabi-SHA Extra Plus offers an outdoor pool. Krua Thara Seafood Restaurant is 5 km from the accommodation, while Ao Phai Plong is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 17 km from the property. Tuk Tuk shuttle services are provided upon request.

name: Royal Nakara Ao Nang
description: Situated on a hillside near Ao Nang Beach and Nopparattara National Park in Krabi, is Royal Nakara Ao Nang Hotel, which offers comfortable accommodation and friendly service. Rooms at Royal Ao Nang are decorated in a contemporary style with a Thai touch. Fitted with dark wood furnishings, rooms feature a large balcony, where you can relax and soak up the sun. Facilities include air conditioning, a DVD player and room service. To explore the island, enquire with the helpful staff for information on attractions and travel arrangements for day trips. After a long day out, take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool, while you sip a drink from the bar. High-speed internet access is also available within the hotel. Dine at Royal Ao Nang's on-site restaurant, which serves delicious Thai and Western cuisine. You will also be able to enjoy the lush tropical landscape as you feast on the fresh seafood it offers.

name: Blue Ba You Resort
address: Soi Noppharattara 13 เลขที่ 284 บลูเบย์ยูรีสอร์ต, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Set in Ban Khlong Haeng, a few steps from Nopparat Thara Beach, Blue Ba You Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. The property is around 1.2 km from Ao Nang Beach, 2.7 km from Pai Plong Beach and less than 1 km from Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium. Every room is fitted with a balcony with pool views and free WiFi. The units at the resort come with a seating area. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All guest rooms will provide guests with air conditioning, a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. An American breakfast is available every morning at Blue Ba You Resort. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 10 km from the accommodation, while Dragon Crest is 15 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Blue Ba You Resort.

name: Ahad Suite Ao Nang By Ma
address: 24 Moo 3 Ao-Nang Muang Krabi, Ao Nang 81000
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, 1.6 km from Ao Nang Beach, Ahad Suite Ao Nang By Ma provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel offers an indoor pool and a concierge service. At the hotel, every room has a desk. Ahad Suite Ao Nang By Ma features certain rooms with city views, and each room is equipped with a balcony. Guest rooms in the accommodation are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. American and halal breakfast options are available daily at Ahad Suite Ao Nang By Ma. The hotel offers a barbecue. Speaking Arabic, English and Thai at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.9 km from Ahad Suite Ao Nang By Ma, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is less than 1 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 23 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: River Front Krabi Hotel
description: Located in Krabi town, 1.4 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram, River Front Krabi Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At River Front Krabi Hotel each room includes bed linen and towels. Thara Park is 3.4 km from the accommodation, while Krabi Stadium is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 11 km from River Front Krabi Hotel.

name: Glur Hostel
description: Boasting a mountain backdrop, Glur Hostel is located in a peaceful area in Aonang. A 15-minute walk from the beach, it features an outdoor common area with a 42-inch flat-screen TV and DVD player. Glur Hostel offers private rooms and dormitories, all combining white furniture and bright blue walls. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with private lockers and bath amenities. The hostel provides free rental of a laptop, as well as books and reed mats. Travel arrangements can be organised at the tour desk. Wi-Fi is free in public areas, and free private parking is available on site. Guests can prepare their own meals in the shared kitchen area, which has a fridge and microwave. Coffee, tea, and hot and cold drinking water are provided free of charge. Glur Hostel is 45 minutes’ drive from Krabi Airport. It is a 15-minute boat ride from Tonsai and Railay beaches.

name: Ananta Burin Resort
description: A 5-minute walk from Noppharat Thara Beach in Krabi and Ao Nang, Ananta Burin Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers room decorated in modern Thai and Japanese styles. The resort features gardens, outdoor pools as well as a water park with 2 water slides, artificial mountains and waterfalls. All rooms at Ananta Burin Resort - SHA Extra Plus comes with a 36" LCD flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Guests can enjoy pool and garden views of the balcony's sitting area. The private bathroom has a bathtub and separate shower. The resort offers car rental and a tour desk for guests who wish to go sightseeing or excursions to nearby islands. Luggage storage is provided at the 24-hour front desk. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also available. American breakfast is served daily at the resort. Thai and international dishes can also be enjoyed at the restaurant.

name: Chada Thai Village
address: 260 Moo 2 Tambol Ao-Nang, Amphur Maung, Krabi 81000
description: Boasting 3 outdoor pools and traditional Thai architecture, Krabi Thai Village Resort is a 10-minutes walk from Ao Nang Beach. It has a spa and 4 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby. Fitted with wooden flooring and Thai-style furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms have a small seating area. Cable TV, a safety deposit box, and tea/coffee making facilities are provided. The private bathroom has a bathtub and separate shower. Guests can relax on sun loungers by the pools, or exercise in the fitness centre. The resort offers limousine and laundry services. Room service is also available. Breakfast is served in Greenary Restaurant, while Rotissary Restaurant offers Thai dishes and views of Nopparat Thara Bay. Refreshments are available at Pavilion Pool Bar and Cat's Eye Bar. Krabi Thai Village Resort is within a 10-minute walk of shops and restaurants in Ao Nang.

name: Na Sook Resort
description: Located in Krabi, this welcoming villa brings it all within your reach. Ao Nam Mao is an easy 5-minute walk away, so you can leave your car at the property, which offers onsite parking, or jump in your vehicle to make short work of the 5-minute drive to Phra Nang Beach. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the outdoor pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a picnic area. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. As you settle into this 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental, you'll find a living room, luggage storage, a safe, and air conditioning. Bathroom amenities include free toiletries and towels. The kitchenette is equipped with a refrigerator and a microwave. And because there's access to laundry facilities, you can go a bit lighter on your packing.Expedia

name: The Scene Cliff View Villas by Swiss-Belhotel
address: The Scene Cliff View Villas 907 M 2 Soi Ao Nang 11, Krabi 81180
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach and with Aonang Mosque reachable within 700 metres, The Scene Cliff View Villas by Swiss-Belhotel offers express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a garden. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. The accommodation provides a kids' club, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hair dryer and a desk. At the resort all rooms have a private bathroom. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at The Scene Cliff View Villas by Swiss-Belhotel. The accommodation offers a terrace. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near The Scene Cliff View Villas by Swiss-Belhotel. Guests can make use of the business centre, work out at the gym or relax in the bar. Ao Phai Plong is 600 metres from the resort, while Dragon Crest Mountain is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 28 km from The Scene Cliff View Villas by Swiss-Belhotel.

name: The Small Hotel Krabi
address: 167 Moo.3 Tambon Ao Nang, Muang, Krabi 81000
description: Navinda Krabi - SHA Plus is located just a few minutes’ walk from Noppharat Thara Beach, and 300 metres from Ao Nang Beach. It offers an outdoor swimming pool and spa tub. Free WiFi is available. Rooms at Small Hotel Krabi are modern and light. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a rain shower. Free Wi-Fi and tea and coffee makers are also available. The Parsley and Basil is the onsite restaurant. It offers all-day dining and serves a mix of international and Thai dishes. Room service is also available. Phra Nang Cave and Princess Lagoon are within a 10 minute drive of the Krabi Small Hotel. The Krabi Airport is approximately 35-minutes’ drive away.

name: Sand Sea Resort
description: Located along Krabi’s Railey West Beach, Sand Sea Resort Railay Beach offers rooms with a private balcony. It boasts an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Sea Sand Resort is a 15-minute boat ride from Ao Nang Beach and a 45-minute boat ride from Krabi Town. The bungalows and suites at the resort are well-equipped with a minibar, refrigerator and TV with cable channels. Hot shower facilities and toiletries are provided in each en suite bathroom. Guests can go on a snorkeling and fishing trip, or enjoy a relaxing Thai massage. The resort provides car rental services while sightseeing and travel arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Sand Sea Restaurant features beachfront dining, and serves a variety of local and international dishes.

name: Railay Village Resort
description: Situated on the white sands of West Railay Beach and surrounded by the beautiful limestone cliffs, Railay Village Resort-SHA Extra Plus offers private villas and rooms with pool views. It also has an outdoor pool. The resort is entirely surrounded by limestone cliffs and is only accessible by boat. Ao Nang Beach is a 15 minutes' boat ride away. All villas and rooms are fully furnished and include cable TV, private balconies, minibars, and 24-hour room service. Guests can enjoy activities such as snorkelling, exploring caves and mountains and short-distance boat trips to several offshore islands including the world famous Phi Phi Islands. Railay Village's Beachfront restaurant serves fresh seafood barbecue dishes, Thai and international cuisine with a backdrop golden sunsets and sounds of the beach.

name: Wild Orchid Krabi by Villa Cha Cha
description: This property is 6 minutes walk from the beach. Directly opposite Ao Nammao Pier, Thip Residence features a salt-water outdoor pool surrounded by a tropical garden. Offering free Wi-Fi, it provides rooms with a private balcony overlooking the sea, mountain, pool or garden. Located in Ao Nammao village, this family-run boutique hotel is 5 km from the famous Ao Nang Beach and 15 km from Krabi Town. Krabi International Airport is 25 km away. Ao Nammao Pier is the departure point by long tail boat to Railay. Air-conditioned rooms all come with a flat-screen satellite TV, fridge and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have hot-water showers.
