Free bottled water is provided daily. Facing the garden, Thip’s The Jasmine Rice restaurant serves traditional Thai and international dishes, along with a vegetarian menu. Guests can relax with a massage or enjoy quiet moments at the library. Aside from room service, transport rentals and free parking are provided at Thip Residence Boutique Hotel.WebBeds

name: Ao Nang Baan Suan Resort
description: Surrounded by tropical greenery, Aonang Baansuan Resort offers budget accommodation with an outdoor pool. It features free beach transfers. Wi-Fi and free parking are available. Baansuan Resort is a 5-minute drive from beautiful Aonang Beach. Baansuan’s individual bungalows feature thatched roofs and are surrounded by greenery. They are fitted with mosquito nets and seating areas. Private bathrooms have shower facilities. Guests can lounge by the outdoor pool or relax with traditional Thai massages. Leisure activities like diving, snorkelling and horse riding are available. Day trips can be planned Baansuan Aonang’s tour desk. Baan Suan Kitchen offers a variety of Thai food and Western dishes, with views of the landscaped gardens. Fresh seafood and barbecued dishes are also available.

name: Krabi Resort
description: Located on Ao Nang Beach, Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus provides direct beach access and charming rooms with private terraces. It has a large outdoor pool and a restaurant offering beautiful sea views. Conveniently situated near Krabi’s spectacular diving sites and limestone cliffs, The Krabi Resort- SHA Extra Plus is also just 4 km from Phra Nang Cave. It takes 30 minutes by car from the hotel to Krabi International Airport. Fitted with fine furnishings, rooms present a traditional Thai decor or contemporary designs. Each room has a cable TV, a minibar and ample seating space. Most rooms come with a luxurious bathtub. Recreation facilities include rock climbing, scuba diving and snorkelling. The resort also provides tour services, airport transfers and wireless internet access for a fee. The Boat, the resort’s all-day dining restaurant, serves Thai and international cuisine. Fresh seafood barbeque dishes are also available. Guests can enjoy refreshing beverages at the Beach and Pool Bar.

name: The Pineapple Hotel
description: Set in Krabi town, 1.8 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram, The Pineapple Hotel offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, all rooms have a balcony with a city view. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a patio and some have pool views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or halal options. Thara Park is 3.5 km from The Pineapple Hotel, while Krabi Stadium is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 11 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sunda Resort
description: Located 800 metres to Nopparathara Beach, Sunda Resort features 2 swimming pools and rooms with free Wi-Fi. It offers free tuk-tuk shuttles to Ao Nang Beach, a 10-minute ride away. The nightlife and entertainment spots of Ao Nang are just a 10-minute drive away. Krabi Airport is a 30-minute drive from Sunda Resort. All rooms at Sunda Hotel come with a private balcony with views of the pool, garden or canal. They feature a private bathroom and seating area, complete with cable TV and tea/coffee machine. Sunda Resort offers motorbike rentals to explore the area and has a tour desk for day trip and tour arrangements. Other amenities include free parking and a restaurant offering local dishes.

name: Amari Vogue Krabi
address: 149 Moo 3 Tubkaak Beach Nong Thale, Krabi 81000
description: The exclusive Amari Vogue Krabi offers a private beachfront along Tub Kaek Beach. Personalised service starts with a welcome drink at check-in. Beautiful rooms are fitted with polished wooden flooring, traditional Northern Thai artwork and carvings, as well as free internet. Luxuriously furnished, each room has a satellite TV, DVD player and minibar. Amari Vogue Krabi is a 20-minute drive from Aonang Beach and a 30-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi Airport is about 40 minutes' away by car. Guests can enjoy total relaxation at Breeze Spa with private steam rooms, massages and beauty treatments. Wellness facilities include a fitness room and spa baths. International cuisine is served at the Lotus Restaurant. Marcos Restaurant and Bar offers Mediterranean and Asian cuisines. Drinks and snacks are available at the Voyager Lounge.

name: Vacation House
description: No description found

name: Maneetel Krabi Beachfront
address: 225 Moo 3, Nopparat Tara Beach, Ao Nang 81000
description: With the peaceful Nopparat Thara Beach across the road, Maneetel Krabi Beachfront-SHA Plus offers comfortable accommodation, and outdoor pool and free WiFi access. Each room at this hotel is air-conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include a seating area, a minibar and a balcony. The bathroom comes equipped with a shower, slippers and free toiletries. During their stay at Maneetel Krabi Beachfront-SHA Plus, guests can make use of the fitness centre or grab a meal at the on-site restaurant. Additional restaurants, bars and shops can also be found nearby. The hotel is 1.2 km from Ao Nang Beach and 1.8 km from Nopparatthara Pier, where boats can take guest to the popular Phi Phi Islands. Krabi Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Venice Krabi Villa Resort
description: Located in Ao Nam Mao, 1.4 km from Ao Nam Mao Beach, Venice Krabi Villa Resort- SHA Plus provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace, as well as an indoor pool and a hot tub. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Venice Krabi Villa Resort- SHA Plus every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 3.7 km from the accommodation, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 8.7 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 21 km from Venice Krabi Villa Resort- SHA Plus.

name: Deevana Krabi Resort
description: Situated a walking distance to Nopparat Thara and Ao Nang Beaches, Deevana Krabi Resort - SHA Extra Plus - offers a comfortable getaway among unspoiled plantations and greenery. It boasts two outdoor pools and bars, massage spas and a modern fitness centre. Guests staying at this resort can use meeting facilities and have access to the Kids Club located at Deevana Plaza Krabi Aonang. Free WiFi is available in all guestrooms. The earth-tone with tints of blue rooms are all air-conditioned and have a privacy balcony that overlooks the garden. The spacious bathrooms are fitted with fluffy towels, bathrobe, complimentary luxury toiletries and a rain shower. Selected room types also come with a separate outdoor bathtub. At Deevana Krabi Resort - SHA Extra Plus - guests can enjoy both Thai and international cuisines at the on-site restaurant. Other beachfront bars and restaurants serving fresh seafood dishes can also be found with a short drive. Other services such as car rentals, airport pick-up and drop-off services can all be arranged at the helpful reception desk that stays open everyday for 24 hours. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 30 km from the property.

name: The Lai Thai - Sha Extra Plus
description: The Lai Thai Luxury Condominiums- Sha Extra Plus is located just 800 metres from Ao Nang Beach and within walking distance of restaurants, shops and tourist facilities. It boasts a fitness centre, soothing massage services, mini mart as well as a 25-metre pool with an attached children's and a plunge pool. Each room at the hotel is air-conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV, a kitchenette and a private balcony. For extra comfort, guests will also find silk bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries in the en suite bathrooms. For guests' additional convenience, the the stylish hotel has a 24-hour front desk, laundry services and an tour desk to book all of the holiday adventures. Free private parking is available. A variety of delectable Italian dishes are served at BB Bistro. The Grape Escape bar serves fine wine and whiskey. Guests can also find a number of dining outlets serving local and international cuisine within a 5-minute walk of the property. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 3.6 km from The Lai Thai Luxury Condominiums- Sha Extra Plus, and Nopparat Thara Beach is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 25 km away from the property.

name: Beyond Krabi
address: 98 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay, Ban Khlong Muang 81000
description: Inspired by nature, the luxurious Beyond Krabi offers a tropical escape on a private stretch of Klong Muang Beach. With an outdoor pool, it also has a fitness centre and restaurant. Featuring relaxed yet modern Thai design, air-conditioned rooms enjoy beautiful views of the gardens, pool or sea. All come with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have hot showers and a hairdryer. Guests can indulge in a relaxing Thai body massage, or arrange day trips at the tour desk. Currency exchange and ticketing services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Thai and international cuisines are served at the hotel's restaurant. A daily breakfast buffet is also offered. Beyond Krabi is 7 km from Ao Nang Beach and 11 km from Railay Beach. It is a 45-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Free parking is available.

name: Infinity Aonang Krabi - Sha Certified
address: 88/88 M.2 Aonang Soi 9 Muang Krabi, Krabi 81180
description: Situated in Ao Nang Beach, 2.6 km from Ao Nang Beach, Infinity Aonang Krabi - SHA Certified features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel provides an indoor pool and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Infinity Aonang Krabi - SHA Certified offers some units with mountain views, and the rooms are equipped with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Infinity Aonang Krabi - SHA Certified offers an American or Asian breakfast. Pai Plong Beach is 2.9 km from the hotel, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 4.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from Infinity Aonang Krabi - SHA Certified.

name: Kokotel Krabi Ao Nang
description: Located in Ao Nang, Kokotel Krabi Ao Nang offers rooms with satellite TV and views of the surrounding mountains or sea. It provides free parking, an Asian fusion cafe and a rooftop pool. A 24-hour security service is also offered. Each air-conditioned room at the Kokotel Krabi Ao Nang comes with a balcony, minibar, telephone and safe. Tea/coffee making facilities are included. Japanese and Thai cuisines are served at the hotel’s restaurant. Kokotel Krabi Ao Nang is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport and is a 5-minute walk to the beach. Various dining outlets and a food mart are within walking distance of the hotel.

name: Krabi Seabass Hotel
address: 273/55 Utarakit Rd, Pak Nam Sub District, Krabi 81000
description: Krabi SeaBass Hotel has a garden, a shared lounge and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Krabi town. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Thai cuisine. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The hotel features some units with city views, and the rooms come with a balcony. Guest rooms feature a private bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Wat Kaew Korawaram is 1.1 km from Krabi SeaBass Hotel, while Thara Park is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Aonang Lodge
description: Located in Ao Nang, 2 km from the beach, Aonang Lodge - SHA boasts an outdoor pool and views of the cliffs. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available and free private parking is available on site. Rooms include a flat-screen TV. All rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. There is ticket service at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Nopparat Thara Beach is 3.1 km from Aonang Lodge - SHA. The nearest airport is Krabi Airport, 18 km away.

name: The Phu Beach Hotel
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, within 1.5 km of Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium and 7 km of Dragon Crest Mountain, The Phu Beach Hotel - SHA Plus provides an outdoor swimming pool. Boasting free daily round trip shuttle service from The Phu Beach Hotel - SHA Plus to Aonang, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Wangsai Seafood Restaurant is 2.9 km from the hotel and Aonang Mosque is 5 km away. The air-conditioned accommodation will provide guests with rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while certain rooms have a patio. Guest rooms have a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is served daily at the property. The hotel offers a fitness centre. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at The Phu Beach Hotel - SHA Plus. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Island Hopping Tour Desk, Nopparat Thara Beach is 2.9 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 25 km from the property.

name: The L Resort
address: 31 Moo 2 - Ao Nang Beach, Ao Nang 81000
description: The L Resort is located in the Ao Nang Beach area of Krabi. The eco-friendly resort features cushioned sun loungers on the terrace and a large outdoor pool with a waterfall. It is just a 40-minute drive from Krabi Airport. The chic and non-smoking units are decorated with bright colours and feature white linens on the beds. A 40-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are offered in all air-conditioned rooms. The 4-star resort offers free Wi-Fi access and room service from 07:00-23:00 hrs. On-site, private parking is available free of charge. Day excursions can be arranged for guests as well. The Thai-Swiss restaurant, Wanna's Place serves a great selection of Thai and international dishes as well as Swiss cuisine.

name: Krabi Nature Beach Resort
description: Situated in Ao Nang Beach, a few steps from Nopparat Thara Beach, KRABI NATURE LUXURY BEACH RESORT features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the indoor pool, or enjoy pool views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Ao Nang Beach is less than 1 km from KRABI NATURE LUXURY BEACH RESORT, while Pai Plong Beach is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 25 km from the accommodation.

name: The Verandah
description: Inspired by Moroccan themes, The Verandah - SHA Extra Plus is a boutique hotel located 200 metres from the beach in Ao Nang. Contemporary rooms are furnished with modern amenities and eye-catching décor. All guests rooms feature air-conditioning, cable TV and a private balcony with a view. For added peace of mind, each guest has a secure key card access to the lift and the private room. Shower facilities and a hairdryer can be found in the private bathroom. Guests can enjoy an American breakfast and refreshing drinks all day at the cafe bar on the ground floor. The hotel features a 24-hour reception, a complimentary internet corner in the lobby and a tour desk. The Verandah - SHA Extra Plus Hotel is a 30-minute drive away from Krabi International Airport. Free parking is possible at a nearby location.

name: Railay Viewpoint Resort
address: Moo 2, Tambon Ao Nang,Ampur Muang, Krabi, Krabi 81000
description: Set in a prime location of Krabi, Railay Viewpoint Resort puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Take advantage of the hotel's ticket service, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, restaurant, tours. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer closet, towels, mirror, air conditioning, desk to ensure a restful night. Access to the hotel's outdoor pool, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. Railay Viewpoint Resort combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Krabi unforgettable.priceline.com

name: The Lucky Beach Ao Nang
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 18 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge) that operates within 10.00 km. Property Location With a stay at The Lucky Beach Ao Nang in Krabi, you'll be near the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Ao Nang Beach and Nopparat Thara Beach. This family-friendly hotel is 5.4 mi (8.7 km) from Khlong Muang Beach and 7.6 mi (12.2 km) from Tubkaek Beach. Dining You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of The Lucky Beach Ao Nang, or stop in at the grocery/convenience store. English breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for English breakfast: THB 150 for adults and THB 80 for children (approximately) Airport shuttle fee: THB 600 per vehicle (one way) Rollaway bed fee: THB 600.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at midnight The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards and cash Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals not allowed General instructions No cribs (infant beds) available No elevatorsViajes Exito Hotels

name: Anyavee Krabi Beach Resort
address: 84/9 Moo 2, Tambol Nong Thale, Amphur Muang, Krabi, Krabi
description: Bann Chom Le is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Krabi. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. 24-hour security, taxi service, luggage storage, car park, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with mirror, towels, air conditioning, balcony/terrace, fan. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Bann Chom Le the perfect choice for your stay in Krabi.priceline.com

name: Andaman Breeze Resort
address: 424/1 Moo 2, Aonang Ao Nang Beach, Ao Nang 81180
description: Situated in Ao Nang Beach, 2.1 km from Ao Nang Beach, Andaman Breeze Resort - SHA Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is set 2.4 km from Pai Plong Beach. At the hotel the rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a balcony with a garden view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. Each room has a safety deposit box and selected rooms also boast city views. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. An American breakfast is available each morning at Andaman Breeze Resort - SHA Plus. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 4.2 km from the accommodation, while Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 7.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from Andaman Breeze Resort - SHA Plus.

name: Aonang Colors Hotel Krabi
description: Featuring an infinity pool, Aonang Colors Hotel Krabi is situated in Krabi and provides stylish accommodation. It offers stylish rooms with private balconies overlooking the garden. This cosy hotel features a number of facilities, such as bicycle rental, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. There is free private parking nearby for guests with a car. Aonang Colors Hotel Krabi offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower, a mini bar and a coffee maker. Each provide slippers, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous restaurants and eateries close by. Krabi's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Aonang Colors Hotel Krabi, with Nopparat Thara Beach only a brief stroll away. An airport shuttle service is also available on request.Revato

name: Aonang Fiore Resort
description: A 5-minute drive from the centre, Aonang Fiore Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers spacious accommodation, an outdoor pool and free WiFi access. The property is a 10-minute drive from Nopparat Thara Beach and a 20-minute drive from Krabi Town. Krabi Airport is a 24 km drive away. The rooms are air-conditioned and come with a TV. There is also a seating area and minibar. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a shower. There is a tour desk and a 24-hour front desk at the property. Thai dishes can be ordered at the on-site restaurant, with additional dining options a short drive away.

name: Railay Phutawan Resort
address: 516 Moo 2 Railay Beach Aonang Muang, Ao Nang 81000
description: Railay Phutawan Resort is located along Railay Beach in Krabi, surrounded by green mountains and the beautiful Andaman Sea. This tropical getaway enjoys easy access to the nearby islands. Phutawan Railay Resort is a 15-minute speedboat ride from popular Ao Nang Beach. Diving and snorkelling trips to Ko Lanta and the Phi Phi Islands are just a short speedboat ride away. Rooms at Railay Phutawan are tastefully decorated with rustic wooden furnishings and Thai accents. Each comes with a minibar and fridge. Bathrooms feature hot and cold water showers. Guests may arrange an exciting day trip at the tour desk. The resort also provides a sun terrace and scenic landscaped gardens, ideal locations for an evening stroll. The resort’s restaurant serves a selection of authentic Thai dishes and a daily Continental breakfast. The bar offers exotic cocktails and romantic sunset views of Railay Beach.

name: Glow Ao Nang Krabi
address: 199/46 Soi 8, Moo 3, Ao Nang, Ao Nang 81180
description: Located in Ao Nang Beach, just a 10-minute walk from Ao Nang Walking Street, GLOW Ao Nang Krabi features accommodation where guests have easy access to local restaurants, food stalls and seaside shops. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool and 2 fitness centres. Guests can enjoy meals at the on-site restaurant. Free WiFi is offered in all guestrooms and free private parking is available on site. Each room at this hotel is air conditioning and comes with Glow's signature bedding, a 40-inch flat-screen TV, a mini fridge, tea/coffee maker and a safe. Overlooking views of the pool, the mountain or the city, there is a balcony or a terrace featured in all rooms. For your comfort, you will find slippers and a hairdryer. An en suite bathroom features rain shower and free toiletries. Guests can make use of a 24-hour front desk, kid's club and an internet lounge during their stay at the property. Nopparat Thara Beach is a 5-minute walk from GLOW Ao Nang Krabi, while Krabi Town is 16 km from the property. Krabi Airport is 25 km away.

name: Ramada by Wyndham Aonang Krabi
description: Thank you for choosing our Ramada Aonang Krabi hotel. Ramada is a global upper-midscale hotel brand with over 820 properties located in over 50 countries worldwide. Most Ramada hotels feature free wired and wireless high-speed internet access, meeting rooms, business services, fitness facilities and upgraded bath amenities. Many properties have an on-site restaurant/lounge, while other sites offer a complimentary continental breakfast. You do your thing, leave the rest to us.Wyndham

name: K-Bunk Aonang Center
address: 522 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Mueang, Krabi, Krabi 81180
description: Situated a 10-minute walk from Ao Nang Beach, The Moment Hostel offers both private and dormitory-style rooms with free WiFi. All guestrooms are air-conditioned and have views. The private room has views of the mountain, a refrigerator and an en suite bathroom. Guests staying in the dormitory rooms have access to a shared bathroom. Facilities available at the hostel include a 24 hour front desk, laundry services and an on-site mini mart. Luggage storage is offered, free of charge. The Moment Hostel is a short walk from restaurants, bars and convenience stores. Nopparat Thara Beach is about 2 km away. Krabi Airport is 25 km away from the property.

name: Aonang Dugong-Sha Extra Plus
description: Set in Ao Nang Beach, 400 metres from Ao Nang Beach, Aonang Dugong-SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Built in 2021, this 3-star hotel is within 1.4 km of Pai Plong Beach and 1.6 km of Nopparat Thara Beach. The hotel also provides free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at Aonang Dugong-SHA Extra Plus can enjoy an American breakfast. Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 2.8 km from the accommodation, while Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from Aonang Dugong-SHA Extra Plus.

name: Friendly Hotel Krabi
description: Friendly Hotel Krabi features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Ao Nam Mao. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, valet parking and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 400 metres from Fossil Shell Beach. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. The hotel provides certain rooms with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a balcony. At Friendly Hotel Krabi each room has a private bathroom and bed linen. The accommodation offers an Asian or halal breakfast. Ao Nam Mao Beach is 500 metres from Friendly Hotel Krabi, while Gastropo Fossils The World Museum is 400 metres away. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: Alisea Pool Villa Aonang
address: 95 Moo 4, Ao Nang, Krabi thailand, Ao Nang 81000
description: Alisea Pool Villa Aonang features an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Ao Nang Beach. With free WiFi, this 4-star resort offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can use the hot tub, or enjoy pool views. At the resort every room is fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kitchen, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Alisea Pool Villa Aonang the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an American or Asian breakfast. Alisea Pool Villa Aonang offers a barbecue. Nopparat Thara Beach is 3 km from the resort, while Ao Nang Krabi Boxing Stadium is 3.4 km away. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 25 km from Alisea Pool Villa Aonang, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Villa Macaque and Villa Languor
description: The Second House - The Wood &The White is situated in Ao Nang, just 35 minutes from Krabi International Airport. It is also a short car trip from Ton Sai Beach and Ao Phra Nang. The Second House - The Wood &The White provides cozy rooms, designed to suit the needs of any traveler. The hotel is an ideal place to explore nearby Ko Poda and Nopparat Thara Beach. Khlong Muang Beach can be easily accessed by car.HotelsCombined

name: Srisuksant Resort
description: Srisuksant Resort is located along Aonang’s Noppharatra Beach. It features a swimming pool, restaurant and free parking. Rooms have cable TV and offer sweeping views of the sea or mountain. The air-conditioned rooms at Resort Srisuksant come with hardwood furnishings and have plenty of natural light. Each room has a private terrace and is equipped with a minibar and tea/coffee maker. Guests can relax with pampering Thai massage treatments. Travel arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Thai and international meals are served at the restaurant. Fresh seafood dishes and refreshing beverages are also available. Srisuksant Resort is 32 km from Krabi Airport and a 15-minute walk to the town’s shops and restaurants.

name: The Seens Hotel
description: Set in Krabi town, 1.9 km from Wat Kaew Korawaram, The Seens Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. The accommodation features a tour desk, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Seens Hotel the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers an à la carte or Asian breakfast. Thara Park is 3 km from The Seens Hotel, while Krabi Stadium is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Aonang Paradise Resort
description: Aonang Paradise Resort is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Krabi. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer are there for guest's enjoyment. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature separate living room, television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Krabi has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Aonang Paradise Resort.Agoda

name: Arawan Krabi Beach Resort
address: 107, Moo 5, Ao Nam Mao, Ao Nang 81000
description: Boasting views of the Andaman sea and limestone cliffs, Arawan Krabi Resort features outdoor swimming pools overlooking a private beach of Ao Nam Mao. Ao Nang beach is only a 12-minute drive away from the resort. Guests are also offered with complimentary shuttle services by Tuk Tuk. Featuring air conditioning, rooms at Arawan Krabi Resort are spacious and and fully equipped with flat screen satellite TVs and a seating area. En suite bathrooms include refreshing showers, toiletries and slippers. Guests can enjoy on-site restaurants serving Thai cuisines. There is an on-site free parking and bike rental available. Koh Phi Phi Don is 32 km from Arawan Krabi Beach Resort,while Railay Beach is 17 km away. The resort is only a 45-minute drive from Krabi International Airport.

name: Pak-Up Hostel
description: Pak-Up Hostel is a boutique backpackers’ joint located at the centre of Krabi Town. The hostel offers free Wi-Fi and parking. Guests can enjoy a variety of beverages at the bar or arrange for massage treatments at the front desk. Hostel Pak-Up is a 1-minute walk from Chaofa Pier and a 15-minute drive from the airport. It is a 20-minute boat ride from Railay and a 20-minute drive from Ao Nang. Guests can make travel arrangements at the hostel’s tour office. The hostel also has coin-operated washing machines, bicycle rental service and luggage storage. The dormitory rooms are fully air-conditioned and are fitted with huge under-bed lockers. The shared bathroom features rain shower facilities.

name: The Ozone Krabi Condotel
description: Situated in Krabi town in the Krabi Province region and Wat Kaew Korawaram reachable within 4.7 km, The Ozone Krabi Condotel features accommodation with free WiFi, barbecue facilities, a rooftop pool and free private parking. Featuring a terrace, some units are air conditioned and have a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. Some accommodation includes a balcony with sea views, a fully equipped kitchen and a shared bathroom with shower. The apartment offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness centre and indoor pool. A a baby safety gate is also available for guests at The Ozone Krabi Condotel. Thara Park is 5.4 km from the accommodation, while Krabi Stadium is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International, 11 km from The Ozone Krabi Condotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Krabi Aquamarine Resort
address: 169 Moo 3, Ao Nang, Muang, Ao Nang 81000
description: Krabi Aquamarine Resort - SHA Plus is located in Ao Nang, 200 metres from Noparathara Beach. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, restaurant and bar. Free parking is provided, as well as a free one-way shuttle service from the resort to Ao Nang city centre. Spacious rooms at Krabi Aquamarine Resort - SHA Plus are built around the pool, so guests enjoy pool access from their doorstep. Rooms have a private balcony, seating area and fridge. Recreational activities in the area include island tours, kayaking and rock climbing. WiFi access is available at an extra charge. Krabi Aquamarine Resort - SHA Plus is 800 metres from Ao Nang Beach. It is a 30-minute drive from Krabi Airport and Walking Street.

name: The Fong Krabi Resort
description: The Fong Krabi resort is a 15-minute drive to Aonang Beach and Krabi Town. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free Wi-Fi. The property features a tour desk and free private parking. The resort is a 20-minute drive from Krabi Airport. Phi Phi Island is a 1-hr boat ride away. Rooms are fitted with flat-screen cable TV and refrigerator. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities. A welcome set of fruits is also provided. I am Cafe, a 2-minute walk away, serves breakfast and a la carte menu between 07:30 to 17:30 hrs daily. Additional local dining outlets can be found within a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Aonang Top View
description: This hotel is located just steps from Ao Nang Beach. It features a 24-hour front desk and free private parking on site. All rooms have a balcony with a view of the garden. Aonang Top View offers air-conditioned rooms with cable TV and a refrigerator. Each has an en suite bathroom. Staffs at the tour desk can help organise local trips and sightseeing tours. The Aonang Top View also offers a laundry service. Krabi Airport is a 40-minute drive from the hotel.

name: T2 Ao Nang Krabi
description: Situated in Ao Nang Beach and with Ao Nang Beach reachable within 1.2 km, T2 Ao Nang Krabi features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a business centre. The hotel has family rooms. Nopparat Thara Beach is 1.2 km from the hotel, while Pai Plong Beach is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Krabi International Airport, 23 km from T2 Ao Nang Krabi.

name: Thepparat Lodge Krabi
address: 151-155 Maharaj Rd, Paknam Dist, Muang, Krabi
description: Theparat Lodge is situated at the heart of charming and laid-back Krabi town. Set in a convenient location it provides comfortable and affordable rooms paired with traditional Thai hospitality. Free WiFi access is available. All 24 cosy rooms are decorated with teak furnishings and are equipped with modern amenities and services to make your stay relaxed and comfortable. Every room is of no-smoking. Arrange for a day trip at the hotel's tour desk to the numerous tourist attractions or pamper yourself with a Thai massage after a long day of sight-seeing. All of these services and more are offered daily. Theparat Lodge's facilities also include an on-site restaurant. Panida Kitchen offers you a warm and inviting setting whilst serving a delicious variety of Asian and western favourites.

name: Ao Nang Phu Pi Maan Resort and Spa
address: 86/8 Moo 2, Ao Nang, Muang, Ao Nang 81000
description: Set amidst tropical greenery, Ao Nang Phu Pi Maan Resort is a 15-minute walk from Ao Nang Beach. The resort features a spa and an outdoor pool with sun deck. Aonang Phu Pi Maan Resort & Spa - SHA Extra Plus is a 15-minute boat ride from Tonsai and Railay Beaches, and a 30-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. A free shuttle to Ao Nang Beach is provided. Featuring stylish Thai designs and hardwood floors, the spacious rooms come with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Most rooms offer sweeping views of the surrounding countryside. Attached bathrooms have an oversized bathtub and separate rain shower. Guests can exercise at the fitness centre, or rent a speed boat to visit the neighbouring islands. The resort also has a tour desk for guests’ convenience. Dalar Restaurant offers local and Western specialities, while refreshing beverages are served at the pool bar. Room service is also available.

name: Centara Anda Dhevi Resort and Spa
description: Centara Anda Dhevi Resort & Spa Krabi is set in Ao Nang and is a short walk from Nopparat Thara Beach. In addition to free private parking on site, the resort offers comfortable 4-star rooms and a pool bar. This modern resort provides free Wi-Fi, water slides and an outdoor pool. It also offers family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids club and babysitting/child services. It also has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and a private balcony. They all feature an in-room closet, a bathtub and a flat-screen TV. Centara Anda Dhevi Resort & Spa Krabi's on-site restaurant, Palm Court, is a popular spot to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available daily and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Centara Anda Dhevi Resort & Spa Krabi is close to the area's popular attractions, including Hat Noppharat Beach and Ao Phra Nang, which are within walking distance. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Krabi.Revato

name: Banyan Tree Krabi
address: 279 Moo 3 Tambon Nongtalay Amphoe Muang Krabi, Nong Thale 81180
description: Step into our sanctuary for the senses, where the sapphire blue sea meets tropical white sands against a backdrop of lush jungle-green mountains. Unwind in an oasis of peace and comfort at our idyllic beachfront resort. Feel the warm embrace of Banyan Tree hospitality - from the tranquil spa treatments to mouthwatering cuisine at our restaurants to spectacular vistas of the Andaman Sea. Retreat to a setting of unparalleled indulgence where you can truly unwind and rejuvenate your mind, body and soul.accorhotels.com

name: Tonsai Bay Resort
description: Surrounded by greenery and cliffs, Tonsai Bay Resort is a 2-minute walk from Tonsai Beach and offers villas with private balconies. It features a diving centre, beachfront restaurant and bar. Tonsai Bay Resort is reachable via boat only by a 10-minute boat ride from Aow-Nang Pier, which is a 30-minute drive from Krabi International Airport. Each air-conditioned villa at the Tonsai Bay has a satellite TV, personal safe and minibar. Attached bathrooms offer hot showers. WiFi is available in restaurant and public area. A rock climbing club lets guests explore the surrounding cliffs. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage. A tour desk, food mart and laundry service are available. Thai and international dishes are served at the Tonsai Bay’s restaurant.

name: Isle Beach Resort Krabi-Sha
address: 216 Moo 3, Nongtalay, Amphur Mueng, Nong Thale 81000
description: Located on the beach of Klong Muang, Isle Beach Resort provides bungalows with free WiFi. The property features an outdoor pool, 24-hour front desk and shuttle service. Free public parking is possible on site. The resort is 25.8 km. from Krabi International Airport. It is 49 km to Phuket International Airport. Bungalows are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, safety deposit box and minibar. They come with an electric kettle and balcony. A bathtub is included in the bathroom. Guests can sample local cuisine at the on-site restaurant.

name: Lada Krabi Residence
description: Lada Krabi Residence Hotel - SHA Plus is a 1-minute walk to the night market. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. A 5-minute walk from Vogue Shopping Centre and Walking Street, the hotel is equipped with a 24-hour front desk. The property is a 15-minute drive from Ao Nang Beach and Krabi Airport. Fitted with tiled flooring, rooms at Lada Krabi Residence Hotel - SHA Plus are equipped a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a telephone. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For guests’ convenience, the hotel provides luggage storage and safety deposit boxes at the front desk. Shuttle service can be arranged upon request. Local dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk from the property.

name: The Haleeva Aonang - Sha Certified
description: Located in Krabi’s Ao Nang area, The Haleeva Aonang - SHA Certified offers colourful accommodation surrounded by tropical gardens. Offering free Wi-Fi, it features an outdoor pool and a restaurant. Haleeva Sunshine is situated about 4 km from Phra Nang Cave and Princess Lagoon. Krabi Airport is 18 km away. Fitted with tiled flooring, air-conditioned rooms at Haleeva feature a spacious layout and a private bathroom. Equipped with flat-screen cable TV and a minibar, they also come with a seating area. Selected rooms come with a private balcony. Guests can rent a car or arrange for a day trip at the tour desk. After a day of sightseeing or rock climbing, they can go for a massage. Those who drive can park on Haleeva Sunshine’s premises for free.

name: Centara Life Phu Pano Krabi
description: Located in Krabi, the hotel is within a 40-minute drive of Krabi International Airport and provides an infinity pool. Guests also have access to complimentary wireless internet and on-site parking. This 3-star hotel provides a 24-hour reception, a kids pool and meeting rooms. A gym is available to guests wanting to keep active while travelling. The rooms at Centra by Centara Phu Pano Resort Krabi are air-conditioned and offer a private balcony, tea and coffee making facilities and a mini bar. They also boast a range of entertainment amenities, such as a flat-screen TV. Centra by Centara Phu Pano Resort Krabi's in-house restaurant, Mix Bistro, is a popular place to have a meal. Centra by Centara Phu Pano Resort Krabi has easy access to Nopparat Thara Beach, Ao Phra Nang and Ton Sai Beach. Khlong Muang Beach and Ko Poda are within a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: U Samui
description: Set in Bo Phut, U Samui is an easy drive from Chaweng and offers a concierge, a 24-hour reception and a swimming pool. It provides 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. A dry cleaning service, a laundry service and 24-hour security are just some of the available services at the resort. A fitness centre is available to guests wanting to keep active while away. Rooms at U Samui feature mini bars, rain showers and tea and coffee making facilities. All offer an in-room safe, a desk and slippers. Guests staying at the resort can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. A daily breakfast is also available to those staying at the property. U Samui is within walking distance of Wat Phra Yai. Chaweng Beach is a short drive away.Revato

name: Socialtel Samui
address: 168/62 Moo 2, Bo Pud, Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: Conveniently situated in Chaweng, SocialTel Koh Samui provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. Among the various facilities are a shared lounge, a terrace, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers karaoke and a concierge service. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms include a balcony and others also offer city views. Guests at SocialTel Koh Samui can enjoy an American breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, British and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play billiards, table tennis and darts at SocialTel Koh Samui, and bike hire and car hire are available. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Tamil at the reception, staff are willing to help at any time of the day. Chaweng Beach is 400 metres from the hotel, while Chaweng Noi Beach is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 1 km from SocialTel Koh Samui.

name: Cascade Tara
address: 20/1 Moo 2, Na Mueang Subdistrict, Koh Samui District, Koh Samui 84140
description: Situated in Na Mueang, 7.8 km from Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks, Cascade Tara features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. The 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The hotel provides mountain views, an outdoor pool and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, the rooms have a balcony. All rooms in Cascade Tara are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Fisherman Village is 23 km from the accommodation, while Big Buddha is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 21 km from Cascade Tara.

name: Hyatt Regency Koh Samui
description: Situated in Chaweng, 1.9 km from Choeng Mon Beach, Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Rooms include a shared bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchenette equipped with a dishwasher. At Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus all rooms have bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Seafood and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus offers a children's playground. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around Chaweng, like snorkelling and canoeing. Chaweng Beach is 2.5 km from Hyatt Regency Koh Samui- SHA Extra Plus, while Big Buddha is 4.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ampersand Resort
description: Set in Bophut, 500 metres from Thongson Bay Beach, Ampersand Resort offers accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The resort will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ampersand Resort all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Mexican and Middle Eastern cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for canoeing and cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star resort. Plai Laem Beach is 500 metres from Ampersand Resort, while Naturism Beach is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 4 km from the resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Holiday Inn Resort Samui Bophut Beach
description: Situated on the heart of Samui Island, right on the stunning white sand and crystal blue waters of Bophut Beach, the Holiday inn Resort Samui Bophut Beach is the best place to stay when looking to enjoy a tropical getaway in one of the world’s must visit vacation destinations! With 203 guest rooms spread across 8 towers, our selection of accommodations ensures each guest has the most idyllic stay. Ranging from standard rooms to a KidSuites®, we can easily accommodate leisure travelers, couples, families, and groups. Whether you are planning an action-packed getaway full of scuba diving, boating adventures, and experiencing around the island, or you’re just looking to relax and unwind at the beach with a cocktail in hand, we can make it happen with our kids eat and stay free programs, everyone can surely get a break. We look forward to welcoming you to our Holiday Inn Resort on the beach soon!IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Kimpton Kitalay Samui
description: Grand Opening Winter 2021. With an enchanting fusion of contemporary design and traditional accents, Kimpton Kitalay Samui conjures the romance of a village intimately connected to the sea. Enjoy any of our 138 rooms, suites or villas, many with their own private pool, access to a swimming pool and views of the sea. Our 500 square meter Kids Club celebrates adventure and a taste of village living, and distinctive restaurants and bars provide irresistible culinary curations all day.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa
address: 208/1 Moo 4, T. Maret, Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Relax in a boutique resort by the beach where five-star service and opulent amenities abound. Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa is set amidst manicured gardens, nestled along the shores of Koh Samui Island. Our hotel's prime location places you steps away from Lamai Beach, Chaweng Beach and Fisherman's Village. After a day on the beach in Thailand, rest well in an elegant hotel room with plush bedding, high-speed Wi-Fi and outdoor whirlpool. Or select one of our resort's lavish villas, each featuring a private pool. Satisfy your hunger at our delicious hotel restaurants with classic dishes from Thailand, locally sourced seafood or tasty international fare. Stay fit in Koh Samui with a workout in our fitness center or recharge with a swim in our hotel pools or a gentle massage at Quan Spa. If you're planning an event in Thailand, take advantage of stylish venues supported by on-site catering. We look forward to making your visit to Renaissance Koh Samui Resort & Spa a memorable one.Marriott

name: Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club
address: 209 Sala Koy Road Bophut Koh Samui, Koh Samui
description: A stay at Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club places you in the heart of Koh Samui, a 1-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and 6 minutes from Chaweng Noi Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: 4U Resort Samui
description: Set in Lamai, 300 metres from Lamai Beach, 4U Resort Samui offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. 4U Resort Samui provides some units with sea views, and each room comes with a patio. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or Asian breakfast is available every morning at the property. At 4U Resort Samui you will find a restaurant serving American, French and Italian cuisine. Vegetarian and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at the hotel. Popular points of interest near 4U Resort Samui include Rocky's Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International, 13 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: W Koh Samui
description: Savor boundless tranquillity by day. Then, ramp it up at night. Situated on a 30-square-mile tropical island in the middle of the Gulf of Thailand, overlooking stunning beaches and lush forests, W Koh Samui resort awakens as the sun goes down, igniting the unexpected. Life is done right. Hotel guests can start the day at our Koh Samui resort with a workout at FIT or dip at WET before unwinding with a locally inspired therapy at AWAY Spa. Then light up the evening with signature cocktails at WOOBAR and dinner at our hotel's on-site restaurants, Namu and The Kitchen Table. Surrounded by verdant foliage, each of our resort's 74 luxury, pet-friendly villas boasts a private outdoor pool and infinite island views. Inside, premiere technology meets signature W pillow top beds, Away Spa amenities and Whatever/Whenever service. Relax and take it easy in Thailand at W Koh Samui Hotel.Marriott

name: Vana Belle, a Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui
address: 9/99 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical forests, mythical gardens, crystal clear blue ocean water and pristine white sand beach. Vana Belle, A Luxury Collection Resort, Koh Samui is located at Chaweng Noi Beach. This Koh Samui hotel is moments away from attractions such as the Elephant Sanctuary, Wat Phra Yai, and Chaweng Beach. Discover the unsurpassed services, unrivaled location and comfort of our Koh Samui, Thailand, resort. Each of our suites and villas boasts private pools. Bring to light the luxurious rooms that feature signature Luxury Collection Bed and pillows, remarkable marble bathrooms and extra amenities. Unwind by the infinity-edge pool at the beachfront with the pool bar or experience the authentic Southern Thai cuisine at Panali or tasteful international cuisine at Kiree. Complete the holiday at Vana Spa with a Spa treatment featuring our signature Siam Boran massage.Marriott

name: Centara Reserve Samui
address: 38/2 Moo 3, Borpud, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Unwind amidst tropical splendor, and discover a new era of sophisticated, story-driven hospitality. The first resort in Centara’s curated luxury collection of refined hotels, Centara Reserve Samui is poised to become one of the Thai island’s most sought-after addresses. Formerly Centara Grand Beach Resort Samui, the distinctive property has been completely re-imagined and redesigned to seamlessly integrate its celebrated colonial aesthetic with contemporary allure. In this discreet beachfront retreat, the guest experience is centered around the individual guest. Travelers are also spoilt for choice when it comes to accommodation options – including exclusive suites and villas that come with “Reserve Hosts,” Centara’s distinct take on personalized butlers, and a selection of pool access rooms and ocean-facing villas that offer even more rare indulgence. Outside of your private sanctuary, discover countless ways to create precious moments through holistic spa pampering and one-of-a-kind gastronomic experiences which redefine the culinary landscape in the island destination. Centara Reserve Samui is nestled in lush gardens set on the tranquil end of Chaweng Beach, less than a 15-minute drive from Samui International Airport.

name: The Spa Resorts - Lamai Village
description: Set in Amphoe Koksamui, 2.1 km from Lamai Beach, The Spa Resorts - Lamai Village offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Featuring a terrace, this 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, all rooms include a balcony with a garden view. All guest rooms in The Spa Resorts - Lamai Village are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes Italian, American and Asian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Seafood and Steakhouse cuisine. Vegetarian, halal and vegan options can also be requested. Rocky's Beach is 2.8 km from The Spa Resorts - Lamai Village, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 14 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thiptara Resort
description: No description found

name: Elephant Beach Resort Samui
address: 159 moo2, Bophut, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: No description found

name: Smile Samui Beach Front Resort
description: No description found

name: Moët Boutique Resort
description: No description found

name: Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui
description: The luxurious Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui offers a 5-star tropical getaway in Ko Samui, with its very own beachfront, beautiful sea view infinity pool, and pampering spa services. Overlooking Ban Tai Beach, it has 4 dining options. Spacious air-conditioned villas feature modern Thai decor and large patios with views of the sea. Equipped with free Wi-Fi, each has a DVD player, TV and a Thai-style sofa. En suite bathrooms present a terazzo bathtub and rainshower. Napasai, A Belmond Hotel, Koh Samui is located along Mae Nam Beach and is about 25 minutes' drive from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. Guests can take PADI-certified diving and snorkelling lessons, or even take part in elephant trekking tours. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive away. Boasting 180° views of the ocean, as well as outdoor seating, Lai Thai Restaurant serves authentic Thai cuisine all day. Fresh seafood barbecue and international dishes are offered at the casual Beach Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at the 2 bars.

name: Melia Koh Samui
address: 83 Moo 5, Choeng Mon Beach, Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Meliá Koh Samui is a perfect blend of traditional Thai hospitality and modern architecture that is ideal for romantic getaways and family holidays overlooking the glorious Choeng Mon Beach. The stylish, u-shaped resort’s layout starts with the main lobby building that also houses Koko Kitchen, Boat’s Bar a. Upstairs is the award-winning YHI Spa. Along each side of the luxury family resort are six sleek, low-rise buildings that effortlessly blend into the tropical landscape and include 159 well-appointed guest rooms and 41 luxurious suites. Ground floor guest rooms boast spacious verandahs that lead directly to the 700-metre long lagoon, which meanders its way around the resort and sports features such as slides, waterjets, jacuzzi, fountains and the Pool Bar. For this reason alone, you begin to understand why the readers of Condé Nast Traveler magazine have voted Meliá Koh Samui as among Thailand’s top resorts, The crowning glory of Meliá Koh Samui are surely the 30 stunning boat suites that sit majestically in their own private gardens surrounded by water. These beautifully restored marvels of Thailand’s rich maritime heritage offer contemporary interior designs with a stand-alone bath tub and double showers on the lower level, while up the spiral staircase is the glorious bedroom with polished wooden floors. A private al fresco deck replete with a sumptuous day bed and huge pillows make a picture-perfect backdrop for romantic couples. Situated on the fringes of the beach is the highly-regarded The Breeza Beach Restaurant and Bar, a relaxing setting any time of the day. It is one of the island’s best kept secrets and serves the most amazing cuisine found anywhere on Koh Samui.

name: Sala Samui Chaweng Beach Resort
description: Enjoying a peaceful beachfront location on the white and sandy Chaweng Beach, SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort comprises of two buildings. The resort features luxurious pool villas and suites, a signature 'moon pool' that overlooks the sea and a romantic beachfront restaurant. The spacious pool deck also comes with plenty of sunbeds and a kid's pool. Inspired by Asian culture, the uniquely designed rooms come with handcrafted furnishings and air conditioning. A cable/satellite TV and minibar are standard features. Bathrooms have hot-water showers and a hairdryer. The open-air Tent Beachfront Restaurant and Bar features fresh seafood and serves a variety of international and traditional Thai favourites. Options for an intimate indoor dining, romantic private gazebos or a complete beachfront dining experience can all be arranged. SALA Samui Chaweng Beach Resort is less than 5 minutes' walk from Chaweng Town. It is a convenient 10-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Avocado Koh Samui
address: 175/64 M.1 T.Bophut, Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: Offering a restaurant and bar, Avocado Koh Samui is located in Bophut and a 10-minute walk from the Fisherman Village. Free WiFi access is available. All rooms here provide guests with a flat-screen satellite TV, air conditioning and a minibar. There is also a sofa seating area and the private bathroom features free toiletries and a shower. Guests can enjoy a garden view. Facilities here include barbecue facilities, bicycle rental and laundry services. There is a tour desk nearby. For added convenience, arrangements can also be made for car rental and an airport shuttle service. Avocado Koh Samui is a 5-minute drive from the shopping centre and 1 km from Bophut Pier. Samui Airport is 7 km away.

name: Banyan Tree Samui
address: 99/9 Moo 4 Maret Koh Samui, Koh Samui
description: Overlooking the sapphire waters of scenic Lamai Bay, Banyan Tree Samui is nestled in a series of cascading terraces on a private cove on the Southeastern coast of Koh Samui. The luxury all-pool villa resort combines the best elements of a tropical getaway with a pristine beach, blissful spa escapes, bespoke dining experiences, locally-infused elements and an unparalleled view of the Gulf of Thailand.accorhotels.com

name: Silavadee Pool Spa Resort
description: Set upon a hill in Koh Samui, Silavadee Pool Spa Resort enjoys a private beach and an outdoor infinity pool. Aside from free WiFi, it also has a free DVD library. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, Silavadee Resort offers free shuttle services to Lamai and Chaweng. Samui Airport is about 9 km from the resort. Spacious and decked with luxurious teak wood furnishings, the Thai-style rooms feature modern amenities like a flat-screen TV, iPod dock and minibar. En suite bathrooms are equipped with bathtubs and hairdryers. The peaceful Silavadee Wellness Spa has a relaxing menu of massage treatments and beauty therapies. The resort also arranges a business centre and laundry services. Fresh seafood, traditional Thai and international dishes are served at The Height Restaurant, which has open-air seating overlooking stunning views of the Gulf of Thailand. The pool has a bar offering cocktails and fruit juices.The Moon Restaurant provides all guests with all day dining, serving varieties of International and Mediterranean dinner a la carte.

name: Samui Resotel Beach Resort
description: Sitting on the white sands of Chaweng Beach, the breathtaking Samui Resotel Beach Resort offers beautiful accommodation with ocean or tropical garden views. It is a 15-minute drive from the airport. Soak up the sun on your private terrace complete with daybeds, or relax with a DVD on the flat-screen TV. All rooms and villas at Samui Resotel are equipped with a tea/coffee machine and high-speed internet access. Lazy afternoons by the pool and indulgent massages await guests at Samui Resotel. There is also a well-equipped gym and a dive centre. Capriccio Restaurant offers authentic Italian and Thai dishes, and a great selection of wines. Samui Resotel Beach Resort also has 3 bars where guests can enjoy refreshing beverages. Room service is available. The resort offers car rental facilities, as well as, a tour desk which organises day trips and island exploration excursions. The Thai Boxing Stadium is about 1.2 km from the hotel.

name: Santiburi Koh Samui
address: 12/12 Moo 1 Mae Nam Beach, Koh Samui 84330
description: Santiburi Koh Samui is located along beautiful Mae Nam Beach in Koh Samui. Featuring luxurious villas and suites, it offers a tropical outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Surrounded by greenery, the spacious accommodations at Resort Santiburi Beach feature polished wooden floors and traditional Thai furnishings. In-room entertainment is provided with the flat-screen cable/satellite TV and DVD player. Guests can relax in the hot tub or indulge in a pampering massage at the spa. An 18-hole championship golf course is just a 5-minute drive from Santiburi. For a good workout, water sports facilities are also available. Regarding "Authentic Thai dishes and Mediterranean food can be enjoyed under the stars at The Beach House. Refreshing evening drinks are served at the cozy Lounge." The Thai Food would be served at the Sala Thai. Description of that as below Indulge in true Thai flavours with innovative presentation. Take your seat for a fine-dining experience as authentic Thai cuisine is served with flair in a tropical garden setting. Ancient recipes, passed down through generations are reimagined with contemporary techniques and infused with creative influences from global gastronomy. Spectacular set menus take diners on a journey of exquisite flavours and unique creations are available a la carte. Our expert team will be delighted to welcome you at Sala Thai. Santiburi Koh Samui is about 8 km from Samui Airport.

name: First Residence Hotel
description: Just 150 metres from Chaweng Beach, First Residence Hotel provides affordable accommodation, great for those travelling on a budget. First Residence Hotel is located 1.5 km from Chaweng Centre with its variety of shops, eateries and entertainment offered. Rooms are simply furnished and feature a balcony overlooking the swimming pool or beach. They are also equipped with air conditioning, cable television and en-suite bathroom. 24-hour room service is also provided. Soak up the sun while lounging around the pool or pamper yourself with a massage. Other facilities at First Residence include an internet corner, tour desk and restaurant.

name: Samui Mekkala Resort
description: Samui Makkala Resort & Pool Villa offers comfortable rooms. It is located within a 5-minute walk from Choengmon Beach. The apartment features an outdoor swimming pool. Free WiFi is provided. Fisherman Village is a 15-minute drive from the property. Samui Makkala Resort & Pool Villa is a 10-minute drive from the Big Buddha Temple. Each room comes with an air conditioning, a refrigerator and an en suite bathroom. A private balcony is featured in the room. The property has a tour desk to provide guests with information of nearby attractions. Guests can relax at the garden area. Chor Chang Restaurant offers authentic Thai and Western cuisines.

name: Casa De Mar
description: Fronting glittering water of the gulf of Thailand, Casa De Mar offers an outdoor pool and a restaurant. This modern resort is just a few steps from the sandy beach of Chaweng, 1.5 km from Ark Bar and 2 km from Samui Airport. Guests can enjoy free WiFi throughout the stay. Offering a choice of private villa to cosy rooms, all units are fully air-conditioned and comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a safety deposit box. Some rooms boast outdoor furniture and a coffee machine. Two bottles of drinking water is provide, daily. A shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries are standard in all en suite bathrooms. Tasty local and international cuisines are served at The Journey Terrace. A breakfast buffet is served daily from 07:00 – 10:30 hrs. Guest can enjoy special drinks or mingle with the other guests at the bar. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk of the property. For guests’ convenience, Casa De Mar provides luggage storage, car hiring and laundry service. Guests can enjoy themselves at the luscious garden or at the sun terrace. Within a short drive from the accommodation, guests can find KC Beach Club Chaweng (2.5 km), Chaweng Walking Street (2.8 km) and Big Buddha (3.7 km). For ferry, Bangrak Pier is located 3.5 km from the property; whilst Bo Phut Pier can be reached under 5 km.

name: Saii Koh Samui Choengmon
description: Located on its very own beach at Hanuman Bay, SAii Koh Samui Choengmon provides a luxurious tropical getaway. An outdoor pool, yoga classes, and free WiFi are provided. All accommodation comes with a private pool. Fitted with high ceilings and antique furnishings, the chic air-conditioned villas and suites have a flat-screen TV. High-quality cotton bedsheets, and spa toiletries are included. The en-suite bathroom has either a shower or bathtub. SAii Koh Samui Choengmon is a 7-minute drive from Samui International Airport and Chaweng Beach. Cheong Mon Beach is a 4-minute ride away. Free parking service are available. Airport transfers can be arranged at an extra charge. Guests can exercise at the fitness room, shop at the stylish Galleria boutique, or lounge at the book and music library. There are also relaxing body massages the spa. Water-front international dining is available at Miss Olive Oyl Restaurant. Drinks can be enjoyed at The Wet Bar.

name: Sala Samui Choengmon Beach
address: 10/9 Moo 5, Baan Plai Lam, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located along Koh Samui's Choeng Mon Beach, SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort offers modern facilities complemented by traditional Thai architecture. It boasts an 80-metre private beach and 2 beachfront pools. SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort is a 10-minute drive from both Samui Airport, Fisherman's Village and Chaweng Centre. Rooms come with private balconies or terraces and outdoor bathrooms. Amenities include cable TV, a DVD player and tea/coffee making facilities. Some villas feature a private pool with a sundeck. Guests can enjoy a massage in one of the spa pavilions, or exercise in the fitness centre. SALA Samui Resort also has a tour and activities desk, a library area and a business centre. Both SALA Samui Restaurant and Pangaea Restaurant & Bar serve Thai and international dishes. The beach bar offers indoor, outdoor and beach seating. In-villa dining is also available.

name: Kc Beach Club & Pool Villas
description: KC Beach Club & Pool Villas is situated on Koh Samui, and offers 4-star facilities, including an infinity pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a kids pool and valet parking. The hotel has 42 rooms and has been recently refurbished. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can help with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a spa bath and a private balcony. Each have a sitting area and a range of entertainment options, such as a flat-screen TV. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. Breakfast is available every day and room service can be enjoyed. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants are also available in the area. KC Beach Club & Pool Villas is a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport, and sightseers can easily reach Lamai Beach by car. Bo Phut and Maret are situated an easy drive from the property.Revato

name: Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Four Seasons Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus is situated on the island’s northwestern tip, a quiet oasis on Laem Yai Bay. Windsurfing, golf and a spa are featured. Each room is fitted with a private infinity pool, private bar and iPod dock. Guests can enjoy views of the gardens or Gulf of Siam on the outdoor day bed. The bathroom’s glass doors open onto the private deck for an al fresco bathing experience. Chilled towels are offered at Koh Samui Four Seasons’ beachside infinity pool. Guests can recharge with a game of tennis, a variety of beach sports or a workout at the fitness centre. A large book and DVD library is provided. The hotel’s SIAMSEAS cruising boat offers access to Marine National Park and a variety of other locations. The resort is about a 30-minute drive from both Big Buddha and Koh Samui International Airport. The Four Seasons’ restaurant serves fresh local seafood seasoned with exotic herbs from nearby gardens. Both Thai and International cuisine are offered. The Beach Bar serves a variety of tropical cocktails.

name: Six Senses Samui
address: 9/10 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: On the northern tip of Samui Island, the luxurious Six Senses Samui enjoys panoramic views of the Gulf of Siam. Boasting a beautiful infinity pool, it has a spa and private beach. Air-conditioned villas feature large open spaces and wooden flooring which give rooms a bright and airy feel. Fitted with a cable/satellite TV, villas also come with free internet and large daybeds. Six Senses Samui is a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. It is around 800 metres from Bo Phut Pier and Fisherman's Village. The elegant Six Senses Spa provides relaxing massage therapies and yoga classes. The hotel's tour desk can help organise jungle treks, island boat trips and diving excursions. Dining on the Rocks offers a farm-to-table cuisine with stunning ocean views. Dining on the Hill features authentic Thai dishes and fresh barbecued seafood.

name: Coco Palm Beach Resort
description: Our swimming pool will be closed from 16th-31st October 2023 due to renovations. During this period you still enjoy our beach activities. Set on peaceful Maenam Beach, Coco Palm Beach Resort boasts beautifully landscaped grounds away from Samui’s bustle. Offering free WiFi and parking, it boasts a beachfront outdoor pool and beachside restaurant. Coco Palm Beach Resort is about 10 km from Samui Airport and Nathorn Pier. It is 5 km from lively Bophut and is a 1-minute walk from Lomprayah Pier. Featuring Thai-style designs and wood furnishings, air-conditioned bungalows are set amidst tropical greenery. They come with satellite TV, heated showers and bathrobes. Leisure afternoons can be spent with a Thai massage or relaxing stroll in gardens. Added conveniences include a business centre, tour desk and water sports facilities. A delicious selection of Thai, Asian and international dishes can be enjoyed at Palm Terrace Restaurant while Thai Lantern offers panoramic views of the gulf. A poolside bar serves refreshing cocktails.

name: Conrad Koh Samui
address: 49/8-9 Moo 4, Hillcrest Road, Amphur Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: Experience complete luxury at this stylish resort in your own villa with infinity-edge pool. Conrad Koh Samui is situated on the south-western tip of the island, overlooking the azure reefs of the Gulf of Thailand from its unique position on a scenic hillside. Set only a few steps from an idyllic white-sand beach, the resort features stunning sunset views. Ride in one of a variety of our luxury limousines from Koh Samui airport, only 45 minutes from the resort, and to destinations throughout the island. The resort's secluded location is home to 65 free-standing one bedroom villas overlooking the pristine Aow Thai beach and sprawling across 25 acres of dramatic hillside. All villas have private terraces and a minimum 10m infinity-edge pool. This incredible resort boasts unobstructed ocean views and a range of sumptuous amenities and modern conveniences guaranteed to please the most discerning travellers. Two and three bedroom luxury pool villas are also available at the exclusive residential wing, Conrad Koh Samui Residences. Plan an unforgettable celebration or design the wedding of your dreams at the exclusive Conrad Koh Samui. Hold the ceremony on the powder white sands of the beach as the sun sets over the iconic five islands or celebrate with an evening gala dinner in the resort's function room. Enjoy a variety of on-site recreation activities and water sports during your stay. Energize in the contemporary 24-hour Fitness Centre and practice yoga outdoors on the sun-soaked, wooden deck. Experience Thailand's legendary snorkelling and incredible views of the coast at our on-site diving and sailing booking centre, sunbathe on the resort's beach or the sea terrace, or in an over-water hammock. Soothe mind and spirit with a relaxing holistic beauty treatment in our opulent spa.Hilton

name: Aloha Resort
description: LOCATION Discover the endless possibilities to exhilarate your senses and creating memories to last a lifetime. Aloha Resort is located directly on the beach and within 500 m of plenty of shopping opportunities and nightclubs. Links to the public transport network lie about 2 km away. Koh Samui airport is approximately 22 km away. ROOMS All elegantly appointed rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. A minibar is also available. Features include a fridge and tea and coffee making equipment. A telephone, a TV and wireless internet access are provided as standard. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer.
