RESTAURANT Gather with your friends and family in the romantic evening setting restaurant. Enjoy local and European cuisine at Aloha Resort's 2 restaurants. AMENITIES Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Amenities include a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a café and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A TV room is also among the amenities at the hotel. Parking facilities available to guests include a garage and a car park. Additional services include room service and a laundry. The hotel offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols on the sun terrace offer a great way to relax. The hot tub offers revitalization. Various refreshing drinks are available from the poolside bar. Leisure options at the hotel also include golf, pool/billiards, a spa, a sauna, a steam bath and massage treatments.WebBeds

name: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort
description: Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort is set on Koh Samui, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as an infinity pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Anantara Spa and Chang Noi Kids' Club. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Couples on a romantic getaway will adore the hotel's features like valet parking and massage services. Rooms at Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort feature a complimentary fruit bowl and a rain shower. All are air conditioned and offer a private balcony, a marble bathroom and a private terrace. The en suite bathrooms provide slippers, bathrobes and luxury toiletries. Guests of Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort are welcome to experience international cuisine at Tree Tops Signature Dining, or try Asian and international meals at OceanKiss. Guests can enjoy scenic countryside walks or make use of Anantara Lawana Koh Samui Resort's bicycle rental service to explore the surrounds. For those travelling by car, parking is available and Chaweng is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: Muang Samui Spa Resort
address: 13/1 Moo2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: A relaxing destination in Koh Samui’s east coast, Muang Samui Spa Resort is located by the white sand of Chaweng Beach. It features an outdoor pool and a beachfront restaurant. Decorated with traditional Thai furnishings, each room at Muang Samui Spa has cable TV, a DVD player, and tea/coffee making facilities. A work desk and a safety deposit box are provided. Private bathrooms feature a spa bath and separate rain shower facilities. Guests can visit Rai-Ra Spa for a massage or aromatherapy treatment, or exercise at the fitness room. Muang Samui provides tour arrangements and car rental. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. Lare Lae Restaurant and Bar serves a variety of international specialities, including Thai and Italian choices. Located across the road, Samui Seafood Grill and Restaurant offers seafood and Italian dishes in a fine dining setting. The Muang Samui Spa Resort is only a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. It is 25 km away from Nathon City and its ferry pier.

name: Khwan Beach Resort
description: Khwan Beach Resort is set on Koh Samui and provides 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi. Just a short stroll from Mae Nam Pier, it offers comfortable rooms equipped with a refrigerator, a mini bar and an in-room dining area. The hotel provides a garden to relax in, as well as free private parking on site. Airport transfers and a laundry service are available upon enquiry. Khwan Beach Resort provides 9 air conditioned rooms. Each have their very own seating area and a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. Guests staying at Khwan Beach Resort can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. For those spending the day out, the hotel offers packed lunches if required. Khwan Beach Resort is within walking distance of Maenam Beach. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Mae Nam.Revato

name: The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach
description: Located in Lamai, a few steps from Lamai Beach, The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. This 5-star resort offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the resort each room has air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace and others also offer sea views. At The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and Asian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Seafood, Sushi and Thai cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Silver Beach is 1.2 km from The Spa Resorts - Lamai Beach, while Coral Cove Beach is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 10 km from the resort.

name: Rummana Boutique Resort
description: Located along the the southern-end of Lamai Beach, Rummana Boutique Resort - SHA Plus features rooms surrounded by tropical gardens. An indulgent massage or a refreshing swim awaits guests at the spa and outdoor pool. Free WiFi is provided. The property is a short 5-minute walk to the famous Grandfather and Grandmother Rocks. Just 1 km away is Lamai Shopping Town. Rummana Boutique Resort - SHA Plus is 18 km from Samui Airport. All air-conditioned rooms at Rummana feature a patio with garden views. Rooms are equipped with a minibar and tea/coffee maker for guests’ convenience. Safety deposit boxes and an electric kettle are available. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower, bathtub and free toiletries. The resort offers sunbeds with umbrellas by the pool and on the beach during low tide. Tour, car and motorbike rental services are available. There is also free parking and luggage storage. Guests can enjoy happy hour drinks at Green Bar and international dishes at the Horapa Restaurant.

name: The Library
description: The Library is set on Koh Samui and provides 5-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre with yoga classes and a swimming pool. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Guests can try out the recreational activities available, such as an outdoor pool and a BBQ/picnic area. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. There are 46 rooms at Library Hotel Koh Samui, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Guests of Library Hotel Samui are invited to experience Thai, international and seafood cuisine at The Page, or try Thai and international dishes at The Drink Gallery. A wide choice of eating options can also be found in the area. Library Ko Samui is within walking distance of Chaweng Beach. Bo Phut and Maret are also a short drive away.Revato

name: Sheraton Samui Resort
address: 86 Moo 3 Chaweng Noi Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Find premium beachfront accommodations at Sheraton Samui Resort. Our hotel in Koh Samui offers a stylish blend of modern and Mediterranean décor in every room. Take in stunning views from your spacious in-room balcony overlooking our tropical Garden Pool and Beachfront Pool, just steps from sparkling turquoise waters. Our beach resort delivers a one-of-a-kind Star Kids Club for families with young children, and our partnership with the Koh Samui Blue Swimmer Crab Bank offers guests a hands-on opportunity to learn about seafood sustainability. We are 15 minutes away from Samui International Airport and a short ride to well-known Koh Samui attractions. Savor authentic Thailand cuisine and signature alfresco dining at our hotel restaurants. Other resort amenities include a Balinese-inspired Glow Spa, mindfulness beach yoga and the 24/7 Sheraton Fitness and outdoor tennis court, perfect for an energizing workout before exploring Koh Samui. Sheraton Samui Resort welcomes you to the timeless serenity of Thailand.Marriott

name: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort
description: Chaweng Regent Beach Resort is situated on Koh Samui and offers 4-star accommodation as well as free Wi-Fi. Popular facilities, such as a sauna and a swimming pool, make for a satisfying stay in Chaweng. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The hotel also has its very own gym, Swimming Pool. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a shower, a mini bar and cable/satellite channels. All offer slippers, an in-room safe and a DVD player. Chaweng boasts convenient dining options, such as international, Asian and Thai dishes at Chom Talay and Thai, Mediterranean and European food at Red Snapper. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants can also be found in close proximity to the property. Conveniently situated, Chaweng Regent is a short drive from Samui International Airport and Chaweng Noi Beach. It also is a convenient base to discover Bo Phut and Maret.Revato

name: Tango Luxe Beach Villa Samui
address: 79/100 Moo 5 T. Bopud A., Koh Samui 84320
description: Tango Luxe Beach Villa, Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus offers tropical villas with a private pool. It has a main infinity pool and two on-site restaurants with the most romantic sunset view on Koh Samui. Luxurious private villas are well-furnished, with air-conditioned, well-stocked mini-bar, electric kettle and outdoor seating area on a private balcony or terrace, flat-screen Smart TV (Netflix, Youtube, Amazon Prime), iPod dock, wooden flooring and sun loungers. Spacious en suite bathroom has a separate bathtub and shower stall. Tango Luxe Beach Villa, Koh Samui located on peaceful coast of Cheongmon area with 5-minute drive from Samui International Airport, and 10 minutes drive to Fisherman's Village and Chaweng Center The two on-site restaurants, Qi Oriental Cuisine and Sea La Vie Bar and Bistro, serve Thai authentic cuisine and selection of seafood. Sea La Vie Bar and Bistro also offering exceptional cocktails. Variety of breakfast will be served in the villas for guests' comfort. Cielo Spa provides a variety of treatments, including aromatherapy, hydrotherapy and Thai massages. The spa is equipped with a sauna, a spa bath and a steam room. Hotel offers concierge services and laundry services. Free parking bicycle and kayak are also available free of charge.

name: Ban Kinaree
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and ovens. Rooms have private patios. 20-inch Smart televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Property Location With a stay at Ban Kinaree in Koh Samui (Bophut Hills), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Chaweng Beach and Bo Phut Beach. This 4-star hotel is 8.5 mi (13.7 km) from Lamai Beach and 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Fisherman's Village Plaza. Dining Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for continental breakfast: USD 10 per person (approximately) Rollaway bed fee: USD 60.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 10:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher and a first aid kit Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property There is no front desk at this property. To make arrangements for check-in please contact the property at least 24 hours before arrival using the information on the booking confirmation. Guests must contact the property for check-in instructions. At check-in, guests must provide a negative COVID-19 test result. Guests providing a negative COVID-19 test result must have been tested no more than 72 hours prior to check-in. Guests may be subject to health screenings for COVID-19 at the property. Customers may be requested by the property to provide documentation of recent travel history (such as showing passport immigration stamps) and/or complete a health declaration. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions Cash deposit required Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safety and Health Administration (Thailand) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Individually-wrapped food options are available for lunch Individually-wrapped food options are available for dinner Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Cashless transactions are available Masks are compulsory at the property Reservation might be required for some facilities onsite Food service has been amended for enhanced safety Guests must provide health documentation Guests must provide a negative COVID-19 test result Negative COVID-19 test result must have been issued within a specific period before check-in: 72 hoursViajes Exito Hotels

name: Chaweng Cove Beach Resort
description: Chaweng Cove Beach Resort offers several accommodation types along Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool, a beachfront restaurant and a beach bar overlooking the ocean. Free W-Fi is available throughout. Chaweng Cove Beach Resort is around 20 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. It is a 15-minute walk from Chaweng’s town centre. Featuring wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. A minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are provided. Some rooms have a private balcony with sitting area. Guests can relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Samui Wellness Spa offers massages, facials and body treatments. The resort has a small fitness room, a tour desk, and a library area. Fresh seafood, Thai and international dishes are served at the restaurant. Cocktails and traditional Thai refreshments are available at Sea Almond Beach Bar.

name: Pause on Samui Residences
description: Set in Bophut in the Koh Samui region, with Bophut Beach and Bang Rak Beach nearby, Pause on Samui Residences offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The accommodation is air conditioned and has a sauna. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The holiday home offers a children's playground. A kids pool is also available at Pause on Samui Residences, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Fisherman Village is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Big Buddha is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 3 km from Pause on Samui Residences, and the property offers a free airport shuttle service.

name: Sareeraya Villas & Suites
address: 100/1 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach Rd., Koh Samui 84320
description: Sareeraya Villas & Suites - SHA Extra Plus is located on the quiet northern end of Chaweng Beach, less than 2 km from Samui Airport. The hotel offers free internet and 3 swimming pools. The Sareeraya Villas & Suites - SHA Extra Plus is a short walk from the main stretch of shops, restaurants and bars on Chaweng Beach. It is about 5 km from Fisherman’s Village. Decorated in a modern Oriental style, the suites and villas at Sareeraya feature flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Some rooms come with an outdoor spa pool while some have a private plunge pool. Guests can enjoy relaxing massage services at Raya Spa or by the pool. The hotel has a fitness centre, a library, and a transit lounge. Buffet breakfast is served at Chef’s Table restaurant, which also offers local, international and fresh seafood dishes. Cocktails and refreshing drinks are available at the hotel’s 2 bars.

name: Escape Beach Resort
description: Located in Mae Nam on Koh Samui, Escape Beach Resort boasts a beachfront location and has an outdoor pool the overlooks the sea and complimentary WiFi access in all area. Offering a choice of bungalows to cosy guestrooms in the main building, all rooms are air-conditioned and comes with views of the sea or garden. The private bathroom is fitted with a hand/rain shower and complimentary toiletries. Other amenities include a flat-screen TV, a fridge and a safety deposit box. Activities including sunset tours, island day trips and fishing can all be arranged for an additional charge. Other services such as motorbike/car hire & transportation are all available. Complete the day after a long day out with a traditional Thai massage and relaxing treatments, which can be booked at the front desk. Open from 07:00 - 22:00 hrs, Castaway Restaurant & Bar offers a wide selected of Thai and international dishes. Guests can sit back by the pool while enjoying refreshing drinks and cocktails from the bar. It is 30 metres to Mae Nam Beach. Samui Airport is 8 km from the resort. Guests can visit nearby attractions in Bophut including the Fisher Man Village (2 km) and Wat Phra Yai (7 km).

name: Ploen Chaweng Koh Samui
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Chaweng, Ploen Chaweng Koh Samui Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop are just some of the facilities on offer. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, additional toilet, children's high chair, cleaning products, clothes rack. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa, massage, pool (kids). Ploen Chaweng Koh Samui Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Samui or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Peace Resort Samui
description: Situated on Bo Phut Beach, Peace Resort offers 1 outdoor pool and an outdoor restaurant. Its spacious bungalows feature a private terrace with sea or garden views. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Equipped with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV, bungalows at Peace also come with a tea/coffee maker and a minibar. Private bathrooms feature a spacious layout and include a hairdryer. The Sea Wrap Restaurant serves International and Thai dishes, with the option of dining outdoors right on the beach. Guests may also enjoy a refreshing drink at the pool bar. Room service is provided. Guests can take a dip in the spa pool or have a quiet read in the resort’s library. Day trips can be arranged at the tour desk, which also assists with car rentals. Peace Resort is a 7 minutes walk from Walking Street at Bophut's Fisherman's Village. It is within a 14-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport. For added convenience airport transfers can be arranged for an additional charge.

name: Anavana Beach Resort
description: Anavana Beach Resort offers a tropical boutique retreat along southern Chaweng Beach on Koh Samui. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, it boasts an outdoor pool and Thai-style cottages with free Wi-Fi. Set within landscaped gardens, cottages at Anavana Beach Resort feature private terraces and stylish open-air bathrooms. Equipped with both air conditioning and a ceiling fan, each room has a flat-screen cable TV and a DVD player. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at the spa or borrow a complimentary movie at the hotel’s library. Anavana Beach Resort also provides a gift shop and a helpful tour desk. Anavana restaurant serves fine Thai cuisine and a vegetarian menu. Beautiful pool and sea views can be enjoyed throughout the entire meal. Anavana Beach Resort is a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Krisada Beach Resort
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished lanais. Flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include desks and microwaves, and housekeeping is provided once per stay. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Property Location When you stay at Krisada Beach Resort in Koh Samui, you'll be on the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Nathon Pier and Bo Phut Beach. This beach hotel is 9.8 mi (15.7 km) from Chaweng Beach and 6.1 mi (9.9 km) from Fisherman's Village Plaza. Dining Breakfast is available for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Cash deposit: THB 500.00 per day We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-In Checkin starts at 12:30 PM Checkin end at 11:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts cash The front desk is open daily from 7 AM - 9 PM. If you are planning to arrive after 9 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals not allowed General instructions Cash deposit requiredViajes Exito Hotels

name: Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel
description: Set in Lamai, 90 metres from Lamai Beach, Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus features some units with pool views, and every room comes with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. At Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus you will find a restaurant serving American, Dutch and British cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Rocky's Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 14 km from Aura Samui Best Beach Hotel - SHA Plus.

name: Nora Beach Resort and Spa
address: 222 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Nora Beach Resort and Spa is set on Koh Samui and offers 4-star accommodation as well as a ski school and free Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre with fitness classes, a saltwater swimming pool and a garden terrace. Guests of Nora Beach Koh Samui can enjoy a variety of relaxation amenities at Anodas Spa, which features a swimming pool and a sauna. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. Nora Beach Resort & Spa features 113 air conditioned rooms. A refrigerator, an in-room safe and bottled water are also included. Serving international, Thai and seafood dishes, Nora Beach Resort & Spa Koh Samui's contemporary brasserie provides a convenient dining option for those who wish dine on site. Room service is also available during certain times. For those who enjoy exploring local restaurants and cafés, there is a wide range within walking distance. For guests travelling by car, parking is available on site and Chaweng is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: MM Hill Hotel
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, MM Hill Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, printer, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as closet, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Access to the hotel's hot tub, outdoor pool will further enhance your satisfying stay. MM Hill Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Samui or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Marina Beach Resort
address: 124/169 M.3, T. Maret Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Conveniently situated along Lamai Beach, Marina Beach Resort - SHA Plus offers spacious rooms that open out to private balconies. It features a restaurant with Thai/Western menus, a beachfront bar and massage services. Resort Marina Beach Lamai is a 10-minute drive from the popular Grandfather and Grandmother rocks. It is 30 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport and provides free parking. Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with classic wood furnishings, satellite TV and a fridge. Heated showers and a safe are also available. Guests can explore the sights of Samui with help from the tour desk. Staff can also provide laundry and car and motorbike rental services.

name: Alpha Gay Resort & Spa - Men Only
description: Eden Beach Resort in Chaweng provides exclusively adult gay-men-only accommodation with barbecue facilities, a terrace and a shared lounge. Featuring a business centre, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor 24-hour pool. Guests can make use of a bar. The units at the resort come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath or shower. Eden Beach Resort offers some rooms that include a terrace, and all rooms are fitted with a kettle. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. KC Beach Club Chaweng is 1.2 km from the accommodation, while Solo Bar is 800 metres away. The nearest airport is Samui Airport, 2 km from the property.

name: Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi
address: 91/2-3 Moo 3, Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi is set on Koh Samui and offers 4-star facilities as well as free Wi-Fi. The multiple amenities this relaxed resort features include an outdoor heated pool, 24-hour room service and a kids pool. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa and wellness centre, Swasana Spa. It also offers babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that is available around the clock. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private bathroom. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, bottled water and a flat-screen TV. Impiana Resort Chaweng Noi's traditional bar is an ideal spot to unwind with a beverage after dinner. Lunch and dinner are served daily at Sabai Restaurant. There is also a selection of drinks to enjoy at the bar, which offers a view of the beach. Within a 20-minute drive of Chaweng Beach, Wat Phra Yai and Samui International Airport, the resort offers an airport shuttle transfer for its guests. It is also a short car ride from Bo Phut and Maret.Revato

name: Royal Muang Samui Villas
description: Located on the white sands and clear waters of Choengmon Beach, Royal Muang Samui Villas offers rooms, villas and pool villas with free WiFi. This beachfront property also features an outdoor pool and 24-hour front desk. Suites and pool villas feature an LCD television, CD and DVD player and en-suite bathroom with a large spa bathtub. Room service is provided. Guests can experience aromatherapy and a variety of treatments at Cave Rai Ra Beach Spa. Other facilities include a fitness centre and a tour desk. Samui Sailor Bar & Grill serve Thai and Italian favourites with fresh seafood. Guests can enjoy wines and cocktails at Spice Beach Restaurant. Royal Muang Samui Villas is a 10-minute drive from Chaweng's shopping and nightlife area. Bophut, Big Buddha Beach and Maenam are nearby, while Samui Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Phangka Paradise Resort
address: 62/4 Moo4, Phangka Beach, Thaling Ngam, Koh Samui 84140
description: Located on Phangka Beach, Phangka Paradise Resort offers cosy accommodation with the convenience of an on-site restaurant and room service. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the resort. Raja Pier and Lamai Beach are a 15-minute drive from Phangka Paradise Resort, while Nathon Pier is a 20-minute ride away. Chaweng Beach is a 35-minute ride away and Samui Airport can be reached within a 45-minute drive from the resort. Air-conditioned villas at the resort offer a satellite TV, a fridge and a private balcony. En suite bathrooms are fitted with shower facilities. Guests can relax with leisure activities at the garden or with pampering massage treatments. Karaoke facilities are available as well. Staff at the tour desk can help guests with sightseeing arrangements. Chomview Restaurant offers Thai and Western dishes as well as a selection of fresh seafood. A variety of drinks can be enjoyed at the bar.

name: Unique Boutique Resort
description: Set in Bangrak Beach, less than 1 km from Plai Laem Beach, UniQue BoutiQue Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Offering a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a sauna. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. UniQue BoutiQue Resort features certain units with sea views, and every room comes with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes Italian, American and Asian options. Choeng Mon Beach is 2.7 km from UniQue BoutiQue Resort, while Big Buddha is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 2 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Baan Boom Boxes Eco Friendly Resort
address: 28/45 Maenam Soi 1, Taveeratpakdee Road, Koh Samui 84330
description: Set in Mae Nam, 2.7 km from Mae Nam Beach, Baan Boom Boxes Eco Friendly Resort offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a terrace. The property is situated 5.3 km from Fisherman Village, 10 km from Big Buddha and 15 km from Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks. The air-conditioned rooms provide a mountain view and come with a desk and free WiFi. All guest rooms at the resort come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. Baan Boom Boxes Eco Friendly Resort features some units with pool views, and all rooms include a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Baan Boom Boxes Eco Friendly Resort offers an outdoor pool. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the resort. Santiburi Beach Resort, Golf and Spa is 3.3 km from Baan Boom Boxes Eco Friendly Resort, while Santiburi Samui Country Club is 6.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 9 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Zara Beach Resort Koh Samui - Sha Extra Plus Certified
description: Set in a secluded beachfront location along the southeast coast of Koh Samui, Zara Beach Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus Certified offers luxurious accommodation surrounded by nature. The villas are surrounded by gardens and have a private decking area. All of the living areas include a flat screen satellite TV and a large sofa. Each villa also includes a minibar and tea and coffee making facilities. With it's beachfront location, it offers direct beach access where guests can enjoy romantic walks on the sand while taking in views of the Gulf of Thailand. Zara Beach Resort Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus Certified is a 20 minutes’ drive away from Koh Samui International Airport.

name: Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui
address: 84 Moo 5 Bophut Tongsai Road,Ko Samui (Suratthani), Koh Samui 84320
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui offers luxurious seaside accommodation and a 200-metre private beach. A spa and 2 outdoor pools aside, it also has 3 restaurants and free Wi-Fi. Elegantly decorated with wooden furnishings, the air-conditioned rooms at Tongsai Bay feature cable TV and minibar. Each has an ocean-view terrace with sun loungers, and some terraces come with an outdoor bathtub. Garrya Tongsai Bay Samui is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 15-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach. The hotel provides airport shuttle service at an additional charge. Guests who are driving can enjoy free parking privileges. 8LEMENTS Spa features a relaxing menu of herbal baths and massage treatments. For a refreshing workout, guests may exercise at the gym or play a game of tennis. The resort also provides on-site water sport facilities for guests' enjoyment. Guests can enjoy meals at Rhoy Rhoy! restaurant, Fish Tales restaurant, EVOL restaurant and at the Po Lad Beach Bar and Bistro. There is also a themed restaurant which is open during high season. Drinking water is provided all-day.

name: Lub D Koh Samui Chaweng Beach
description: Situated in Chaweng, Lub d Koh Samui Chaweng Beach is within easy driving distance of Bo Phut and provides a swimming pool. Some of the features on offer at this 3-star hostel include free on-site parking and Wi-Fi. Lub d Koh Samui Chaweng Beach provides luggage storage, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Guests are also welcome to take a stroll around the hostel's garden. Lub d Koh Samui Chaweng Beach features 124 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. In-house dining options include Beachfront Restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at the hostel, there are a selection of eateries located close by. The staff at the tour desk are available to book tours and sightseeing trips in Chaweng.Revato

name: Chaweng Villawee
address: 174 Moo 2, Tambon Bophut, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located in Chaweng, a 4-minute walk from Ark Bar Samui, Chaweng Villawee Hotel boasts a garden and shared lounge. Among the various facilities of this property are a bar and a restaurant. At the hotel each room comes with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms also offer a balcony. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Chaweng Villawee Hotel offers a sun terrace. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. KC Beach Club Chaweng is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Solo Bar is 100 metres away. The nearest airport is Samui Airport, 2 km from the property.

name: Varinda Garden Resort
description: Situated on a hill overlooking Lamai Bay, Varinda Resort is just 5 minutes’ walk from Lamai Beach. Boasting abundant greenery and colourful interiors, it features an outdoor infinity pool. Free internet access is provided in the lobby area. Individually designed, Varinda Garden’s rooms combine bright colours and Thai furnishings. Amenities include a TV and safety deposit box. Each room has a private veranda and attached bathroom. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, or play a game of billiards. Other facilities include an open-air fitness area, a mini library, and a karaoke room. The resort provides tour arrangements and motorbike rental. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Thai and international dishes are served at Ruan Mai Restaurant. Offering a rustic and relaxing atmosphere, the restaurant is decorated with hand-crafted wooden furniture. Varinda Resort is 15.3 km away from Samui Airport.

name: Samui Mermaid Resort Garden Side
description: When you stay at Samui Mermaid Resort Garden Side in Koh Samui, you'll be on the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Bo Phut Beach and Choeng Mon Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Mantra Samui Resort
description: Located on the hillside and boasting stunning views of Bo Phut Bay, Mantra Samui Resort offers luxurious boutique accommodation. Offering free WiFi, it also has an 24-metre outdoor infinity pool and a pampering spa. Spacious rooms feature dark wood furnishings and neutral fabrics. They are fitted with flat-screen cable TVs. Guests have the use of free tea/coffee making amenities and a safe. Mantra Samui Resort is a 5-minute drive to Bo Phut Beach, 10-minute drive from Fisherman's Village and about a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport. The on-site View Restaurant opens daily, serving a wide variety of tasty traditional Thai dishes as well as selected international meals. Other restaurants and dining options can also be found nearby the property. For those looking to exercise, Mantra Samui has a state-of-the-art fitness centre. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide concierge and travel services. A shuttle service to shopping malls is available with an additional charge.

name: The Hive Hotel Samui
description: Boasting an infinity pool facing a 60-m² beachfront,The Hive Hotel sits on the golden sands of Lamai Beach in Koh Samui. It offers rooms set within quiet tropical gardens. Featuring private balconies, The Hive Hotel's rooms have simple interiors with tiled flooring and dark wood furniture. Each room has cable TV, a DVD player, and a safety deposit box. The en suite bathroom provides a hot shower and bath toiletries. Guests can relax on the sun loungers by the pool or on the beach, or take a stroll through the landscaped botanical gardens. The resort offers the convenience of a 24-hour reception and a tour desk, as well as laundry services and currency exchange. The beachfront Restaurant serves Thai and Western dishes in an outdoor setting. It is also connected to the pool terrace, so guests can sip refreshments whilst enjoying the sun. The Hive Hotel is within walking distance of local shops, banks, restaurants and bars.

name: Chaweng Garden Beach Resort
description: Directly situated on Chaweng Beach, this intimate family-run property is a minute’s walk from Chaweng’s nightlife and lively shops. It features buffet breakfast and a beachside restaurant offering evening grills. Featuring spacious interiors, air-conditioned rooms are tastefully furnished with dark wood fittings and local fabrics. They open out to tropical views and boast a bathroom with shower facilities. Chaweng Garden Beach Resort is just a minute's stroll from the restaurant and bars lining Beach Road. It is a 15-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport and provides free parking. Leisurely afternoons can be spent with a massage by the outdoor pool. Other conveniences include water sports facilities, tour desk and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Shaded by palm trees, Sukulaya Restaurant offers fresh seafood grills and international dishes by the seaside.

name: Baan Samui Resort
description: Located on a private area along Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui, Baan Samui Resort offers rooms steps from the beach. The resort features an outdoor pool and offers Thai massages by the beachfront. Baan Samui Resort is a convenient 15-minute drive from Samui Airport. The Thai Boxing Stadium is 500 metres away. Colourful rooms offer a balcony and come with cable TV channels and tea and coffee-making facilities. It features wooden furnishings that complements its tropical surroundings. The resort has a library. A variety of watersports including scuba diving and jet skiing can be enjoyed by the beach. The beachside Moon Dance restaurant offers fresh seafood and international cuisine accompanied by live entertainment.

name: Baan Sawan Samui Resort
description: Situated just 300 metres from Chaweng Noi Beach, Baan Sawan Samui Resort offers a large swimming pool and a garden. With free WiFi access available throughout, it is conveniently located a 5-minute drive from Chaweng's centre and a 10-minute drive from Lamai Beach. Spacious air-conditioned rooms are decorated with Thai touches and provide guests with patio and cable TV. There is also an electric kettle and a minibar. Free toiletries and a shower are in the en suite bathroom. Guests can sample local and international dishes at the on-site restaurant or enjoy drinks at the bar. With pets allowed on request, the property features a tour desk, laundry services and a free daily maid service. Free parking is available. Baan Sawan Samui is 700 metres from the Chaweng Viewpoint and 6 km from Samui Airport. Bo Phut Pier is 7.1 km away.

name: Rattana Guesthouse & Bungalow
description: Rattana Guesthouse is located in Chaweng and offers simple accommodation, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in the entire hotel. It provides a shuttle service to Samui International Airport, situated a 20-minute drive away. Rattana Guesthouse & Bungalow is only a 2-minute walk from Chaweng Beach and a 10-minute drive to Hin Ta Hin Ya (Grandfather and Grandmother Rock). It takes 20 minutes by car from the bungalow to the Big Buddha Temple. Rooms have either a fan or air conditioning, and come equipped with a refrigerator and a TV. All rooms are fitted with a dressing table. The hotel provides car and motorbike rentals for guests’ convenience. It also has a tour desk which organises excursions to nearby attractions. For a quiet afternoon indoors, the guesthouse provides a reading corner. Alternatively, relax in the guesthouse’s tropical garden.

name: Cape Fahn Hotel Samui
description: Situated in Choeng Mon Beach and with Bang Rak Pier reachable within 2.7 km, Cape Fahn Hotel Samui offers a private beach area, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and water sports facilities. Each accommodation at the 5-star resort has pool views, and guests can enjoy access to an outdoor swimming pool. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the restaurant. All guest rooms at the resort come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath. Featuring a terrace, all rooms are fitted with a kettle, air conditioning and a desk. At Cape Fahn Hotel Samui guests are welcome to take advantage of a fitness room. Snorkelling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the resort. For any tips on how to get around or what to do in the area, guests can ask at the reception. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: Bandara Resort and Spa, Samui
description: Steps from peaceful Bophut Beach, Bandara Resort and Spa offers 4-star rooms with free Wi-Fi private balconies overlooking tropical landscapes. It features 4 pools, a fitness centre and free parking. Resort Bandara is a 5-minute walk from Walking Street at Bophut’s Fisherman’s Village. It is within a 15-minute drive from popular Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport. Modern Thai-style rooms at Bandara Resort are spacious and feature an entertainment system. They are fitted with a safe, fridge and ironing facilities. Large bathrooms have a bathtub, hairdryer and toiletries. Guests can lounge by the large outdoor pool or indulge with traditional Thai massages at Bandara Spa. A tour desk helps with trip planning and travel arrangements. Bandara Resort also has a kid club and a gift shop. A range of Asian and European dishes can be enjoyed on the beachfront or in the tropical garden. Chom Dao Restaurant also offers fresh seafood, steaks and barbecued dishes.

name: Baan Chaweng Beach Resort & Spa
address: 90/1 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach Road, Koh Samui
description: Baan Chaweng Beach Resort & Spa is located along Chaweng Beach and a 5-minute walk from Central Festival Samui. This sea-facing resort features an outdoor pool and a spa. Each room at Baan Chaweng comes with a safety deposit box, a minibar, and tea/coffee making facilities. Rooms have attached bathrooms and private balconies offering partial views of the sea. Buffet breakfast is served at the resort. Leelavadee Restaurant serves Thai and international specialities. Diners can have their meal on the terrace and enjoy views of the ocean. The resort provides tour arrangements and car rental. For guests’ convenience, luggage storage and laundry services are also available. Baan Chaweng Beach Resort & Spa is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport and a chargeable airport shuttle is provided. Nathon Town is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Poolsawat Villa
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 24 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Property Location When you stay at POOLSAWAT VILLA - SHA Extra Plus in Koh Samui, you'll be on the beach, a 1-minute drive from Lamai Beach and 7 minutes from Chaweng Beach. This beach villa is 0.7 mi (1.2 km) from Silver Beach and 2.7 mi (4.3 km) from Chaweng Noi Beach. Dining Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar. Breakfast is available for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Rollaway bed fee: THB 400 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: The Jungle Club
description: No description found

name: Bhundhari Chaweng Beach Resort Koh Samui
description: A Simple Pleasure, Bhundhari Chaweng Beach Resort Ko Samui, a local boutique hotel & resort, located on the Southernmost of Chaweng, with a peaceful view of the whole Chaweng Beach, offering opportunity to learn the life of a local fisherman which just in front of the resort. You can choose which style you like as we have 2 styles of accommodation; Seaside Bungalows with Thai Southern design and Deluxe Rooms with Moroccan style. The area is separated into two parts, one is the main deluxe building another is the seaside bungalow, both within a few steps walk. Bhundhari Chaweng is a tidy local village where local environment mixed with multicultural environment.Onda.me

name: Kanok Buri Resort
description: Located along the sands of Lipa Noi, Kanok Buri Resort is within walking distance from Niki Beach Club and offers spacious villas with a spa bath and free Wi-Fi. Kanok Buri's villas are decorated with a blend of western and Thai design. They are fitted with tea/coffee maker and satellite TV. For guests' convenience, there are a hairdryer, a safety deposit box and free toiletries in the room. Guests can have fun with a swim in the pool. Rentals for a car and motorbike as well as a tour desk are available. Kanok Buri Resort, Romantico beachside restaurant offers beautiful sunset views and serves Thai and Western food. Local restaurants can be found within the area along the street. A 45-minute drive brings guests to Chaweng Beach and Samui Airport, it takes a 15-minute drive to Nathon Pier and a 5-minute drive to Lipa Noi Pier.

name: Nora Lakeview Hotel
address: 18 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Conveniently based and featuring free Wi-Fi, this modern hotel is located an easy drive from Bo Phut. It also provides a 24-hour reception, a lift and a garden. Floral Hotel Lakeview Koh Samui has 33 air conditioned rooms. Each provides its very own bathroom with a shower. The area surrounding Floral Hotel Lakeview Koh Samui has a variety of restaurants and cafés. The hotel also provides convenient access to Samui International Airport.Revato

name: Samui Buri Beach Resort
address: 26/24 Moo 4, Mae Nam Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samui Buri Beach Resort is a beachfront resort on Koh Samui’s Maenam Beach. Featuring traditional Thai architecture, it offers an outdoor infinity pool. Free Wi-Fi access is also available throughout. The resort offers villas with private pools, as well as rooms built around the main pool. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. The bathrooms have a shower and a double vanity sink. Samui Buri Beach Resort is a 25-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 20-minute drive from Nathon Pier. The centre of Chaweng Beach is 25 minutes’ drive away. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage at the spa, or exercise in the fitness centre. A kid’s club offers activities for younger guests, while adults can take Thai cooking classes. The resort also has a tour desk and a business centre. International dishes are served at the open-air Seetawaree Restaurant, where meals are prepared with fresh ingredients from the resort gardens. Drinks are available at 3 bars.

name: Nora Buri Resort & Spa
address: 111 Moo 5, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, Nora Buri Resort & Spa puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, are at hand. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, free welcome drink, mirror. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as private beach, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Nora Buri Resort & Spa the perfect choice for your stay in Samui.priceline.com

name: Sandalwood Luxury Villas
description: Overlooking the scenic Gulf of Siam, Sandalwood Resort’s luxurious villas occupy a prime hillside location. Featuring nine private infinity pools and one communal pool with stunning sea views, it has a spa and free WiFi. Boasting private balconies with sweeping views of the coast, Sandalwood villas feature a blend of traditional Thai decor and modern amenities. They come with a spa bath, flat-screen TV and well-equipped kitchenette. Leisurely afternoons can be spent on the loungers at the sundeck. For a pampering experience, Sanctuary Spa offers soothing treatments. Exploring Koh Samui and neighbouring islands is easy with the help of a tour desk. After a long day out, head back to the Sandalwood Resort for a delicious meal at Blue Ginger Restaurant. Enjoy authentic Thai dishes as you take in views of Chaweng Bay. Sandalwood Luxury Villa Resort is about 10 km from Samui International Airport, while it is 26 km from Nathon Pier.

name: Saree Samui
address: 135 Moo 4 Baan Tornsai, Tumbol Mae Nam, Amphur Koh Samui, Surathani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Presenting a blend of traditional Thai and Balinese decor, Saree Samui provides luxurious villas with free Wi-Fi. Its outdoor infinity pool overlooks the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach. Spacious and elegant, all villas are fitted with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests can lounge at the private sundeck, in the comfortable living room, or even by the private pool in some villas. Semi-outdoor bathrooms come with a bathtub and rainshower. Saree Samui is a 20-minute drive from shopping and dining at popular Chaweng Beach. It is a 30-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Saree Rarom Spa provides relaxing herbal steam baths, Thai massage and morning yoga sessions. Staff at the tour desk can help arrange day trips to Angthong Marine National Park, the Crocodile Farm and The Samui Aquarium. Surya Chandra Restaurant serves local and international dishes, with the choice of al fresco beachfront dining. Drinks can be enjoyed by the Beach Bar.

name: Avani+ Samui Resort
address: 53/5 Moo 4, Phang Ka, Taling Ngam, Koh Samui 84140
description: Avani+ Samui Resort is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a private beach. Guests also have exclusive access to the AvaniSpa and AvaniFit. Guests can make the most of the sun on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Free Wi-Fi is also provided. Rooms are air-conditioned and have premium amenities such as a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They feature a desk, a seating area and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include Essence Restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Avani+ Samui Resort is situated next to Pang Ka Bay. The resort also offers complimentary bicycle rental so guests can easily discover the surrounding sights.Revato

name: Silver Beach Resort
description: Offering budget rooms along peaceful Tongtakien Beach, Silver Beach Resort features a restaurant serving local specialities. Offering free parking, it is a convenient 10-minute drive from the Chaweng and Lamai Beaches. Simply furnished rooms at Silver Beach Resort feature a private balcony with outdoor seating. They come with cable TV, fridge and an attached bathroom with heated shower facilities. For leisure, explore Samui with a day trip organised by the tour desk or enjoy a soothing massage by the beach. Stunning beach views accompany a spread of Western and Asian dishes at Silver Beach’s open-air restaurant. Room service is available. Silver Beach Resort is a 30-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Superpro Samui
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 40 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, a television in a common area, and tour/ticket assistance. Property Location With a stay at Superpro Samui in Koh Samui, you'll be a 1-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and 6 minutes from Lamai Beach. This hotel is 0.5 mi (0.9 km) from Chaweng Noi Beach and 3 mi (4.8 km) from Silver Beach. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Joe Restaurant serving guests of Superpro Samui. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Breakfast fee: between THB 50 and THB 250 per person (approximately) Airport shuttle fee: THB 1000 per vehicle (roundtrip) Rollaway bed fee: THB 500 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at 10:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards This property offers transfers from the airport (surcharges may apply). Guests must contact the property with arrival details before travel, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. name: Shasa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui
address: 116/1 Moo 2 Tambon Mared, Laem Set, Koh Samui 84310
description: Nestled in a tropical hillside, this 5-star property boasts 3 beachfront pools and spacious suites overlooking the beautiful Gulf of Thailand. It offers attentive service, hearty buffets and free Wi-Fi. Located away from the crowds of Samui, ShaSa Resort & Residences, Koh Samui - SHA Extra Plus & Residences, Koh Samui offers shuttles to the Chaweng and Lamai beaches. It is 45 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport. Bright and airy, well-designed suites feature modern interiors with fully furnished kitchens. They come with a flat-screen cable TV, laundry facilities and spacious bathrooms with a large bathtub. Guests can take relaxing dips in the hydro-therapy pool or get a Thai massage at the spa. The resort also houses fitness facilities, a library and games room. Beyond The Sea Siamese Brasserie offers a spread of fine Thai and international dishes. It also features an extensive wine list and gourmet coffees.

name: Outrigger Koh Samui Beach Resort
description: Set on the serene shores of Lamai Beach, the newly renovated Outrigger Koh Samui Beach Resort, SHA Plus is an elegant colonial style resort located only 30 minutes from Koh Samui International airport and 20 minutes from the entertainment and shopping district of Chaweng. Featuring 146 spacious rooms and suites, ideal for families, include either a private balcony, Juliette balcony or garden terrace. Our exclusive Voyager 47 club is included for all Suites and Club Garden Rooms with daily non-alcoholic beverages, afternoon snacks, evening canapés and cocktails. With a great selection of restaurants and bars including our all day dining restaurant Mala Kitchen and our beachfront club Edgewater, families can enjoy swimming and dining poolside while couples fall in love with our signature romantic dining packages by the sea. The resort offers an abundance of recreational facilities including beachfront and resort side swimming pools, water sports, fitness center, kids club and activities center.

name: The Flow Samui Beach Resort
description: Located in Koh Samui, a few steps from Mae Nam Beach, The Flow Samui Beach Resort provides accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is around 1.7 km from Bophut Beach, 2.2 km from W Koh Samui Beach and 3.4 km from Fisherman Village. The accommodation features room service and free WiFi. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a fridge, a minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. Every room has a safety deposit box and certain rooms here will provide you with sea views. The rooms in the resort are equipped with a flat-screen TV and slippers. Big Buddha is 8.1 km from The Flow Samui Beach Resort, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: The Sea Koh Samui Resort & Residences by Tolani
description: The Sea Koh Samui is located along the sandy shores of Mae Nam Beach, a 10-minute drive from Nathon. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. The contemporary rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV and a spacious living area. A kitchen area with microwave is provided. Rooms come with an indoor or outdoor hot tub. The Sea Koh Samui is a 20-minute drive from Chaweng Town. Samui Airport is about 11 km away. A fitness centre is available for guests wishing to keep up with their regular work-out. The spa features massage treatments. A tour desk and car rentals are available. Drinks and cocktails are available by the pool. Guests can dine in-room with room service.

name: The Nest Samui
description: No description found

name: Suanmali Samui
description: A 7-minute walk from Lamai Beach, Suanmali Samui features an outdoor pool and a bar. It offers cosy rooms with air conditioning. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available. Suanmali Samui is a 10-minute ride from Grand Father and Grand Mother Rocks. Samui International Airport is a 25-minute ride away. All rooms are air-conditioned and offer a TV. En suite bathrooms are fitted with shower facilities. Guests can take a stroll in the garden to relax. Staff at the tour desk can arrange sightseeing tours for guests. Laundry and room service are also available. The on-site bar serves a fine selection of beverages. Local and international restaurants are available around the resort.

name: P & T Hostel
address: 73/46-47 Moo 4 Bang Rak, Bophut, Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: P & T Hostel features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Bangrak Beach. The property is located 2.4 km from Plai Laem Beach, 2.9 km from Fisherman Village and 16 km from Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks. The accommodation provides karaoke and free WiFi throughout the property. Every room is fitted with air conditioning, and certain units at the hostel have a balcony. Popular points of interest near P & T Hostel include Bang Rak Beach, Bophut Beach and Big Buddha. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 1 km from the accommodation.

name: Samui Reef View Resort
description: Nestled in the foothills, 4 km south of Lamai Beach, Samui Reef View Resort boasts accommodations with views of the Gulf of Thailand, the island's coastal reefs, mountains and the jungle. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each air-conditioned unit at Samui Reef View Resort comes with a refrigerator, a kettle, a safe as well as a cable TV. The en suite bathroom is equipped with hot shower facilities. Guests can enjoy the outdoor swimming pool, located in the middle of the resort, with a wading area suitable for children. Arranging a day trip to the waterfalls, elephant trekking through the jungle or a visit to the tiger zoo or aquarium are all possible at the property. For guests wishing to explore the island and surrounding areas on their own, scooter or car rental is available. Situated next to the pool is the on-site restaurant and bar where guests can sample a selection of Thai and European dishes as well as cool drinks while admiring views of the ocean. Breakfast can also be enjoyed every morning from 07:00 - 10:00 hrs. Located near Hua Thanon, it takes 40 minutes by car from the airport to the hotel and half an hour from Nathon Pier.

name: Samui First House Hotel
description: Located between Chaweng and Chaweng Noi beaches, Samui First House is just 1 km from Chaweng’s shopping and nightlife spots. It features a restaurant, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in the lobby area. Rooms at First House Samui feature wooden furnishings and large windows. Each room has cable TV and a minibar. Private bathrooms come with a bathtub and shower. Some rooms also have a private balcony with pool views. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage. Safety deposit boxes are provided at the front desk. The hotel also has a tour desk, a minimart and an internet corner. Located beside the pool, the restaurant serves a selection of Thai and international dishes throughout the day. Drinks are available at the bar. Samui First House is approximately a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport. Samui Ferry Pier is about 33 km away.

name: Ammatara Pura Pool Villas
description: This boutique resort features contemporary Thai villas with living area, kitchen and a balcony overlooking Lamai Beach. Offering free Wi-Fi, it houses a multi-cuisine restaurant with 24-hour room service and an outdoor pool with whirlpool. Fitted with tiled flooring, the spacious villas at Ammatara Pura feature classic and natural beige and brown interiors, decorated with influences from traditional Thai palaces and temples. Equipped with a dining area and a washing machine, they offer a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each has a private pool. Situated on Ko Samui, Ammatara Pura is 20 km from Samui International Airport. It is an hour by flight from Bangkok City. Guests can play a game of table tennis or enjoy a soothing massage. The on-site tour desk can help arrange transport rentals and an airport shuttle service.

name: P Chaweng
description: P.Chaweng Guest House is only a 5-minute walk from Chaweng Beach on Samui Island, a short drive from the Chaweng nightlife and a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport. P.Chaweng Guest House offers free wifi and parking. Rooms at P.Chaweng are air conditioned and come with private bathrooms and shower. Guests can hire a car or motorbike to explore the neighbourhood, or approach the tour desk for excursion bookings.

name: Dara Samui Beach Resort - Adults Only
description: Dara Samui Beach Resort - Adult Only is situated on Koh Samui and provides 4-star accommodation as well as free Wi-Fi. It also features a coffee bar, a swimming pool and a tour desk. The resort has 67 rooms and has been recently refurbished. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to provide assistance. Rooms feature a modern décor, air-conditioning and a private balcony. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and enjoyed in the comfort of the room's living area. Dara Samui Beach Resort - Adult Only provides a varied dining experience, which include a relaxed restaurant and a bar. A buffet and an American breakfast is available every morning. A selection of dining options are also found close by. Dara Samui Beach Resort - Adult Only is a convenient place to explore nearby Wat Phra Yai and Chaweng Noi Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Bo Phut and Maret are also an easy car ride away.Revato

name: Nora Chaweng Hotel
description: Conveniently based and offering an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi, this modern hotel is located a short drive from Bo Phut. It is situated a 20-minute drive from Samui International Airport and an airport transfer is provided for those staying at the property. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa, Anodas Spa. There is also free private parking on site for those travelling with a car. All rooms feature a modern décor, air-conditioning and a mini bar. They each offer a private bathroom, an in-room safe and a refrigerator. Guests staying at Floral Hotel Chaweng Koh Samui can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close for a meal. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the area. Floral Hotel Chaweng Koh Samui is moments from Chaweng Beach. Chaweng Noi Beach is just an easy car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Samui Natien Resort
description: Located Ko Samui’s Chaweng Beach, Samui Natien Resort offers comfortable guest rooms with direct access to the beach. The resort features an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site restaurant. Guest rooms at Natien Samui Resort have air conditioning and an en suite bathroom. They are equipped with cable TV and a tea/coffee maker. An iron and hairdryer are also provided. Guests can work out at the fitness centre or relax in the sauna. Diving and snorkelling equipment are available at Samui Natien. The resort’s tour desk helps with trip planning and provides information on the island’s attractions. Other services include currency exchange, car rental and laundry. Natien Beach Restaurant at Samui Natien Resort serves a range of Thai, Western and fresh seafood dishes. Situated at Chaweng Beach, the resort is a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Samahita Retreat
address: Yoga Retreat (th) Co.,Ltd 55/20-24 Moo 4, Koh Samui 84140
description: Samahita Retreat offers a variety of yoga, fitness and wellness programs. Healthy buffet meals can also be enjoyed at the property. Located on the beach, this retreat features a salt water pool, restaurant and free WiFi. There is also an herbal steam room right by the pool. Set overlooking the garden, all rooms have air conditioning. A fridge and electric kettle is also included. The private bathrooms come with a shower and free towels. Other facilities offered include a children's playground, a fitness centre with sea views and on-site shops. Guests can relax at the beachfront lounge, meditate in the garden or have a drink at a coffee bar. The retreat also offers cooking classes at an additional cost. Laemsor Pagoda is 2.3 km from Samahita Retreat. Na Mueang Waterfall is at a distance of 6.5.km, while Samui Airport is 18 km away. Free parking is offered on site.

name: Beluga Boutique Hotel
description: Facing the blue sea, Beluga Boutique Hotel sits at Lamai Beach. Just a 3-minute walk from Hin Ta Hin Yai, it has an outdoor mineral water pool, pampering massage treatments and free Wi-Fi. Featuring modern Thai decor, the air-conditioned rooms feature gorgeous sea views. All are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have a rain shower. Beluga Boutique Hotel is a 10-minute walk from nightlife of Lamai and a 30-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Airport shuttles can be arranged at an extra charge. Day trips and car rentals can be arranged at the tour desk. Water sports facilities like diving and snorkelling are also available. The hotel also provides laundry services. Thai and European dishes are served at the restaurant. In-room dining is possible with room service.

name: Samui Green Hotel
description: Situated in Chaweng, within less 100 meters to access public beach and a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport, Samui Green Hotel boasts a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest can enjoy an outdoor pool with the famous beach club Seen located 150 meters from the hotel with additional charge and the Samui Green Hotel has its own spa and wellness centre with an additional charge. The hotel has strengthened its hygienic measures for the safety and tranquility of its staff in order to calmly welcome its customers. Each room and apartment at this hotel is spacious and air-conditioned and features a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Certain units have a balcony. Each room has a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Drinking water and coffee/tea facilities are provided daily. Motorbike, bicycle and car rental services are available nearby and the area is popular for snorkelling. There is an information office located close to the property with a private mini van available to explore the island. This hotel provides Traditional Thai massage treatments with graduated masseuses. Staff here can converse in Thai English and French. There are many local restaurants within a short walk from Samui Green Hotel. The mall Central Festival is 1 km from the property, while Chaweng Walking Street is only 50 metres away. A round-trip airport shuttle service is also available at an additional charge.

name: Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort
description: Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort is located on Koh Samui and offers 5-star facilities as well as a rooftop terrace and outdoor tennis courts. The numerous amenities this modern hotel features include a kids pool, a kids club and valet parking. This elegant hotel provides an on-site gym, a coffee bar and 24-hour room service. For those wanting to get outdoors the hotel has a wide variety of activities, such as windsurfing, snorkeling and scuba diving. Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower, a marble bathroom and luxury toiletries. Each have a private balcony, a mini bar and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort features a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of an evening with a meal and a drink. A wide selection of eating options are also found in close proximity to the property. Bo Phut's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort, with Bo Phut Pier just a short stroll away. For guests with a car, parking is available on site and Mae Nam is within easy driving distance of the hotel.Revato

name: The Mud
description: This comfortable resort in Ang Thong provides free wireless internet, as well as an outdoor pool and massage services. It also features a ticket service, a concierge and a tour desk. The Mud provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free public parking on site. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace offers a nice place to relax. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a hair dryer and tea and coffee making facilities. The on-site restaurant serves Thai, seafood and European dishes in a traditional setting. A daily breakfast is also served. The Mud is under a 35-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Mae Nam and Bo Phut are also an easy car ride away.Revato

name: D Varee Diva Avenue Samui
description: The Avenue Samui is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Samui. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the The Avenue Samui. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Access to the hotel's outdoor pool will further enhance your satisfying stay. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Samui, The Avenue Samui will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Code Samui Hotel
address: 55/13 Moo 6, Bang Por Soi 4, Meanam, Koh Samui 84330
description: Situated in Bang Por area of Ko Samui, Code is a luxurious collection of contemporary apartments with beautiful ocean views. Featuring a fitness centre, the hotel boasts a stylish infinity outdoor pool, a tennis court and pampering spa treatments. Free WiFi is available at this property. The beach can be reached within a 2-minute drive. Spacious and well-designed, all apartments are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and iPod dock. A kitchen, living room and balcony are included. En suite bathrooms come with hot-water showers. Samui International Airport is 16 km away. Hotel offers free shuttle service to and from Bang Por Beach and Maenam Beach. Guests can lounge on the pool deck, work out at the fitness centre, relax at the steam room or take a dip in a hot tub. Car rentals, area shuttles, tour bookings and luggage storage can be arranged at the 24-hour front desk. Vanilla offers an all-day dining menu from 07:00-23:00. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar equipped with a billiard table. The hotel also provides barbecue facilities.

name: Grand Manita Beach Resort
address: 146/58 Moo 4 Tumbol Maret, Lamai Beach, Koh Samui 84310
description: Grand Manita Beach Resort is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Samui. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, laundromat, photocopying are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, hot spring bath, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, massage. For reliable service and professional staff, Grand Manita Beach Resort caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Centara Villas Samui
address: 111 Moo 2, Maret, Natien Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Centara Villas Samui is situated on Koh Samui, and offers 4-star accommodation as well as a private beach. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. Guests of Centara Villas in Koh Samui can begin their day at SPA Cenvaree, or enjoy the many leisure facilities, including an outdoor pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests travelling with a car. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a private balcony and tea and coffee making facilities. All offer an in-room safe and a telephone. Every morning, breakfast is available at Reef Café. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel is a short walk from Laem Set Beach, and an easy drive from Maret. It is also perfectly located close to a range of cafés and restaurants.Revato

name: Le Murraya Boutique Serviced Residence & Resort
description: Located in Chaweng, Le Murraya Boutique Serviced Residence & Resort features luxurious accommodation with complimentary WiFi in all areas. It offers an outdoor pool, a fitness room, restaurant and free shuttle services to Chaweng Beach which is available three times a day. Each air-conditioned room at Le Murraya comes with a TV, balcony and an en suite bathroom. Le Murraya provides beach towels and packed lunches for guests visiting Chaweng Beach. Le Murraya is within walking distance of the shopping, dining and entertainment outlets located on Chaweng Beach Road. The resort is a 15-minute drive away from Koh Samui International Airport.

name: Lamai Coconut Beach Resort
description: Lamai Coconut Resort offers standalone bungalow with private balconies, just steps from Lamai Beach. It boasts a sun terrace, a private beach area and free Wi-fi in the entire hotel. The resort is a stroll to Lamai’s shopping and nightlife options, while Hinta Hinyay is a 5-minute drive away. It takes 25 minutes by car from Lamai Coconut to Samui Airport.
