This chic boutique resort features a beachfront pool, fitness facilities and soothing massages. A short drive from various attractions, Nikki Beach Resort & Spa is 15 km from Nathon Pier and 10 km from beautiful Namuang Waterfall. It offers free parking and is a 45-minute drive from Samui Airport. Featuring tasteful dark wood furnishings, bungalows open out to sweeping views of Thailand’s Gulf or tropical greenery. They have a 42-inch flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Lazy afternoons can be spent on day beds by the landscaped pool or with a soothing massage in the outdoor pavilion. Staff are on hand to help coordinate daily activities and tours. The spa centre offers a copious variety of treatments ranging from body massages, scrubs, facials and steam room sessions. Tropical garden views accompany seafood, Thai and international specialities at Nikki’s restaurant. After-meal drinks and signature cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar, which features a DJ and Nikki Beach’s signature brand of music and entertainment.

name: Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio
address: 82/49 Moo 3 Bophut Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio features free WiFi throughout the property and views of sea in Chaweng Noi Beach. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub. There is free private parking and the property offers free airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, Asian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Chaweng Noi Beach is 1 km from the accommodation, while Coral Cove Beach is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 6 km from Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio.

name: Papillon Resort
address: 159/3 Moo 2, T. Bophut, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84302
description: Overlooking Chaweng Beach, Papillon Resort offers comfortable accommodation in Ko Samui. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All rooms boast a private outdoor terrace. Featuring local Thai decor, Papillon’s rooms provide en suite bathrooms, air conditioning and cable TVs. Le Café des Arts is Resort Papillon’s all-day restaurant and bar. It serves a wide range of food including Thai, French and Asian cuisines. The resort is 15 minutes’ drive from Samui Airport. Within 5 minutes’ drive of the hotel, guests can find the lively Chaweng nightlife, local shops, restaurants and cafes.

name: Golden Monkey Samui
address: 155, 34-35 Chaweng Beach Rd, Bo Put, Koh Samui 84320
description: Boasting a shared lounge, a terrace as well as a bar, Golden Monkey Samui is situated in the centre of Koh Samui, 200 metres from Chaweng Beach. The property is located 6.6 km from Fisherman Village, 7.8 km from Big Buddha and 10 km from Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and Chaweng Noi Beach is 1.4 km away. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The rooms at the hotel are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen. You can play billiards at Golden Monkey Samui, and bike hire and car hire are available. Chaweng Viewpoint is 2.6 km from the accommodation, while Lamai Viewpoint is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from Golden Monkey Samui.

name: Montien House Chaweng Beach Resort
description: Sitting on Chaweng Beach, this beautiful beachfront resort offers a large outdoor pool and memorable dinners on the beach. It provides massage services and luxurious accommodation with private terraces. Surrounded by tropical gardens, the air-conditioned rooms all have an outdoor seating area. They are spacious and fitted with cable TV and a refrigerator, while en-suite bathrooms have hot shower facilities and a hairdryer. Guests can soak up the sun on the lounge chairs located around the pool, or enjoy a walk on the beach. The hotel also provides water sports facilities. The restaurant serves Thai and Western dishes and live entertainment in the evenings. Montien House SHA PLUS is a 15-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport.

name: Riviera Beach Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Riviera Beach Hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Bophut and has a terrace, restaurant and bar. Boasting a private beach area, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a few steps from Bophut Beach, 1.1 km from Bang Rak Beach and 300 metres from Fisherman Village. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Riviera Beach Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Riviera Beach Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Big Buddha is 4.5 km from the hotel, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from Riviera Beach Hotel.

name: Hansar Samui Resort & Spa
description: Located on Bophut Beach, Hansar Samui features sea view rooms. Less than 500 metres away from Fisherman’s Village, it also offers dining outlets, a fitness centre and an infinity pool. The resort’s spacious rooms feature handmade furniture, wooden floors and stone basins. Each room has a living area with a daybed. Modern amenities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access. Hansar Samui’s H-Bistro serves local and Western dishes and seafood. To sip drinks with views of the sea, guests can head to the resort’s Pool and Beach Bar or the Chill Lounge. Guests of Hansar Samui can work out at the fitness centre or enjoy body treatments at the spa. A tour desk can assist with travel and sightseeing arrangements. Hansar Samui Resort & Spa is a 10-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport.

name: Chaba Samui Resort
address: 19 Chaweng Beach Road, Bo Put, Koh Samui 84320
description: Chaba Samui Resort is situated on Koh Samui, and offers 3.5-star facilities, including a private beach. This modern resort also features free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool, and is within easy driving distance of Bo Phut and Maret. Chaba Samui Resort has a gym with a swimming pool. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Chaba Samui Resort provides 93 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. Each has a bathroom that offers a shower and bathrobes. Chaba Samui Resort's in-house restaurant provides Thai-inspired meals, which can enjoyed on the terrace. Alternatively, there are a variety of other eating options nearby. Samui International Airport is within a 10-minute drive of Chaba Samui Resort, as is Chaweng Noi Beach. Lamai Beach and Wat Phra Yai are just a short car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Utopia Resort
address: 124/105 M.3. Lamai Beach T. Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: Utopia Resort is located on Lamai Beach. It offers bungalows with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The resort features a tour desk, massage service and laundry. Free private parking is possible on site. The resort is a 5-minute drive to Grandfather and Grandmother Rocks. It is a 20-minute drive to Chaweng Beach and a 30-minute drive to Samui Airport. Bungalows are fitted with a balcony, cable TV and seating area. Hot shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. The restaurant serves Thai and western food between 08:00-22:00 hrs.

name: Paradise Island Estate
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club
description: Located in Bangrak Beach, 1.7 km from Big Buddha, The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club features an outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The popular Fisherman's Village is a 5-minute drive away. All fully furnished rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the sea, pool or garden are featured in certain rooms. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. This hotel has a secluded beach area and car hire is available. A range of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling and diving. The Chaweng Beach area is a 15-minute drive away, while Samui Airport is is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Tara Resort
address: 50/9 Tara Resort Moo.3 Angthong Soi 6, Koh Samui 84140
description: Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a pool with a view, Tara Resort is situated in Nathon. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. The villa features 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a terrace with mountain views. The villa offers a picnic area. A car rental service is available at Tara Resort. Fisherman Village is 18 km from the accommodation, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 22 km from Tara Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Skye Beach Hotel
address: 8/135 Plai Laem Soi 5 M.5, Bophut, Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: No description found

name: Samui Seabreeze Place
description: Samui Seabreeze Place is located in Koh Samui, near the shopping area of Lamai. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and restaurant. Free parking is provided. Rooms at Seabreeze Place Samui are decorated with modern Thai furnishings. Each room is equipped with a cable TV, minibar and safety deposit box. Guests can make travel plans at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the island. An internet corner is available. The restaurant serves seafood and barbecue dishes. It also has an à la carte menu for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Samui Seabreeze Place is a 20-minute drive from Samui Airport and from the pier. Transfers can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: New Star Beach Resort
description: Situated on Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui, New Star Beach Resort offers luxurious beachfront accommodation. It features an infinity-edge pool and 2 dining options. Free parking is provided. Rooms and villas are decorated in a tropical style with wooden furnishings. Each room has a private balcony, TV and minibar. Treat yourself to a massage at Akiira Spa, or go on a dive trip or an elephant trek. Other facilities include laundry service and car rental. Breakfast buffet is served at Lime Restaurant, which offers indoor and al fresco seating. Sip afternoon tea at the Lobby Lounge or arrange for a meal by the pool. New Star Beach Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Ark Bar Beach Resort
address: 159/89, Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Location Ark Bar Beach, escape your world and play and energize. ARKbar Beach Resort is known around the world as the one-stop party destination in the heart of Chaweng Beach. It is located 50 meters from the main shopping area and only 10-minute drive from Koh Samui. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace can be found in most rooms. A safe and a minibar also feature. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. All rooms offer a telephone, a TV, a CD player and a DVD player. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower and a hairdryer. Restaurant Ark Bar Beach Resort has two large restaurants to satisfy the appetite of visitors and guests relaxing at the resort. The menu has something for all tastes including a range of local dishes with spicy and non-spicy options as well as international favorites. The a la carte menu is available all day leaving you to decide what time to eat breakfast! Amenities A safe, internet access, wireless internet access, a restaurant, a bar, room service and a laundry are available to guests. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. The swimming pool is ideal for a refreshing dip. A sun terrace, sun loungers and parasols are available. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. Guests can enjoy various leisure options during their free time, including pool/billiards, or for a fee, massage treatments.WebBeds

name: Thai Fight Hotel
address: 26/1-3 moo3 Tambol Maret Lamai Beach, Koh samui, Koh Samui 84310
description: Situated in Lamai, 200 metres from Rocky's Beach, Thai Fight Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Thai Fight Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Thai Fight Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Lamai Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 14 km from Thai Fight Hotel.

name: Monkey Samui Hostel
address: 66/4, Moo 5, Ban PlyLam, Bo Put, Koh Samui 84320
description: Monkey Samui Hostel offers air-conditioned budget accommodation about a 10-minute walk from Choeng Mon Beach. It features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Guests have the option of staying in a guest room with a private bathroom or in a dorm room with bunk beds. The dorms have access to shared bathroom facilities. Hostel Monkey Samui is a 15-minute walk from the popular Big Buddha statue. It is about a 30-minute drive from Bo Phut Fisherman’s Village and lively Chaweng Beach. Staff can offer trip planning advice and bike rental. Added conveniences include free parking and luggage storage.

name: Samaya Bura Beach Resort - Koh Samui
address: 171/4-9 Moo 4, Lamai, T Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: The 3.5-star Samaya Bura Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Samui. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, babysitting. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, towels, umbrella, separate living room can be found in selected guestrooms. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Samui has to offer by making Samaya Bura Hotel your base.Agoda

name: Karma Resort
description: Facing the beachfront, Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers 4-star accommodation in Bophut and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. A few steps from Bophut Beach and 1.7 km from Mae Nam Beach, the property offers a shared lounge and a terrace. Guests can enjoy American and French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. At Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bophut, like hiking, snorkelling and cycling. W Koh Samui Beach is 2 km from Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus, while Fisherman Village is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 5 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Al's Resort
description: Located within the scenic parkland of Chaweng, Al's Resort provides traditional accommodation and a full range of facilities, including an outdoor pool, 24-hour room service and a kids pool. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Al's has panoramic sea views, plus a tour desk, an airport shuttle and massage services. There is also a BBQ area available for guests to enjoy. Rooms come with a rain shower and a mini bar together with slippers. All provide a shared garden, bottled water and tea and coffee making facilities. Samui International Airport is within a 10-minute drive of Al's Resort Koh Samui, as is Chaweng Noi Beach. It also is an ideal base to explore nearby Bo Phut and Maret.Revato

name: Buri Rasa Village Samui
description: Located northwest of Koh Samui on the beachfront of Chaweng Beach, Buri Rasa Village offers an outdoor pool, spa and a hot tub. Rooms feature a private terrace and free Wi-Fi. Buri Rasa's spacious rooms are of a blend of traditional Thai decor with modern facilities. It provides a private bathroom, four-poster bed and cable TV with DVD player. Tea/coffee maker and a minibar are provided. Guests can enjoy a beach side dining at the Beach Club @ Buri Rasa. The lobby and beach bars serve drinks. For relaxation, guests can have traditional Thai herbal spa and therapy or soak up the sun at the outdoor pool or Chaweng Beach. Buri Rasa Village offers airport shuttle and car rental services. Parking is free. Buri Rasa Village is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Baan Rom Mai Resort
description: A minute’s walk from Chaweng’s northern beachfront, Baan Rom Mai offers rooms set in tropical gardens. Featuring an outdoor pool with pool bar, it provides free Wi-Fi in public areas. Baan Rom Mai Resort is a 10-minute walk from Chaweng’s town centre and a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Featuring private balconies, simply furnished rooms are fitted with either air conditioning or a fan. Each has an attached bathroom with heated shower facilities. Selected room comes with a TV. For leisure, guests can have a dip in the spa pool or make sightseeing arrangements at the tour desk. Other amenities include a safe and laundry facilities. Thai dishes can be sampled in the casual dining environment of the restaurant.

name: Beyond Samui
address: 20 Moo 2 Chaweng Chongmon Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Choeng Mon Beach, 300 metres from Chaweng Beach, Beyond Samui offers accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. All guest rooms come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Big Buddha is 4.4 km from Beyond Samui, while Fisherman Village is 6.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 2 km from the accommodation.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Koh Samui
description: Surrounded by the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand, our Koh Samui resort is located in a world-renowned island paradise that boasts turquoise waters and perfect beaches with a more laidback and authentic lifestyle. The Ritz-Carlton, Koh Samui - nestled within the private bay at the island’s northern tip and set in a 58 acres of a former coconut plantation – features a variety of suites and private pool villas that suit every guest's needs. It is perfect for wellbeing and leisure with its unique facilities, guest activities and experiences embracing the southern Thai culture and tradition within the resort. Highlights at our Koh Samui 5-star hotel include Muay Thai boxing classes, local-inspired treatment at Spa Village Koh Samui and a vibrant culinary journey at restaurants and bars as well as southern Thai cooking classes.Marriott

name: Samujana Villas
address: 63/154 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samujana Villas is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including a private beach, an infinity pool and a butler service. It has a gym, as well as outdoor tennis courts, free Wi-Fi and a private cinema. The property provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. It offers body treatments and a sun deck, as well as fitness classes. All the villas at Samujana Villas include direct pool access, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They are air conditioned and offer a marble bathroom, a coffee maker and a private garden. A mini bar, a private terrace and a private balcony are also provided to guests. Samujana Villas has easy access to Choeng Mon Beach. Those wanting to explore the area can also visit Chaweng, located within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Panisara Pool Villa Samui
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Property Location When you stay at Panisara Pool Villa Samui in Koh Samui, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Lamai Beach and Chaweng Beach. This hotel is 2.5 mi (4 km) from Silver Beach and 4.5 mi (7.2 km) from Chaweng Noi Beach. name: The Fair House Beach Resort & Hotel
description: Sitting on Chaweng Noi Beach, Fair House Beach Resort & Hotel boasts a spa pavilion and free WiFi. It has a beachfront freshwater swimming pool and another pool with tropical theme located on a hill. Fair House Beach Resort is located 8 km from Samui Airport and 25 km from Nathorn Pier. The hotel provides car and bike rental facilities, making trips to tourist attractions easy. Airport shuttle service can be arranged at an additional cost. Rooms are elegantly decorated in Contemporary Thai design and all feature private balconies. They are equipped with a satellite TV, minibar and fridge. A hairdryer is also provided. Some rooms offer views of tropical gardens or the ocean. Guests can enjoy Thai and European dishes at the Sea Paint beach-side restaurant, or sip drinks at the Rim Lay Bar. Room service is available. The resort offers traditional Thai massages at the Sala Spa. There are also lounge chairs along the beach for guests who wish to soak up the sun while admiring the ocean.

name: Villa Labaron
address: 30/204 Moo 4 T. Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located 1.8 km from Big Buddha, Villa Labaron boasts a beach front accommodation with a communal outdoor pool. This villa provides free WiFi access in all areas. Villa Labaron is 600 metres from Samui Crocodile Farm. A 3-minute drive will bring guests to Fisherman Village. Samui Airport is 1 km away. Featuring a terrace with an outdoor seating area, this air-conditioned villa offers a living area, a sofa set and a flat-screen TV. It also has a microwave, a fridge and a dining area. Shower facilities, free toiletries and towels are included in an en suite bathroom. At Villa Labaron, guests will find sun loungers and airport shuttle service. Bangrak Pier, from which guests can commute to Koh Pangan, is 1 km away.

name: Panalee Koh Samui Resort
address: 73/9 Moo 6 Tambon Maenam, Koh Samui Suratthani, Koh Samui 84330
description: Surrounded by nature, Panalee Koh Samui Resort - SHA Plus is located along peaceful Bang Po Beach in Koh Samui. Offering free Wi-Fi, it has an outdoor pool with a spa pool. Enjoying views of the ocean, mountain or pool, air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite TV and DVD player. A personal safe and minibar are also included. Panalee Koh Samui Resort - SHA Plus is about 4.7 km from Nathon Pier and 14 km from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. The resort features open-air pavilions where guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage. Island tours can also be arranged at the tour desk. A daily American breakfast is served at the resort's restaurant. In-room dining is available with room service.

name: Samui Bayview Resort & Spa
description: Standing on the green hills of Chaweng Noi, Samui Bayview Resort & Spa - SHA Plus offers guests breathtaking views of the sea and a peaceful location close to the busy city centre of Chaweng. The tranquil Samui Bayview Resort overlooks the most popular beach of Koh Samui. Among the facilities provided by Samui Bayview Resort & Spa - SHA Plus are an outdoor pool overlooking the sea and a fine spa offering treatments like outdoor massages. The Bayview Restaurant awaits you with delicious food paired with panoramic views of Chaweng Beach or Chaweng’s night lights. Every room is furnished with an Asian touch and comes with modern amenities. The suites offer a hot tub on the balcony while other rooms provide private balconies with beautiful sea views.

name: Samui Palm Beach Lead by Celes Samui
description: The 4-star Samui Palm Beach Resort offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Samui. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, chapel, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer carpeting, separate living room, internet access – wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms to ensure a restful night. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as snorkeling, boats, private beach, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Samui Palm Beach Resort.Agoda

name: Samui Mermaid Beachfront
description: Samui Mermaid Resort is located in Baan Bang Rak (Big Buddha Bay) on the coast of north-east Koh Samui. Guests can choose to enjoy a stay at the seaside or the garden side. Featuring 3 swimming pools including an infinity edge pool, it also has free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour restaurant with outdoor seating. This tropical resort is a 10-minute journey from Samui Airport. Samui Mermaid Resort is a 15-minute drive from the Bophut fisherman village and nightlife at Chaweng. Lamai Beach is a 30-minute drive away. Featuring modern Thai décor, rooms are equipped with either a fan or air conditioning. All come with a cable TV, free bottled water and a private balcony. Attached bathrooms have hot-water showers. At the tour desk, guests can arrange to go elephant trekking, visit the crocodile farm or watch an exciting Muay Thai match. Water sports activities like diving and snorkelling can be enjoyed by the beach. Boasting beautiful sunset views, the beach-side Dolphin restaurant specialises in Thai and international dishes. Cocktails and a daily barbecue are offered at The Little Mermaid pool-side bar.

name: Samui Paradise Chaweng Beach Resort & Spa
description: Samui Paradise offers luxurious suites and villas with private terraces on a quiet strip of Koh Samui. The beachfront resort features an outdoor pool with 2 spa baths, a spa and 2 restaurants. Chaweng Centre is located just 500 metres from Samui Paradise Chaweng Beach Resort, SHA Plus. It is a 20-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport and 6 km from Lamai Beach. Rooms are charming with wooden flooring and furnishings. They enjoy great views of the sea or tropical gardens. All accommodation comes with free bottled water, cable TV and a minibar, while select rooms have a private outdoor spa bath. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massages and body treatments at the resort’s spa or enjoy the sun on the many lounge chairs located throughout the property. For a quiet day, enjoy Wi-Fi in rooms. Fresh seafood, Thai and international cuisines are served at Paradise Restaurant, which boasts spectacular views of Chaweng Bay. Papa Sam’s Bar offers cocktails and chilled beer along the beach.

name: The Secret Pool Villas By The Library
description: This comfortable hotel in Chaweng offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as meeting rooms and a swimming pool. It also features babysitting/child services, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at The Secret Pool Villas By The Library Koh Samui, including DVD/video rental, a library and limited hours room service. Guests can also enjoy private parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private garden, direct pool access and a private terrace. They all have a pillow menu, a mini bar and luxury linen. The Secret Pool Villas By The Library Koh Samui is located under a 10-minute car ride from Samui International Airport. Lamai Beach is just an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Toh Buk Seng Ayutthaya Hotel
description: Located in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, 17 km from Wat Yai Chaimongkol, Toh Buk Seng Ayutthaya Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. The property is situated 17 km from Wat Mahathat, 17 km from Chao Sam Phraya National Museum and 18 km from Ayutthaya Historical Park. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. An Asian breakfast is available daily at Toh Buk Seng Ayutthaya Hotel. Wat Chaiwatthanaram is 21 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 61 km from Toh Buk Seng Ayutthaya Hotel.

name: Ayutthaya Garden River Home
description: A 15-minute drive from Bang Pa-in Train Station and Bang Pa-in Palace, Ayutthaya Garden River Home is a peaceful getaway with Thai-style architecture, tropical gardens, and views of the Chao Phraya River. It features an outdoor pool. The air-conditioned rooms at this riverfront resort have satellite TV, a microwave, and tea/coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. Kimonos and slippers are provided. Guests can enjoy a relaxing massage, exercise in the fitness room, or jog in the mornings around the neighbouring villages. The property offers local cooking classes that include a morning tour of the local market. A tour desk is also available. Thai favourites and Western specialities are served in the restaurant. For salads and vegetarian dishes, guests can pick fresh vegetables from the resort’s organic garden. Ayutthaya Garden River Home is a 90-minute drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Several Ayutthaya attractions, also UNESCO World Heritage Sites, are within a 30-minute drive of the resort.

name: Home Ayutthaya
description: No description found

name: Ampo Residence Hotel
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Khlong Suan Plu, Ampo Residence promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, valet parking, car park, room service, airport transfer are readily available for you to enjoy. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature closet, towels, television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, internet access – wireless. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, garden. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Ayutthaya has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Ampo Residence.Agoda

name: Kantary Hotel Ayutthaya
address: 168 Moo 1, Rojana Road, Tanu, U-Thai, Ayutthaya 13000
description: Located in historical Ayutthaya, Kantary Hotel Ayutthaya offers spacious accommodation with a balcony, free WiFi in public areas and free private parking. Guests can enjoy the outdoor pool and fitness room. Air-conditioned rooms offer a living area with DVD player and flat-screen TV, kitchenette and private bathroom with bathtub. Room service is provided. Kantary Hotel Ayutthaya offers a sauna, steam room and a lounge. The California Steak Restaurant offers seafood, international and Thai dishes. The hotel is less than a 2-hour drive from Bangkok.

name: Krungsri River Hotel
description: Krungsri River Hotel, located in Ayutthaya, is a four-star hotel offering spacious accommodations with views of the river or city. It has a restaurant, a pool and a spa. The hotel is near Pa Sak river, about an hour’s drive to Suvarnabhumi International airport. Krungsri River Hotel provides airport transfer services on request. Rooms at Krungsri River Hotel are air-conditioned and offer stunning views of the river or Ayutthaya City, the old capital of Bangkok. They come with a bathtub, hairdryer and minibar. Facilities at the hotel include a swimming pool. Guests can also enjoy a fun karaoke session with friends and family. The hotel also features a fitness centre. The hotel restaurant serves Thai, Chinese and Italian dishes. After your meal, enjoy a traditional Thai massage at the Spa. Guests will also find a sauna.

name: Jidapa Resort
description: Jidapa Resort is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Ayutthaya. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Jidapa Resort. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, towels, internet access – wireless, non smoking rooms, air conditioning. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include spa, massage, garden. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Ayutthaya, Jidapa Resort will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Ayothaya Hotel
description: Boasting an outdoor pool, Ayothaya Hotel offers affordable rooms situated along Pasak River. Featuring a restaurant and bar, it provides massage services and free parking. Wi-Fi is available. Air-conditioned rooms at Ayothaya feature classic Thai-style furnishings and fabrics. They are fitted with cable TV and seating area. For convenience, a fridge is provided. Private bathrooms have bathtubs and hot/cold shower. Guests can relax with traditional Thai massages or at the loungers by the outdoor pool. Souvenirs can be bought at the gift shop. To explore Ayuthaya, car rental service is available. Ayothaya’s restaurant serves European dishes and Thai specialities. Drinks and cocktails are available at the bar. Situated in historic Ayuthaya, Hotel Ayothaya is easily accessible from well-known temples Wat Mahatat and Wat Ratchaburana. It is a 1.5-hour drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport.

name: Sala Ayutthaya
address: 9/2 Moo 4, U-Thong Road, Pratu Chai, Ayutthaya 13000
description: Located in the heart of Ayutthaya, Sala Ayutthaya is 1.2 km from Chao Sam Phraya National Museum. This boutique hotel offers an outdoor pool and stylish accommodation with free WiFi access. The hotel is 1.6 km from Ayutthaya Historical Park and 1.7 km from Wat Chaiwatthanaram. Suvarnabhumi Airport is 75 km away. Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a DVD player. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with bathrobes and slippers. Other facilities offered at the property include luggage storage and laundry facilities. Featuring river views, The River Restaurant features both indoor and outdoor dining areas. Refreshing beverages can be enjoyed at the bar.

name: Sala Bang Pa-In
description: Located in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, 29 km from Wat Chaiwatthanaram, Sala Bang Pa-In provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guests at Sala Bang Pa-In can enjoy a continental or an Asian breakfast. IMPACT Muang Thong Thani is 31 km from the accommodation, while Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 32 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 31 km from Sala Bang Pa-In.

name: Woraburi Ayutthaya Resort & Spa
description: Set in a prime location of Ayutthaya, Woraburi Ayutthaya puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, luggage storage are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with complimentary tea, towels, complimentary instant coffee, mirror, internet access – wireless. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as outdoor pool, pool (kids). A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Woraburi Ayutthaya.Agoda

name: Baan Luang Harn
description: Situated in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya and with Wat Mahathat reachable within 1.4 km, Baan Luang Harn features express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFithroughout the property and a garden. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 2.9 km of Chao Sam Phraya National Museum. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. The rooms at the guest house are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer and a shower. Baan Luang Harn offers some rooms with pool views, and rooms come with a terrace. The units at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk. A continental, Full English/Irish or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests at Baan Luang Harn will be able to enjoy activities in and around Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, like cycling. Ayutthaya Historical Park is 3 km from the guest house, while Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 52 km from Baan Luang Harn.

name: The Aiyara
address: 45 Moo 2 Baan Krod Bangpa-in Ayutthaya Baan Krod Bangpa-in Ayutthaya, Ayutthaya 13160
description: Set in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya offers accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a sauna. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, garden views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a fridge, and a private bathroom with hot tub and a hair dryer. A minibar and kettle are also featured. Guests at ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya can enjoy an American breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Japanese and Thai cuisine. The wellness area at ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya is comprised of a hot tub and a fitness room. Guests can swim in the pool with a view, go golfing or relax in the garden. Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 6.5 km from the aparthotel, while Wat Mahathat is 10 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 45 km from ไอยรา อยุธยา The Aiyara Ayutthaya, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Baan Pomphet
address: 13/5, Thanon Uthong, Tambon Horrattanachai, Amphoe Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Ayutthaya 13000
description: Situated in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, 2.1 km from Wat Mahathat, Baan Pomphet features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Baan Pomphet rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. Chao Sam Phraya National Museum is 2.4 km from Baan Pomphet, while Ayutthaya Historical Park is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 52 km from the hotel.

name: P.U. Inn Resort
description: P.U. Inn Ubonpon is a 5-minute walk from Chao Prom Market and Ayutthaya Bus Terminal. Offering air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi, the property is equipped with a tour desk and shuttle service. Massage treatments can be arranged upon request. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Mahathat Temple and Rajaburana Temple. It is a 30-minute drive from Don Muang Airport and a 1.5-hr drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Rooms at P.U. Inn Ubonpon are fitted with colourful decor. Each room comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a sofa seating area and a refrigerator. Shower facilities are included in a private bathroom. Guests can sample Thai and western cuisines all day at the restaurant. Beverages are also served at the bar.

name: The Cavalli Casa Resort
description: The Cavalli Casa Resort is a 5-minute drive from Ayothaya Floating Market and Ayutthaya Railway Station. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free Wi-Fi. This hotel is equipped with meeting facilities. The resort is 5 km from Wat Yai Chaimongkon. It is 40 km from Donmuang Airport and 80 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Rooms at The Cavalli Casa Resort are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a wardrobe. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For guests’ convenience, the resort provides shuttle service, laundry and luggage storage. Free private parking is available on site. Traditional Thai dishes are served at Leelawadee Restaurant. Room service can be arranged upon request.

name: Brickhouse Ayutthaya Guesthouse Est 1986
description: Boasting a garden and a bar, BRICKHOUSE Ayutthaya Guesthouse EST 1986 is situated in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, 1.8 km from Wat Mahathat and 3.5 km from Chao Sam Phraya National Museum. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared kitchen and full-day security, along with free WiFi. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, like cycling. Ayutthaya Historical Park is 3.6 km from BRICKHOUSE Ayutthaya Guesthouse EST 1986, while Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 3.9 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 52 km from the accommodation.

name: iuDia Hotel
description: Located among the ancient ruins of temples and old palaces, this boutique property faces the Ayutthaya World Heritage Park. Offering rooms with free Wi-Fi, it also features a café and an outdoor pool. Air-conditioned rooms at iuDia Hotel feature courtyard or Chao Phraya River views. Furnished with antiques, they are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are included. A 15-minute walk from Chao Sam Phraya National Museum, iuDia Hotel is 1 km from Mahathat Temple and 3 km from Ayutthaya Train Station. Guests can explore the surroundings on their own as free bike rentals are provided. Drivers can park on-site for free. I U Dia Café serves the daily breakfast, along with coffee and light snacks. Internet access is available here.

name: Nature Home
address: 23/4, Pa Maphrao Road, Pratuchai, Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, Ayutthaya 13000
description: Located in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, within 1.1 km of Wat Mahathat and 2.6 km of Chao Sam Phraya National Museum, Nature Home provides accommodation with pool with a view and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring an open-air bath, this 3-star guest house has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.7 km from Ayutthaya Historical Park. All units in the guest house are equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Nature Home every room comes with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Guests at Nature Home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, like cycling. Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 4.8 km from the guest house, while Wat Chaiwatthanaram is 5.1 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International, 53 km from Nature Home, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Pludhaya Resort & Spa
description: Pludhaya Resort & Spa is a Thai-style boutique resort offering rooms with free Wi-Fi. It has an outdoor pool, fitness centre and a restaurant. Free parking is available. Spacious rooms feature air conditioning, private bathroom and a hairdryer. A minibar and a writing desk are provided. Guests of Pludhaya can enjoy traditional Thai massage or foot reflexology at the resort. For meals, they can go to the on-site restaurant, which serves local cuisine in an indoor and outdoor dining setting. The resort has a 24-hour front desk and provides airport shuttle services. Pludhaya Resort & Spa is located in Ayutthaya, the former capital of Thailand. It is a 1.5-hour drive from Bangkok city.

name: Vassana Design Hotel
description: Vasana Design Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Ayutthaya, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Vasana Design Hotel. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, mirror, sofa, closet. Take a break from a long day and make use of fitness center, outdoor pool, massage, karaoke. Vasana Design Hotel is an excellent choice from which to explore Ayutthaya or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: Classic Kameo Hotel & Serviced Apartments, Ayutthaya
description: Classic Kameo Hotel & Serviced Apartments, Ayutthaya is a 5-minute drive from Wat Yai Chai Mongkol. It offers modern non-smoking rooms with a kitchenette and a seating area. The apartment features an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and a sauna. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. The property is a 5-minute drive to Northern Bus Interchange Terminal. It is a 10-minute drive from Ayutthaya Mall. Rooms at Classic Kameo Hotel & Serviced Apartments are furnished with contemporary decor. It comes with air-conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a safety deposit box. A bathtub is included in an en suite bathroom. Laundry service is available at the 24-hour front desk. Other facilities include a meeting room, a business centre and free private parking. Guests can enjoy a variety of Chinese dishes daily at Terrazzo Restaurant.

name: Grand Phranakhon Hotel
description: Set in Phra Nakhon Si Ayutthaya, 2.6 km from Wat Yai Chaimongkol, Grand Phranakhon Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.5 km from Wat Mahathat. At the hotel, every room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units at Grand Phranakhon Hotel feature air conditioning and a wardrobe. Chao Sam Phraya National Museum is 5.8 km from the accommodation, while Ayutthaya Historical Park is 6.4 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 48 km from Grand Phranakhon Hotel.

name: ayutthaya river camp and yacht charter
address: ต.สำเภาล่ม อ.พระนครศรีอยุธยา จ. พระนครศรีอยุธยา, Ayutthaya 13000
description: Set 5.6 km from Wat Chaiwatthanaram, ayutthaya river camp and yacht charter offers a garden, a terrace and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. Windsurfing and canoeing are possible within the area, and the luxury tent offers a range of water sports facilities. Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 6 km from ayutthaya river camp and yacht charter, while Wat Mahathat is 8.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 51 km from the accommodation.

name: Tm Land Hotel
description: TM Land Hotel is a 10-minute drive to Ayutthaya Historical Park. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and free WiFi. Guests can indulge in spa massages or relax by the pool. It also has a fitness centre and a sauna. The property is a 10-minute drive to Ayutthaya Bus Station. It is a 15-minute drive from Ayutthaya Railway Station, Floating Market and Tesco Lotus Shopping Centre. Non-smoking rooms at TM Land Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and a safety deposit box. Free toiletries are included in en suite bathroom. Luggage storage and shuttle service can be handled by staff at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel is equipped with meeting rooms, BBQ facilities and a beauty shop. Laundry and dry cleaning service are available. Guests can sample a great selection of Thai and Japanese dishes at TM Land Restaurant. In-room dining can be arranged upon request.

name: Rabbit House แรบบิท เฮ้าส์
address: 27/2 ถนน โรจนะ ซอย โรจนะ1/6 ตำบล ไผ่ลิง อำเภอ พระนครศรีอยุธยา จังหวัด พระนครศรีอยุธยา, Ayutthaya 13000
description: Boasting air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony, Rabbit House แรบบิท เฮ้าส์ is situated in Ban Han Tra Fang Nua. This property offers access to a terrace, free private parking and free WiFi. The bed and breakfast features a flat-screen TV. Towels and bed linen are available in the bed and breakfast. An à la carte, American or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. Guests can relax in the garden at the property. Wat Yai Chaimongkol is 1.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Wat Mahathat is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 51 km from Rabbit House แรบบิท เฮ้าส์.

name: Rabbit House

description: Featuring pool views, Rabbit House offers accommodation with a balcony and a coffee machine, around 1.8 km from Wat Yai Chaimongkol. description: Located in Kanchanaburi, U Inchantree is a short drive from Kanchanaburi War Cemetery and the Hellfire Pass Museum. Those staying at the property are able to curl up with a book in the on-site library. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom with bathrobes. U Inchantree Kanchanaburi's on-site cocktail bar offers guests a convenient place to enjoy a drink. Guests are able to enjoy afternoon tea, which is served every day at the hotel. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at U Inchantree Resort Kanchanaburi, there are a selection of eateries located nearby. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. An à la carte, American or Asian breakfast is available each morning at the property. name: Kanchanaburi City Hotel
description: Located 250 metres from The Bridge of the River Kwai, Kanchanaburi City Hotel - SHA Extra Plus boasts an outdoor pool, free WiFi access and free bicycle rental services. A cup of freshly brewed coffee can also be enjoyed at the on-site café. Offering views of the pool and mountains, each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and a refrigerator. The private bathroom includes shower facilities. At Kanchanaburi Hotel, guests will find a helpful staff at the 24-hour front desk who can provide assistance in luggage storage services as well as shuttle and airport transfer arrangements. For those who want to explore Kancanaburi and it's must-see destinations, tour information and directions can all be provided by the hotel staff. Free private parking is also available. The hotel is 5.6 km from The Jeath War Museum and 80 km from Hellfire Pass Museum. Sapan Kwae Yai Railway Station is 250 metres away from the property.

description: Surrounded by lush mountains and the beautiful River Kwai, Monsane Resort provides a peaceful retreat from the city with affordable accommodation, charming service and a relaxing spa. Rooms at Monsane River Kwai are cosy and are decorated in a contemporary style with a touch of Thai. They are also fitted with ample workspace, television and en-suite bathroom. Relax with a swim in the outdoor pool, which overlooks the river or pamper yourself with a spa treatment and massage. For those more adventurous, have fun kayaking or jet-skiing. You can also explore the historical sites of the province by speedboat. Enjoy a sunset dinner as you overlook the river when dining at the Sky River Restaurant or have fun at Monsane's pub and karaoke restaurant. You can also unwind at Rabeangnam bar with a cool drink and amazing views.

name: Taakradan Valley Resort
address: 231, M.1, Taa Kradan, Srisawat, Ban Tha Kradan 71250
description: Situated in Si Sawat, 7 km from Srinakarin Dam, Taakradan Valley Resort ท่ากระดานวัลเล่ย์ รีสอร์ท features a terrace and views of the mountain. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. All air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle as well as bottled water. Certain rooms include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony where guests can enjoy barbecue featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom with a bath, a hot shower and a bidet, with free toiletries provided. This resort offers karaoke facilities. You will find shops at the property, while convenient store like 7-11 is also located nearby. The property can also arrange tickets for guests to enjoy water park facilities, situated a 10-minute drive away.

name: Ruknam Resort
address: Tha Kradan Soi 5 259 Moo 5 Tha Kradan Subdistrict Si Sawat District, Ban Tha Kradan 71250
description: Set in Ban Hin Hak, 19 km from Erawan Waterfall, Ruknam Resort offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a water park. All rooms have a balcony. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room includes a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some feature mountain views. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the resort. Guests at Ruknam Resort will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ban Hin Hak, like canoeing. The Nine-Army Battle Historical Park is 39 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Dawei Airport, 257 km from Ruknam Resort.

name: นอนกาญจน์ โฮมสเตย์
description: Situated 8.7 km from Hellfire Pass Museum, NonKan HomeStay นอนกาญจน์ โฮมสเตย์ offers pool with a view, a garden and air-conditioned accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered, as well as a kettle. Guests at the campground can enjoy an Asian breakfast. NonKan HomeStay นอนกาญจน์ โฮมสเตย์ offers an outdoor fireplace. A an indoor play area is also available for guests at the accommodation. Malika R.E.124 The Siamese Living Heritage Town is 42 km from NonKan HomeStay นอนกาญจน์ โฮมสเตย์, while Saiyok Noi Waterfall is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Dawei, 237 km from the campground, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: บ้านไร่ วรรณ วาลย์ รีสอร์ท
address: 282 หมู่บ้านท่ากระดาน ซ. 12, Ban Tha Kradan 71250
description: Located in Tha Kradan, 22 km from Erawan Waterfall, บ้านไร่ วรรณ วาลย์ รีสอร์ท provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a bar, as well as a hot tub. All rooms have a balcony with mountain views and free WiFi. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At the resort, each room comes with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Guests at บ้านไร่ วรรณ วาลย์ รีสอร์ท can enjoy an Asian breakfast. The Nine-Army Battle Historical Park is 42 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Dawei Airport, 260 km from บ้านไร่ วรรณ วาลย์ รีสอร์ท.

name: ณ กาญโฮม
address: 125 หมู่3 ต.หนองเป็ด อ.ศรีสวัสดิ์ (เหนือเขื่อนศรีนครรินทร์ 15 กิโล), Si Sawat 71250
description: No description found

name: Baan Parimtarn Kanchanaburi
address: 171/1 Baan Parimtarn, Ban Tha Thung Na 71000
description: Located in Kanchanaburi, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. Jump into your car and tackle the 34-minute drive to Bridge Over the River Kwai or the 11-minute drive to Erawan National Park (and enjoy of the property's convenient onsite parking in the meantime). Relax in the garden or sip a drink on the balcony or patio of this villa (and be sure to enjoy the sun loungers and pool umbrellas)! As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. The kitchen is equipped with a stovetop, a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, a microwave, and cookware.Expedia

name: Heaven Hill Camping
description: With Hellfire Pass Museum reachable in 19 km, Heaven Hill Camping offers accommodation, a restaurant, a garden, a shared lounge and a terrace. The luxury tent features both WiFi and private parking free of charge. There is a private bathroom with shower in every unit, along with free toiletries, a hairdryer and slippers. Heaven Hill Camping offers a à la carte or Asian breakfast. A barbecue is available for guests to use at the accommodation. Daowadung Cave is 4 km from Heaven Hill Camping, while Chong Khao Khat is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Dawei Airport, 265 km from the luxury tent.

name: The St. Regis Bangkok
description: Experience the splendor of Bangkok, Thailand, from our five-star luxury hotel in Siam. Find us near Bangkok's elite business institutions, many superb restaurants, boutique shops and attractions like the Erawan Shrine, Central World, Gaysorn Village, Lumphini Park and Ratchaprasong District. Travel throughout Bangkok and visit sites like Siam Paragon on the BTS Skytrain via the nearby Rajadamri Station. After exploring the Bangkok city center, pamper yourself with a signature treatment at Clinique La Prairie Longevity Hub, lounge on our hotel's 15th-floor pool deck or sip a signature cocktail at any of our eight-inspired restaurants and bars. At the end of the day, retreat to a five-star hotel room or suite featuring multi-bedroom layouts, Thai-inspired décor, luxury amenities and our signature 24-hour St. Regis Butler service. Revel in unobstructed views of the greenery of The Royal Bangkok Sports Club and the skyline of Siam Bangkok.Marriott

name: Park Hyatt Bangkok
description: Offering an outdoor pool and views of the city, Park Hyatt Bangkok is located in Bangkok, 100 metres from Central Embassy. The hotel has a sun terrace and spa centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Some units have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Each room comes with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Central Childlom is 350 metres from Park Hyatt Bangkok, while Siam Paragon is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 21 km from Park Hyatt Bangkok.

name: Wora Bura Hua Hin Resort And Spa
description: Wora Bura offers spacious rooms with LCD TVs, a large free-form pool with a hot tub, and 5 restaurants and bars. It is 75 metres from Hua Hin's beaches along the Siam Gulf. Guests enjoy a herbal welcome drink and fruits upon arrival. A 5-minute walk from Cicada Night Market, Wora Bura Hua Hin Resort & Spa - SHA Plus PLUS consist of low-rise buildings of Thai-Colonial style surrounding the outdoor pool and garden. The resort is 50 metres from Jedeeluang Temple and 70 metres from Walking Street. It is 100 metres from Way Prasri. Guests have a selection of luxurious rooms and villas that feature spectacular views of the outdoor landscape from private balconies. Guests can relax at the resort's Wora Spa, which offers an extensive spa menu, and children can play at the kid's club. Shuttle bus transfers heading to Hua Hin town are provided as per hotel's schedule. Boasting both outdoor and indoor seating areas, Chulamongkut Restaurant offers international buffet breakfast and mount-watering dishes from around the world. Rak Talay restaurant serves delectable dinner, such as homemade pasta and grilled seafood, at open-air terraces with panoramic views of the Hua Hin Bay as a background. A light lunch menu and refreshments are provided at The Chonlamark Pool Bar set in a tropical surrounding at the resort's curved pool.

name: Kantary Beach Hotel Villas & Suites, Khao Lak
description: Discover the allure of Kantary Beach Hotel Villas & Suites, where modern beachfront accommodations meet comfort and style. Immerse yourself in the luxury of our well-appointed rooms, each equipped with a flat-screen TV for your entertainment. Enjoy a range of exceptional amenities including an inviting outdoor pool, a well-equipped fitness center, and a variety of dining options. Stay seamlessly connected with complimentary WiFi throughout your stay. Nestled amidst lush tropical surroundings, our air-conditioned rooms at Kantary Beach offer a private sanctuary, boasting balconies that provide stunning beach or garden views. Inside, you'll find cable TV and a secure safe for your valuables. Our spacious rooms also feature a convenient kitchenette, complete with facilities for tea and coffee making, a refrigerator, and ample space for in-room dining. Experience the tranquil beauty of the sea from the comfort of the beachside, and entrust our dedicated 24-hour front desk staff to assist you in arranging leisure activities and transportation to enhance your stay. Indulge your palate with sumptuous buffet spreads at Kantary's main restaurant, or unwind at our pool bar and café, offering a delightful selection of light refreshments. Whether you're seeking relaxation or adventure, Kantary Beach Hotel Villas & Suites provides the ideal backdrop for an unforgettable getaway.

name: Hotel Baraquda Heeton Pattaya by Compass Hospitality
address: 485/1 Moo 10 Pattaya 2 Road, Tambon Nong Prue, Amphoe Banglamung, Chonburi, Pattaya 20260
description: Hotel Baraquda Pattaya by Heeton offers stylish and luxurious accommodation with free Wi-Fi. It has a spa, fitness room and a large outdoor pool. Hotel Baraquda Pattaya by Heeton is approximately a 1,5-hour drive from Bangkok. It is located next to the Avenue Lifestyle Mall and a 20-minute ferry ride to Koh Larn (Coral Island) Each room offers spacious interiors which are fitted with fine bedding and furnishings. They have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a minibar. Guests will also find slippers and electric kettle in all rooms. Arrangements to local attractions and chargeable airport transfer services can also be arranged by the hotel. Asian cuisine and fresh seafood is served at the hotel's signature s.e.a restaurant.

name: Rawi Warin Resort and Spa
description: Rawi Warin Resort And Spa - SHA Extra Plus offers 5-star luxury with 4 large outdoor pools, fitness centre. Boasting 5 dining options, it offers stunning views of Klong Tob Bay. Featuring spacious layouts and private balconies, modern Thai-style rooms have fine wood furnishings and flooring. They are fitted with cable TV. A fridge and tea/coffee making amenities are provided. For relaxation, there is a library and games room with numerous facilities. Leisure activities can be planned at the tour desk. Specialising in seafood dishes, The Watermark offers diners a memorable outdoor dining experience. Hearty breakfasts and international dishes are available at The Golden Pond. The Wave Bar serves light refreshments. Rawi Warin Resort And Spa - SHA Extra Plus is a 2-hour car and ferry transfer from Krabi Airport. From Krabi Airport, it is about an hour’s flight from Suvarnabhumi International Airport.

name: Dusit Thani Pattaya
description: Located in Pattaya, Dusit Thani Pattaya offers relaxed 5-star accommodation, as well as an outdoor heated pool, a private beach and outdoor tennis courts. Guests also have exclusive access to the Devarana Spa and DFIT and Wellness Facilities. Dusit Thani offers free wireless internet, as well as a garden for guests to relax in. The hotel's amenities, such as meeting rooms, executive floor and photocopier, kids pool, kids club and playground, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms at Dusit Thani in Pattaya are air-conditioned and include slippers, a mini bar and a refrigerator. They come with an in-room safe, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Dusit Thani Pattaya Hotel provides a range of places to have a meal, including Cascade and The Lobby Lounge. Places to dine at the hotel include Dusit Gourmet and The Bay Restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a drink at Chaba Pool Bar. Dusit Thani Pattaya Resort is located in the heart of Pattaya’s entertainment district with restaurants, cafés and nightlife on the doorstep. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every guest has an enjoyable visit.Revato

name: Asira Boutique Huahin
description: Situated in Hua Hin, in a building dating from 2016, Asira Boutique HuaHin features an outdoor swimming pool and guestrooms with free WiFi. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Hua Hin Fishing Pier is 700 metres from the hotel and Hua Hin Night Market is 900 metres away. All units in the hotel are fitted with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A desk and wardrobe are also featured. Asira Boutique HuaHin offers certain rooms that have a balcony and pool view. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Guests can make use of the fitness centre. Klai Kangwon Palace is a 12-minute walk from Asira Boutique HuaHin.

name: Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya
description: Stop at Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya to discover the wonders of Pattaya. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, gift/souvenir shop, wheelchair accessible, are at hand. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, additional bathroom, additional toilet, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, massage. Hard Rock Hotel Pattaya is an excellent choice from which to explore Pattaya or to simply relax and rejuvenate.priceline.com

name: The Yana Villas Hua Hin
address: 122/138 Soi Mooban Takieb, Nongkae, Hua Hin
description: Located in Hua Hin, a few steps from Khao Takiab Beach, The Yana Villas Hua Hin provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a terrace and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Guest rooms at the resort come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms come with a patio and others also offer sea views. The units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, American or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near The Yana Villas Hua Hin include Hua Hin Beach, Khao Takiap Temple and Cicada Market. The nearest airport is Hua Hin Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Bakantiang Resort
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Bakantiang Resort is located in Ko Lanta. Featuring free WiFi access, rooms come with a large balcony. It is 900 metres from Ba Kan Tieng Bay and 1.6 km from Klong Jark Bay. Lanta Old Town is 5 km away. Air-conditioned rooms provide a flat-screen satellite TV and a seating area. There is also a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities. Free toiletries, a hairdryer and shower are in the private bathroom. Guests staying at Bakantiang Resort can enjoy sea views while dining at the on-site restaurant. Arrangements can be made for excursions, taxis and bicycle rental. The property offers free parking.

name: The Chiang Mai Old Town
address: 184 Ratchamanka Road, Phra Sing, Chiang Mai 50200
description: The Chiang Mai Old Town has free bikes, outdoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and garden in Chiang Mai. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel offers a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel all rooms have air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The Chiang Mai Old Town features some units that feature a balcony, and every room includes a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. Popular points of interest near The Chiang Mai Old Town include Wat Phra Singh, Chedi Luang Temple and Three Kings Monument. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 3 km from the hotel.

name: iSanook Resort & Suites Hua Hin
address: 14/88 Soi Mooban Huadon Tambon Nongkae, Hua Hin 77120
description: Situated in Hua Hin, 600 metres from Khao Takiab Beach, iSanook Resort & Suites Hua Hin features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. 1.7 km from Hua Hin Beach and 700 metres from Hua Hin - Pattaya Ferry, the property offers a bar and a garden. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe. All rooms at iSanook Resort & Suites Hua Hin have air conditioning and a desk. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. iSanook Resort & Suites Hua Hin offers a sun terrace. Khao Takiap Temple is 1.1 km from the hotel, while Cicada Market is 2.8 km from the property.

name: Intercontinental Hua Hin Resort, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Hua Hin Resort blends Eastern and Western design heritage set alongside sparkling gulf waters for a truly alluring destination. Two accommodation wings feature spacious rooms and suites as well as a swimming pool at each wing. Facilities and amenities include a spa, a fitness centre, versatile event spaces and wide-ranging food and drink venues. Club InterContinental accommodation level, meanwhile, provides guests with more benefits and highly personalised service.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Homestay Chiangrai
address: 240 Soi 5 Moo 2 Ban Hong O, Chiang Rai 57000
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, laundry facilities, and towels.Expedia

name: Rest Detail Hotel Hua Hin
description: Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, Rest Detail offers relaxing stays in chic beachfront accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Featuring a spa, it features a sparkling turquoise pool that meets the beach. Offering modern décor with colourful touches, spacious rooms fresh white linen and classic furnishings. In-room comforts include a flat-screen cable TV, DVD player and electric kettle. An en suite bathroom comes with bathtub and separate shower. Just 5 km from Hua Hin Airport, Rest Detail Hotel Hua Hin is within a 15-minute walk from Hua Hin Night Market. It provides airport transfers and free parking. Pampering massages and beauty treatments await at Restfully Yours Spa. Alternatively, guests can go on hiking and cycling trips with the travel services available. Featuring buffet breakfast in a garden setting, pool views accompany Thai and Mediterranean dishes at the hotel’s restaurant.

name: Pai Village Boutique Resort
description: Situated along the banks of Pai River, within tropical gardens, Pai Village Boutique Resort provides rustic wooden cottages. It provides massage services and is only a 5-minute walk from Wat Pa Kham Temple. Traditional Thai massages await guests at The Mamalon Massage. To complement the experience, relax at The Baan Pai’s landscaped Koi pond garden. Free WiFi is also available in the public areas. Featuring private balconies, the Thai-style cottages present beautiful views of the mountain or garden. They have an electric kettle, a seating area and a private bathroom equipped with a hot shower and free toiletries. A surcharged shuttle service to or from Chiang Mai can be arranged upon request. The Blue Ox provides a relaxing setting to enjoy local specialties with a wide selection of wines. Room service is available. Pai Village Boutique Resort is a 10-minute walk from the bus station, while Pai Airport is a 15-minute drive away. Pai Market and Wat Luang Temple are a 5-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Arden Hotel and Residence
address: 42/111 Moo 9, T. Nongprue A. Banglamung, Pattaya 20150
description: Situated in Central Pattaya, Arden Hotel and Residence by At Mind offers stylish accommodation with state-of-the-art facilities. Guests can also make the most of complimentary internet throughout the property. The hotel features an all-hours reception, as well as a shuttle service and a safe. For added convenience, it offers a business centre, a wake-up service and a laundry service. There are 141 rooms at Arden Hotel and Residence by At Mind, each offering all the necessities to ensure a comfortable stay. The hotel's on-site restaurant, Mind Terrace, is a popular place to enjoy a meal. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés in the local area. The location of Arden Hotel and Residence by At Mind permits easy access to multiple tourist attractions on foot. Guests can also visit Pattaya Beach and Central Festival Pattaya Beach.Revato

name: Le Méridien Chiang Rai Resort, Thailand
description: Discover tranquility and peace at Le Méridien Chiang Rai Resort, Thailand. Our five-star hotel is situated on the banks of the Kok River close to the city's most compelling attractions. Chiang Rai is a city rich in culture and history, promising an enchanting stay for any traveller. Indulge in curated cuisines from our on-site restaurants such as Favola, our signature Italian restaurant, or all-day dining at Latest Recipe. Energise your travels in Chiang Rai, Thailand at our modern fitness centre or relaxing Parvati Spa. Every room at our resort boasts signature bedding, enhanced accommodation and a private balcony with panoramic views of our natural surroundings. Host meetings, bridal parties or MICE events in our thoughtfully appointed venues. Unlock the wonders of Northern Thailand at Le Méridien Chiang Rai Resort, Thailand.Marriott

name: Fresh Inn Hotel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 45 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary bottled water. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as an indoor pool and a lazy river. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and a reception hall. Property Location FRESH INN HOTEL - SHA Extra Plus is centrally located in Hua Hin, a 4-minute walk from Hua Hin Beach and 6 minutes by foot from Hua Hin Shopping Mall. This hotel is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Hua Hin Railway Station and 0.6 mi (1 km) from Hua Hin Night Market. Dining Enjoy local and international cuisine at Fresh Restaurant, one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Breakfast fee: between THB 70 and THB 200 per person (approximately) Nearby parking fee: THB 60 per night (1640 ft away) Late check-out is available for a fee (subject to availability, amount varies) Rollaway bed fee: THB 942.0 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at anytime The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation This property accepts credit cards and cash Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a smoke detector, a security system, and a first aid kit Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property If you are planning to arrive after 11:30 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. When traveling to Thailand, you may be required to quarantine at an SHA Extra Plus hotel. Check government regulations for quarantine details.
