Travelers booking a quarantine hotel need to use the pay now option. Unless specified, booking does not include COVID-19 test or airport transfer, which are mandatory requirements. To obtain Thailand Pass entry, select the appropriate COVID-19 test and airport transfer add-on or if unavailable, pay the hotel directly for these services after booking your stay. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:30 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals not allowed General instructions Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safety and Health Administration (Thailand) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Individually-wrapped food options are available Individually-wrapped food options are available for breakfast Gap period enforced between guest stays - 72 hours Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measuresViajes Exito Hotels

name: Pullman Khon Kaen Raja Orchid
description: Pullman Khon Kaen Raja Orchid, an international premium branded hotel at the city center. 10-minute drive from Airport. A short walk to Central Plaza Khon Kaen, food streets & Ton Tann Night Market. 293 Wifi connected rooms & suites with separate shower & tub starting room size 43 sqm. 2 restaurants, 2 bars, 14 meeting rooms (ballroom 1,400 sqm), a fitness, a day spa & an outdoor pool. Khon Kaen University, Khon Kaen Ram & Bangkok Hospital made Khon Kaen known as an education, medical & wellness hub.accorhotels.com

name: The Sukhothai Bangkok
description: A tranquil garden paradise in central Bangkok, the luxurious Sukhothai Bangkok offers extra spacious rooms featuring teakwood furnishing and Thai silks. A 10-minute walk from Lumphini MRT Subway Station, it provides pampering spa services, free WiFi and free parking. An outdoor swimming pool and eight dining options await guests. Fitted with elegant wooden floors, the air-conditioned rooms and suites at The Sukhothai Bangkok are equipped with large flat-screen TVs, iPod docks and Nespresso coffee makers. Modern en suite bathrooms come with separate bathtubs and rain showers. A relaxing menu of massage and facials can be enjoyed at Spa Botanica. To get a full workout, guests may exercise at the 24-hour fitness centre, or play a game of tennis and squash. Recognized as the “Best Restaurant in Bangkok” by Travel and Leisure magazine, Celadon Restaurant serves delicious authentic Thai cuisine. Other must-try dining options include the champagne Sunday brunch and its signature chocolate buffet. Italian dishes can also be enjoyed at La Scala Restaurant. The hotel is a short drive from Bangkok's financial district, the Chao Phraya River and shopping venues. The Royal Bangkok Sports Club is less than 3 km away, while Suvarnabhumi International Airport is approximately a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hotel La Villa Khon Kaen
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Kasikorn Tung Sang Lake, Hotel La Villa Khon Kaen features cosy rooms with a cable TV. Boasting an outdoor pool, it also offers a spa and an on-site restaurant. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the residence. Khon Kaen University is a 10-minute drive from Hotel La Villa. Central Shopping Centre, Khon Kaen Train Station and Khon Kaen Airport are a 15-minute ride away. Rooms at the hotel features wooden floors and offer air conditioning, a cable TV, fridge, kettle and hairdryer. En suite bathrooms are fitted with shower facilities. Guests can take a dip in the pool to relax or enjoy pampering massage treatments at the spa. For convenience, laundry service and on-site parking are provided. Enjoy an extensive international a la carte menu offered at the hotel's restaurant.

name: Wangchan Riverview
description: Situated in Phitsanulok, 1.1 km from Wat Phra Si Rattana Mahathat, Wangchan Riverview features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking and a shared lounge. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space for guests. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Wangchan Riverview also boast a city view. The rooms at the accommodation have air conditioning and a desk. Wangchan Riverview offers an American or Asian breakfast. The nearest airport is Phitsanulok, 4 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Thai Garden Resort
description: Just 1 km from Pattaya Bay, the 4-star Thai Garden Resort offers luxurious rooms with free Wi-Fi. Nestled within palm trees, the large lagoon swimming pool is bordered by sun loungers. Airport shuttles are available at an extra charge. Each of the resort’s spacious rooms is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, a seating area and air conditioning. They are fitted with crisp white linens, dark wood furniture and a modern bathroom with large mirrors. The resort provides traditional Thai massages and foot reflexology sessions, which can be enjoyed in rooms or in the resort’s gardens. Breakfast is available at Lanna Coffee Shop. Wong Amat Beach is located 2.5 km from Thai Garden Resort, while the popular Walking Street Pattaya is about 3 km away.

name: Thipurai City Hotel
address: 4/1,8/5 Soi Kanjanomai Poolsuk Rd, Hua Hin 77110
description: About 200 metres from Hua Hin Beach and Night Market, Thipurai features an outdoor pool and a restaurant with ocean and city views. It offers accommodation with a seating area. Thipurai City Hotel is 600 km from Hua Hin Railway Station and about 9 km from Hua Hin Airport. Fitted with tiled flooring, Thipurai City features air conditioning and a private bathroom with hot showers. In addition to a TV with cable channels, a minibar is included. Some rooms feature private balconies with panoramic views. Guests can arrange for day trips at the tour desk or use the business centre. Alternatively, they can enjoy a variety of water sports on Hua Hin Beach. Thipurai City Hotel features Thai and European Buffest breakfast dishes.

name: Centara Grand At Centralworld
description: The luxurious Centara Grand At CentralWorld is located in Pathumwan, a 10-minute stroll from Chidlom BTS Skytrain Station. Big on Thai hospitality, it offers an outdoor pool and 9 dining options. Free WiFi is available throughout. Centara Grand CentralWorld is placed adjacent to CentralWorld Department Store. It offers an easy access to other shopping centres, such as MBK, Siam Paragon and Siam Square, where guests can find a huge number of leading restaurants, trendy stuff and traditional souvenirs. Suvarnabhumi Airport is about 23 km from the hotel. For guests who drive, parking is free. Lined with clear floor-to-ceiling windows, rooms at Centara Grand are elegantly decorated with soothing colours. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV and personal safe. The spacious bathrooms come with a bathtub and bathrobes. The award-winning Spa Cenvaree provides private massage rooms and pampering spa pools. Guests may also enjoy a game of tennis or exercise at the fitness centre. CRU Champagne Bar, Uno Mas and Red Sky Bar enjoy sky-high views of Bangkok City.Other dining options include The World International Restaurant, Dynasty, serving Cantonese cuisine and Zing Café. Cocktails and fruit juice can be enjoyed at the hotel’s 4 bars.

name: Sea Breeze Resort
address: 94/11 Moo 6 Baantai Haad Rin, Ko Pha Ngan 84280
description: This boutique resort is located at Haad Rin, 5 minutes walking from the famous Full Moon Party area. It is set within landscaped gardens and offers panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. The guestrooms of the Sea Breeze are decorated in contemporary Thai style and feature balconies, TVs and a minibar. All rooms are air conditioned. An open-air restaurant is situated at the roof top and serves a fusion of Thai and international cuisine. Facilities of the Sea Breeze Resort include and outdoor pool with jacuzzi® overlooking the ocean and massage treatments. The property is a getaway to explore nearby Leela Beach of and the lively Haad Rin Pier. Guests can benefit from free private parking upon request.

name: Ayrest Hua Hin Hotel
description: Ayrest Hotel is located 5 km from Hua Hin Beach. Boasting Thai-style architecture, it offers well-decorated rooms and an outdoor pool. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The centre of Hua Hin is just a 15-minute ride away. Offering free on-site parking, Ayrest Hotel is located 200 metre away from Hua Hin Hospital. The famous Ploen Warn Market is located 2 km from the hotel, while The Venezia Hua Hin Shopping Mall is located 4 km away. Stylish and comfortable rooms have a private balcony, air conditioning and an en suite bathroom. They come with a flat-screen TV, a fridge and a safety box. Some rooms offer a spa bath. Guests can relax at the garden area. For convenience, the hotel provides a 24-hour front desk and meeting facilities. For meals, enjoy a variety of Thai and international dishes served at the restaurants located around the property.

name: Kavin Buri Green Hotel
description: Featuring a rooftop restaurant and swimming pool, Kavin Buri Green Hotel is located in Udon Thani. This hotel offers free WiFi access. The rooms at Kavin Buri Green Hotel are air-conditioned and provide a flat-screen cable TV. There is also a balcony and a minibar. A shower and hairdryer can be found in the en suite bathroom. Facilities here include a fitness room, a 24-hour reception and free airport transfers. Thai and international food is served at the restaurant between 06:00 to 23:00 hrs. Free parking is available. The hotel is a convenient 5-minute walk from Central Plaza Udon Thani and UD Town. Udon Thani Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Sofia Garden Resort
address: 31/28 Moo4, Klong Prao Beach, Ko Chang
description: Surrounded by tropical landscape, Sofia Garden is a 15-minute walk from Klong Phrao Beach and 15 km from Koh Chang Pier. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Sofia Garden Resort features a blend of traditional and modern architecture. Fitted with either a fan or air conditioning, the resort’s rooms come with a private bathroom and cable TV. A minibar is also included. Guests may relax at the resort’s sauna or go for a relaxing massage. They can also make travel arrangements with the tour desk. Aside from barbecue facilities and car rental services, the resort also offers free parking. Resort Sofia Garden’s restaurant serves a selection of local and Western dishes. It also houses a bar, which offers a variety of drinks. Alternatively, room service is available.

name: Amari Pattaya
description: The luxurious Amari Pattaya along Northern Pattaya is about 3 km from the famous Walking Street. It offers stunning sea views, an outdoor pool with a pool bar. Free parking and free WiFi is available in all rooms. Amari Pattaya is 84 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Bangkok is a 2-hour ride away. The property also offers chargeable airport transfer services. All guest rooms and suites feature panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows or a private balcony overlooking the glittering bay. Fitted with wooden floors and warm lighting, they come with satellite TV, slippers and minibar. En suite bathrooms includes free toiletries and toothbrushes. Breeze Spa features a range of relaxing body massage and beauty treatments. Guests can also exercise at the fitness centre. Water sports activities are also available at the beach.

name: Iron Resort&hotel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a garden. Property Location Located in Phitsanulok, Iron Resort&Hotel is within a 15-minute drive of Wat Phra Sri Rattana Mahatat Woramahawihan and Naresuan University. This hotel is within the region of Wat Si Phirom Temple and Wat Tha Luang. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Cash deposit: THB 100.00 per stay We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 20 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts cash Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No rollaway/extra beds available No cribs (infant beds) available Cash deposit required Property is cleaned with disinfectant Staff wears personal protective equipment Protective clothing is available to guests Masks are available to guests Shield between guests and staff in main contact areas Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property follows regional sanitization guidelines Safety and Health Administration (Thailand) Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Gap period enforced between guest stays - 24 hours Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Temperature checks are available to guests Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Guest accommodation is sealed after cleaning Electrostatic spray is used for disinfection Cashless transactions are available Masks are compulsory at the propertyViajes Exito Hotels

name: Slive Hotel
description: Located in Surin, Slive Hotel features accommodations with a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Situated opposite to Surin Hospital, guests can relax at the roof garden on the 4th floor or make use of free private parking on site while staying at Slive Hotel. Every room at this hotel is air-conditioned and features a 40-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Certain rooms have a seating area for guests' convenience. Guests will find a kettle in the room. The rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. Complimentary minibar is included in all units. Offering a 24-hour front desk, the property also provides bicycles for guests to use free of charge. Free shuttle services within the town is available. Buri Ram Airport is 76 km from Slive Hotel. The property offers airport shuttle services at an additional charge.

name: The Residence Resort & Spa Retreat
description: Luxurious villas with private pools, full kitchen facilities and spacious lounge areas await at The Residence Resort. A 2-minute drive from Bangtao Beach, it boasts a spa and fitness facilities. Free Wi-Fi is available inside the property. Featuring a rooftop area for outdoor dining and barbecues, these large villas offer warm colour schemes and laundry facilities. There is a TV, DVD player and spacious bathrooms. The Residence Resort & Spa Retreat provides a free shuttle service to Tesco Lotus and Bangtao Beach (Catch Beach Club). It is a 25-minute drive from Patong’s nightlife and a 30-minute drive from Phuket International Airport. Guests can enjoy meals throughout the day from 06:30 - 21:30 hrs in the privacy of their own villas. For dinner, a personal chef can also prepare private barbecues in villas.

name: Banyan Tree Bangkok
description: Banyan Tree Bangkok is located on South Sathon Road in the city's central business district and lies just 40 minutes from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. With every modern amenity and facility you can desire, including the award-winning Banyan Tree Sp a and 24-hour business centre, the resort is a hushed sanctuary offering you the gift of rejuvenation even as you escape from the bustle of fast-paced city living.accorhotels.com

name: Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin
address: 33/17 Soi Mooban Huadon, Petchasem Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: A lovely beachfront property just outside Hua Hin Town, Anantasila Beach Resort Hua Hin offers a relaxing getaway with an outdoor pool and sea-facing restaurant. Rooms and villas are nestled amidst tropical gardens. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings and beddings, Anantasila’s rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows with views of surrounding greenery. Each room comes with cable TV, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Private bathrooms have a bathtub and shower. Guests can play a round of mini golf, or relax on the sun loungers provided on the beach. Massages can be enjoyed on the beach, by the pool, or in the privacy of guests’ rooms. Beach views accompany meals at the restaurant, which serves Thai, Western and Italian specialities. Cocktails are available at the beach bar. Anantasila Villa is a 15-minute drive from Hua Hin’s town centre. It provides a free shuttle to a bus stop where guests can catch a minibus to the town centre.

name: Teak Garden Resort, Chiang Rai
address: 155 International Airport Road, Moo 19, Chiang Rai 57100
description: Located 2 km from Chiang Rai Airport, Teak Garden Spa Resort offers free roundtrip airport transfers and free Wi-Fi in public areas. It has spacious rooms with private bathroom facilities. Rooms at Teak Garden Resort are decorated with wooden flooring and well-equipped with air-conditioning, cable TV, and a minibar. Bathrobes and hairdryers are also provided. Guests can relax at the outdoor swimming pool or enjoy the sun on the lounge chairs. There is also a Spa which provides Thai massages and other body treatments. Teak Garden Spa Resort, Chiang Rai has a restaurant which serves local and Western dishes. Meals can be enjoyed in the privacy of guest’s room. Other services at the resort include luggage storage facilities, car rentals and laundry services. The resort is 10 km to Chiang Rai City Centre and the night market. Guests will find rice fields opposite the resort.

name: Phi Phi Coco Beach Resort
address: 299 Moo 7, Tambon Aonang, Ko Phi Phi 81210
description: Featuring a garden, terrace and free WiFi, Phi Phi CoCo Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus is located in Phi Phi Don, less than 1 km from Ton Sai Pier and 3.6 km from Ao Poh Bay. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. The property is 5.5 km from Viking Cave and 800 metres from Pirate Island Adventures. All guest rooms at the resort are fitted with a seating area and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. The restaurant at Phi Phi CoCo Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus serves European cuisine. Snorkelling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near the accommodation. Loh Dalum Bay is 200 metres from Phi Phi CoCo Beach Resort - SHA Extra Plus, while Monkey Beach is 500 metres from the property.

name: Kuad Khon Thoe Pai Cottage
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge). Property Location Located in Pai, Kuad Khon Thoe Pai Cottage is a 3-minute drive from Pai Memorial Bridge and 6 minutes from Tha Pai Hot Springs. This hotel is 4.5 mi (7.3 km) from Pai Hospital and 4.6 mi (7.4 km) from Walking Street. Dining Breakfast is available daily from 8 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Rollaway beds are available for an additional fee The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at 9:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 15 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards and cash This property offers transfers from the airport. Guests must contact the property with arrival details 24 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. The front desk is open daily from 7 AM - 10 PM. This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:00 AM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No cribs (infant beds) available Social distancing measures are in placeViajes Exito Hotels

name: Layana Resort & Spa
description: Layana Resort and Spa is located in Ko Lanta and offers free Wi-Fi. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Linger Longer Spa and Wellness Pool. Guests staying at Layana Resort and Spa can enjoy taking a dip in the outdoor pool, working out in the fitness centre or unwinding with a drink in the bar. Guests can try out the recreational facilities on offer, such as a sauna and a playground. There is also free private parking on site for those travelling with a car. Each room is equipped with an iPod docking station, a mini bar and a refrigerator. All are air conditioned and provide slippers, an in-room dining area and a flat-screen TV. Layana Resort houses Seasky, which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and provides guests with all they need for an enjoyable night within the resort. Located within a short walk of Layana Resort And Spa Koh Lanta is Serenity Massage and Spa. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Ko Lanta.Revato

name: Sirin Hotel Hua Hin
description: Enjoying a prime location on Hua Hin's popular walking street, Damnernkasem Road, Sirin Hotel offers value-for-money rooms with private balconies, within walking distance of the beach, dining and shopping options. Rooms enjoy much natural light and feature wooden flooring. They offer views of the pool and city and come air-conditioned and equipped with a minibar, satellite TV and a safe. A hairdryer and slippers are also provided. The Sirin has an outdoor swimming pool bordered by sun loungers. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. For meals, visit the on-site Sirin Restaurant to sample some of its signature dishes like the fish curry and the smoked salmon with Thai herbs. It also offers fresh coconut juice and other refreshing beverages to accompany the meals. Sirin Hotel is located within a 3-hour drive from Bangkok. Hua Hin Night Market is only about 750 metres away.

name: Reverie Siam
description: Offering 2 outdoor pools and an all-day Mediterranean and contemporary Thai cuisine restaurant, Reverie Siam is located in Pai. Guests can enjoy extensive collection of wines and live performances. It features traditional Thai with vintage colonial style accommodation with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi access, which is available in all areas. On-site parking is possible. Situated on the back of Pai River, Reverie Siam is just a 5-minute ride from Pai Walking Street and a 10-minute ride from Pai Airport. Chiang Mai International Airport is situated 85 km away. The van transit with chauffer can be arranged. Each well-decorated unit features a private balcony with outdoor furniture. It has a seating area, a flat-screen cable TV and a fridge. Free handmade toiletries are provided in an en suite bathroom. An electric kettle, a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are provided. For convenience, the property offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage facility. A laundry service can be arranged upon request and a free airport transfer and shuttle service to Pai walking street can also be organised. Guests can enjoy European dishes for breakfast and dinner at Silhouette Bar.

name: Marlin Hotel
description: Set in Suratthani, 9.3 km from Surat Thani Railway Station, Marlin Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The units at the hotel feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, DVD player, and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Marlin Hotel can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. Surat Thani Rajabhat University is 11 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Surat Thani Airport, 23 km from Marlin Hotel.

name: The Zense Boutique Hotel
description: Set in Phitsanulok, 5.5 km from Wat Phra Si Rattana Mahathat, The Zense Boutique Hotel offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The hotel has a terrace and pool views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. The Zense Boutique Hotel provides some units that feature a patio, and each room has a kettle. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot tub. The nearest airport is Phitsanulok Airport, 9 km from The Zense Boutique Hotel.

name: De Princess Hotel Udonthani
description: De Princess Hotel Udonthani is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Udon Thani. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, infirmary, taxi service, are at hand. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with closet, complimentary tea, dressing room, towels, scale. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, outdoor pool, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Udon Thani, De Princess Hotel Udonthani will make you feel instantly at home.priceline.com

name: Phi Phi Arboreal Resort
description: Located atop a hill on Phi Phi Island, this resort offers spacious rooms with panoramic views of the Tonsai Cliffs, tropical rainforest and the sea. Fitted with tiled flooring, the air-conditioned rooms at Phi Phi Arboreal Resort feature a private balcony with a seating area. A TV with satellite channels and tea/coffee making facilities are included. Phi Phi Arboreal is less than a 10-minute walk from the island's shopping centre and nightlife.It is a 15-minute walk to Phi Phi Tonsai Pier. Phuket or Krabi Islands can be reached via a 90-minute ferry ride. The resort’s restaurant serves a daily American breakfast, with Thai specialities offered for lunch and dinner. In-room dining is possible. Guests can go for a massage or make travel arrangements at the tour desk. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available.

name: Siblanburi Resort
description: No description found

name: The Residence on Thonglor by UHG
description: Situated in Bangkok, The Residence On Thonglor By UHG provides 4-star accommodation, as well as a sauna and a rooftop pool. There is also a fitness centre with a sauna, a rooftop terrace and a swimming pool. The hotel features an all-hours reception, as well as meeting rooms and a concierge. For added convenience, it offers an airport shuttle, a safe and luggage storage. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a microwave and a rain shower. They are all soundproofed and include a kitchen, a private bathroom and slippers. The Residence On Thonglor By UHG's restaurant is open for breakfast, providing guests with a pleasant dining experience not far from their room. Alternatively, there are a range of cafés and restaurants within a short stroll. Located just a short walk from The Residence On Thonglor By UHG is Khlong Tan Nuea. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to ensure that every guest has a hassle-free stay.Revato

name: Phi Phi Chang Grand Resort
address: 197 Moo 7, Phi Phi Don Village, Ko Phi Phi 81000
description: Surrounded by greenery, Phi Phi Chang Grand Resort is a 5-minute walk to Ao Lodalum. It offers free Wi-Fi in public areas. Guests can enjoy diving as well as a relaxing massage. The resort is a 10-minute walk to Tonsai Bay. Phuket is a 2-hour ferry ride away. Fitted with a terrace, each air-conditioned room features cable TV, fridge and en suite bathroom with shower facilities. Travel arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Laundry services are available. Local restaurants are just a 2-minute walk away.

name: The Cabin Beach Resort
address: 130/63, Moo 6, Leela Coco Beach, Ko Pha Ngan 84280
description: Situated along the secluded Leela Beach on Koh Phangan, The Cabin Beach Resort offers beachfront accommodation decorated with an industrial loft theme. Free WiFi is available throughout. All rooms are fully furnished and come with air conditioning, a seating area and a TV. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower, complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer. Cabin Beach Resort is about 700 metres away from Haad Rin Beach where the famous Full Moon Party takes place. The property also offers a free pick-up service from Haad Rin Pier, which is about 1 km away.

name: Praseban Resort
description: Located along the white sands of Pranburi Beach, Praseban Resort offers luxurious rooms with free Wi-Fi, free public parking, an outdoor swimming pool and 2 restaurants. Rooms and villa's feature a private balcony with a view of the sea. Rooms feature air conditioning, satellite TV, minibar and large bathroom with hairdryer. Praseban Resort offers a sunbathing deck, laundry service and room service. Kanang Sari Restaurant has outdoor seating and serves Thai and international dishes. Praseban Seafood Terrace is an open-air restaurant offering fresh seafood. Praseban Resort is 30 km away from Hua Hin and is approximately a 3-hour drive form Bangkok.

name: Novotel Chiangmai Nimman Journeyhub
address: Soi Sreesud Huay Kaew Road, Chiang Mai 50300
description: The 4 star Novotel Chiang Mai Nimman JourneyHub is located at the heart of Chiang Mai, only 500 meters from MAYA Lifestyle Shopping Mall and MAYA theatres. It offers breathtaking views an outdoor pool, bar brand new guest rooms, restaurant featuring Thai and International cuisine, fitness center, gourmet bar and meeting facilities for up to 250 guests. Perfect for leisure and business travelers.accorhotels.com

name: Pp Princess Resort- Sha Extra Plus
description: Situated along Loh Dalum Bay on the famous Phi Phi Island, PP Princess Resort- SHA Extra Plus boasts it's own on-site restaurant, bar and a selection of accommodation types to choose from. Free WiFi is available in the public areas. PP Princess Resort- SHA Extra Plus is 2.6 km from Long Beach and 50 metres from Lo Da Lam Beach.The island's main pier, Ton Sai Pier is just a 5-minute walk away. Rooms at PP Princess feature a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and air-conditioning. En suite bathrooms come with shower facilities, a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests will can enjoy activities including diving, fishing and snorkelling at the beach around the property. A concierge service, a laundry service and a tour desk are also available at PP Princess Resort- SHA Extra Plus. Guests can enjoy an American buffet breakfast from 07:00 - 10:30 hrs. While Mediterranean dishes and barbecue delights are available at The Media and Rom Mai deli.

name: Visa Hotel Hua Hin - Sha Plus
description: Boasting a year-round pool and sun terrace, VISA Hotel Hua Hin - SHA Plus offers simple and comfortable rooms with free WiFi in all areas. It is 1.5 from Hua Hin Night Market where local cuisines and souvenirs can be found. Rooms are air-conditioned and each are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and a safety deposit box. Guests can enjoy views while relaxing at the outdoor seating area on the balcony. The private bathrooms are fitted with a bath or shower, towels and free toiletries. VISA Hotel has a 24-hour front desk. The East Square Hua Hin is 850 metres away while Hua Hin Market Village is 900 metres away from the property. The city's famous Cicada Night Market is a 15-minute drive away. Hua Hin is located approximately a 3.5 hour drive away from Bangkok.

name: Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort
address: 8/15 Moo 4, Klong Prao Beach, Ko Chang 23170
description: Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort is set on Ko Chang and provides 4-star facilities in addition to free Wi-Fi. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool. This traditional resort provides a kids pool, porters and valet parking. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. Guests can also enjoy ocean views from the property's day spa. The rooms are air conditioned and include a mini bar, a refrigerator and a coffee maker. They each offer a private bathroom, an in-room safe and slippers. Guests of Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort are invited to experience international and Thai cuisine at Chantara Restaurant, or try Thai and international meals at By The Sea Restaurant and Bar. In the evening, guests can relax in the lounge bar. Santhiya Tree Koh Chang Resort provides an ideal place to discover nearby Lonely Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. It also borders Mu Ko Chang National Park.Revato

name: Nak Nakara Hotel-Sha Extra Plus
description: Nak Nakara Hotel-SHA Extra Plus is located within a 12-minute drive from the stunning Wat Rong Khun, the city’s most renowned temple built by a famous Thai painter. The hotel offers modern Lanna style rooms with free Wi-Fi. Massage services and an outdoor pool are available for guests to enjoy. The hotel is a 2-minute walk to Walking Street and Hill Tribe Museum. It is a 5-minute walk to Po Khun Meng Rai Monument. Night Bazaar and Chiang Rai Bus Terminal are a 5-minute ride away, while Chiang Rai Airport can be reached within a 15-minute ride away. Decorated with modern Lanna style in vibrant colours, each air-conditioned room comes with a satellite TV, a mosquito net and a refrigerator. An en suite bathroom is equipped with a shower and a hair dryer. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can offer assistance with car rentals and laundry service. A chargeable shuttle service can be arranged upon request. The hotel offers free private parking. Local restaurants are located within a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Shantaa Resort, Kohkood
description: Set in Ko Kood, 500 metres from Ao Tapao Beach, Shantaa Resort, Kohkood offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Built in 2003, the property is within 4.3 km of Klong Chao Waterfall. The resort features a Thai restaurant as well as free WiFi. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a balcony. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Shantaa Resort, Kohkood also have a sea view. At the accommodation, all rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options.

name: Pai Vieng Fah Resort
description: Located in scenic Pai, Vieng Fah Resort offers beautiful boutique accommodation nestled in tropical landscapes. It provides massage services, free shuttle services and free Wi-Fi. There is a restaurant on site. Sunrises and sunsets can be witnessed from Wat Phra That Mae Yen, located 1 km away. Surrounded by rice fields, all rooms come with private balconies that offer breathtaking views. They are decorated with fine furnishings and feature a fridge, cable TV and private bathroom facilities. Guests can soak up the sun on Pai Vieng Fah Resort’s terrace or enjoy a stroll in its gardens. Alternatively, the resort has a tour desk that organises excursions to local attractions. The Pai Vieng Fah’s restaurant serves breakfast daily. Other services at the resort include laundry and ironing facilities. Vieng Fah Resort’s free shuttle service brings guests to Pai Airport, bus stations and various popular areas, all located about 5 minutes away. The resort is a 5-minute drive from the town centre and Pai Walking Street is 1 km away.

name: Shanghai Mansion Bangkok
description: Winner of the 2019 Global Luxury World's Best City Design Hotel, Shanghai Mansion Bangkok is a boutique property that features stylish Art Deco inspired rooms, hip restaurants, and award-winning treatments at Spa Burasari. It is situated a brief walk from the Golden Buddha Statue and Chao Phraya River. This stylish 4.5-star hotel is located in Phra Nakhon and provides a butler service. Amenities include complimentary Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. Rooms at Shanghai Mansion Bangkok are individually-decorated and air conditioned, and provide a coffee maker, a refrigerator and a mini bar. Each have slippers, bottled water and a private bathroom with a shower. The hotel's restaurants, Cotton Breakfast Restaurant and Red Rose Restaurant, offer dinner nightly. Those wanting to socialise can take advantage of Shanghai Terrace, conveniently located on-site. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a range of popular restaurants and cafés in the local area to discover. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 40-minute drive from Shanghai Mansion Bangkok. The hotel has passed the quality test for hygiene and safety from Thailand's Department of Health, assuring all guests and customers with Standard Hygiene Procedure for COVID-19.Revato

name: Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok
description: Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok is a 5-star luxury hotel with resort-styled facilities and is strategically located in Bangkok’s downtown Rachaprasong area. Located at a cultural landmark, the Erawan Shrine, the hotel is conveniently linked to Chidlom BTS SkyTrain Stations and has easy access to Rajdamri BTS Stations and the city’s leading shopping centers like Central World, Siam Paragon, Erawan Mall and Gaysorn via Skywalk. The hotel location offers many leisure activities including Ocean World, the Jim Thompson House Museum, a skating rink, and a boat ride from Pratunum pier to Khao San road. The hotel is one of the most accessible base from which to explore Bangkok. Featuring stunning views of the cityscape, luxurious rooms incorporate contemporary interior and Thai elements into the design. All rooms feature ample workspace and a spacious bathroom with a rain shower and deep soaking bath. The rooms are equipped with Hyatt Grand Bed™, premium bath amenities, mobile entry, a flat-screen TV, laptop-size in-room safe, tea-making facility, mini-bar, pillow menu for personalized full relaxation, digital room service ordering app and free WiFi access. Guests staying in one of the hotel's Club rooms or suites enjoy elevated comfort and extensive benefits including daily breakfast and evening cocktails served at Grand Club Lounge. At the award-winning i.sawan Residential Spa & Club, guests can relax with a nourishing massage or other specialized treatment. Enjoy active workouts at the 24-hour fitness center or take a dip in the outdoor free-form swimming pool. With its 9 distinctive restaurants and bar, Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok is a gastronomic destination in the heart of Thailand's capital, showcasing an unrivaled variety of authentic local and global flavors. Whether private dining or an extravagant buffet, a light lunch or a leisurely afternoon tea, an authentic French croissant or Thai chocolate, Grand Hyatt Erawan Bangkok offers world-class dining experiences with exceptional service. Currently some restaurants may provide limited service or be temporarily closed. Operational hours may be changed. The hotel has a business center and concierge, fully equipped meeting rooms, and an extensive option of event spaces. Laundry and babysitting services are also available. Airport transfers and hotel limousine service can be arranged at an additional fee.

name: Mai Holiday by Mai Khao Lak
address: 9/17 Petchkasem Rd., Moo 1 Kuk Kak, Khao Lak 82190
description: Situated in Khao Lak, 2.8 km from Bang Sak Beach, Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, an ATM and luggage storage for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The units will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. An American breakfast is available each morning at Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone. You can play table tennis and tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for canoeing. Tsunami Memorial - Rue Tor 813 is 20 km from the accommodation, while Sairung Waterfall is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Phuket International Airport, 91 km from Mai Holiday by Mai Khaolak - Adult Zone.

name: Thee Vijit Lanna By Th District, Sha Extra Plus
address: 82/1 Chaiyaphum 2 Road, Chang Moi, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, THEE Vijit Lanna by TH District provides 4-star accommodation, as well as a swimming pool. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a tour desk and a 24-hour reception. There are a range of amenities available to guests of the property, including a car rental desk, room service and a terrace. Guests are able to enjoy a book in the on-site library. THEE Vijit Lanna by TH District features 39 air conditioned apartments filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, in addition to a private bathroom. Chiang Mai's attractions, such as Tha Pae Gate and Wat Chiang Man, are easily accessible on foot from THEE Vijit Lanna by TH District. Guests can also visit Wat Chedi Luang, Chiang Mai Night Bazaar and the Baan Haw Mosque.Revato

name: Maven Stylish Hotel Hua Hin
description: Situated in Hua Hin, 700 metres from Hua Hin Beach, Maven Stylish Hotel Hua Hin features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a kids' club and room service. Guests can enjoy Thai and international dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel rooms come with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a city view. The rooms have a safety deposit box. An American breakfast is available each morning at Maven Stylish Hotel Hua Hin. Speaking English and Thai at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Hua Hin Railway Station, Royal Hua Hin Golf Course and Hua Hin Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Hua Hin Airport, 7 km from Maven Stylish Hotel Hua Hin.

name: SYLVAN Koh Chang
description: SYLVAN Koh Chang is situated on Ko Chang, and offers 5-star accommodation in addition to a private beach. Guests also have exclusive access to the Rainforest Spa and Swimming Pool. Those staying at the resort can begin their day at Kids Area, or use the various leisure amenities, including an outdoor pool. There is also free public parking on site for guests travelling with a car. A kids club, a kids pool and free Wi-Fi are also available. The rooms at SYLVAN Koh Chang are air-conditioned and offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a refrigerator. Each includes a private bathroom with slippers, bathrobes and a shower. Guests of the resort can wake up to breakfast daily at Sunset Restaurant, plus dinner at Sea View 1989 in the evening. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at SYLVAN Koh Chang, there are a selection of restaurants located nearby. It is conveniently situated just moments from Mu Ko Chang National Park.Revato

name: Nicha Suite Hua Hin Hotel
address: 4/125 Soi Hua Hin 98, Nonggae, Hua Hin, Hua Hin 77110
description: Nicha Suite Hua Hin Hotel is a popular choice amongst travelers in Hua Hin / Cha-am, whether exploring or just passing through. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, 24-hour security, taxi service, 24-hour front desk, are at hand. Television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, towels, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including spa, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Hua Hin / Cha-am, Nicha Suite Hua Hin Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Phi Phi The Beach Resort
address: 177 Moo 7 Phi Phi Island, Ko Phi Phi 83000
description: Offering hillside accommodation with beautiful ocean views, Phi Phi The Beach Resort- SHA Certified is located on Phi Phi Island’s Long Beach. It features snorkelling and kayaking facilities, and an outdoor pool. Phi Phi The Beach Resort- SHA Certified is a 2-hour 30-minute journey from Phuket and Krabi Airports. The trip includes land and sea transfers. Featuring teak wood furnishings and private balconies, rooms at The Beach Resort Phi Phi come with satellite TV and tea/coffee making facilities. Private bathrooms provide hot and cold water. Guests can sign up for an excursion at the tour desk, then enjoy a traditional Thai massage after a day of sightseeing. Laundry service is available. An American buffet breakfast is served daily at the coffee shop. Thai, Western and seafood dishes can be sampled at the resort’s restaurant. The beach bar offers cocktails.

name: The Siam Heritage Hotel
description: The Siam Heritage Boutique Suites is a 5-minute walk from Patpong. The luxurious hotel features a restaurant, rooftop swimming pool and rooms with antique teak furnishings. Rooms and suites come with polished wood flooring and have plenty of natural light. All rooms have satellite TVs and tea/coffee making facilities. Select rooms are fitted with a kitchen with stove. Guests at Boutique Siam Heritage Suites can enjoy relaxing massages and spa treatments. The hotel also offers a fitness room and a tour desk. Currency exchange and laundry services are available. Traditional Thai dishes are served at the Siam Cuisine Restaurant, which also features an international and Asian menu. A pool bar offers a variety of drinks and delicious snacks. The Siam Heritage Boutique Suites is a 5-minute walk from Sam Yan MRT Subway Station and a 10-minute walk from Saladaeng BTS Skytrain Station.

name: Hilton Hua Hin Resort & Spa
description: Situated on the shores of the Gulf of Thailand, Hilton Hua Hin Resort & Spa is located in the heart of the royal town of Hua Hin yet tucked away from the hustle and bustle of city life: well-known for its royal legacy, pristine white beaches, shopping areas and golf courses. Find your respite in a traditional Thai massage or herbal steam bath at the luxurious eforea Spa, relax by the lagoon-shaped pool, or simply unwind from the privacy of the spacious guest room, each with private balcony and ocean views. Choose from an array of restaurant and bars, offering a range of options from fresh seafood and authentic Thai cuisine with International flair to hand-crafted cocktails at the Sky Bar on 17th floor. Host social gatherings or business meetings in this beautiful Hua Hin hotel supported by the latest audio/visual technology and five versatile function rooms for up to 600 guests.Hilton

name: Makmai Villa
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens, this property is situated on Mae Rum Peung Beach in the Rayong province. Featuring an outdoor pool, it offers rooms with a patio and free Wi-Fi access. Makmai Villa (Rayong) is a 10-minute drive from Baan Pae and the piers where guests can take a ferry to visit Samed Island. It is within a 30-minute drive from Lamthong Shopping Mall and Central Plaza Rayong. The villa is about a 3-hour drive from Bangkok City. Fitted with tiled flooring and a private balcony with a seating area, modern air-conditioned rooms feature a light blue theme. They are equipped with a fridge, satellite TV and a private bathroom. Meals can be ordered from the reception from 09:00 – 21:00. Airport shuttle can be arranged upon request at additional charges.

name: Chayadol Resort - Sha Extra Plus
description: A 5-minute drive from Central Plaza Chiang Rai Shopping Mall, Chayadol Resort features modern rooms with private balconies and free Wi-Fi, which is available throughout the residence. It boast an outdoor pool. Chayadol Resort is a 15-minute drive from Chiang Rai Bus Terminal. It is a 25-minute drive from Chiang Rai Airport and approximately a 30-minute drive from Wat Rong Khun Temple. Featuring floor-to-ceiling glass doors, all rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. Free toiletries are included in the en suite bathrooms. Guests can laze by the pool or relax with massage treatments. Staff at the tour desk can arrange sightseeing tours for guests. For convenience, a laundry service and on-site parking are available. The on-site restaurant serves daily breakfast, lunch and dinner, as well as light snacks.

name: Millennium Hilton Bangkok
description: Millennium Hilton Bangkok is a riverfront sanctuary in proximity to the heart of the city and cultural district with a spectacular view of the Chao Phraya River from every guest room and suite. The hotel offers a fresh perspective of life and is close to a vibrant network of streets filled with art galleries, museums, and authentic markets. Conveniently located within a short walking distance from the BTS Gold Line Charoen Nakhon station the property can be easily reached via a cross-river ferry from the Si Phaya Pier next to the River City Bangkok shopping center. ICONSIAM, one of the largest shopping malls in Asia, is just a few minutes’ walk from the hotel. Enjoy a scenic ride along the Chao Phraya River with our complimentary shuttle boat from the hotel's private pier to Saphan Taksin BTS Skytrain station daily from 6 am to 9.45 pm. This 32-storey landmark by the bank of the Chao Phraya River features 533 guest rooms, which are elegantly appointed with upscale amenities, oversized bathrooms, and panoramic river views. The riverside all-day-dining restaurant, Flow provides a wide variety of international menu selections. While ThreeSixty Jazz Lounge and ThreeSixty Rooftop Bar remain, the hotel highlight for a perfect evening.Hilton

name: Taman Spa Resort
description: Located in Phitsanulok, Taman Spa Resort is within a 25-minute drive of Phitsanulok Airport and offers a swimming pool. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort offers guests free public parking on site, as well as complimentary Wi-Fi to make the most of throughout their stay. In fine weather, an outdoor terrace provides an ideal place to relax. The rooms at Taman Spa Resort feature a private balcony, a seating area and a refrigerator. Hot drinks can be made with complimentary tea and coffee supplies. The resort is a convenient place to discover Wat Phra Si Rattana Mahathat and Wat Ratchaburana. It is also a brief drive from the Sergeant Major Thawee Folk Museum, the Phra Buddha Chinnarat and Central Plaza Phitsanulok.Revato

name: Khaolak Oriental Resort - Adult Only
description: Khaolak Oriental Resort - Adult Only is located on Nangthong Beach, within 15 minutes’ drive of the Khao Lak National Park. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool, a spa bath and well-equipped gym. Rooms at Khaolak Resort are decorated with Oriental-style furnishings. Every room comes with a private balcony or terrace, a tea and coffee maker and satellite TV. Some rooms offer direct access to the pool. The in-house restaurant serves a buffet breakfast. For lunch and dinner it features a varied menu and seafood dishes. The pool-side bar is an ideal place for enjoying light snacks and cocktails. As well as free onsite parking, the Oriental Resort has free internet throughout the hotel and a 24-hour front desk. Just a boat ride away, guests can find snorkeling at Pakarang Reef and the Similan Islands. The town of Takuapa is a 30-minute drive away and the property is approximately 80 km from Phuket International Airport.

name: Saii Phi Phi Island Village
description: Escape to SAii Phi Phi Island Village, a dream-like tropical resort on a private 800-metre stretch of pristine white sandy beach lapped by the turquoise waters of the Andaman Sea. The resort is set amid 70 acres of coconut palm plantations, in the privacy of Loh Ba Gao Bay on the peaceful northeast coast of beautiful Phi Phi Island. Accommodations include 189 traditional Thai-style bungalows and 12 exclusive Hillside Pool Villas. Each villa has its own private pool overlooking the island’s magnificent scenery. Resort facilities include five restaurants, three bars, a spa, gift shop, recreation centre, 5-Star PADI dive centre, fitness room, two large swimming pools and tennis courts. At the Marine Discovery Centre, experts educate and inspire guests and locals with sustainability efforts including raising baby sharks and clownfish. Having been off-limits to the public for three and a half years to allow for environmental rejuvenation, Maya Bay in Ko Phi Phi National Park has now officially reopened to tourists and, as one of Thailand’s true national treasures, is a must-visit destination.

name: Grande Centre Point Pattaya
description: Grande Centre Point Pattaya is located in Pattaya and features free Wi-Fi. In addition to free public parking on site, the hotel offers comfortable 5-star rooms and a bar. Guests of Grande Centre Point Pattaya can begin their day at The Fit Club, or use the many fitness facilities, including an outdoor pool. The hotel's amenities, such as airport shuttle, business centre and meeting rooms, kids club and children's play area, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. It also has its very own spa and wellness centre, Let's Relax Spa. The rooms are air conditioned and include a coffee maker, a private balcony and a refrigerator. The private bathroom includes complimentary toiletries in addition to slippers, bathrobes and a hair dryer. A cooked breakfast is served at The Sky 32 and Waves & Wind each morning before guests venture off to explore the local area. Guests can enjoy a meal in the in-house restaurant, along with a daily breakfast. Guests can also try one of the various bars and restaurants in the vicinity. Grande Centre Point Pattaya is located in the popular tourist destination of Central Pattaya. Jomtien Beach is just an easy drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Akyra Manor Chiang Mai
address: 22/2 Nimmana Haeminda Road Soi 9, Chiang Mai 50200
description: Check in to pure urban style and big city sophistication in the heart of this charming northern city's most buzz-worthy street Nimmanhaemin Soi 9, known locally as 'coffee street'. Take in the chic boutiques, galleries, bars and coffee shops, then return to your sanctuary and warm northern Thailand hospitality and the showstopping experiences of the rooftop Rise bar and Chiang Mai's best new italian restaurant ItalicsiHotelier/iStay

name: Sai Kaew Beach Resort
address: 8/1 Moo 4 Tumbon Phe, Amphur Mueang, Ko Samet
description: Sai Kaew Beach Resort sits on the adjacent Pineapple and Sai Kaew beaches on Koh Samet. It offers 3 outdoor pools, 2 beachfront restaurants and a variety of water sports. The resort is located within Khao Laem Ya National Park. It is a 2.5-hour drive from Bangkok or Rayong. Boat transfers are provided from Ao Prao Pier on the mainland or from Koh Samet. Modern rooms at Sai Kaew Resort feature sea or garden views. Each air-conditioned room comes with satellite TV, a DVD player, and a fridge with minibar. Attached bathrooms provide shower facilities. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage on the beach, or exercise in the fitness centre. The Zea Restaurant on Sai Kaew Beach serves Thai and international dishes, while La Luna on Pineapple Beach offers Italian specialities. The Mango café and bakery provides an internet corner.

name: Le Vimarn Cottages & Spa
address: 40/11 Moo 4, Tambol Phe, Amphur Muang, Ko Samet 21160
description: Lazy days by the infinity outdoor pool and luxurious massages await guests at Le Vimarn Cottages & Spa. It offers charming bungalows along Ao Prao Beach in Rayong. Bungalows are beautifully decorated with traditional woven fabrics and wooden furnishings. A satellite TV, DVD player and minibar are provided in all units, while select ones offer large private balconies with spa bath. Dhivarin Spa offers indulgent massage treatments and beauty therapies. Guests can also exercise at the fitness centre or simply enjoy the sun by the pool. Water sports such as diving and canoeing are provided for guests’ enjoyment. The beachfront O Restaurant at Le Vimarn Resort serves a daily breakfast and Italian food. Buzz Restaurant serves authentic Thai favourites with breathtaking views of the ocean. Hotel shuttle boat service (chargeable), please contact a hotel staff at Ao Prao Pier (Ban Phe, mailand) Tel. +66 38 651 134. From Ao Prao Pier (mainland) at 11AM / 1:30 PM / 4PM From Na Dan Pier (Koh Samet) at 10AM / 12:30PM / 3PM Remarks: -To avoid any delay upon transfer to Koh Samet, please standby at Ao Prao Pier (Ban Phe) 30 minutes before departure time for pre-check. -To avoid any delay upon transfer to mainland, please be ready at the lobby 30 minutes before departure time for check-out -Routing from Ao Prao Pier to Na Dan Pier, Koh Samet. (Hotel will provide ground transfer from Na Dan Pier to Resort) -Parking fees at Ao Prao Pier at THB 100 per car per night.

name: Thipurai Beach Hotel
description: Located in Hua Hin, Thipurai Beach Hotel is just a 2-minute walk from the city’s sandy beach. It features an outdoor pool and spacious rooms with a balcony. Free WiFi access in available in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms have a seating area and cable. The private bathrooms are stocked with free soap and shampoo. The restaurant serves a range of cuisines including Thai sea food, Chinese and European. Cold, refreshing drinks, hot beverages and light snacks are offered at the bar. The Thipurai Beach is a 2.5-hour drive from Bangkok.

name: Phi Phi Anita Resort
address: 108 Moo 7 Aonang Muang, Ko Phi Phi 81000
description: Just 30 meters from the white sands of Loh Dalum Beach, Phi Phi Anita Resort - SHA Certified offers comfortable rooms and private bungalows. It is in close proximity of shops and a supermarket. Anita Phi Phi Resort is located on a 5-minute walk from Phi Phi pier, which offers ferry boats to Phuket. The hotel is a 30-minute drive away from Krabi Airport. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature tiled flooring and a terrace. They are equipped with cable TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. Guests can arrange excursions at the resort’s tour desk. Other services at Phi Phi Resort include massages and laundry service. Phi Phi Anita Resort - SHA Certified features a restaurant, where the daily breakfast is served. A wide range of restaurants can be found in the immediate neighborhood, along the beach and the village.

name: Golden Pine Resort and Spa
address: 291 Moo 4, Baan Muang Kham, Chiang Rai 57310
description: Golden Pine Resort is located in the Nanglae District countryside. Surrounded by rice and pineapple fields, the resort offers an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Rooms at Chiang Rai Golden Pine come with a private balcony. Each is equipped with a cable TV, safety deposit box and fridge. Private bathrooms feature a bathtub with overhead shower. Guests can visit Hom Nuan Spa for a soothing massage or exercise in the fitness centre. The resort also provides a tour desk and car rental. Sang Chan Restaurant serves local and international specialities. It has both air-conditioned indoor seating and an open-air terrace area. Refreshments are available at the lobby bar. Golden Pine Resort is 15 km from Chiang Rai’s city centre. Chiang Rai International Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Baan Nilrath Hotel
description: Baannilrath Hotel is located 100 metre away from Colonade Mall. Offering rooms with private balconies, it is equipped with an outdoor pool and a restaurant. On-site parking and free Wi-Fi is available. Hua Hin Beach and Hua Hin Night Market are just 300 metre away from Baannilrath Hotel. Hua Hin Market Village is located 1 km away and Hua Hin Airport is located 10 km away from the property. All the air-conditioned rooms come with an en suite bathroom and free toiletries. They are provided with a flat-screen cable TV, a safety deposit box and slippers. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk, car rental service and luggage storage facilities. A laundry service is also provided. Guests can enjoy a variety of Thai and European dishes served at Nilrath Restaurant. Room service is available.

name: Royal Orchid Sheraton Hotel & Towers
description: Experience refined luxury and travel smart at Royal Orchid Sheraton Hotel & Towers. Discover our five-star hotel haven on the enchanting Chao Phraya River in vibrant Bangkok. Delight in our location opposite ICON Siam and next to the Chaopraya River Cruise Port, along with the convenience of our shuttle boats to iconic attractions. Unwind in elevated river view hotel rooms and suites. Rejuvenate in marble-clad bathrooms and Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience beds, then savor our enticing on-site restaurants and bars. Introducing Siam Yacht Club, our culinary gem blending modern European cuisine with traditional Asian influences. Enjoy indulgent amenities like resort-style pools, meditation gardens, steam rooms, tennis courts, and a Sheraton Fitness center. With 43,000 square feet of venue space overlooking the river, create unforgettable MICE events. Simplify and elevate your stay in the heart of Bangkok at Royal Orchid Sheraton Hotel & Towers.Marriott

name: Hotel Nikko Bangkok
description: Set in the Sukhumvit district of Bangkok, just a 3-minute walk from BTS Thong Lo Skytrain Station, Hotel Nikko Bangkok features both rooms and suites with free WiFi. This 22-storey hotel also provides guests with an outdoor pool and 4-floor basement parking. Featuring a unique Japanese-style decor, each room and suite features an en suite bathroom equipped with TOTO Washlet toilet and luxurious PAÑPURI bath amenities. Other facilities include a lobby lounge and an executive lounge. Guests can also make use of the Grand Ballroom and various meeting facilities with state-of-the-art audio and visual equipment. A fully-equipped 24-hour fitness centre, a pool bar and sauna are all featured at Hotel Nikko Bangkok. For dining options, guests can sample Japanese dishes at the on-site signature restaurant, Hishou, or enjoy casual all-day dining at The Oasis. The EmQuartier mall and Benjasiri park are 1.5 km away while Terminal 21 is 5.3 km from Hotel Nikko Bangkok. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 24 km from the property.

name: Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa
description: Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa is set on Ko Yao Yai, and provides 5-star facilities, including an infinity pool and a waterfall pool. Guests also have exclusive access to the on-site Ayurvana Spa and Swimming pool. This cosy resort offers valet parking, a beauty centre and free Wi-Fi. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. The rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a refrigerator, a mini bar and a private balcony. All feature their own bathroom with robes and amenities. Guests of Santhiya Koh Yao Yai Resort & Spa are welcome to experience seafood, Thai and international cuisine at By The Sea Restaurant and Bar, or try Thai dishes at Chantara Restaurant. A buffet breakfast is served each morning.Revato

name: Narawan Hotel
address: 250/131 Hua Hin Soi 94 Petchakhasem Rd, Hua Hin 77110
description: Combining modern and Northern Thai decor, Narawan Hotel, Hua Hin is just 500 metres from Hua Hin Beach and Market Village Shopping Complex. It has an outdoor pool and free in-room internet. Fully air-conditioned and fitted with tiled flooring, rooms feature a private balcony and a cable TV. Guests can relax at the sun loungers surrounding the outdoor spa pool or rent a motorbike to explore Hua Hin at leisure. The hotel also provides laundry services and a 24-hour front desk. The off-site restaurant serves a daily Asian and Western buffet breakfast. Narawan Hotel, Hua Hin is 2 km from the local Night Market and vibrant nightlife options.

name: Baan Bayan - Hua Hin - Sha Extra Plus
description: Just 320 metres from Hua Hin Market Village, the 4-star beachfront Baan Bayan has an outdoor swimming pool with sun loungers. Offering free Wi-Fi and parking, it has a massage room and a restaurant. Overlooking the courtyard, garden or sea, air-conditioned rooms are spacious and feature a TV and DVD player. For a quick bite, a minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are available in all rooms. Baan Bayan - Hua Hin is within a 10-minute drive to the golf courses of Hua Hin. It is about 7.8 km from Hua Hin Airport. The 24-hour front desk provides helpful services like daily newspapers and car rentals. Enjoying views of the Gulf of Thailand, The Cafe Bayan serves authentic Thai cuisine and Western dishes. The resort also provides grilled seafood barbecue by the beach, as well as drinks at the open-air Poolside Bar.

name: Chada Veranda Hotel
address: 88, 90 Sri Chan Road, Nai Mueang, Khon Kaen 40000
description: Chada Veranda Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Khon Kaen Shopping Center area. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas are readily available for you to enjoy. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, telephone, satellite/cable TV, refrigerator. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, massage. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Khon Kaen has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Chada Veranda Hotel.Agoda

name: Scandia Beach Hotel
description: Set in Jomtien Beach, Scandia Beach Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace or a balcony, free WiFi and flat-screen TV, as well as an outdoor swimming pool and a bar. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. The aparthotel offers a continental or Asian breakfast. The restaurant at Scandia Beach Hotel serves American, Thai and Asian cuisine. The accommodation offers a picnic area. A car rental service is available at Scandia Beach Hotel. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Dongtan Beach, Jomtien Beach and Pratumnak Beach. The nearest airport is U-Tapao Rayong-Pattaya International, 41 km from Scandia Beach Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Haadtien Beach Resort
description: Haadtien Beach Resort is a boutique resort nestled on a secluded beach in Koh Tao Island. Set on Thian-Org Bay (Shark Bay), it is surrounded by palm groves and offers spacious villas with private balconies. Free wired internet is available at the public areas. Haadtien Resort is a 15-minute drive Mae Haad Pier and 1 km from the nearest village and local shops. Villas offer much comfort and privacy with ample outdoor seating area and a private bathroom. They are fitted with rustic wooden furnishings and equipped with a TV, a minibar and a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massages at the resort. Arrangements for activities such as hiking, canoeing, mountain biking and yoga classes can be made at the tour desk. Snorkelling equipment is available at reception. InSea Beach Bar & Grill offers a beachfront setting and dreamy views of Haad Tien Bay with delicious Thai dishes. Fresh seafood and organic produce also feature on the menu.

name: Signature Phuket Resort Sha Plus
description: A relaxing getaway experience awaits at The Signature Phuket Resort SHA Plus & Restaurant, which is located along Soi Ta-Eiad in South Phuket. It offers a tropical outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The Signature Phuket is a 15-minute drive from the sandy shores of Kata Beach, Nai-Harn Beach and Rawai Beach. Patong Beach is a 20-minute drive from the resort, while Phuket International Airport is a 40-minute journey by car. Spacious and colourful, the stylish rooms at The Signature Resort Phuket are fully air conditioned and come with 32-inch flat-screen TVs. Boasting a sofa seating area, rooms also have a private outdoor terrace, fridge and DVD players. Interesting island trips or sightseeing tours around Phuket are easily organised at the tour desk. The resort also provides laundry services and free parking. With the option of outdoor dining, The Signature Restaurant serves a selection of Italian specialities and traditional Thai dishes. Guests may also enjoy free seasonal fruit served at the lobby lounge.

name: Hisea Huahin Hotel
description: Located in Hua Hin's centre and a short walk from the popular night market, Hisea Huahin Hotel - SHA Extra Plus offers accommodation with free WiFi access and a balcony. The air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The en suite bathroom includes a shower, hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Guests can take a dip in the rooftop pool or enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. A 24-hour front desk is available. The beach is a 250 metre walk away. Bangkok is approximately a 3-hour drive from the city.

name: Novotel Bangkok on Siam Square
description: Novotel Bangkok on Siam Square is a newly renovated 4-star hotel downtown that combines modern comfort and luxury. Featuring 425 rooms and suites and luxury amenities such as our In Balance Fitness and Splash Poolside and Bar. Located in the center of Bangkok where most shopping malls are found, such as Siam Square, Siam Paragon and CentralWorld. The hotel is the perfect base to explore the city as it is situated in the main shopping district of Bangkok with easy access to the BTS train station.accorhotels.com

name: Hyatt Regency Hua Hin
address: 91 Hua Hin Khao Takiap Road, Hua Hin 77110
description: This luxurious 5-star beachfront property boasts a large lagoon pool set in 12.5 acres of tropical landscapes. Stretching across 315 metres of white sandy beach, it houses the award-winning The Barai Spa. Opening out to tropical or sea views, spacious rooms feature a 55-inch flat-screen TV and iPod dock. They offer a seating area and a bathroom with a window and bathtub. Guests can lounge by the outdoor pool which boasts a water slide or enjoy workouts at the gym. Added conveniences include 24-hour concierge service, free Wi-Fi and free parking. Pet-friendly rooms are also available at Pet Friendly Deluxe Room with an additional charge. Those staying in Club rooms or suites will enjoy extensive facilities and club benefits, including daily continental breakfast, all-day refreshment and evening cocktails in the club lounge. Housed in a restored 19th century Pavilion, McFarland House offers fine dining and modern European food. Other dining options include Figs Italian Restaurant and Talay Thai. Just 3 minutes’ walk from Cicada Market, Hyatt Regency Hua Hin is a 5-minute drive from Hua Hin Night Market and Railway Station. It is a 20-minute drive from Hua Hin Airport.

name: Grande Centre Point Hotel Terminal 21
description: Grande Centre Point Hotel Terminal21 offers a direct access to the Sukhumvit MRT and Asoke BTS train stations. Providing free WiFi and parking, it features an outdoor pool and fitness facilities. The rooms are provided with a flat-screen cable TV and fridge. Bathrooms have a hairdryer and toiletries. Grande Centre Point Hotel Terminal21 is a 5-minute drive from Queen Sirikit Convention Centre. It is a 5-minute BTS skytrain ride from Siam Paragon and MBK shopping centres. Guests can use sauna, hot tub and meeting facilities. Added conveniences include a business centre, laundry service and a 24-hour front desk. Grande Centre Point Terminal 21 is a 3-minute drive from Nana, 7-minutes drive from Bumrungrad International Hospital. Arab is 4-minutes drive or 12-minutes walk while Jodd Fair is a 30-minutes drive away from hotel.

name: Phavina Hotel Rayong
description: Located 4 km from Rayong city centre, Phavina Service Residence offers free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Featuring a garden, the hotel also provides free public parking on site. The hotel is 1.5 km to Rayong sport stadium. Saeng-Chan Beach is 3.5 km away. It is 26 km from Baan Phe Pier to Samet Island. Fitted with a balcony, each air-conditioned room features a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and wardrobe. Shower facilities and hairdryer are included in an en suite bathroom. Selected rooms come with a safe, seating area and kitchen. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. Laundry services and fitness centre are available. Phavina Cafe serves a variety of Thai cuisine.

name: Mövenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya
description: Welcome to Na Jomtien Beach, a burgeoning district on Thailand's eastern seaboard, home to Moevenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya. Offering direct beach access, luxurious facilities, and a warm sense of Swiss hospitality, Mövenpick Siam Hotel Na Jomtien Pattaya has everything guests need for a relaxing and enjoyable stay.accorhotels.com

name: Yoma Hotel, Pai
description: Yoma Hotel features views of Mount Mae Yen and Pai’s natural landscape, as well as free shuttle services to the town and airport. A 5-minute drive from Pai Airport and the Walking Street Market, it features an outdoor pool with jet stream. Guests can explore Pai on bicycles provided free of charge, or enjoy quiet reading at the library. Hotel Yoma also offers a gift shop and car rental services. Wi-Fi is free throughout the hotel. Each air-conditioned room at Yoma Hotel Pai has a private balcony with a sitting or lounging area. Rooms come with satellite TV and free tea and coffee. Private bathrooms feature a rain shower and hairdryer. Mountain views accompany meals at Dum Ya Restaurant, which serves Asian dishes with international influences. Diners can have their meals outdoors in a garden setting. Yoma Hotel, Pai is a 15-minute drive from Pai Hot Spring. The town of Pai is 135 km away from Chiang Mai.

name: Sheraton Hua Hin Pranburi Villas
description: Find Sheraton Hua Hin Pranburi Villas in an alluring destination with transformative facilities ready for a romantic couples getaway. Our quiet Hua Hun luxury hotel is nestled on the lush beaches of the Gulf of Thailand and near historic Pranburi sites, including the Chao Mae Tubtim Thong Shrine. Host your next business retreat, wedding or event in Hua Hin at our versatile indoor hotel. Enjoy a variety of on-site dining options, including rooftop seating for views of Pranburi or alfresco pavilions surrounded by lily ponds. Relax poolside with a refreshing cocktail or explore Hua Hin on wheels with our complimentary bike rental program. Challenge yourself with a workout in our modern fitness center, open 24/7. Our hotel's 53 villas include a private swimming pool, sunken outdoor bathtub, and breathtaking ocean views for your complete privacy. Expand your horizons in Pranburi, Thailand, with Sheraton.Marriott

name: Natural Park Resort De Wangthong
description: Located in Ban Nong Nok Aen, 40 km from Wat Phra Si Rattana Mahathat, Naturalpark Resort De Wangthong provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi. The resort features family rooms. At the resort, every room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hairdryer, guest rooms at Naturalpark Resort De Wangthong have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms come with a balcony. At the accommodation each room has bed linen and towels. Guests at Naturalpark Resort De Wangthong can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. The area is popular for hiking and cycling, and car hire is available at the resort. The nearest airport is Phitsanulok, 44 km from Naturalpark Resort De Wangthong, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hua Hin Marriott Resort and Spa
description: Gazing out over one of the most magnificent beaches in Thailand, Hua Hin Marriott Resort & Spa offers luxury services and accommodation, gorgeous landscaping, upscale amenities and direct access to the sand and surf. The Night Market and other Hua Hin attractions are just a few moments away from our hotel. Our strikingly manicured grounds include a lagoon that winds through the resort, five pools and several superb restaurants, highlighted by a seafood eatery right on the beach. Stretch out in spacious accommodations with a blend of contemporary convenience and unique Thai design. Our rooms feature featherbed mattresses, marble bathrooms and high-speed internet access. Quan Spa is a tranquil oasis offering soothing treatments and our fitness center offers everything resort guests need to stay healthy during your stay in Hua Hin. For those planning a romantic wedding or important business event in Hua Hin, our hotel’s versatile event spaces include a ballroom, boardrooms and picturesque outdoor spaces.Marriott

name: Novotel Bangkok Platinum Pratunam
description: Check in to 4-star comfort at our family-friendly Novotel Bangkok Platinum Pratunam hotel located right above the Platinum Mall. Go on a shopping spree at shopping malls all within walking distance. If you're feeling adventurous, hop onto a sky train at nearby stations that will take you all over Bangkok. Feel free to chill out in our contemporary-designed rooms that include modern amenities. Stay connected, all rooms feature free Wi-Fi internet, a flat-screen TV, minibar and coffee & tea facilities.accorhotels.com
