name: Ao Prao Resort
description: Surrounded by tropical vegetation, this resort is located on the beaches of Ao Prao. It offers accommodation with a private balcony overlooking the sea. Guests of Ao Prao Resort can take a dip in the outdoor pool or engage in water sports such as canoeing or snorkelling. Hiking and biking trails are also available. Fitted with wooden flooring, air-conditioned rooms at Ao Prao Resort feature Thai décor. In addition to tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar, a TV with satellite channels and a DVD player are included. Private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Open until midnight, the resort’s restaurant serves Thai delights and international dishes, accompanied with views of the sea. In-room dining is possible. A wine cellar and a bar are also available. Situated on the west coast of Koh Samet Island, Ao Prao Resort is an hour’s drive from Pattaya City and a 2.5-hour drive from Bangkok City.

name: Laksasubha Hua Hin
description: Sunset views over a private beachfront can be enjoyed at the 4-star Laksasubha Hua Hin. It has a free-form outdoor pool surrounded by sun loungers, a spa and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. The Thai-Victorian style Klai Kangwon Palace is situated 2.5 km away. Guests can reach Hua Hin Airport with a 15 minutes’ drive from Laksasubha Hua Hin. All-white guest rooms feature private outdoor balconies, traditional Thai accents and high-quality duvet covers and linens. Each also comes with a cable TV, DVD player and minibar. Zaanti Spa is housed in a Balinese-style villa, providing flower baths, Thai massage and herbal therapies. Guests can also join Thai cooking classes or go horse riding by the beach. The beachfront Oceanfront Restaurant serves Mediterranean, Italian and Thai-fusion cuisine. A daily buffet breakfast is also available there.

name: Ruen Thai Rim Haad
address: 206/5 Moo 3 Duangtawan Beach Rd. Muang, Rayong 21160
description: Ruen Thai Rim Haad Resort is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Rayong. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, car park, room service, airport transfer, restaurant, are at hand. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature internet access wireless, air conditioning, desk, mini bar, balcony/terrace. Access to the hotel's private beach, massage, garden, water sports (motorized) will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Rayong has to offer by making Ruen Thai Rim Haad Resort your base.priceline.com

name: Piya Guesthouse
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 16 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and separate sitting areas, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Property Location With a stay at Piya Guesthouse in Mae Hong Son, you'll be just steps from Wat Chong Klang and Wat Chong Kham. This hotel is 0.2 mi (0.3 km) from Nong Chong Kham Public Park and 1.3 mi (2.1 km) from Wat Phra That Doi Kong Mu. Dining Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Breakfast fee: between THB 60 and THB 150 per person (approximately) The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM Checkin end at 9:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts cash Safety features at this property include a fire extinguisher, a security system, and a first aid kit The front desk is open daily from 7 AM - 9 PM. If you are planning to arrive after 9 PM please contact the property in advance using the information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. name: Asia Hotel Bangkok
description: Directly connected to Ratchathewi BTS Skytrain Station, Asia Hotel Bangkok has an outdoor pool and 6 dining options. It is 1 Skytrain stop from Siam Square and MBK Shopping Mall. Spacious rooms at Asia Hotel are fitted with classic furnishings and a flat-screen TV. Rooms come with a personal safe, minibar and fridge. The marble bathrooms are equipped with a bathtub and hairdryer. Asia Hotel Bangkok is also 1 Skytrain stop from Phaya Thai BTS Skytrain Station, which connects to the Airport Railway Link to Suvarnabhumi Airport. After a day of shopping, guests may relax at the outdoor spa pool, enjoy a Thai massage or exercise at the fitness centre. The hotel also provides an internet corner, a tour desk and business centre. Live music accompanies Thai and international dishes at Tivoli Coffee Shop. Other dining options include Great Wall Restaurant, Vietnamese and Brazilian restaurants. Light refreshments are available at Asia Bakery and Crystal Lobby Bar.

name: Glacier Hotel Khon Kaen
address: 141 Prachasamran Road, Nai Muang, Khon Kaen
description: Glacier Hotel by Infinity Hotels and Resorts is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Khon Kaen. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, laundromat, wheelchair accessible are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, wake-up service. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including golf course (within 3 km), indoor pool, solarium. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Khon Kaen, Glacier Hotel by Infinity Hotels and Resorts will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Paradee
address: 76 Moo 4, Tumbol Phe, Amphur Mueng, Ko Samet 21160
description: Located on the palm-fringed beaches of Koh Samed Island, Paradee hotel offers teak and Thai silk decorated villas with a private balcony and free internet connection. It features an on-site library. Paradee features thatched-roof villas with a separate living area and spacious bathroom. All villas have private pools and a patio. They are equipped a flat-screen television, DVD player and mini-bar. Rejuvenating massage treatments can be enjoyed at Paradee's spa or head out to the sea for windsurfing and snorkelling. Island day trips and diving lessons are available at the hotel. Cocktails are served at Sunset Bar. Guests can also enjoy Paradee's on-site restaurant, which serves a delicious selection of Thai and international dishes.

name: Chatrium Residence Sathon Bangkok
description: Chatrium Residence Sathon Bangkok provides modern 4-star accommodation in Bangkok. Guests also have exclusive access to the Green Leaf Spa and Salon and Fitness Center. The hotel treats guests to a variety of recreational amenities and services, such as a sauna, a playground, an outdoor pool and Swimming Pool. There is also free private parking on site for guests with a car. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Kids Playground. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature premium amenities such as a rain shower, luxury linen and a coffee maker. They provide a pillow menu, a kitchen and a private balcony. Those staying at Chatrium Residence Sathon Bangkok can sample fusion, French and Mediterranean dishes at the in-house restaurant, suitably situated for those who want to stay close by for a meal. Guests can also order from the drinks menu at Flow Oasis Pool Lounge. Chatrium Residence Sathon Bangkok has easy access to Patpong and Chao Phraya River. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Bangkok.Revato

name: Penny's Resort
description: Located in White Sand Beach, Penny's Resort is a perfect starting point from which to explore Koh Chang. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, desk, balcony/terrace, television to ensure a restful night. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, garden. Discover all Koh Chang has to offer by making Penny's Resort your base.priceline.com

name: The Cobble Beach
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a restaurant, The Cobble Beach - SHA Certified Vaccinated is located in Phi Phi Don. It features cosy accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi access. The hotel is 800 metres from Phi Phi Island, 900 metres from Ton Sai Pier and Ton Sai Bay. Phuket International Airport is 65 km away. Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. At The Cobble Beach - SHA Certified Vaccinated you will find a bar that opens daily from 11:00 - 20:00 hrs. Staff at the tour desk can assist with travel and sightseeing arrangements.

name: Amora Neoluxe Hotel
description: Amora NeoLuxe Suites Hotel is located along Bangkok's Sukhumvit Road, just 10 minutes' walk from Phrompong BTS Skytrain Station. Offering free Wi-Fi, it also has an outdoor pool and gym. The modern air-conditioned rooms are fitted with wooden flooring and warm lighting. Each comes with a flat-screen cable TV, minibar and personal safe. En suite bathrooms have a bathtub and hairdryer. Amora NeoLuxe Suites Hotel is a 10-minute walk to Emporium Shopping Mall. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is a 45-minute drive from the hotel. Free parking is available on-site. The hotel's restaurant serves a selection of à la carte international dishes. It also serves a daily Continental breakfast every morning. Guests can make use of the hotel's laundry, ironing and dry cleaning services. Room service is also available.

name: Wintree City Resort Chiang Mai
address: 72 Highway Chiang Mai-Lampang Frontage Road, Chiang Mai 50300
description: Situated in Chiang Mai, 3.6 km from Chang Puak Market, Wintree City Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the various facilities of this property are a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel the rooms include air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Rooms are equipped with a kettle, while some rooms have a balcony and others also feature city views. At Wintree City Resort all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or Asian breakfast is available each morning at the property. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star hotel. Guests can make use of the business centre to work or head for a sightseeing trip organized by the tour desk. Chang Puak Gate is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Three Kings Monument is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chiang Mai International Airport, 7 km from Wintree City Resort.

name: Holiday Inn & Suites Rayong City Centre
address: 554/4 Sukhumvit Road, Tumbol Noen Pra, Rayong 21000
description: Holiday Inn & Suites Rayong City Centre, the first and only international branded hotel in Rayong city offers fresh & comfortable 288 guest rooms including: Standard Room, Premium Sea View Room, One Bedroom Suite, One Bedroom Club Corner Suite and Two Bedroom Suite in modern style with our signature ‘Soft & Firm’ pillows. The hotel is located in the heart of Rayong, adjacent to Passione Shopping Destination and within close proximity to Rayong's favourite attractions such as Yomjinda Old Town, Saengchan Beach and many night life entertainment hot spots. The renowned Samed Island is just 20 kms from the hotel. U-Tapao International Airport is just 33 kms away or a 30 minutes drive from the hotel. Dining options range from authentic Thai to International cuisine, conveniently available within our hotel restaurant outlets, including CU Lounge & Bar, The Brasserie Global Dining and ‘Elementi Rooftop Grill & Bar’ on 30th floor. With 9 elegant event spaces including a pillar-less high ceiling Grand Ballroom which can accommodate up-to 300 persons in banquet style, all our meeting rooms come equipped with latest state of the art equipment. A professional on-site events team ensures a successful event.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya
description: Located in Na Jomtien, 100 metres from South Na Jomtien Beach, Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a kids' club and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. At the resort, every room has a wardrobe. All rooms are complete with a private bathroom and air conditioning, and certain rooms here will provide you with a terrace. All units include a safety deposit box. Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya offers an American or Asian breakfast. North Na Jomtien Beach is 500 metres from the accommodation, while Eastern Star Golf Course is 32 km away. The nearest airport is U-Tapao Rayong-Pattaya International Airport, 32 km from Ana Anan Resort & Villas Pattaya.

name: Akira Lipe Resort
address: 370 Moo 7, Koh Sarai Sub-District, Ko Lipe 91000
description: Boasting a beachfront location, Akira Beach Resort is placed along the Pattaya sandy beach,a 5-minute walk to the walking street. The property features 3 well-designed swimming pools, a garden and a gym. It also includes a kids' club and a library. All stylish rooms and suites are air-conditioned and are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a work desk and a minibar. An in-room safe is also available for guests' security. Complete with a bathtub or a walk-in shower, the en suite bathroom comes with bathrobes, slippers and a hairdryer. The Bistro restaurant serves Thai and European dishes. The beachfront swimming-up pool bar provides premium quality of international cocktails and smoothies. The staff at the front desk are always happy to assist all guests.

name: Sailom Hotel Hua Hin
description: Boasting views of calming sea and lush gardens, Sailom Hotel Hua Hin offers an outdoor pool and a famous beachfront restaurant. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Cicada Market is only a 3-minute drive from the hotel, while Hua Hin Night Market can be reached within a 15-minute drive. The property has an electric vehicle charging station. Spacious air-conditioned rooms at Sailom Hotel provides private bathrooms, hairdryer and satellite TV. A safe and a fridge are also provided for the convenience of guests. Set overlooking the sea, Sailom Seafood Restaurant offers local Thai and Western dishes with live music entertainment. The beachside barbecue serves grilled seafood. Guests of Sailom Hotel Hua Hin can relax with Thai massage or pamper themselves at the beauty/barber shop. Sailom Hotel Hua Hin is a 3-hour drive from Suvarnabumi International Airport in Bangkok.

name: Pandora
address: Pandora, Ao Noi Na, Rayong, Ko Samet 21160
description: Located in Koh Samed, Pandora offers comfortable rooms with free WiFi and an on-site restaurant. Boasting 2 outdoor swimming pools, the hotel offers free on-site parking. Spacious air-conditioned room is fitted with a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and balcony. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Guests can arrange day trips to various attractions at the on-site tour desk. To unwind, guests can relax in a soothing massage. There is also a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour security. A wide range of Thai and European dishes can be sampled at The Pandora restaurant. Guests can enjoy refreshing drinks at the bar.

name: Apa Hotel Ginza-Kyobashi
description: APA Hotel Ginza Kyobashi offers both non-smoking and smoking rooms with free WiFi and a 40-inch wall-mounted flat-screen TV. It is located within a 5-minute walk from Kyobashi, Takaracho and Ginza-Itchome Yurakucho Subway Stations. The Ginza Kyobashi APA Hotel is approximately a 10-minute walk from the Kabuki-za Theatre, the Imperial Palace and Tokyo International Forum. Air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a desk, a fridge and an electric kettle. Guests can relax on the original mattress optimising weight distribution. Japanese pub restaurant Katete offers a wide assortment of drinks and meals, while the hotel’s buffet restaurant caters a variety of Japanese dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. It’s open for dinner time until midnight. APA Hotel Ginza Kyobashi has a 24-hour reception, which offers luggage storage and fax/photocopy services. In-room massages can be arranged, and drinks vending machines are on-site.

name: Apa Hotel Tokyo Itabashi Ekimae
description: APA Hotel Tokyo Itabashi is conveniently located just a minute’s walk from JR Itabashi Station and features well-equipped room with flat-screen TVs, a restaurant and coin-operated laundry machines. Free Wi-Fi is available and an in-room massage can be arranged. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Shimo Itabashi Train Station and Shin Itabashi Subway Station. Ikebukuro is a 5-minute train ride away, while Sunshine City Aquarium is 15 minutes away. It takes 15 minutes by train to the Togenuki Jizo statue. The rooms at Itabashi APA Hotel Tokyo are equipped with both air conditioning and heating facilities as well as an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Each room features a fridge, an electric kettle and a bathroom with a bathtub.

name: Cerulean Tower Tokyu Hotel, A Pan Pacific Partner Hotel
description: Centrally located in Shibuya, Cerulean Tower Tokyu Hotel offers spacious rooms with panoramic city views. The hotel features a fitness centre and a range of dining options. The Cerulean Tower is just a 5-minute walk away from Shibuya Station, providing access to many train and subway lines. From there it is a 2-minute train ride to Harajuku and the Meiji Jingu Shrine. Overlooking the greater metropolitan area, all rooms are located on the 19th floor and above. They feature air conditioning, a desk, flat-screen TV and minibar. The private bathrooms have a bath, shower and free toiletries including toothbrushes, shampoo, conditioner and body soap. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Guests at Tokyu Hotel Cerulean Tower can unwind in the sauna or hot tub, or enjoy a treatment in the beauty salon. The many other facilities include a pastry shop and a nursery. Cerulean Tower Tokyu Hotel boasts 8 restaurants, serving Japanese, Chinese and French cuisine. Beverages can be savoured at the top floor bar, the Garden Lounge and the Jazz Club.

name: Shibuya Excel Hotel Tokyu
description: Directly connected to Shibuya Train Station, Shibuya Excel Hotel Tokyu offers easy transportation links, 2 high-floor restaurants and comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi access and a satellite flat-screen TV. Overlooking Shibuya Scramble intersection, the hotel is just a 3-minute walk to the famous Shibuya 109 Building. The Harajuku area and Yoyogi Park are a 15-minute walk away. Shibuya Station’s 6 train lines and 3 subway lines offer convenient transport. Rooms at Hotel Shibuya Excel feature a calm, sophisticated decor. Each is fitted with a satellite TV, minibar and en suite bathroom with hairdryer. Guests can sip a fresh cup of tea and enjoy city views. Excel Tokyu Shibuya Hotel’s 24-hour front desk offers fax/photocopying services and luggage storage. Guests can relax with a massage or sleep in and have an in-room breakfast. The lobby has free Wi-Fi. Shunsai Japanese Restaurant and French Restaurant A Bientot offer fine dining with panoramic 25th-floor views of Tokyo. The spacious and bright Estacion Cafe serves coffee and cake.

name: Hotel New Otani Tokyo The Main
description: Surrounded by a beautiful 400-year old Japanese garden, Hotel New Otani Tokyo is situated in central Tokyo and offers comfortable accommodation less than a 10-minute walk from 5 subway lines. New Otani Hotel is just 300 metres from Akasaka-Mitsuke Subway Station. From this station the Ginza, Shibuya and Shinjuku areas can all be reached in less than a 10-minute subway ride. The room has large full-height windows that extend from the foot to the ceiling with a sense of openness. Some rooms have views of the hotel's Japanese garden or Shinjuku New City Centre. Hotel New Otani features an incredible 37 dining options, ranging from international cuisine to authentic Japanese dishes – everything from French and Italian to tempura and teppanyaki.

name: Royal Park Hotel The Shiodome, Tokyo
description: Conveniently situated within a 3-minute walk from Shinbashi and Shiodome stations, The Royal Park Iconic Tokyo Shiodome is modern and stylish accommodation. It provides a luxurious spa and a free-use fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Located above the 24th floor and offering city views, the spacious guestrooms at The Royal Park Iconic Tokyo Shiodome feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge and an air purifier/humidifier. Guests can enjoy a soak in the stylish en suite bathroom. A safe and toiletries are also included. Popular Ueno and Asakusa areas are within a 15-minute subway ride from Shinbashi Station. Shiodome Station offers direct subway links to lively Shinjuku and Roppongi areas. Shinbashi Station also provides a direct 35-minute train access to Haneda Airport. This hotel features earthquake-absorbent structures and offers a business centre and coin launderette. International cuisines are offered at the hotel’s on-site restaurants, including restaurant Harmony. The Bar located on the 24th floor offers drinks on tap and skyline views.

name: Hilton Tokyo Odaiba
description: Located in the waterfront area of Tokyo Bay, Hilton Tokyo Odaiba enjoys spectacular 180-degree ocean views. Each guest room provides stunning views of Tokyo's skyline, Rainbow Bridge or Tokyo Tower from a private balcony. The hotel is situated just minutes from a popular entertainment and shopping area as well as a key business and commercial district. With a wide selection of dining options and two levels of flexible meeting facilities, the Hilton Tokyo Odaiba hotel offers both business and leisure travelers a memorable stay like no other.Hilton

name: Smile Hotel Nihombashi - Mitsukoshimae
description: Only a 5-minute walk from Mitsukoshimae Subway Station, Smile Hotel Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae offers simple accommodations. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests can enjoy VOD channels on the flat-screen TV for an extra cost and request for in-room massages. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute train ride away. The air-conditioned rooms feature a safety deposit box, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toothbrush sets. Bottled mineral water, Japanese Yukata robes and slippers are provided for all guests. Free-use PC is available at the lobby. A coin-launderette is on site and dry cleaning services are offered at the 24-hour front desk. Luggage storage and photocopying services are available as well. A breakfast buffet featuring Japanese dishes are served at the dining room. Nihombashi Mitsukoshimae Smile Hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Imperial Palace and a 20-minute subway ride from Akihabara Station. Tokyo Dome is a 25-minute train ride away.

name: Designers Hotel Siesta
description: Ideally situated in the Taito district of Tokyo, Designers Hotel Siesta is situated 700 metres from Kanaami Inari Shrine, 700 metres from Izumi Park and 700 metres from Akihabara Neribei Park. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 600 metres from Convention Room AP Akihabara, and within 5.3 km of the city centre. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, all rooms at Designers Hotel Siesta have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Designers Hotel Siesta include Kusawakeinari Shrine, Sakuma Park and Fujisoft Akiba Plaza. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hyatt Tokyo
description: Grand Hyatt Tokyo is an award-winning luxury hotel centrally located in Roppongi Hills, a multi-use complex housing shops, restaurants, a cinema, art museum and observatory. Roppongi Station is just a 3-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and guests also have access to the business centre on site. The stylish and modern rooms incorporate warm wood furnishings and Japanese aesthetics into the design. All rooms feature a private bathroom with a rain shower and deep soaking limestone bathtub that allows guests to relax after a long day. In addition, the room is equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player, safety deposit box, laptop charger, minibar and Japanese yukata robes. Complimentary mineral water bottles are provided. A range of services are available at the concierge desk and currency exchange is provided at the 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy spa treatments and massages at the Nagomi Spa and Fitness Center or relax by the indoor swimming pool that utilises natural stone designs. Grand Hyatt Tokyo offers 10 restaurants and bars that feature a variety of international cuisine including French, Italian, Chinese, steak meals, Japanese sushi, teppanyaki and seasonal kaiseki cuisine. Guests can enjoy dining at one of the open-air terraces or listen to live music in the jazz lounge Maduro. Tokyo Grand Hyatt is a 40-minute bus ride from Haneda Airport and a 90-minute ride from Narita Airport on the limousine bus (charges apply). Tokyo Station is a 25-minute train ride away.

name: The Peninsula Tokyo
description: The Peninsula Tokyo pampers its guests with a spa centre and a fitness club with a swimming pool and sun loungers, overlooking the Imperial Palace Gardens. It's a 3-minute walk from Ginza shopping district, and offers concierge services. Tokyo Station is just a 5-minute drive away. Featuring designs with traditional Japanese influences, luxurious rooms boast a living area with sofas and a wide-screen TV, a bedroom with bed-side curtain controls and a marble bathroom with built-in flat-screen TV. They come with a dressing area, mood lighting and free WiFi. Guests can relax with a massage or beauty treatment, or unwind in a sauna or an aromatherapy shower. Services include a personal trainer while airport transfer by Rolls-Royce limousine is provided at a charge. There is a 24-hour front desk. Paid parking is available on site. A variety of restaurants at The Tokyo Peninsula cater Japanese, Cantonese and Western cuisines. Authentic high tea can be enjoyed at cafe The Lobby, while on the 24th floor Peter: The Bar offers cocktails, creative cuisine and sweeping Tokyo views. The Peninsula Tokyo is directly connected to Hibiya Subway Station. Ginza and Yurakucho stations are both within a 3-minute walk, offering easy access to Shinjuku, Shibuya and Roppongi. Tokyo Sky Tree and Asakusa are 40 minutes away by train. Airport buses take 40 minutes to Haneda Airport, and 90 minutes to Narita Airport.

name: Hotel Allamanda Aoyama Tokyo
description: Open from June 2016, Hotel Allamanda Aoyama is conveniently located a 1-minute walk from Gaienmae Subway Station on the Ginza Line. It boasts spacious rooms with elegant decor, a spa centre, sauna and a bar. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and private parking is available on site. Guests can enjoy shopping at the Omotesando and Harajuku areas, a 10-minute walk from the property. Nezu Museum is 900 metres from Hotel Allamanda Aoyama, while Mori Art Museum is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 14 km from the property. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Each room has a private bathroom equipped with a bath and bidet. For your comfort, you will find bath robes, slippers and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hotel guests can use the fitness gym, sauna and big bath free of charge and the swimming pool can be used at an extra cost.

name: Tokyo Marriott Hotel
description: Feel completely at home at Tokyo Marriott Hotel. Welcoming you to Japan with the perfect blend of style and substance, our hotel is located near Shinagawa Station, while our proximity to the peaceful Gotenyama Garden provides a sense of serenity in the heart of bustling central Tokyo. Relax in restorative hotel rooms and suites with pillowtop bedding, sleek bathrooms and complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi. Some accommodations feature views of Tokyo Bay and the city, and upgraded rooms and suites provide access to the exclusive Executive Lounge. You can also enjoy a meal at Lounge & Dining G, our sophisticated restaurant. If you're hosting an event in Shinagawa, we offer a selection of striking spaces, including two breathtaking ceremony venues, the beautiful Gotenyama Ballroom and several high-tech conference rooms. Expect an exceptional stay at Tokyo Marriott Hotel.Marriott

name: NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara
description: Attractively situated in Tokyo, NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara features an American breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is situated 300 metres from Kusawakeinari Shrine. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sakuma Park, Kanaami Inari Shrine and Izumi Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from NPlus Hotel Higashikanda-akihabara.

name: Imperial Hotel, Tokyo
description: Situated in a central location with 3 stations within a 5-minute walk, Imperial Hotel Tokyo is a prestigious hotel renowned for providing first-class hospitality for over a century since 1890. It features a fitness centre, an indoor swimming pool and a beauty massage salon. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. The nearby Ginza, Hibiya and Yurakucho stations offer direct access to various locations in Tokyo. Imperial Palace and Ginza area are both a 5-minute walk away, while Tokyo International Forum is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Popular Tsukiji Fish Market is just a 7-minute drive or taxi ride away. Direct airport limousine buses to/from Narita and Haneda airports are available at an extra charge. Rooms at Tokyo Imperial Hotel are elegantly decorated, and come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a small fridge and a seating area. Free tea set and a newspaper are offered. The en suite bathroom includes toiletries and bathrobes. Guests can enjoy a workout at the fitness gym or in the pool at an extra charge. A variety of shops are available on site, including hair salons, a flower shop and a newsstand. Chargeable in-room massages can be arranged. The Imperial Hotel offers wide range of dining options with 13 restaurants and 3 bars, like Les Saisons French restaurant and Kamon Teppanyaki restaurant. The Imperial Viking Sal serves a lavish buffet, while cocktails and whiskeys can be enjoyed at Old Imperial Bar.

name: Andaz Tokyo Toranomon Hills - a concept by Hyatt
description: Opened in June 2014, Andaz Tokyo, the 12th hotel of the Andaz brand by Hyatt features a spa, a fitness centre and an indoor pool with a view. This completely non-smoking, 5-star hotel is centrally located just a 15-minute walk from Tokyo Tower and an 18-minute walk from the Imperial Palace. Toranomon Subway Station is a 5-minute walk away. Rooms at Andaz Tokyo - A Concept by Hyatt include free WiFi access, complimentary snacks, soft drinks and other non-alcoholic beverages from the minibar, and a modern en suite bathroom with hairdryer. A flat-screen TV and free domestic phone calls are also included. Next to the Andaz Lounge on the 51st floor is the main dining venue, The Tavern - Grill & Lounge. Guests will be served refined European provincial cuisine cooked with fresh Japanese produces. The roof-top bar on the 52nd floor offers breathtaking views of the city. Andaz, meaning 'personal style' in Hindi, offers a variety of facilities and services. Guests can get a soothing massage at a surcharge, order room service or relax in the sauna. Laundry, dry cleaning and luggage storage services are available at the 24-hour front desk. Andaz Tokyo - A Concept by Hyatt is located within an 18-minute walk from the fancy Ginza district and a 14-minute train ride from the Marunouchi area. Haneda Airport is just 20 km away from the hotel and Narita International Airport can be reached within 1 hour train ride.

name: Ddd Hotel
description: Conveniently set in Tokyo, DDD HOTEL provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Asakusa Mitsuke Memorial. At the hotel, each room comes with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At DDD HOTEL each room includes bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near DDD HOTEL include Hatsunemori Shrine, Hulic Hall and Hulic Conference and Ichogaoka Hachiman Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: The Capitol Hotel Tokyu
description: Designed by Kengo Kuma, Capitol Hotel Tokyu boasts 3 restaurants, a 14th-floor indoor pool and direct access to 4 subway lines. Rooms are spacious for Tokyo and have city views. Free WiFi is available in the entire building and paid private parking is available on site. Rooms at Tokyu Capitol Hotel offer a softly lit blend of the old and new, with paper screens and a large flat-screen TV. A minibar and a large private bathroom with a bathtub are included. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer are provided. Guests can look out over Tokyo as they work out at the fitness centre or relax in the hot tub. Carju Rajah TIADO Spa offers massages and the hotel includes a beauty salon, photo studio and other shops. The business centre on the 3rd floor features a computer and photocopying services for guests' convenience. Star Hill Chinese Restaurant serves lunch and dinner in stylish modern settings. Suiren offers various Japanese dishes including teppanyaki, sushi and kaiseki multi-courses. Asian and Western cuisines are available all day at Origami. The Capitol Bar offers mood lighting, natural wood and elegantly served cocktails. The hotel has direct access to the Tameike-sanno and Kokkai-gijido-mae subway stations, which offer direct links to the Shinjuku, Shibuya and Ginza areas. The Imperial Palace is a 5-minute drive, while Roppongi Hills is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Mystays Kamata
description: Located just a five-minute stroll from Kamata Train Station, Hotel Mystays Kamata offers guests an ideal base while visiting Tokyo. It also offers free wireless internet. The hotel features a spa, offering a wide range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy. For added convenience, it provides luggage storage, a 24-hour reception and a safe. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a rain shower, slippers and an oversized bathtub. They are all soundproofed and include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a seating area. The area surrounding Hotel Mystays Kamata has a variety of cafés and restaurants. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Keikyu Kamata Railway Station, which allows for easy access in and around Tokyo.Revato

name: Bellustar Tokyo, A Pan Pacific Hotel
description: A quiet private space in the city "BELLUSTAR TOKYO, A Pan Pacific Hotel" "BELLUSTAR TOKYO, A Pan Pacific Hotel" is an urban luxury resort where you can enjoy a special space away from the hustle and bustle of the ground. The interior design incorporates traditional Japanese culture, the 7-meter-wide window offers an outstanding view of Tokyo, and the beds in all rooms are made by Slumberland, a company that is a purveyor to the British royal family. Rooms. The top floor has a restaurant with an overwhelming view of the 3-story atrium, a spa where you can experience the blessings of the Japanese land and the four seasons in a superb view, and a penthouse with 5 rooms that welcomes guests with high-quality hospitality. ”. Relax in a unique space with a 360-degree panoramic view.Rakuten

name: Hotel New Otani Tokyo Executive House Zen
description: Hotel New Otani Executive House Zen is located in Tokyo, 1.2 km from National Diet Building and 1.3 km from Chidorigafuchi. The hotel has a seasonal outdoor pool and water sports facilities, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Every room comes with a private bathroom with a bath and bidet, with bath robes provided. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. Hotel New Otani Executive House Zen features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Japan Imperial Palace is 1.7 km from Hotel New Otani Executive House Zen. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 14 km from Hotel New Otani Executive House Zen.

name: Hotel Listel Shinjuku
description: Featuring a restaurant, bar and massage services, Hotel Listel Shinjuku is about a 10-minute walk from Shinjuku Sanchome Subway Station. It offers cosy rooms with a fridge and free internet. The air-conditioned rooms at Listel Shinjuku Hotel feature an electric kettle and an en suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy watching video-on-demand movies for an extra cost. Shinjuku Train Station is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden, the Kabukicho area and Isetan Department Store are all about a 10-minute walk away. The hotel’s 24-hour front desk provides luggage storage and safe deposit services. Fax/photocopying is also available. Hotel Listel Shinjuku’s Salon et Restaurant Femmenette serves both local specialities and international dishes. Guests can enjoy drinks at the bar or order room service.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Station Shin Ohashi Mae
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Tokyo Station, Toyoko Inn Tokyo-eki Shin-Ohashi Mae promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort makes Toyoko Inn Tokyo-eki Shin-Ohashi Mae the perfect choice for your stay in Tokyo.Agoda

name: Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Otemachi
description: Situated in Tokyo and with Taira no Masakado's Grave reachable within a few steps, Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Otemachi features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. Featuring a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness centre. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Otemachi offers some rooms with garden views, and rooms have a kettle. Guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a coffee machine and an iPad. Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Otemachi offers a continental or American breakfast. The hotel offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna and hot tub. Popular points of interest near Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Otemachi include Nikkei Hall, Kokyo Otemon Gate and Museum of the Imperial Collections. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 17 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Perrier (Adult Only)
description: Situated in Tokyo's largest red-light district, Kabukicho in Shinjuku, HOTEL PERRIER (Adult Only) is a love hotel that features air-conditioned rooms and free private parking. There is a 24-hour front desk on site and free WiFi is provided throughout the property. Every room is fitted with a flat-screen TV with Video-on-Demand, karaoke and a DVD player. The en suite bathroom is comes with a TV and is fitted with a spa bath, bathrobes and slippers. Free toiletries are provided for guest's convenience. Meiji Jingu Shrine is 2.4 km from HOTEL PERRIER (Adult Only), while Shinjuku Gyoen National Park is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 17 km from HOTEL PERRIER (Adult Only).

name: Hotel Chinzanso Tokyo
description: Set within a historic Japanese garden, Hotel Chinzanso Tokyo offers spacious rooms with garden or city views and free Wi-Fi. On-site YU The Spa features massages with scented oils and traditional Japanese hot-spring baths. A glass-enclosed indoor pool and 3 dining options are featured. The classically luxurious rooms include a marble en-suite bathroom with deep soaking bathtub. Each room is fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV and hi-fi audio system. Guests can receive rejuvenating treatments and soak in the open-air heated hot tub and the hot spring bath at the spa. For convenience, the hotel’s business centre and fitness centre are open 24 hours. Overlooking the Chinzanso Gardens, Il Teatro features Venetian chandeliers and Milanese-style Italian dishes. Miyuki offers a range of Japanese cuisine served by staff in kimonos, and international dishes are served at the Bistro. Tokyo Chinzanso Hotel is a 25-minute taxi ride from JR Tokyo Train Station. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Edogawabashi Subway Station.

name: Intercontinental - Ana Tokyo
description: ANA InterContinental Tokyo mirrors the rich diversity of this city. The dynamic buzz of the lobby calls to mind some of Tokyo’s famous street scenes. The hotel’s exceptional food experiences evoke the city’s world-class dining reputation and the urban sophistication of Club InterContinental reflects the sanctuary to be found in the many local temples and shrines here. All this, whilst history is quietly being written inside its elegant Japanese banquet halls.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo
description: Boasting fine restaurants and an award-winning spa on the 37th floor, Mandarin Oriental offers 5-star luxury in the historical Nihonbashi area in the heart of Tokyo. Among the most spacious in Tokyo, rooms feature gorgeous city views. Mitsukoshimae Subway Station and JR Shin-Nihonbashi Train Station are directly connected to the hotel. Rooms at the Mandarin Oriental, Tokyo pair wide windows with chic design inspired by Japanese aesthetics. A full range of modern amenities are offered, including a satellite flat-screen TV. All rooms boast a sofa, seating area and desk, while bathrooms have a large bathtub and separate shower. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Tokyo Stock Exchange and an 8-minute walk from JR Tokyo Station. Ginza area is a 5-minute subway ride and the Imperial Palace is a 3-minute subway ride away. Akihabara Electric Town and the popular Tsukiji Fish Market are both within a 10-minute drive or taxi ride from the property. Guests can work out to city views at the 38th-floor fitness room, or relax in the hot tub or sauna. The spa offers exclusive Asian and Western-fusion treatments in a tranquil setting. The hotel’s concierge helps with sightseeing. Among the hotel’s 9 dining options is Sushi Shin by Miyakawa, offering edomae-style sushi and skyline views. Cantonese and French cuisines also tempt the tongue. Mandarin Bar pours cool cocktails. The Michelin starred Tapas Molecular Bar is open for both lunch and dinner.

name: Centurion Hotel Grand Akasaka
description: Centurion Hotel Grand Akasaka is a convenient 3-minute walk from Akasaka Subway Station and a 2-minute walk from Akasakamitsuke Subway Station. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Carpeted designer rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a Slumberland mattress, air conditioning/heating and an en suite bathroom. Each comes with a refrigerator and an electric kettle. In addition, free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner and body wash, as well as a hairdryer can be found in rooms. At Grand Centurion Hotel Akasaka, guests can use the coin launderette, get a massage at a surcharge or get their clothes dry cleaned, also at a surcharge. Public bath/sauna facilities are open to male guests only, The Imperial Palace is a 12-minute walk and train ride away. The fancy shopping district of Ginza is a quick 10-minute train ride and walk away, while Tsukiji Market is a 15-minute taxi ride away.

name: Hotel Resol Ikebukuro
description: Hotel Resol Ikebukuro is only a 2-minute walk from Exit 1 of Higashi Ikebukuro Station on the Yurakucho Subway Line. It offers a modern accommodation with a restaurant, massage services and rooms with free WiFi. JR Ikebukuro Train Station is a 7-minute walk away. Guestrooms are fitted with both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room has a humidifier, a flat-screen TV and a tea set with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and a bathtub. Resol Ikebukuro Hotel offers easy access to the Ginza and Roppongi area, both within a 30-minute subway ride away. Guests can take an Airport Limousine Bus from Haneda and Narita Airport to Sunshine City, which is located a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Narita Airport is a 1-hour ride and Haneda Airport is a 40-minute bus ride away. Il Chianti EST Restaurant serves Italian buffet dishes for breakfast. Drinks can be purchased from the vending machine. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. Dry cleaning services are available.

name: The Westin Tokyo
description: Nestled in the quiet, upscale area of Ebisu, The Westin Tokyo welcomes you to the heart of Tokyo, the most metropolitan city in Japan. Offering convenient access to the bustling Shibuya and Roppongi areas, our upscale hotel is perfect for both business and leisure travelers. With its strategic location and thoughtful amenities, our Tokyo, Shibuya hotel is consistently acclaimed among the best hotels in Japan. Our hospitality embodies a modern sophistication that stays true to traditional Japanese values. Classic European décor adorns each room, accompanied by the signature Heavenly Bed to ensure you leave feeling better than when you arrived. Select rooms and suites allow you to enjoy views of the iconic Tokyo Tower and to truly embrace the vibrance of the Japanese capital. Just minutes away from JR Ebisu Station, corporate offices, shopping and entertainment centers, our Tokyo hotel offers one of the best locations in the city, making it a simple decision when considering where to stay in Tokyo.Marriott

name: Sutton Place Hotel Ueno
description: Situated in Tokyo, 400 metres from Ryukoku-ji Temple, Sutton Place Hotel Ueno features views of the city. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a shared kitchen and a shared lounge. The property is 500 metres from Front gate of Honobo In Kanei-ji Temple, and within 6 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Sutton Place Hotel Ueno rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kissho-in Temple, Gate of Former Residence of Koda Rohan and The Shitaya Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 22 km from Sutton Place Hotel Ueno.

name: Aloft Tokyo Ginza
description: Take your travels to a new level at Aloft Tokyo Ginza. Our Chuo City hotel is in a famous shopping district, a few minutes from Ginza and Higashi Ginza subway stations and near Haneda Airport. Meet & mingle at W XYZ bar, enjoy breakfasts at WAREHOUSE and grab a snack at Roof Dogs, our rooftop bar serving hotdogs. These dining spots turn into red-hot hangouts thanks to Live@Aloft, our live acoustic performances featuring local and emerging artists from Ginza, Tokyo. Perk up at our 24-hour fitness center with treadmills, ellipticals, free weights, studio mats and recumbent bikes or retreat to a contemporary hotel room or suite with ultra-comfortable beds, walk-in rainfall showers, 55-inch 4K TVs and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy downtown Tokyo with Aloft Tokyo Ginza.Marriott

name: The Lively Tokyo Azabujuban
description: The LIVELY TOKYO AZABUJUBAN is well set in the centre of Tokyo, and provides a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The property is non-smoking and is located 200 metres from Daiho-ji Temple. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. A seating area is available in all units, while selected rooms include a Blu-ray player. At The LIVELY TOKYO AZABUJUBAN every room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. You can play billiards at this 4-star hotel. With staff speaking English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese, guidance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near The LIVELY TOKYO AZABUJUBAN include Choden-ji Temple, Kenso-ji Temple and Juban Inari Shrine. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Chisun Hotel Hamamatsucho
description: Chisun Hotel Hamamatsucho is conveniently located in the popular Tokyo Tower area. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Car park, meeting facilities, babysitting, restaurant, laundry service are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Chisun Hotel Hamamatsucho caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Roppongi-Eki-Higashi
description: Near Tokyo Tower With a stay at Apa Hotel＆Resort〈Roppongi Ekihigashi〉 in Tokyo (Roppongi), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Imperial Palace. This hotel is 4.3 mi (6.9 km) from Tokyo Dome and 6.2 mi (9.9 km) from Tokyo Skytree. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a seasonal outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Featured amenities include express check-in, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Suntory Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi Roppongi Hills - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi Tokyo Tower - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Tokyo Midtown - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi Shiba Park - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi Keio University - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi Hibiya Park - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi Happoen Garden - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi Meiji Jingu Stadium - 3 km / 1.8 mi Tokyo Takarazuka Theatre - 3 km / 1.9 mi Tokyo Imperial Palace - 3 km / 1.9 mi Omotesando Hills - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Tokyo Midtown Hibiya - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi Ginza Six - 3.3 km / 2 mi Imperial Garden Theatre - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi The nearest airports are: Haneda Airport (HND) - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi Narita Intl. Airport (NRT) - 70 km / 43.5 mi Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 9:30 AM for a fee. Make yourself at home in one of the 696 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary bottled water.Ticket Package

name: Shinjuku Prince Hotel
description: Right next to the lively Kabukicho area, Shinjuku Prince Hotel is a 5-minute walk from JR Shinjuku Station. It features massage services and a Japanese restaurant with panoramic city views. Fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, rooms at Shinjuku Prince Hotel have an elegant contemporary design. Each includes a fridge and a safe. The en suite bathroom is equipped with a bathtub and slippers. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Isetan Department Store and a 10-minute drive from Shinjuku Gyoen Garden. Nearby Shinjuku Station offers direct train access to the Shibuya and Harajuku areas within 5 minutes. The hotel is directly above Seibu-Shinjuku Train Station. Internet stations can be used for a fee, and luggage storage is available at the bell desk. The 24-hour front desk is offered. A variety of shops are located directly below the hotel. Restaurant Fuga-Wafu on the 25th floor features creative Japanese cooking and a bar, while Prince Marche serves buffet meals with Western and Japanese foods.

name: Apa Hotel Tokyo Kiba
description: APA Hotel Tokyo Kiba provides well-equipped rooms with a bathtub and yukata (casual summer kimono), a 5-minute walk from Kiba Station. It features a restaurant, massage services and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Tokyo Kiba APA Hotel is a 11 minutes from Tokyo Big Sight. The Nihombashi area can be accessed via a 6-minute subway ride, while the Tsukiji Fish Market and the upscale Ginza area are a 15-minute taxi ride away. The rooms are modern and feature an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, heating and air conditioning facilities, as well as, a fridge. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. A Video on Demand (VOD) system is also available. A Japanese and Western-style Gozen-style breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant, Public Bar Clover. There are vending machines on site.

name: Apa Hotel Nihonbashi-Hamachoeki-Minami
description: Just 500 metres from Hamacho Subway Station, APA Hotel Nihombashi Hamacho-eki Minami provides free WiFi in all areas and modern rooms with free wired internet, an LCD TV and a private bath. Accha Restaurant serves breakfast and lunch as a set meal, for a fee. Rooms at Nihombashi Hamacho-eki Minami APA Hotel are compact and air-conditioned, with a fridge and green tea. An original mattress optimising weight distribution is provided in all rooms. A Yukata robe and toiletries are provided. Some rooms have Sumida River views. Kokugikan Sumo Stadium is 1.5 km from the hotel. Suitengumae Subway Station is a 10-minute walk and offers direct access to the Otemachi and Shibuya areas. Tokyo Station is 4.5 km away. Massages can be requested at the 24-hour front desk. A free-use microwave and coin-operated launderette are on site. The breakfast is available from 07:00-10:00.

name: Hilton Tokyo
description: Experience the vibrancy of modern Japan when you stay in the heart of Tokyo’s dynamic business, shopping and entertainment center at the Hilton Tokyo. This luxury hotel in Shinjuku offers contemporary guest rooms, an exclusive Executive Lounge, selection of restaurants and bars and 24/7 fitness center and business center. Restaurants and Bars TSUNOHAZU dinning floor - Junisoh, Dynasty, Metropolitan Grill, Zatta, and Marble Lounge, St. George Bar. Internet: WiFi available at Lobby and Marble Lounge area. Wired & Wireless HSIA for up to five devices in all guest rooms Fitness: Produced by PRECOCR / Free for in house guests / 24/7 gym available. Indoor pool, sauna and whirlpool available.Hilton

name: The Tokyo Edition, Toranomon
description: Experience the unparalleled comfort of the luxury lifestyle at The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon. With a downtown location offering a privileged view of Tokyo Tower and Tokyo Bay, our luxury hotel signals a new generation in laid-back luxury. Discover an unprecedented intersection of tasteful design, innovation and elevated service steps from the city’s renowned art galleries, cultural landmarks, nightlife and restaurants. Showcasing premier dining, entertainment and amenities under one roof, our enchanting hotel offers an oasis of sophistication in downtown Tokyo, Japan. Every amenity achieves the perfect balance of comfort and style, from a specialty restaurant and signature cocktail bar to a 24-hour gym and custom-designed spa with 6 treatment rooms. The Tokyo EDITION, Toranomon features 206 hotel rooms and suites with iconic skyline views, including 15 rooms with outdoor terraces.Marriott

name: Hotel Metropolitan Edmont Tokyo
description: Located in the heart of Tokyo just a 5-minute walk from the East Exit of JR Iidabashi Subway Station, Hotel Metropolitan Edmont Tokyo offers comfortable rooms with a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The hotel boasts 6 dining options and massages. Guests stay at either the Main Building or East Wing Building. Nearby Iidabashi Station has 5 subway/train lines and offers direct access to the Shinjuku and Otemachi areas as well as the Kokugikan Sumo Stadium at Ryogoku. Guest rooms at the Tokyo Metropolitan Edmont are decorated with wood highlights, giving a warm feel to the room. They are air-conditioned and fitted with a fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub with shower attachment. The hotel features a convenience store and a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage and currency exchange. Metropolitan Edmont Hotel offers a variety of fine dining, including Western cuisine and local specialities such as sushi and Japanese teppanyaki grill dishes. Restaurant Beltempo serves a daily breakfast buffet for a fee.

name: Shangri-La Tokyo
address: Chiyoda-ku, Marunouchi Trust Tower Main, 1-8-3 Marunouchi, Tokyo 100-8283
description: This modern hotel is in Central Tokyo, a short stroll to Nihonbashi. It provides an indoor pool, a sauna and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site day spa, CHI. For a fast and effortless arrival and departure experience, guests can benefit from the express check-in/check-out facility. It also offers useful options for business meetings and events. Rooms feature tea and coffee making facilities, movies-on-demand and a pillow menu. All offer a Blu-ray player, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Those staying at Shangri-La Tokyo can indulge in a beverage at Lobby Lounge, before savouring a meal at Nadaman. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Shangri-La Tokyo is close to Tokyo's well-known attractions, with Mitsukoshi, INCJ and Bank of Japan just a 10-minute stroll away. Guests can also visit Marunouchi and Tokyo Stock Exchange.Revato

name: Hotel Gajoen Tokyo
description: Boasting chic decor with touches of Japanese traditional aethetics, Hotel Gajoen Tokyo is a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World. 7 dining options are featured, and free parking is available on site. JR Meguro Station is 6 minutes on foot and Tokyo Metropolitan Teien Art Museum is a 12-minute stroll. Free WiFi is provided throughout. All spacious rooms rooms include a satellite TV with cable channels, minibar, a coffee machine and handy smartphone. An en suite bathroom is fitted with a spa bath, free toiletries and hairdryer. For your comfort, some rooms include a sauna. Guests can unwind in a Japanese-style garden or at a library on site The front desk is open for 24 hours a day, and there are a pastry shop and gift shop at the property. Massage services and room services can be arranged. Shunyuki serves signature Chinese delicacies, while Tofutei offers an authentic Japanese kaiseki multi-course meal. Teppanyaki Japanese wagyu beed, American-style grilled dishes and Italian cuisine can be sampled on site. Live piano performance can also be enjoyed at an on-site cafe lounge in the day time. JR Shibuya Station is a 5-minute train ride, while JR Shinagawa Station is 8 minutes by train from Hotel Gajoen Tokyo. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 10 km away.

name: The Okura Tokyo
description: Composed of 2 buildings, The Okura Tokyo boasts a garden and bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi. The accommodation features a concierge, ticket service and currency exchange for guests. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, kettle and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All guest rooms have a private bathroom with a bath, hairdryer, bidet and free toiletries. Located on 28-40 floors, Prestige Tower offers rooms with cityscape views. Guests booking room type with Club Lounge Access in Heritage Wing can enjoy Club Lounge. Spacious rooms in Heritage Wing include complimentary welcome drink, steam sauna and spa bath. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Popular points of interest near The Okura Tokyo include Iino Hall and Conference Centre, National Diet Building and Space FS Shiodome. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International, 22 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo
description: Occupying the top nine floors of the 53-story Midtown Tower in the Roppongi District, the capital’s entertainment and design-related business hub, The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo features 245 elegantly appointed guest rooms. Our downtown Tokyo hotel features a Club Lounge and fine dining with views of the Shinjuku area, the Imperial Palace or Mount Fuji. Guests at our luxury hotel in Tokyo, Japan can enjoy an indoor pool, a soothing spa and a floor dedicated to health and wellness. Our business hotel in Tokyo also features reimagined meeting spaces with free Wi-Fi available throughout the property. Whether you are traveling for business or leisure, a luxurious welcome awaits at The Ritz-Carlton, Tokyo.Marriott

name: Hotel Wing International Ikebukuro
description: An 8-minute walk from JR Ikebukuro Train Station, Hotel Wing International offers rooms with free broadband internet and a private bathroom. A shiatsu massage service is available. The rooms at Hotel Wing International Ikebukuro are furnished with a flat-screen satellite TV and a refrigerator. Guests can relax in the nightgown and slippers and enjoy a cup of tea. Ikebukuro Hotel Wing International is just a 3-minute walk from Sunshine City, where the Airport Limousine Bus stops. Nearby Ikebukuro station offers direct train access to Shinjuku and Shibuya.

name: Grand Prince Hotel Shin Takanawa
description: Grand Prince Hotel Shin Takanawa offers spacious rooms with a balcony beside a 5-acre Japanese garden. A 5-minute walk from Shinagawa Shinkansen Station, it features several restaurants. The property features the Club Lounge, where guests with access can relax and enjoy light meals. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests at Grand Prince Hotel Shin Takanawa stay in contemporary air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub and shower, and an electric kettle is provided. From nearby Shinagawa Station, Tokyo Station is a 12-minute train ride. The Shinjuku, Harajuku and Shibuya areas can all be reached within 20 minutes by train, while Tokyo Big Sight Convention Centre is 11 km away and the Roppongi area is 5.5 km away. In mid-summer, 2 outdoor pools are available for an extra charge. A concierge provides sightseeing assistance. There is also a business room on site. A buffet-style breakfast is served at SLOPE SIDE DINER ZAKURO Buffet&Café. Guests can enjoy Japanese cuisine at SHIMIZU Japanese Restaurant and SHUMEI Japanese-style Room. There is also a Chinese restaurant, chocolate salon and bar at the property.

name: Pullman Tokyo Tamachi
description: Business or pleasure, Pullman Tokyo Tamachi transcends you to an energizing playground in the heart of Tokyo. Furnished with artwork to spark your creativity, housed with the facilities for global nomads, and blessed with a vibrant restaurant, lounge and bars.accorhotels.com

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai
description: Attractively located in the Edogawa district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai is situated 1.1 km from Shin Nagashima River Shinsui Park, 1.1 km from Gyosen Park and 1.2 km from Subway Museum. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk. The rooms in Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ukita Park, Furukawa Shinsui Park and Shinsakon River Shinsui Park. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 21 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Tozai-sen Nishi-kasai.

name: The Strings By Intercontinental, Tokyo, An IHG Hotel
description: Refined and elegant as the city itself, The Strings by InterContinental Tokyo is the perfect way to experience the beauty of Tokyo. The hotel is only a short walk from Shinagawa Station, with direct access via the Shinkansen Bullet Train to Yokohama, Osaka, Kyoto and Kobe. The famous Tsukiji Fish Market and Ginza district are nearby; Haneda International Airport is 15 min away from our hotel in Tokyo by Airport Express Train, whilst Narita International Airport is 1 hour by limousine bus.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Trunk(Hotel) Yoyogi Park
description: No description found

name: Dormy Inn Premium Shibuya Jingumae Hot Spring
description: A 5-minute walk from Meiji Jingumae Subway Station, the completely non-smoking Dormy Inn Premium Shibuya-jingumae features modern accommodations with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with shampoo, conditioner and a hairdryer. Shibuya-jingumae Premium Dormy Inn is a 10-minute walk from Yoyogi Park and Takeshita Street. Shibuya Station and JR Harajuku Train Station are both a 10-minute walk. A spacious public bath is available for guests to relax in. A coin-operated launderette and drink vending machines are available on-site as well. Guests can rent a humidifier or DVD player to use in their rooms. A Japanese/Western breakfast is available at Hatago. Free Yonaki Soba ramen noodles are catered at night.

name: Apa Hotel Shimbashi Toranomon
description: Located just a 6-minute walk from JR Shinbashi Train Station, APA Hotel Shinbashi Toranomon offers free Wi-Fi access and a 24-hour front desk. Air conditioned rooms have carpeted floors and are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels. Each room features an original mattress optimising weight distribution and an en suite bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Each comes with an electric kettle, a green tea set and a refrigerator. At Shinbashi Toranomon APA Hotel, guests can get a massage at a surcharge. A luggage storage service and vending machines are also available on site. An Italian restaurant Su E Giu is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute walk and train ride away, while the popular Ginza shopping area is accessible within a 15-minute walk from the property. Tokyo Tower is a 7-minute taxi ride from the hotel.

name: Hotel Asia Center of Japan
description: Just 500 metres from Aoyama-Itchome Subway Station, Hotel Asia Center features a Western restaurant and a massage service. Guest rooms have a LAN cable, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Asia Center of Japan have a wooden desk. Rooms also come with tea bags of Japanese green tea and houjicha, or oven-roasted tea. A flat-screen TV with satellite and VOD channels is also available. The bathroom is equipped with a bathtub. Nogizaka Subway Station is 500 metres from the hotel, and the Midtown Complex is less than a 10-minute walk away. The National Art Centre is 900 metres away. Nearby Aoyama-Itchome Station offers direct access to the Shibuya, Ginza and Shinjuku areas. Coin-operated internet stations and laundry machines are provided. The 24-hour reception offers luggage storage, and free mineral water is available at the lobby. Onsite restaurant SHIKI offers Japanese and Western style cuisine. Guests can enjoy drink include cocktail and sake.

name: Hyatt House Tokyo Shibuya
description: No description found

name: Dai-ichi Hotel Tokyo
description: Located just a 5-minute walk from the popular Ginza area, Daiichi Hotel Tokyo offers spacious modern rooms with free WiFi. Guests can request for relaxing massages after a workout at the fitness centre or a swim at the indoor pool. It also boast 10 dining options with various cuisines. JR Shimbashi Station is only a 2-minute walk away, and the Imperial Palace can be reached within a 20-minute walk. The Odaiba area is a 20-minute train ride away. Famous Tsukiji Fish Market is 7 minutes away by car or taxi. Direct airport limousine buses to/from both Narita and Haneda airports are available from the hotel. The air-conditioned rooms have warm lighting and carpeted floors. Each includes a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and an electric kettle with green tea bags. All rooms feature a Simmons mattress and memory foam pillows to ensure a good night's rest. Bathrobes are provided for all guests and the en suite bathroom has a shower. Guests can purchase small gifts at the souvenir shop or relax in the sauna rooms. Laundry services and daily newspapers are available at the front desk. Room service is offered 24/7.

name: Apa Hotel Tokyo-Kudanshita
description: A 3-minute walk from Exit 7 of Kudanshita Station and 1 km from Tokyo Dome, APA Hotel Tokyo Kudanshita features free WiFi. Massage services are available and modern rooms include an LCD TV. Offering rooms with a comfortable decor of neutral colours, Tokyo Kudanshita APA Hotel equips each with an electric kettle and a fridge. All rooms offer an original mattress optimising weight distribution, air-conditioning and come with toiletries and a wood desk. Video-on-demand movies can be used for free. Guests can store luggage at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Yasukuni Shrine and a 20-minute walk from the Imperial Palace. Kudanshita Station has direct links to the Shinjuku and Shibuya areas.

name: Hotel Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airport
description: Featuring a fitness centre, bar and views of river, Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airport is set in Tokyo and connected to Haneda Airport International Passenger Terminal. Among the facilities of this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. Every room includes a separate shower booth and views of the river. Villa Fontaine Premier Haneda Airpo offers a buffet or American breakfast. The accommodation offers an open-air hot spring bath, stone spa, sauna for guests to relax, while 30 restaurants are available onsite along with 60 shopping and shops. A business centre and vending machines with drinks are available on site at the accommodation.

name: Hotel Mystays Premier Omori
description: A 5-minute walk from the north exit of JR Omori Train Station, HOTEL MYSTAYS PREMIER Omori offers classically furnished western rooms and free WiFi throughout the property. Rooms are decorated in earth tones and are equipped with a 32-inch flat-screen TV, a personal refrigerator and tea-making facilities. Rooms also come with a small sofa and a private bathroom with bath, shower and free toiletries. Guests can make arrangements for an in-room Swedish oil massage and laundry services are available. Discount passes to Shinagawa Aquarium, which is a 5-minute walk away can be purchased at Omori MYSTAYS PREMIER HOTEL. Private parking is available on site for an additional fee. It is a 20-minute drive to Odaiba and a 6-minute train ride to Shinagawa. Both Ueno in Tokyo and Yokohama can be reached within a 20-minute train ride from the Omori Station. Please note, guest room temperatures are centrally controlled. Guests cannot switch between air conditioning and heating.

name: Smile Hotel Tokyo Nihonbashi
description: Just 100 metres from Kayabacho Subway Station, Smile Hotel Nihonbashi offers rooms with free wired internet, a tea maker and a private bathroom. There is an on-site restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Smile Hotel Tokyo Nihonbashi come with an electric kettle with green tea. Slippers and a bathtub are provided. Tokyo Train Station is a 5-minute drive, and Tsukiji Fish Market is a 10-minute taxi ride. Nearby Kayabacho Station has direct subway links to Roppongi, Akihabara and Otemachi. Takashimaya Department Store is a 10-minute walk. Guests can unwind with a massage, and a coin launderette is on site. Laptops can be rented at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Hotel Niwa Tokyo
description: Located just a 4-minute walk from JR Suidobashi Station, Hotel Niwa offers an elegant accommodation with touches of Japanese traditional design. A Japanese-style courtyard and 2 on-site restaurants are featured. Free WiFi is available. Jimbocho Subway Station is a 5-minute stroll away. This hotel was selected as one of Top 25 Hotels in Japan by TripAdvisor's Travelers' Choice Award 2018. Bright light filters through paper sliding screens in the modern rooms at Hotel Niwa Tokyo. Rooms are furnished with an LCD TV and fridge. A complimentary bottle of water is provided every day during your stay. Some rooms come with an extra long bed or a coffee machine. Hotel Niwa Tokyo features a Relaxation Lounge with massage chairs, overlooking a rooftop mini garden. Guests can work out at free fitness centre on site. A coin-operated launderette, drinks vending machines and a 24-hour business centre are available. Seasonal Japanese kaiseki multi-course meals can be savoured at Yukuri, with views of the garden. Dining Lieu offers casual French delicacies, specialising in farm to table vegetables. Hotel Niwa Tokyo is 10 minute on foot to Tokyo Dome Stadium. Tokyo Imperial Palace is a 20-minute walk away, as is Yasukuni Shrine.

name: Hotel Mystays Hamamatsucho
description: Hotel MyStays Hamamatsucho is located just a 3-minute walk from Daimon Subway Station and a 5-minute walk from JR Hamamatsucho Train Station. It offers a massage service, memory foam pillows and free WiFi access is available throughout the entire property. Hamamatsucho Hotel MyStays is 500 metres from Hamamatsucho Monorail Station, which offers direct access to Haneda Airport in 18 minutes. Tokyo station is a mere 5-minute train ride away from JR Hamamatsucho Train Station by using the Keihin Tohoku line, while the Roppongi area is only a 5-minute train ride away from Daimon Subway Station on the Oedo Subway Line. This subway line also offers direct access to cultural centre Asakusa, the Tokyo Skytree and lively Shinjuku area. Tsukiji fish market is a 5-minute drive away. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities, while air purifier is available in rooms. Stylishly decorated, each room is equipped with a fridge, a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels and a tea set with green tea. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub and a toilet. Free toiletries, slippers and hairdryers are provided.

name: Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo Ariake
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo Ariake is situated in Tokyo, 2.1 km from Odaiba Beach and 1.5 km from Tokyo Water Science Museum. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features an ATM, a business centre and currency exchange for guests. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Gas Science Museum, Ariake West Terminal Park and Panasonic Center Tokyo. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 11 km from Villa Fontaine Grand Tokyo Ariake.

name: The Prince Gallery Tokyo Kioicho, a Luxury Collection Hotel
description: A five-star travel experience with an unrivaled view awaits at The Prince Gallery Tokyo Kioicho, a Luxury Collection Hotel. Let us welcome you to Japan's capital city with a seamless blend of historic elegance, modern style and exquisite service. Our hotel is superbly located in Tokyo's bustling downtown district, just steps from the iconic Akasaka Prince Classic House, directly connected to the subway station and a short distance from the city's main train station. The moment you step into our soaring Sky Lobby, with its abundant natural light, you'll know you've arrived somewhere special. Immaculately designed hotel rooms and suites feature unparalleled views of downtown Tokyo and modern technology such as free Wi-Fi, DVD players and tablet controls; Luxury Collection amenities in the bathroom elevate your stay. Our spa, indoor pool and heated public bath offer a restorative retreat, while our restaurants and bars serve a range of unique and flavorful options.Marriott

name: Ueno First City Hotel
description: Ueno First City Hotel is located a 1-minute walk from Yushima Subway Station and a 5-minute walk from JR Okachimachi Station. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi, 2 restaurants and massage services. Rooms at Ueno First City Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV, refrigerator and private bathroom with hairdryer. Business facilities and luggage storage are available. Guests can rent bicycles and use personal computers for a fee. Breakfast is served at Fushimi-Tei and Cafe Terrace Ruru. Located within a 10-minute walk from Ueno First City Hotel are tourist attractions such as the Ueno Zoo, Tokyo National Museum and The National Museum of Western Art.
