Kappabashi street is a 5-minute drive away. Akihabara, Asakusa and Ginza areas can be accessed directly via Ueno Station's 2 subway lines.

name: Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-Guchi Tennozu Isle
description: Ideally located in the Shinagawa Ward district of Tokyo, Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle is set 100 metres from Archi-Depot Museum, 300 metres from Tennozu Park and 700 metres from Higashishinagawa Kaijo Park. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and free shuttle service for guests. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle provides some units with river views, and each room is equipped with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ebara Jinja Shrine, Yoganji Temple and Kujirazuka. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 8 km from Toyoko Inn Tokyo Shinagawa Konan-guchi Tennozu Isle.

name: Sheraton Grande Tokyo Bay Hotel
description: Holding the proud distinction of being a Tokyo Disney Resort® Official Hotel, Sheraton Grande Tokyo Bay Hotel offers unbeatable access via monorail to both Tokyo Disneyland® and Tokyo DisneySea®. We're also 10 minutes from Ikspiari, home to sensational shopping, dining and entertainment. Plan your visit to enjoy resort amenities like a free shuttle to and from the monorail, a full fitness center, Japanese-style baths and four exceptional restaurants. Our 1,016 contemporary, spacious hotel rooms and suites boast views of Tokyo Disney Resort® or the bay. The brand-new Park Wing is inspired by a luxury liner & features stylish Dog Lover Suites. Guests seeking a distinctive venue for a business meeting, wedding or social event in the Tokyo Disneyland® area can make use of 40,000 square feet of sophisticated venue space. Create lasting memories at Sheraton Grande Tokyo Bay Hotel.Marriott

name: Centurion Hotel Ikebukuro Station
description: Opened in September 2014, this hotel is conveniently located within a 3-minute walk from JR Ikebukuro Station. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. It is situated right in the heart of lively Ikebukuro area. Each air-conditioned room at Centurion Hotel Ikebukuro comes with a flat-screen TV, Slumberland mattress, an air purifier. fridge and a telephone. The en suite bathroom features a bath tub, hairdryer and free organic amenities including shampoo, conditioner and body wash. The Centurion Hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage services and shops on site. Massages can be requested at an additional charge. There is a coin launderette at the property. The 2nd floor restaurant serves American and Asian food for breakfast. There is a convenience store located on the ground floor. The hotel is a 5-minute walk to the Sunshine 60 Observatory. The Ikebukuro Station offers direct train access to Shinjuku, Harajuku and Shibuya, all within a 20-minute ride.

name: Hotel Graphy Nezu
description: This affordable hotel is located in Taito, just a few minutes from Ueno Zoo. It offers complimentary Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace and a coffee bar. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of Hotel Graphy Nezu, including a library, a shared kitchen and luggage storage. Laundry facilities are also available. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature premium amenities such as a rain shower, an oversized bathtub and slippers. They are all soundproofed and include a private bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities and a refrigerator. Nezu Graphy Hotel offers a conveniently located café where guests can have a bite to eat before discovering the property's surrounds. Hotel Graphy Nezu is close to Ueno Zoo Monorail, making it easy for guests to explore Tokyo and its surrounding areas. Ueno Park is within a 10-minute walk and Haneda Airport is 35 minutes' drive away.Revato

name: New Otani Inn Tokyo
description: Right next to JR Osaki Train Station, New Otani Inn Tokyo offers stylish rooms and an en suite bathroom with bathtub. The hotel features massage services and a Japanese restaurant. Rooms at Tokyo New Otani Inn are decorated with modern art and red pillows. You can try on the linen yukata robe and watch TV, or have a soak in the bath. Directly connected to the Yamanote Line’s Osaki Station, the hotel is 1 train stop from JR Shinagawa Shinkansen Station. The Shinjuku, Marunouchi and Odaiba areas are all within a 20-minute train ride. Guests can enjoy browsing the hotel’s shops, or rent a laptop from the 24-hour front desk to surf the Web. Traditional multi-course Kaiseki meals featuring seasonal ingredients are on offer at Funachaya Restaurant. The Lounge serves tea during the day and cocktails in the evening, while Bar Outrigger pours drinks at its polished counter.

name: Dormy Inn Akihabara Hot Spring
description: Renovated in July 2015, Dormy Inn offers rooms with free internet, good transportation links and an open-air bath with sauna. The property is just a 5-minute walk from Akihabara Electric Town. Dormy Inn's air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, hairdryer and private shower room. Dormy Inn Akihabara's facilities include a restaurant, free internet access in the lobby and coin-operated laundry machines with free detergent. Tumble dryers are available at a fee. There are separate open-air baths for men and women available at the property. Breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant. Free Yonaki Soba ramen noodles are catered at night. It is less that a 5-minute walk from JR Akihabara Station and Suehirocho Station for the Tokyo Metro Ginza Line.

name: Ginza Creston
description: Only a 7-minute walk from Tsukiji Subway Station, Ginza Creston offers guestrooms with Sumida River or city views and hotel-wide free WiFi. All rooms are located between the 33rd and 38th floor. Tokyo Station is a 10-minute taxi ride away. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Guests can use the electric kettle to make warm green tea and wear the provided nightwear, and the en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Ginza Creston is a 5-minute walk from Tsukiji Outer Market and a 20-minute walk from Ginza shopping areas. Haneda Airport is a 50-minute train ride and Narita International Airport is a 75-minute train ride away. Guests can request relaxing massages for an extra cost. Luggage storage and laundry services are available. Japanese dishes are served at Shabuzen, and grilled Teppanyaki meals at Kazan restaurant. Light meals and refreshments are available Lounge Prashanti.

name: Dhawa Yura Kyoto
description: Travel back in time to a mysterious hideaway in the ancient capital city of Kyoto. Contemporary design meets historical features in this intimate boutique hotel near the Kamo River, telling the story of an era that marked Japanese history with its blend of old and new, East and West. Located in Sanjo in the heart of Kyoto, Dhawa Yura sits within walking distance of temples, shrines, shopping, cuisine and museums.accorhotels.com

name: Sequence Kyoto Gojo
description: Well situated in the centre of Kyoto, sequence KYOTO GOJO offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar. All units in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. The units at sequence KYOTO GOJO come with a TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Guests staying at sequence KYOTO GOJO have access to the on-site wellness area which includes a sauna. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto International Manga Museum and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from sequence KYOTO GOJO.

name: Hyatt Regency Kyoto
description: The stylish Hyatt Regency offers spacious rooms, free Wi-Fi at the lobby and 3 restaurants on just a 5-minute drive from Kyoto Station. It features a fitness centre, spa services and rental bicycles. Private parking is offered on site at an additional charge. The elegant rooms are decorated in light natural tones, and furnished with a 32-inch plasma TV, a DVD player and a safe. A minibar, nightwear and slippers are provided. Guests can treat themselves to shiatsu, acupuncture, aromatherapy and other treatments at Riraku Spa. The Kyoto Regency Hyatt offers a 24-hour concierge, a souvenir shop and baby-sitting services. Restaurant cafe 33 features cafe cuisine, while Touzan serves Japanese cuisine and Trattoria Sette offers Italian food. The Hyatt has a bar, a pastry shop and room service. The Hyatt Regency Kyoto is a 5-minute walk away from Shichijo Station. It is a less than 5-minute walk away from Kyoto National Museum and Sanjusangen-do Temple. From Kyoto Station, an express train can take guests to Kansai International Airport in 75 minutes. Limousine buses also depart from Kyoto Station for Osaka Itami Airport and the bus ride takes approximately 55 minutes.

name: Smile Hotel Kyoto-shijo
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Karasuma Station and Shijo Subway Station, Smile Hotel Kyoto Shijo offers great access to public transport links. The hotel features affordable rooms, free WiFi and a restaurant. Kyoto Shijo Smile Hotel is a 15-minute walk from Nijo Castle and downtown area Shijo-Kawaramachi. It is a 20-minute walk from Nishihonganji-temple, and 2 subway stops from Kyoto Station. The bright rooms at the Smile Hotel are comfortably furnished with a flat-screen TV, fridge and electric kettle with green tea bags. Bath amenities, hairdryers and toothbrushes are provided. Guests will also find nightwear and slippers in the room. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and it conveniently offers coin-operated laundry facilities. Luggage storage is available, and massage service can be arranged in the room.

name: The Royal Park Hotel Kyoto Sanjo
description: The Royal Park Hotel Kyoto Sanjo features stylish modern accommodations with free wired internet access. The hotel offers massages and concierge services, as well as a bar and a buffet restaurant with savory dishes. Kyoto Shiyakusho-mae Subway Station and Sanjo Keihan Station are both within a 3-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms boast smooth colours, stylish lamps and a flat-screen TV. Each private bathroom features a spacious shower area with a bathtub. A fridge and an electric kettle with green tea are provided. The Royal Park Hotel Kyoto Sanjo is a 20-minute walk from Kyoto Imperial Palace and a 10-minute public bus ride from Nijo Castle. The Gion area and Yasaka Shrine are within a 15-minute walk away. Luggage storage and a safety deposit are offered at the 24-hour front desk. A coin-launderette is on-site and dry cleaning services can be requested as well. Laptop rentals and drink/snack vending machines are available. Featuring an IKA Culinary Olympic rewarded chef, Monsieur Ito serves Western dishes using local ingredients. Late-night drinks are available at the stylish bar. There are also a wide selection of restaurants around the hotel.

name: La'gent Hotel Kyoto Nijo
description: The property is 2 km away from Nijo Castle, 2 km from Kitano Tenmangu Shrine, 3 km from Kyoto International Manga Museum, and 4 km from Kyoto City KYOCERA Museum of Art. The hotel is 4 km away from Kyoto Station, 48 km from Osaka International Airport, and 100 km from Kansai International Airport. Facilities and services include large public bath, free Wi-Fi, smoking booth, vending machine/ice machine, coin laundry, air conditioning, multilingual staff, wheelchair access, safe, restaurant, and elevator. Rooms feature all rooms are non-smoking, humidified air purifier, hair dryer, electric kettle, refrigerator, safe, alarm clock, free Wi-Fi, and TV.WebBeds

name: Hotel Granvia Kyoto
address: JR Kyoto Station, Karasuma Chuo-Guchi, Kyoto 600-8216
description: Ideally located within Kyoto Station, Hotel Granvia Kyoto boasts an indoor swimming pool, a fitness centre and 9 dining options. The hotel offers spacious rooms with chic décor and modern facilities. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. Rooms have large windows and are fitted with an LCD TV, extra-long beds and a bathroom. A minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Guests at the Kyoto Granvia can relax in the steam room or the hot tub. The hotel features over 1000 art works. It is close to Kyoto Station’s shopping mall and museum. Extra charges apply to use the swimming pool and fitness centre. Cafe Restaurant Le Temps serves light dishes and a range of restaurants offer Japanese specialities. Granvia Hotel features a bar and provides in-room dining until midnight. Hotel Granvia Kyoto is just a 3-minute walk to Kyoto Tower. Popular Arashiyama area and Fushimi Inari Shrine with hundreds of red gates are both within a 15-minute train ride from the Kyoto Station. Iconic Kiyomizu Temple is a 20-minute bus or taxi ride away.

name: Gion Elite Terrace
description: Located in Kyoto, 800 metres from Gion Shijo Station, Gion Elite Terrace provides accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel features a sauna, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms at Gion Elite Terrace are equipped with a seating area. A buffet, continental or Asian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The accommodation provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Gion Elite Terrace include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Shoren-in Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the hotel.

name: Onyado Nono Kyoto Shichijo Natural Hot Spring
description: Boasting a spa and wellness centre, Onyado Nono Kyoto Shichijo Natural Hot Spring is situated in the centre of Kyoto, 400 metres from TKP Garden City Kyoto. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation features a sauna, hot spring bath, restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kyoto Station, Sanjusangen-do Temple and Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from Onyado Nono Kyoto Shichijo Natural Hot Spring.

name: Kyoto Garden Palace
address: 605 Tatsumae-cho, Shimochojamachi Agaru, Karasuma-dori, Kamigyo-ku, Kyoto 602-0912
description: Right in front of Kyoto Imperial Palace, Kyoto Garden Palace offers free WiFi in all areas of the hotel. The hotel features a restaurant, and it provides bicycle rentals and massage services. Rooms at Garden Palace are air-conditioned and fitted with an LCD TV with satellite channels, a fridge and a green-tea maker. Japanese Yukata robes are provided for all guests. Guests can unwind with a massage, visit the hairdresser or browse in the hotel shop. Japanese specialities can be sampled with a garden view at restaurant Hanagoyomi, while Restaurant Brillante serves a variety of Western dishes. Drinks can be enjoyed at the tea lounge. The hotel is a 1-minute walk from Kyoto Gyoen Garden and a 20-minute walk from Nijo Castle. Marutamachi Subway Station is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Okura Kyoto
description: Hotel Okura's elegant rooms boast spectacular views of Kyoto against the backdrop of the Higashiyama Mountains. In the heart of the city, the hotel treats its guests to a shopping avenue, free Wi-Fi at the lobby and concierge services. Beauty treatments and baby-sitting services are available. Connected to the Shiyakusho-mae Subway Station, Hotel Okura Kyoto is a 5-minute walk from Honno-ji Temple, and a 10-minute walk from Kyoto International Manga Museum. The Takashimaya department store in the shopping district of Shijo Kawaramachi is a 12-minute stroll away. Guests can browse a variety of boutiques at Shopping Avenue Comfort, which includes a hairdresser and a jewellery shop. Okura Hotel offers a charged indoor swimming pool and free parking. A free shuttle and charged luggage delivery is provided to/from its Welcome Lounge at JR Kyoto Station. Luxurious rooms feature neutral colours, extra long beds, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. Guests can lounge in their yukata robe or bathrobe, with drinks from the minibar. Free high-speed wired internet is provided. Boasting panoramic mountain and city views, Sky Restaurant Pittoresque serves French cuisine and wines from its own wine cellar. Hotel Okura Kyoto houses a bakery and a variety of restaurants, including a top-floor buffet restaurant and Kyoto cuisine.

name: Maana Kiyomizu
address: 427-18, Myohoin Maekawacho, Higashiyama Ward, Kyoto, Kyoto 605-0932
description: No description found

name: Toyoko Inn Kyoto Gojo-omiya
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Kyoto, Toyoko Inn Kyoto Gojo omiya provides buffet breakfast and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 2.9 km away and Nijo Castle is 3 km from the hotel. The units in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Guest rooms in Toyoko Inn Kyoto Gojo omiya are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Staff at the accommodation are available to provide guidance at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Kyoto Gojo omiya include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto Station and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 43 km from the hotel.

name: hotel kanra kyoto
description: Just a 12-minute walk from Kyoto Station, hotel kanra kyoto is an entirely non-smoking hotel, offering spacious rooms and a mix of traditional Japanese, modern and Western decor. All guest rooms feature free WiFi access and Japanese tatami (woven-straw) flooring. Rooms feature a Japanese-style seating area and traditional Kyoto Kiyomizu-yaki ceramics. There is a wash basin, and the en suite bathroom comes with a wooden bathtub and free toiletries. The 24-hour front desk provides concierge services and free luggage storage. There is a drinks vending machine on site and bicycles can be rented for an additional fee. The hotel offers Teppanyaki and Italian cuisine, and a cafe featuring local seasonal ingredients. Japanese-style and Western set menus are offered for breakfast. Nishiki Market is 14-minutes away via train and walk, while the Gion area, Kiyomizu-dera Temple and Nijo Temple are all within a 15-minute drive. Fushimi Inari-Taisha Shrine is 7-minutes from Kyoto Station via train and walk. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, a 50-minute drive away from the property.

name: The Westin Miyako Kyoto
description: The Westin Miyako Kyoto opened in 1890 at the base of Higashiyama in the ancient capital city of Kyoto, Japan. For more than 130 years, our family-friendly hotel has responded to the changing times while respecting its traditions. Now, we open a new chapter in our hotel's history. Expect memorable moments filled with understated elegance, luxury and approachable service when you visit us in Kyoto, Japan. Explore nearby museums, music halls, zoos and many historical temples and shrines, including the Heian Shrine, Nanzenji, Eikando and Ginkakuji. Sample delicious, locally inspired dishes and expertly crafted cocktails in one of our many hotel restaurants. At the end of your day in Kyoto, settle into a well-appointed hotel room or suite with complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and 24-hour room service. Experience all Kyoto, Japan, has to offer with your family at The Westin Miyako Kyoto.Marriott

name: The Hotel Higashiyama By Kyoto Tokyu Hotel
description: THE HOTEL HIGASHIYAMA by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel has a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Kyoto. With a bar, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All guest rooms in THE HOTEL HIGASHIYAMA by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near THE HOTEL HIGASHIYAMA by Kyoto Tokyu Hotel include Shoren-in Temple, Samurai Kembu Kyoto and Heian Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 47 km from the hotel.

name: Fauchon Hotel Kyoto
description: Boasting a fitness centre, a restaurant as well as a bar, Fauchon Hotel Kyoto is set in the centre of Kyoto, 800 metres from Gion Shijo Station. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Each room has a safety deposit box and selected rooms also feature mountain views. At the hotel the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Fauchon Hotel Kyoto offers a continental or American breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sanjusangen-do Temple, Samurai Kembu Kyoto and TKP Garden City Kyoto. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from Fauchon Hotel Kyoto.

name: Hotel Mondonce Kyoto Gojo
description: Hotel MONDONCE Kyoto Gojo provides accommodation within 1.5 km of the centre of Kyoto, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and a stovetop. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. Kitchenware and kettle are also provided. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include TKP Garden City Kyoto, Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 45 km from Hotel MONDONCE Kyoto Gojo.

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi Jokyoji
description: Set in Kyoto, within 1 km of Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall and 1.5 km of Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi Jokyoji offers accommodation with a spa and wellness centre. Featuring a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.6 km from the city centre and 600 metres from Gion Shijo Station. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms are equipped with a shared bathroom with a bidet, a hairdryer and slippers. At Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi Jokyoji every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. The reception at Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi Jokyoji can provide tips on the area. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 1.7 km from the hotel, while Shoren-in Temple is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Kawaramachi Jokyoji.

name: Dormy Inn Premium Kyoto Ekimae Natural Hot Spring
description: A 3-minute walk from Kyoto Station and Kyoto Tower, Dormy Inn Premium Kyoto Ekimae Natural Hot Spring offers rooms with free internet. It features large natural hot spring baths, a sauna and massages. Rooms at the Kyoto Ekimae Dormy Inn feature a contemporary decor. They come with a flat-screen TV, a refrigerator and a private toilet. Guests at Dormy Inn Premium Kyoto Ekimae Natural Hot Spring can relax in the top-floor indoor and semi-outdoor hot tubs. The Inn offers free laundry facilities and a convenience store. A breakfast buffet is available at the hotel's restaurant, which specialises in Japanese and Western favourites. Dormy Inn Premium Kyoto Ekimae Natural Hot Spring lies amidst shops and restaurants. Famous nearby sites include the Higashi Hongan-ji Temple and the Shosei-en Garden, both within a 5-minute walk.

name: Hotel Mystays Kyoto - Shijo
description: Recommended by the Michelin Guide, Hotel MyStays Kyoto-Shijo is centrally located in Kyoto and is a 6-minute walk from Shijo Subway Station. It offers rooms with free WiFi and wired internet, a restaurant and self-service laundry facilities. Rooms at Kyoto-Shijo MyStays are bright and comfortable. They feature an LCD TV, an air purifier and a safe. A refrigerator and an electric kettle are provided. Guests at MyStays Hotel Kyoto-Shijo can enjoy complimentary coffee or green tea milk. Local Kyoto cuisine "Obanzai" can be savoured at Kyo Washoku Dining Chacha restaurant, which offers breakfast buffets. Hotel MyStays Kyoto-Shijo is just a 15-minute walk away from Nijo Castle. World Heritage Site Kiyomizu-dera Temple and the Heian-Jingu Shrine are both a 15-minute bus ride away.

name: Resi Stay Mayu Grace Hotel
description: Attractively situated in the Nakagyo Ward district of Kyoto, RESI STAY Mayu Grace Hotel is situated 700 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum, 1.2 km from Nijo Castle and 2.3 km from Samurai Kembu Kyoto. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is 3.2 km from Kyoto Imperial Palace and 3.3 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a microwave, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel rooms have a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Shoren-in Temple is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Heian Shrine is 3.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 38 km from RESI STAY Mayu Grace Hotel.

name: Hotel & Spa Lotus (Adult Only)
description: Designed for adults only, Lotus Hotel & Spa is a love hotel located a 15-minute walk away from Takeda Subway Station. The love hotel offers guests spacious rooms to relax in. Guests enjoy free parking and free wired internet. Kyoto Station is within a 15-minute Taxi ride. The stylishly decorated rooms feature tasteful, modern interiors and earth-tone fabrics. Each has a flat-screen TV and a comfortable seating area. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and free toiletries. Rooms have erotic items and TV channels and a computer connected to the internet. Guests can enjoy Balinese oil massages at the spa. Dinner is not served on the property, but guests can bring their own dinners or dine out. Breakfast is served in the guest rooms. Fushimi Inari is a 15-minute walk away, while the Shijo/Kawaramachi area is within a 16-minute taxi ride from the property. Kinkakuji (Golden Pavilion) is accessible within a 30-minute taxi ride.

name: Hotel Nikko Princess Kyoto
description: Receiving 3 black pavilions for five consecutive years on the 2014 to 2018 Michelin Guides, Hotel Nikko Princess Kyoto is a 3-minute walk from Exit 5 of Shijo Subway Station. This 5-star hotel offers a beauty salon, 5 dining options and property-wide free WiFi service. Guestrooms offer spacious European interiors with modern furnishings. Each room is equipped with an air purifier/humidifier, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. A mini-fridge, an electric kettle and nightwear is provided. Guests can refresh in spacious bathtub in the contemporary en suite bathroom. A buffet featuring 70 different breakfast items is available at the Café Restaurant Amber Court in the mornings. Tempura dishes and Japanese meals are available at Sagano, while Chinese cuisines are served at Hisuien. Teppanyaki grills are offered at Hoen restaurant. Guests can enjoy a massage or spa treatment at the beauty salon. Traditional crafts from Kyoto can be purchased from the souvenir shop on site. Tourist information and various services are offered at the concierge desk. Princess Kyoto Nikko Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Nijo Castle and Kiyomizu-dera Temple. The Minamiza Kabuki Theatre is a 20-minute walk and Nishiki food market street is a 7-minute walk away.

name: Rihga Royal Hotel Kyoto
description: Conveniently located a 7-minute walk from JR Kyoto Train Station, RIHGA Royal Hotel Kyoto is renovated in September 2016 and features 8 restaurants. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property and a concierge is available on call. Complimentary shuttle runs between the hotel and JR Kyoto Station. Featuring contemporary decor with Japanese touches, all rooms come with a satellite TV and minibar. An en suite bathroom includes Laura Ashley bath amenities and toothbrushes. Guests will find an electric kettle, hairdryer, air humidifier and purifier in their rooms. Offering panoramic views from the 14th floor, a rotating restaurant, Top of Kyoto, serves authentic French delicacies, while Aoi Teppanyaki Restaurant serves Japanese-style grilled omi Japanese wagyu beef. Chinese dishes and a bar and cafe are also on site. The hotel is only a 5-minute walk from Nishi Hongan-ji Temple. Higashi Hongan-ji Temple and To-ji Temple are within a 20-minute walk. Fushimi Inari Taisha Shrine is a 5-minute train ride, while Kiyomizu-dera and Kinkaku-ji temples can be reached within a 30-minute bus ride.

name: The Chapter Kyoto, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: Located in Japan’s historical and cultural hub, our Kyoto, Japan, hotel is set to showcase the hidden gems of the city for travelers and locals who seek out independent experiences and crave a connection with the community when traveling. The hotel features 203 elegantly appointed guestrooms including two signature suites. Drawing inspiration from Japanese tea ceremonies, the guestrooms feature key elements of Japanese tea rooms and are reimagined with a modern interpretation to offer functional beauty and comfort with a sense of tradition. The hotel also has a fully-equipped, 24/7 fitness center as well as a traditional Japanese public bath for guests to relax and rejuvenate after a long day of exploring. Discover our range of Kyoto, Japan, hotel deals before your next visit to The Chapter Kyoto, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel.Marriott

name: Kyoto Tower Hotel Annex
description: Kyoto Tower Hotel Annex is conveniently located in the popular Kyoto Station area. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, taxi service, ticket service, laundromat, 24-hour front desk. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, carpeting, slippers, towels, internet access – wireless. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as massage. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kyoto Tower Hotel Annex.Agoda

name: Village Kyoto
description: Village Kyoto provides elegant 3-star accommodation in Kyoto. It also features a laundry service, off-site parking and free Wi-Fi. The rooms at Kyoto Village are air-conditioned and include slippers, a flat-screen TV and a refrigerator. They provide heating and a bathtub. A satisfying breakfast is prepared every morning at Kyoto Village Hotel, and there are numerous cafés and eateries nearby. Kyoto's well-known attractions and landmarks are within close proximity to Village Hotel Kyoto, with Mibu-dera just a 10-minute walk away. Kinkaku-ji is only a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hearton Hotel Kyoto
description: Hearton Hotel Kyoto offers a restaurant, coin-operated laundry facilities. Rooms come with free wired internet, while free Wi-Fi is available at the lobby. Only 3 train stops away from Kyoto Station, Karasuma-Oike Subway Station is a 2-minute walk away from the hotel. Bright, air-conditioned rooms are decorated in lively colours. They are fitted with an LCD TV, a desk and a refrigerator. Nightwear and slippers are provided. Guests at Hearton Hotel can unwind with a massage treatment. Computers are available at the internet corner, and there is a souvenir shop. Overlooking the patio, the hotel's restaurant serves Western and traditional Kyoto cuisine. Hearton Hotel Kyoto is less than a 5-minute walk away from Kyoto International Manga Museum. It is a 15-minute walk from Nijō Castle and Nishiki Market.

name: HOTEL THE MITSUI KYOTO, a Luxury Collection Hotel & Spa
description: Since ancient times, visitors to Kyoto, Japan have experienced the exquisite beauty of the natural world, where four seasons come and go in balanced succession. Our luxury Kyoto hotel harmonizes with nature, climate and history while harnessing our guests' pleasures as our own. This ideal, and the ties to traditional Japanese aesthetics and beliefs, is a part of our brand concept, EMBRACING JAPAN’S BEAUTY. From architecture and crafts to food and service, Kyoto culture and local customs shine through every detail of our hotel and infuse our meticulous, inviting hospitality. Be replenished with the natural spring water of our five star hotel in Kyoto’s private onsen thermal spa. Get energized in our fitness center open 24 hours a day. Delight in views of Kyoto or the garden from your luxury hotel room or suite with evening turndown, 24-hour room service and shoji room dividers. At HOTEL THE MITSUI KYOTO, a Luxury Collection Hotel and Spa, the authenticity of Japan is at the forefront of our service.Marriott

name: Ana Crowne Plaza Hotel Kyoto, An IHG Hotel
description: ANA Crowne Plaza Kyoto is situated right in front of the prominent world heritage site Nijo-Castle, surrounded by an abundance of greenery and seasonal flowers. Around the perimeter of the Nijo Castle is an ideal place for a jog or perhaps a stroll. Direct Shuttle Bus runs conveniently to and from JR Kyoto Station and Nijojo-mae Subway Station are located just a minute's walk away.  Nearby bus stops provide guests with easy access to major sightseeing spots, downtown areas as well as the Gion district, where guests may bump into a Geisha or Maiko on the way to work. ANA Crowne Plaza Kyoto is the ideal hotel for both sightseeing and business purposes. In each of our 6 restaurants, Japanese, Szechwan, French, Teppanyaki, Tempura as well as the Café, expert chefs proudly serve distinctive seasonal dishes which will surely be a feast for all our guest’s senses.  Also, guests can unwind in our lounge under the dynamic view of the 7m waterfall cascade or sink into a sofa in the member’s bar and enjoy the elegant and intimate setting over a drink. Our standard rooms, based around the color white, ensure tranquility, our spacious deluxe rooms provide warmth in abundance and our renovated rooms blend Kyoto tradition and modern stylishness. All guest rooms in the hotel are well appointed and equipped with high-speed Internet access via LAN and Wi-Fi, as well as a humidifier and VOD.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Suiran, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Kyoto
description: Immerse yourself in the unique, rich and beautiful history and culture of Japan at Suiran, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Kyoto. Set along the peaceful Hozu River in the scenic Arashiyama Hills, we welcome you to enjoy an authentic Japanese-style experience. A harmonious blend of a relaxing haven and the modern conveniences of a vibrant city, our luxury hotel is perfectly poised to offer access to some of Japan’s most important national treasures. With an intimate collection of 39 rooms, including six specialty rooms, this retreat is inspired by traditional Japanese touches and culture, offering a truly enriching and indigenous experience. For a locally inspired meal, the restaurant and comfortable café offer a variety of gourmet options.Marriott

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Shinmachi Bettei
description: Opening in March 2014, Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Shinmachi Bettei offers accommodations with a modern yet traditional décor. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property and guests can refresh in the public bath. Shijo and Karasuma Station are both within a 10-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms feature comfortable Serta beds and a flat-screen TV. An electric kettle with green tea bags is provided in each room. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. A coin-launderette is on site, while dry cleaning services are available as well. The 24-hour front desk offers photocopying services and luggage storage. Drink vending machines are on site. Guests can request massage services at an additional charge. The restaurant serves a Japanese breakfast in a traditional modern decor. Meals feature local ingredients including Kyoto vegetables. Shinmachi Bettei Kyoto Mitsui Garden Hotel is a 15-minute walk from Nijo Castle and a 5-minute drive from the Kyoto Imperial Palace. JR Kyoto Station and Kiyomizu Temple are both within a 10-minute drive away.

name: Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji
description: Conveniently set in the Shimogyo Ward district of Kyoto, Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji is located 1 km from TKP Garden City Kyoto, 2.3 km from Sanjusangen-do Temple and 2.4 km from Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 2.2 km from the city centre and 800 metres from Kyoto Station. All rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hairdryer, all units at Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a terrace. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. Kyoto International Manga Museum is 3.7 km from Shiki Suites - Kyoto Umekoji, while Nijo Castle is 3.9 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 42 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Grand Fine Kyoto Minami
description: Designed for adults only, Hotel Grand Fine Kyoto Minami is a love hotel located in Kyoto City and a 5-minute taxi ride (or 15-minute walk) from the west exit of Takeda Train/Subway Station. This love hotel offers elegant rooms that include a flat-screen TV with free video-on-demand movies. This stylish adults-only property offers free parking, a complimentary breakfast and a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage. Free Wi-Fi is available at the lobby. Modern décor and warm lighting feature throughout the guest rooms at Hotel Grand Fine. All air-conditioned units are well equipped with a fridge, complimentary mineral water and an electric kettle with instant coffee. A spacious bathtub, a flat-screen TV, a sauna room and toiletries are in the attached bathrooms. Rooms have erotic items and TV channels. Guests enjoy the convenience of room service and vending machines. There are free-use internet PCs at the lobby. From nearby Takeda Station, Kyoto Station is a 10-minute train ride away and the Gion area is an 18-minute train ride away. Fushimi Inari Shrine is a 15-minute taxi ride from the hotel.

name: The Ritz-Carlton, Kyoto
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Kyoto, the first luxury urban resort in Japan, sits on the banks of the Kamogawa River, with sweeping views of the famous Higashiyama mountains. This Kyoto, Japan hotel resort features 134 guest rooms with traditional Japanese motifs, four restaurants and bars including modern Japanese cuisine and a spa for the ultimate rejuvenation.Marriott

name: Daiwa Roynet Hotel Kyoto Shijo Karasuma
description: Only a 1-minute walk from Shijo Subway Station in the heart of Kyoto downtown area, Daiwa Roynet Hotel Kyoto Shijo Karasuma offers modern accommodations with free Wi-Fi and wired internet access. Guests can request for relaxing massages. Hankyu Karasuma Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms come with a flat-screen TV with video-on-demand, a trouser press and a humidifier. Sleepwear and slippers are provided for all guests and the en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Guests can make green tea using the electric kettle. A coin-operated launderette and a free-use internet computer are provided for guests to use. Free Wi-Fi and wired internet access is offered at the lobby, and luggage storage is available at the 24-hour front desk. The hotel is a 15-minnute subway ride to International Conference Center and a 5-minute walk to Nishiki Market. The historic Gion area is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Nazuna Kyoto Gosho
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and an outdoor private bath, as well as a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, down comforters, and towels.Expedia

name: Kizashi The Suite
description: Awarded 4 red pavilions by the Michelin Guide for 2 consecutive years, Kizashi The Suite 京都祇園 offers luxury accommodation right in downtown area Gion. The hotel features spa services, 24-hours concierge service and rooms with free internet. Hotel The Suite Kizashi is just a 5-minute walk from Gion Shijo Station and Yasaka Shrine. It is a less than 10-minute drive from Kiyomizu-dera Temple, Heian Jingu Shrine and the Manga Museum. The spacious suites feature a large bathroom. Amenities include an LCD TV with satellite channels, a DVD player and a minibar. The hotel houses a relaxing hot tub, and upon advance request, massage treatments can be enjoyed in the privacy of one’s suite. The hotel also provides luggage storage service. Guests can enjoy in-room dining at Kizashi The Suite 京都祇園, which serves breakfast and set dinners in the guests’ rooms upon request. A continental breakfast consisting of yogurt, salad, bread, fruits, coffee and orange juice is provided daily.

name: Matsui Bekkan Hanakanzashi
description: No description found

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Shijo
description: Mitsui Garden Hotel Kyoto Shijo is located in Kyoto, 600 metres from Karasuma Station. It offers modern accommodation with a public bath, a restaurant and rooms with free WiFi. Shijo Station Exit 2 on the Karasuma Subway Line is a 6-minute stroll. All rooms are renovated in 2020. Guestrooms offer both air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge, an electric kettle with tea bags and a flat-screen TV. Free bath amenities, tooth brush sets and slippers are also provided. Massage services are available upon request. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Guests can purchase beverages from the drinks vending machine on site. The on-site restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. Kyoto Shijo Mitsui Garden Hotel is 1.5 km from the historical Higashihongan-ji Temple and Nijo Castle.

name: Nishiyama Ryokan
description: No description found

name: Hotel Resol Trinity Kyoto
description: Featuring a garden, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel Resol Trinity Kyoto is located in the centre of Kyoto, 700 metres from Kyoto International Manga Museum. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Heian Shrine is 2.1 km away and Shoren-in Temple is 2.3 km from the hotel. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet or an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Resol Trinity Kyoto include Samurai Kembu Kyoto, Gion Shijo Station and Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 46 km from the accommodation.

name: Sakura Terrace
description: Open from October 2013, Sakura Terrace is only a 6-minute walk from Kyoto Station’s Hachijo-Higashi Exit. It features free WiFi throughout, and it has a free-use launderette. The hotel is a few steps from Kujo Subway Station. Rooms feature an interior in neutral colours, an LCD TV with cable channels and a fridge. They boast a combined air conditioning and air cleaning unit, while toiletries are provided. Hotel Sakura Terrace offers a restaurant and a bar counter. Spacious public baths, male-only saunas and female-only ceramic-bed sauna are available. Guests can enjoy a complimentary welcome drink at the bar counter. Kyoto Tower is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while Toji Temple is a 15-minute walk. The property is a 1-minute walk to the bus stop for Kiyomizu-dera Temple/Gion area, and a 3-minute walk to the bus stop for Kinkaku-ji Temple.

name: Nanzenji Sando Kikusui
description: No description found

name: Centara Grand Hotel Osaka
description: Located close to Osaka Namba Train Station, the hotel provides guests with an ideal base when in Osaka. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a range of amenities on offer to guests of Centara Grand Hotel Osaka, such as a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and a currency exchange. A fitness centre is available to guests wishing to keep up their exercise regimes while away. Rooms have an en suite bathroom equipped with bathrobes. They also feature a range of entertainment amenities, including a flat-screen TV. Centara Grand Hotel Osaka is close to Namba Train Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Osaka and its surrounding areas. Osaka City Air Terminal, Tsutenkaku Tower and Dotonbori are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Ja Namba South Hotel
description: No description found

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Osaka Umeda-Eki Tower
description: Well located in the centre of Osaka, APA Hotel & Resort Osaka Umeda-eki Tower provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. The property is located 500 metres from Hosei-ji Temple, 500 metres from Hankyu Men's Osaka and 200 metres from Tsuyu no Tenjinja Shrine. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the property. Speaking English and Japanese, staff are always on hand to help at the reception. Popular points of interest near APA Hotel & Resort Osaka Umeda-eki Tower include Hokai-ji Temple, Honden-ji Temple and Taiyū-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Sanrriott Osaka Hommachi
description: Situated less than 1 km from Nanba Betsuin Temple, Hotel Sanrriott Osaka Hommachi offers 3-star accommodation in Osaka and has a spa and wellness centre. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 2.1 km from the city centre and 200 metres from Stage Ku. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. At Hotel Sanrriott Osaka Hommachi rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Staff speak English, Japanese, Korean and Chinese at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near Hotel Sanrriott Osaka Hommachi include Namba Shrine, Shinsaibashi Station and TKP Shinsaibashi Ekimae Conference Center. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel New Otani Osaka
description: Located right in front of Osaka Castle, Hotel New Otani offers spacious rooms and 13 dining options. The property is a 5-minute walk from shopping complex JO-TERRACE OSAKA. Free WiFi connection is available throughout the property. Rooms feature large windows with city or Osaka Castle views. They have an LCD TV and comfortable beds. Guests can relax in the hot tub or sauna, or enjoy a massage treatment for an additional charge. Several shops and a beauty salon are available as well. The hotel offers concierge services, where entrance tickets to Osaka Castle can be purchased. Hotel New Otani Osaka offers a shuttle service to and from Kyoto. New Otani Osaka’s restaurants cater a variety of French, Japanese and International cuisine. Offering spectacular views of the city skyline and Osaka Castle, Keyaki restaurant serves grilled teppanyaki dishes, while Sky Lounge offers refreshing cocktails. A breakfast buffet featuring various cuisines are available at an extra charge. Osaka Station is a 10-minute train ride from Hotel New Otani, while Kyoto and Nara can also be reached within 1-hour by train. The hotel is about a 75-minute train ride from Kansai International Airport and a 1-hour train ride from Itami Airport.

name: Apa Hotel Shin-Osaka Ekimae
description: Located in Osaka, within 200 metres of Hinode Minami Park and 300 metres of Shin-Osaka Marunouchi Building Annex, APA Hotel Shin-Osaka Ekimae provides accommodation with a spa and wellness centre. With a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At APA Hotel Shin-Osaka Ekimae each room has bed linen and towels. Staff at the accommodation are always available to provide guidance at the reception. Popular points of interest near APA Hotel Shin-Osaka Ekimae include Nakajimasosha Temple, TKP Shin Osaka Ekimae Conference Centre and Yamaguchi Honcho Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Wan Osaka ebisu
description: No description found

name: Apa Hotel Tennoji Ekimae
description: APA Hotel Tennoji-Ekimae is a minute's walk from Tennoji Subway Station, just a 2-minute walk from JR Tennoji Train Station and a 5-minute walk from Tennoji Zoo. It offers Japanese/Western breakfast sets, massages and modern rooms with en suite bathroom and a 40-inch LCD TV. Free WiFi is offered in the whole hotel. Rooms are decorated in smart neutral shades and include a private bath with free toiletries and a hairdryer. An electric kettle with green tea, fridge and Yukata robes and are provided. You can relax with a video-on-demand movie, for a fee while relaxing on the original mattress optimising weight distribution. Spa World is a 10-minute walk away. Tsutenkaku Tower is about a 15-minute walk. Both Osakajokoen Station is a 13-minute train ride and Osaka Station is a 20-minute train ride away on the JR Osaka Loop Line. The bright, wood-panelled Cafe Grainfield serves breakfast from 06:00-09:30, for a fee, and is also open for lunch.

name: The Singulari Hotel & Skyspa At Universal Studios Japan
description: The Singulari Hotel & Skyspa at UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN TM is an official affiliate of Universal Studios Japan (R). Directly connected to JR Universal City Station, guests can enjoy convenient access to Universal Studios Japan (R) and Osaka city centre. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. For guests' comfort, all rooms are equipped with Simmons mattresses. A clothes rack, sofa bed, electric kettle, hairdryer, toothbrush and slippers are provided. Some rooms have large windows featuring Osaka bay views. Dry cleaning service can be requested for an additional charge. The Skyspa which features an open-air bath and a sauna is located on the 14th floor and is free for all guests to view the Osaka waterfront. The on-site restaurant offers buffet breakfast for an additional cost. JR Osaka Station is a 12-minute train ride from the hotel, while Namba Station is a 35-minute train ride and walk away. The closest airport is Itami Airport which is 30 minutes drive away from the property.

name: Ana Crowne Plaza Hotel Osaka
description: Overlooking the Dojima River, 5 star ANA Crowne Plaza offers rooms with sweeping city views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel features a swimming pool and 6 food and beverage options. Rooms at the ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka are spacious, with comfortable colours and soft lighting. All include a minibar and a flat-screen TV. The hotel is a 3-minute walk from Oebashi Train Station. Osaka Castle and Dotonbori Shopping Street are a 15-minute taxi ride away. Guests can relax with a spa treatment or unwind in the sauna. All guests have access to the 24-hour fitness room for free. Sightseeing is easy with the concierge and tour desk. Nishi-Umeda Station on the Subway Tosubashi Line is a 7-minute stroll from the hotel. Kitashinchi Station on the JR Tozai Line is a 5-minute walk from ANA Crowne Plaza Osaka. Karin Chinese Restaurant offers modern Cantonese cuisine in an elegant setting. Japanese dishes are served at Tankuma Kitamise and Dojima Teppanyaki. A cafe and bar are available. The Delica Shop on site offers a selection of rich cakes and chocolates for guests to take out.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Shin-Osaka Station
description: Find everything you need to move forward at Courtyard Shin-Osaka Station. Conveniently located only steps from world-famous Shin-Osaka Train Station, our hotel allows for stress-free travel to Western Japan's notable cities and historic attractions. Osaka, Kobe, Kyoto, Nagoya are all easily accessible via train. Settle into your spacious, intelligently designed hotel room with amenities like a flat-screen TV, deluxe bedding, complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, a mini-bar and a workspace. Guests can also reserve our premium Executive-level lodging for panoramic views of Osaka and free access to our sophisticated Lounge. Additional on-site resources include two exquisite restaurants, a welcoming bar, a 24-hour fitness center and modern, versatile venue space. Our hotel is a superb choice for those looking to host a business gathering or social event in the area. Japan is yours to explore from Courtyard Shin-Osaka Station.Marriott

name: The Park Front Hotel at Universal Studios Japan
description: The hotel features private parking, various cafes, restaurants and shops on site, as well as free WiFi access in all areas. Universal City Station is a 12-minute ride from JR Osaka Station via train, and a 20-minute ride from JR Shin-Osaka Station, where bullet train access is provided. The limousine bus service from Osaka International Airport to the property takes 45-minutes. From Kansai International Airport, the limousine bus will take 70-minutes. By car, it is around a 20-minute drive from Osaka via the Hanshin Express Way. The hotel features a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and massage services, and a coin laundry service is available at an extra cost on the 2nd floor. In addition, guests will find a café, a pancake shop, a pizza restaurant and a convenience store all within the property premises. All rooms are furnished with an air purifier/moisturizer and are air-conditioned with a flat-screen satellite TV, desk and seating area. The en suite bathroom features a private bath and shower. Free toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer is provided. Rooms are also soundproof and feature refrigerators as well as personal lockers. The on-site restaurant Buffet Dining Akala has a Hawaiian themed interior and serves a wide array of international cuisine, including Chinese, Western and Japanese dishes. The restaurant is available for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

name: New Osaka Hotel
description: Located just a 3-minute walk from JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen Station's South Exit, New Osaka Hotel offers laundry facilities, massage services and cosy rooms with free WiFi access. Hotel New Osaka's rooms feature wooden flooring and an interior in light colours. They are furnished with air conditioning and an LCD TV with video-on-demand movies. Each comes with a private bathroom with shower, bathtub and toilet. Shin-Osaka Subway Station's Exit 7 is just a 1-minute walk from the hotel, and Itami Airport is only a 20-minute ride on the Limousine Bus. Both Abeno Harukas and Shinsaibashi area can be reached within a 20-minute subway ride. The 24-hour front desk at New Hotel Osaka provides luggage storage. "Check In Advance Service" which is available from 8 a.m. can help guests bring their luggage to the guest rooms so our guests can go to their rooms directly after their trip. BelleVue Restaurant offers a Chinese menu with 13th-story views of the city, while Adustam serves Cafe-Restaurant.

name: Dormy Inn Premium Namba Annex Natural Hot Spring
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Osaka, Dormy Inn Premium Namba ANNEX Natural Hot Spring offers buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 4-star hotel offers a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the sauna and the hot spring bath, or enjoy city views. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a shared bathroom with a bidet. At Dormy Inn Premium Namba ANNEX Natural Hot Spring all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a spa centre. Popular points of interest near Dormy Inn Premium Namba ANNEX Natural Hot Spring include Nipponbashi Monument, Zojugoi Yasuidoton Dobokukiko Monument and Hoan-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from the hotel.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Osaka Castle
description: We’re a 10-minute walk from Osaka Castle, Tenman-Bashi Station, and Otemon Gate. The Symphony Hall, Osaka Waterfront Park, Forest of Memorial Trees, Glico Museum, and Umeda Station are less than six kilometers away. Maishima Sports Island and Universal Studio Japan are a 20-minute drive. Enjoy views of Osaka City, our fitness center, and indoor pool.Hilton

name: Shin Osaka Sunny Stone Hotel
description: Sunny Stone Hotel is 1 km from JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen Station. It offers a breakfast buffet and massages. Rooms have free WiFi and wired internet, a private bathroom and a video-on-demand (VOD) system. Rooms at Shin-Osaka Sunny Stone Hotel include a fridge, an electric kettle with green tea and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub, shower and amenities. The hotel offers convenient access to the Midosuji Subway Line and Hankyu Train Line. It is a 3-minute walk to Exit 1 of Nishi-Nakajima-Minamikata Subway Station, which is 2 stops from Umeda Station and 1 stop from JR Shin-Osaka Shinkansen Station, and a 6-minute walk to Hankyu Minamikata Train Station. A free-use internet PC is available at the lobby. Sunny Restaurant serves Japanese and Western dishes for breakfast and lunch.

name: Hilton Osaka
description: The Hilton Osaka is an oasis of sophisticated calm in one of the world’s greatest manufacturing and commercial cities. In the heart of Osaka’s main business, shopping and entertainment district stands the Hilton Osaka. The hotel is a 2-minute walk from the JR Osaka station, a 10-minute drive from the Shin Osaka bullet train station, 65 minutes by limousine bus from the Kansai International Airport, and a 25-minute drive from the Osaka Airport. Enjoy easy access to Osaka Castle, Osaka International Convention Center, INTEX Osaka, theme parks, Kobe, Nara and Kyoto. Hilton Osaka is adjacent to the shopping, dining and entertainment centers, the Hilton Plaza East/West and Herbis Ent complex. Superb comfort, unbeatable location, and personalized service make the award-winning Hilton Osaka the first choice for both business and pleasure. Choose from a selection of guest rooms to suit your every need. From our luxurious suites and Executive Rooms tailored to business needs, to or our modern and sophisticated Deluxe Rooms – there is an option to suit all your requirements. Hold an event in the well-equipped banquet and meeting facilities which can cater for small groups of just a few guests to functions of up to 1000.Hilton

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Taniyon Kosaten
description: Located in Osaka Castle, Toyoko Inn Osaka Taniyon Kousaten is a perfect starting point from which to explore Osaka. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Facilities like free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, newspapers, laundry service, dry cleaning are readily available for you to enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as massage. Toyoko Inn Osaka Taniyon Kousaten combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Osaka unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Aloft Osaka Dojima
description: Aloft Osaka Dojima provides sleek and stylish hotel lodging for the self-expressive traveler. Located in the heart of Osaka, Japan, our hotel embraces both history and future. Settle into spacious lodging, offering open-concept design alongside playful art and plentiful USB and power outlets. We are close neighbors to attractions, nightlife and dining in Osaka, including Kita-shinchi entertainment district, the Umeda Sky Building and the National Museum of Art. Find Namba, Dotombori, Universal Studios Japan and Osaka Castle just a short drive from our Kita hotel. On-site dining includes comfort foods at The WAREHOUSE and speciality crafted drinks complemented by live music at W XYZ Bar, a social space for music lovers. Jumpstart your day in Kita, Osaka, with a visit to Re:fuel, offering grab-and-go coffee and snacks. Other hotel perks include a 24-hour fitness center, Re:charge, ideal for keeping up with your exercise routine while visiting Japan. Stay in style at Aloft Osaka Dojima.Marriott

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Yodoyabashi Station Minami
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 376 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as coffee/tea makers and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and a vending machine. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location A stay at Toyoko Inn Osaka Yodoyabashi Station Minami places you in the heart of Osaka, within a 5-minute drive of Osaka Central Public Hall and Nipponbashi. This hotel is 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Osaka Castle and 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Osaka-jō Hall. Dining A complimentary local cuisine breakfast is served daily from 6:30 AM to 9:00 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A city tax may be collected at the property. The city tax ranges from JPY 100-300 per person, per night based on the nightly room rate. The tax does not apply to nightly rates under JPY 7,000. Please note that further exemptions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Self parking fee: JPY 1100 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Please note that cultural norms and guest policies may differ by country and by property; the policies listed are provided by the property Housekeeping is provided every 4 days. This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Guests who are booked for 7 nights or more may be required to change rooms during their stay. name: Grand Prince Hotel Osaka Bay
description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, Hyatt Regency Osaka Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage, Wi-Fi in public areas. Television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, separate living room, internet access – wireless can be found in selected guestrooms. Take a break from a long day and make use of hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Osaka, Hyatt Regency Osaka Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Hotel Noah Resort Sakuranomiya (Adult Only)
description: Situated in Osaka, 1.5 km from Dawn Center, Hotel Noah Resort Sakuranomiya (Adult Only) features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is set 1.9 km from Horikawaebisu Shrine, 2.1 km from Creo Osaka East and 2.2 km from Nozaki Park. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. The rooms at the hotel have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, Blu-ray player, and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Noah Resort Sakuranomiya (Adult Only) rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Taiyū-ji Temple is 2.3 km from the accommodation, while Honden-ji Temple is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from Hotel Noah Resort Sakuranomiya (Adult Only).

name: Hotel Brighton City Osaka Kitahama
description: Conveniently located within a 5-minute walk from Kitahama Station on the Keihan and Sakaisuji lines, Hotel Brighton City Osaka Kitahama offers accommodation with elegant rooms. It offers a Japanese restaurant and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Bright rooms are fitted with an air purifier/humidifier and a silent refrigerator. The stylish bathrooms come with a rainshower and free toiletries, slippers and hairdryers. Bath amenities and a green tea set are provided. The Kitahama Brighton City Osaka Hotel provides non-smoking floors and luggage storage. Massage service can be arranged in the room. Guests can purchase beverages from the drinks vending machine on site. Hotel Brighton City Osaka is a 10-minute walk from Yodoyabashi Subway Station. Universal Studios Japan is a 40-minute train ride away while Osaka Castle and the Osaka Tenmangu Shrine can be reached with less than a 10-minute drive. Various shops and restaurants are located within a walking distance. Kansai International Airport is 70-minutes from Kitahama Station via express train, while Osaka Itami Airport is 55-minutes away via monorail and train.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Osaka Honmachi
description: Courtyard Osaka Honmachi is a family and business-friendly hotel ideally located in the heart of downtown Osaka, Japan. Stay just a one-minute walk from Sakaisuji-Hommachi Station on the Osaka Metro Chuo Line. This Osaka family hotel provides convenient access to city center attractions like Osaka Castle, the Osaka Station Umeda area and the Namba and Shinsaibashi areas, where you can enjoy shopping and delicious cuisine. Hotel guests also enjoy easy access to Shin-Osaka Station on the Tokaido Shinkansen, allowing them to reach other popular cities in Japan such as Kyoto, Tokyo and Fukuoka with ease. In addition to the high-quality service for which the Courtyard brand is known, our hotel near Namba provides warm and friendly service, allowing our guests to enjoy a truly unique travel experience that's filled with emotion and delightful discoveries. Have a memorable hotel stay at Courtyard Osaka Honmachi.Marriott

name: Shinsaibashi Arty Inn
description: Situated in the centre of Osaka, 200 metres from Orange Street, Shinsaibashi ARTY Inn features air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a sauna and a spa centre. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Speaking both English and Japanese, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near Shinsaibashi ARTY Inn include Glico Man Sign, Manpuku-ji Temple and Shinsaibashi Shopping Arcade. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 21 km from the accommodation.

name: Japan Sessions Kanzaki 02
description: Situated in the city center, this welcoming vacation home brings all of Osaka within your reach. Make short work of the 5-minute drive to Umeda Sky Building or the 6-minute drive to Grand Front Osaka Mall. Check out other neighborhoods and see more of Osaka by hopping on a metro at Kanzakigawa Station, just 5 minutes away by foot. This vacation rental features a sitting area, a dining area, a sofa bed, and climate-controlled air-conditioning. Enjoy the free WiFi and TV. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, a toilet with electronic bidet, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with a stovetop, a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, and a freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And because there's access to laundry facilities, you can go a bit lighter on your packing. Other amenities include bed sheets, a desk, an ironing board, and climate-controlled heating.Expedia

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Hankyu Juso-eki Nishi-guchi No.1
description: Ideally situated in the Yodogawa Ward district of Osaka, Toyoko Inn Osaka Hankyu Juso-eki Nishi-guchi No.1 is situated 600 metres from Kamitsu Shrine, 800 metres from Tsukamoto Shrine and less than 1 km from Zenkyuji Temple. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, the rooms have a desk. All rooms in Toyoko Inn Osaka Hankyu Juso-eki Nishi-guchi No.1 are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a hairdryer. American and Asian breakfast options are available each morning at the accommodation. Speaking English and Japanese, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Osaka Hankyu Juso-eki Nishi-guchi No.1 include Tsukamoto Station Shopping Street, Namban Culture Center and Glico Museum. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Sheraton Miyako Hotel Osaka
description: Directly connected to a train station and easily accessible to Kansai International Airport/Itami Airport with limousine buses, Sheraton Miyako Hotel Osaka provides a convenient location for both business and leisure travelers in Japan. Situated in the heart of downtown Osaka, our 4-star hotel is the perfect home base for visiting NARA or KYOTO and other area attractions. From the moment you step into our hotel lobby, experience sincere hospitality and impeccable service throughout your stay. Find respite in our modern rooms, featuring upscale amenities and a tranquil Japanese ambiance. Our downtown hotel offers on-site dining serving both contemporary Japanese cuisine and eclectic international fare. Travel hassle-free while in Japan when you take advantage of our convenient location near the train station, as well as our direct airport limousine bus from Kansai International Airport/Itami Airport, which stops right in front of the hotel. Look forward to a memorable stay at Sheraton Miyako Hotel Osaka.Marriott

name: Hotel Awina Osaka
description: Hotel Awina Osaka offers accommodations with free wired internet and a flat-screen TV. Osaka Uehonmachi Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms feature a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and slippers are provided for all guests. Massages can be requested for an extra cost. A safety deposit box and photocopying services are available at the front desk. Luggage storage is provided as well. Osaka Awina Hotel is a 10-minute drive from Namba Station and a 15-minute drive from Osaka Castle. Universal Studios Japan is a 30-minute train ride away.

name: Imperial Hotel Osaka
description: Situated along the Okawa River renowned for beautiful cherry blossoms, Imperial Hotel Osaka is a prestigious 5-star hotel with elegant guest rooms, a fitness centre and various fine dining options. It is a 5-minute walk from JR Sakuranomiya Station and a 15-minute free shuttle ride from JR Osaka Station. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Featuring chic décor and a relaxing ambience, each spacious room comes with a satellite LCD TV, a fridge and a minibar. A wide work desk and a safety box are also included. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bathtub and free toiletries. While staying at Imperial Hotel Osaka, guests can work out at the fitness club and swimming pool at an additional charge, or receive rejuvenating massage treatments in the room or at the on-site salon. The business centre comes with work desks and chargeable internet PCs. A hair salon and a flower shop are also available. Both Osaka Tenmangu and Ougimachi subway stations are within a 10-minute walk, while iconic Osaka Castle is a 10-minute drive away. Japan Mint, which is a favourite spot for cherry blossom viewing in spring, is just a 10-minute stroll away. Les Saison restaurant offers panoramic city views and sophisticated French cuisine. Kamon serves fresh seafood and steaks in teppanyaki-style, while lavish Chinese dishes can be enjoyed at Jasmine Garden.

name: Onyado Nono Namba Natural Hot Spring
description: Located just 2-minutes on foot from Nippombashi station in Osaka, Onyado Nono Namba Natural Hot Spring is a convenient location from where to explore popular destinations such as Dotonbori, the famous sight of the Glico sign, and Nanba City shopping center. There is free WiFi throughout the property and a 24-hour front desk. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. An electric kettle and refrigerator can be found in the guest rooms. Private bathrooms include free slippers and toiletries. A hot springs bath and sauna are available on site. There is a free ironing service but dry cleaning and laundry services require a surcharge. Luggage storage is provided for free. There is a restaurant at the property and drinks vending machines available. Convenience stores and local restaurants are located within 2-minutes walking distance from the property. Guests can enjoy sightseeing, shopping, and dining at Dotonbori, a 5-minute walk away. Tsutenkaku is an 11-minute train ride from the property on the Sakaisuji Line.

name: Hotel Nikko Osaka
description: Hotel Nikko Osaka is directly connected to Shinsaibashi Subway Station. It is centrally located within easy access to shopping areas, restaurants and the Dotonbori area. It is also located directly across the street from Daimaru Department Store. Each spacious air-conditioned room is equipped with an LCD TV, a fridge and a sofa. Free WiFi is available in the entire property. Hotel Nikko Osaka faces the famous tree-lined Midosuji Avenue, the city's main street with numerous shopping and leisure opportunities. Shin Osaka Station is a 17-minute subway ride away, while Kyocera Dome is 11 minutes and Osaka Castle is 25 minutes on the subway. Dotonbori area is a 9-minute walk, and Namba Station is a 15-minute walk away. An airport limousine bus service is available to Kansai International Airport for an extra fee. The hotel is located at a 30-minute train ride away from Universal Studios Japan®. Guests can purchase 1 Day Studio Pass at the front desk. Guests can enjoy from a variety of meal choices including Japanese, Chinese food, French cuisine and Teppanyaki at Hotel Nikko Osaka.Breakfast buffet featuring a wide variety of both Western and Japanese dishes served at restaurant Serena.

name: Apa Hotel Namba Kita Shinsaibashi Ekimae
description: Conveniently situated in the Chuo Ward district of Osaka, APA Hotel Namba Kita Shinsaibashi Ekimae is located 500 metres from Orange Street, 600 metres from Shinsaibashi Shopping Arcade and less than 1 km from Glico Man Sign. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 1.1 km from the city centre and 500 metres from Manpuku-ji Temple. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. At APA Hotel Namba Kita Shinsaibashi Ekimae each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. APA Hotel Namba Kita Shinsaibashi Ekimae can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Kokoni Sunaba Ariki Monument, Shinsaibashi Station and TKP Shinsaibashi Ekimae Conference Center. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from APA Hotel Namba Kita Shinsaibashi Ekimae.

name: The Westin Osaka
description: The Westin Osaka offers a wonderful night view, and the guest rooms are over 41 square meters. We promise a comfortable stay with Heavenly® Beds uniquely developed by the Westin brand. We are the 4-star hotel with around 300 guest rooms including suites, Japanese / Chinese / Western restaurant, lounge, bar, and banquet halls for up to 1000 guests. Great access to KUCHU TEIEN OBSERVATORY(Umeda Sky Building) and many shopping areas. It takes about 7 minutes walk to JR Osaka Station and about 9 minutes walk to Umeda Station. The limousine bus stop from/to Kansai International Airport is located within our hotel. You will feel the peace of mind with the nature surrounding our hotel and enjoy the urban scenery of Osaka.Marriott

name: Hotel Hillarys Shinsaibashi
description: Located in Central Osaka, Hotel Felice Shinsaibashi By Relief offers 3-star accommodation and a 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and massage services. It is situated a short stroll from Dotonbori and Amerikamura. The hotel provides 225 air conditioned rooms filled with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. They are also fitted with a shower, a hair dryer and a refrigerator. Hotel Felice Shinsaibashi By Relief provides breakfast each morning, and has a bar where guests can unwind with a drink. The hotel is under a 30-minute drive from Osaka International Airport and Osaka City Air Terminal is a brief walk away. It is within walking distance of Osaka Namba Train Station and Nipponbashi Train Station, which allows for easy access in and around Osaka.Revato

name: Swissotel Nankai Osaka
description: Upper upscale hotel located in the heart of Osaka. 546 room with 9 F and 7 outlets. Purovel spa and sport and 18 meeting rooms including 1 grand ballroom. Connected to local train and subway lines. Immediate access to Kansai Airport within 35 mins. Fitness Center Gym - indoor swimming pool - sauna. Swissotel Nankai Osaka is a luxury hotel ideally located in the heart of Namba- Osaka's most exciting entertainment- shopping and dining district. Tourist attractions like Dotonbori- Shinsaibashi and DenDen Town are within footsteps from the Hotel. Hotel sits above Namba station on Nankai Railway- offering a direct train access to the Kansai International Airport. All major tourist attractions and business districts are within easy reach. The 546 guest rooms and suites serve the demand of all travellers and offer a choice of accommodation options. Facilities include a choice of 7 restaurants- Purovel- an indoor swimming pool- gymnasium- 18 types of banquet - meeting rooms- wedding chapels.Fairmont

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Higashi
description: Attractively set in Osaka, Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Higashi features an Asian breakfast and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Hokai-ji Temple is 700 metres from the hotel and Taiyū-ji Temple is 700 metres away. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Higashi include Horikawaebisu Shrine, Nozaki Park and Honden-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

name: St. Regis Osaka
