description: The St. Regis Osaka welcomes guests to the heart of beautiful Midosuji, the Champs Elysées of Osaka. Our five-star hotel is located near popular destinations such as Universal Studios Japan, Osaka Aquarium Kaiyukan and the city's premium shopping districts. There is no better address to explore the city center and the neighboring cities of Kyoto and Nara, thanks to our hotel location near the train station. Return for exquisite dining at our on-site restaurants, Rue d'Or, La Veduta, and Teppanyaki WAJO, before discovering the epitome of luxury at the exclusive IRIDIUM featuring SOTHYS Spa. Retreat to our hotel’s iconic 12th-floor terrace with sweeping vistas of the Osaka skyline. Discover unforgettable ambiance and state-of-the-art amenities in five-star hotel accommodations. Our 160 luxury hotel rooms and suites feature spacious layouts and elegantly appointed decor. Every experience our hotel in Osaka, Japan, is enhanced with the St. Regis Butler Service, available any time, day or night.Marriott

name: Hotel Keihan Universal Tower
description: Featuring the 31st-floor S-PARK Spa with a sauna, jet bath and hot-spring baths with city views (admission fees not included with stay), Hotel Keihan Universal Tower is 300 metres from Universal Studios Japan. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. Rooms at Hotel Keihan Universal Tower have a large window, neutral tones and wood highlights. All come with a 37-inch flat-screen TV. The attached bathroom includes a bath. Bath amenities including a toothbrush set, hairdryer and slippers are provided. The hotel offers a massage service. Currency exchange and luggage storage are available at the 24-hour reception. Top of Universal served in buffet style for dinner, overlooking the Osaka skyline from the 32nd floor. The hotel is a 70-minute ride from Kansai Airport by express Limousine Bus. Itami Airport is a 45-minute express bus ride. JR Osaka Train Station is a 15-minute train ride away.

name: Apa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi
description: APA Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi is just a 2-minute walk from Tanimachi 4-Chome Subway Station and offers air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet, an LCD TV and an en suite bathroom. Rooms at Osaka-Tanimachi APA Hotel have wood furnishings and features an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Each room comes with air conditioning, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea. The private bathroom includes a bathtub and toiletries. Video-on-demand movies are available for free. Dotonbori shopping street and the lively Namba area are 20 minutes away by train. Osaka Castle is 1.6 km away.

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower
description: Featuring 3-star accommodation, APA Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower is set in Osaka, 400 metres from Namba Shrine and 700 metres from TKP Shinsaibashi Ekimae Conference Center. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi. The property is 200 metres from Nanba Betsuin Temple, and within 1.4 km of the city centre. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, some units at the hotel also have a city view. At APA Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower all rooms include bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, American or Asian options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include OSTEC Exhibition Hall, Hongan-ji Temple Tsumura Betsuin and Mitama Shrine. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from APA Hotel & Resort Midosuji Hommachi Eki Tower.

name: W Osaka
description: Live it up in the dynamic heart of Osaka, Japan at W Osaka. Nestled in the fun-filled heart of Shinsaibashi, on Midosuji Boulevard, our vibrant and exciting pet-friendly hotel welcomes you to experience this fab city the W way. Reboot all your social needs amid the electric nightlife scenery of Dotonbori just around the corner. W Osaka seamlessly blends Japan’s celebrated cultural heritage with bold contemporary designs in a rarified milieu of playful chic and boundless luxury. Immerse yourself in super social, delicious dining experiences. Later, kick back in style in one of our extra-comfy hotel rooms and recharge for your next Osaka adventure.Marriott

name: Hotel Binario Umeda
description: Providing rooms with a custom pillow and free wired internet, the Hotel Binario Umeda is just a 3-minute walk from Nakatsu Subway Station and a 5-minute walk from Hankyu Umeda Train Station. A restaurant and massage service are available. Rooms at the Hotel Binario Umeda are decorated in comfortable neutral colours, and have a private bathroom with a bathtub. Each air-conditioned room includes a fridge and a flat-screen TV with video-on-demand movies. JR Osaka Train Station is only a 10-minute walk away and Umeda Sky Building is a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Osaka Castle is a 30-minute train ride away, and Universal Studios Japan is 1-hour away by train.

name: Liber Hotel At Universal Studios Japan
description: LIBER HOTEL AT UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Osaka Bay district of Osaka. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and ticket service, along with free WiFi. The hotel has a garden and provides a terrace. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. All units will provide guests with a fridge. A continental breakfast is available daily at LIBER HOTEL AT UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN. Universal Studios Japan is 3.1 km from the accommodation, while Tempozan Ferris Wheel is 6 km away. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 22 km from LIBER HOTEL AT UNIVERSAL STUDIOS JAPAN.

name: Apa Villa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi 4chome-Ekimae
description: Set in a prime location of Osaka, APA Villa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi 4Chome-Ekimae puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, luggage storage are just some of the facilities on offer. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, air purifier, carpeting, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms. Access to the hotel's sauna, spa, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. For reliable service and professional staff, APA Villa Hotel Osaka-Tanimachi 4Chome-Ekimae caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Osaka Academia
description: Located an 12-minute walk away from Nakafuto Station, Osaka Academia boasts an array of meeting rooms of various sizes, one of which can host up to 500 guests. The hotel also features an open-air bath, public bath and sauna on site. Free on-site luggage storage is available and there is a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with an electric kettle, refrigerator and tea maker. En suite bathrooms are equipped with a bath and a toilet with grab rails. Free toiletries including toothbrushes, shampoo and conditioner are provided for guests. Osaka Academia is an entirely non-smoking hotel but has a designated smoking area within the accommodation. Free ironing and laundry services are provided for guest's convenience. Accessible parking and a electric vehicle charging station is also provided on site. Guests can rent bicycles at this hotel to use during their stay. The convention centre, INTEX Osaka, is just a 5-minute walk away from the hotel. Guests can go to Umeda Station via a 50-minute train ride to enjoy shopping and dining. Guests can reach Universal Studios Japan in approximately 60 minutes via train. There is a restaurant on site and breakfast can be prepared for an additional fee with a reservation in advance. A supermarket and fast-food dining options are located within a 15-minute walk from Osaka Academia.

name: Candeo Hotels Osaka Namba
description: This 4-star hotel is located in Central Osaka and includes a mineral bath. It offers free Wi-Fi, a sauna and a 24-hour reception. A dry cleaning service, luggage storage and a laundry service are just some of the convenient services at Candeo Hotels Osaka Namba. The in-house spa offers a chance to get pampered and relax. The rooms are air conditioned and include slippers, a refrigerator and a private bathroom. All provide blackout curtains, a flat-screen TV and heating. Osaka's attractions, such as Shinsaibashi, Dotonbori and Dotonbori Tsuribori, are easily accessible on foot from Candeo Hotels Osaka Namba. Guests can also find lots of restaurants and shops nearby.Revato

name: Shin Osaka Washington Hotel Plaza
description: Conveniently situated a 5-minute walk from Shin Osaka Shinkansen (Bullet Train) Station, Washington Hotel Plaza offers simple guest rooms with free wired internet. Overlooking the city, two restaurants on the 23rd floor offer delicious Japanese and Chinese cuisine. The air-conditioned rooms are fitted with an LCD TV with video-on-demand programmes, a small fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Guests at Shin Osaka Washington Hotel Plaza can unwind with a massage in their room, or enjoy a workout at the gym. The front desk is open 24/7, offering luggage storage services. Japanese restaurant Ginza serves signature shabu-shabu dishes and other local meals, while China Table offers gourmet Chinese and gorgeous city views. A hearty breakfast buffet can be enjoyed at China Table on the 23rd floor. The hotel is within a 30-minute train ride from both Kaiyukan Aquarium, which houses a whale shark, and Universal Studios Japan. The popular Umeda area is a 10-minute train ride away. Kyoto can be reached within a 30-minute train ride from the hotel.

name: Hotel Public Jam
description: Hotel Public Jam is a hotel located in Osaka, 1.4 km from Shitennoji and 1.8 km from Namba CITY shopping mall. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property and free private parking is available on site. The rooms include a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. Every room comes with a private bathroom fitted with a bath. Extras include bath robes, slippers and a hair dryer. Glico Man Sign is 1.8 km from Hotel Public Jam, while Tsutenkaku is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Osaka Itami Airport, 15 km from Hotel Public Jam.

name: Hotel Monterey La Soeur Osaka
description: Hotel Monterey Lasoeur Osaka is situated in Osaka Business Park, next to Panasonic Centre. It offers modern accommodation with a spa, a restaurant and free Wi-Fi. It's a 5-minute walk from Kyobashi Train Station, which connects to downtown Osaka in 6 minutes and to Kyoto in 40 minutes. Famous cherry blossom viewing spots like Osaka Castle Park and Japan Mint are both within a 15-minute walk away. Decorated in an art-deco style, rooms feature rich colours and wooden flooring. Each room is equipped with a work desk and a flat-screen TV. Guests can relax at Trinite Natural Hot Springs Spa at a charge, unwinding in a hot tub, sauna and open-air bath. Laundry and ironing services are available. Restaurant Escale serves French cuisine in an elegant setting. Zuientei offers Japanese dishes. A Chinese restaurant is also located within the hotel. Lasoeur Osaka is 500 metres from Osaka Business Park Subway Station and about 1.5 km from Osaka Castle. Hokoku Shrine is about a 20-minute walk away.

name: Daiwa Roynet Hotel Osaka Uehonmachi
description: Only a 1-minute walk from Osaka-Uehonmachi Train Station, Daiwa Roynet Hotel Osaka-Uehonmachi offers modern accommodations featuring a flat-screen TV with VOD channels. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property and laptop rentals are provided at the 24-hour front desk. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a trouser press and a desk. A humidifier and Japanese Yukata robes are provided as well. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toothbrush sets. A coin-launderette is on site and guests can request for relaxing massages for an extra cost. Dry cleaning and photocopying services are provided at the front desk. A free-use internet PC is located at the lobby. Osaka-Uehonmachi Daiwa Roynet Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Tanimachi Kyuchome Subway Station and a 15-minute train ride from Namba Station. Kansai International Airport is a 50-minute ride and Itami Airport is a 30-minute ride away from Osaka-Uehonmachi Train Station on the limousine bus.

name: Apa Hotel Osaka Tenma
description: APA Hotel Osaka-Temma is located on Temmabashi Suji Street, and a 6-minute walk from JR Temma Station and 7-minute walk from JR Sakuranomiya Station. Ogimachi Subway Station is an 8-minute walk away. It boasts public baths, a sauna and a restaurant. The guestrooms are well equipped with free wired internet access. Featuring an original mattress optimising weight distribution, the rooms are well equipped with a flat-screen TV, heating and air conditioning facilities, as well as, a work desk. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. APA Hotel Osaka-Temma is 10 minutes by car from Osaka Castle, while Nakanoshima Park is a 20-minute drive away. The hotel provides a Japanese and Western and Indian buffet style breakfast daily. There are vending machines on site. Other facilities include massage chairs, laundry and dry cleaning services, and luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Business Hotel Nissei
description: Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, a 24-hour front desk and massages, Business Hotel Nissei is a 7-minute walk from the lively Dotonbori street and a 3-minute walk from Namba Train Station. Rooms at Hotel Nissei are air-conditioned and simply furnished, with a satellite LCD TV, a desk and a fridge. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub. Green tea and a Yukata robe are provided. Nipponbashi Subway Station is 350 metres away, and the Shinsekai neighbourhood is a 7-minute walk from the hotel. Tsutenkaku Tower is about a 15-minute walk. Two free-use internet PCs are provided at the hotel’s “business room.” Luggage can be left at the front desk. Breakfast sets are served at the dining area from 06:30-09:30. Other meals are not served.

name: Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka
description: Located in Osaka, 300 metres from Kitanosaurus, Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka provides accommodation with a restaurant and private parking. This 4-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Sonezaki Ebisu Shrine, Hokai-ji Temple and Hosei-ji Temple. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 18 km from Hotel Monterey Le Frere Osaka.

name: Hotel Bali Tower Osaka Tennoji
description: Located only a five-minute walk from Tennoji Train Station, Hotel Bali Tower Osaka Tennoji offers guests a convenient base when in Osaka. It also offers complimentary wireless internet. There are a range of amenities at the hotel that guests can enjoy, such as a coffee bar, meeting rooms and a gym. It also provides a shopping mall, room service and a designated smoking area. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a Blu-ray player, a refrigerator and a shower. They are also equipped with heating and a hair dryer. Hotel Bali Tower Osaka Tennoji offers a conveniently located café where guests can have a bite to eat before exploring the area. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel is close to Osaka's well-known attractions, with Abeno Cues Town and Shitenno-ji Temple just a 10-minute walk away. Tennoji Park, Isshin-ji Temple and Tennoji Zoo are each within walking distance.Revato

name: SureStay Plus Hotel by Best Western Shin-Osaka
description: Our restaurant is temporarily closed and breakfast suspended until further notice. SureStay Plus by Best Western Shin-Osaka is a stylish new midscale hotel which keeps guests well-connected in downtown Osaka. Perfectly located close to Shin-Osaka Station, guests can easily access the Osaka Metro and rail networks, including Shinkansen bullet train services. This puts the entire city, the thriving Kansai region and the rest of Japan within easy reach. The hotel features 108 modern guestrooms, all equipped with comfortable beds and convenient amenities, including complimentary Wi-Fi. Every morning, guests can start their day with an energizing buffet breakfast. SureStay Plus by Best Western Shin-Osaka becomes the first SureStay in Japan, marking the start of a new era of smart, contemporary and value-for-money accommodation.bestwestern.com

name: The Lively Osaka Honmachi
description: The Lively Osaka Honmachi has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Osaka. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 600 metres from Stage Ku, and within 1.7 km of the city centre. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast is available every morning at the property. You can play billiards at the hotel, and bike hire is available. Popular points of interest near The Lively Osaka Honmachi include Nanba Betsuin Temple, Namba Shrine and Nakanoshima Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Osaka Tokyu Rei Hotel
description: Osaka Tokyu REI Hotel is located a 10-minute walk from JR Osaka Train Station and Umeda Subway Station. The hotel offers modern accommodation, flat-screen TVs, free internet access and a cafe. Free Wi-Fi is available at the entire property. The air-conditioned guestrooms at Tokyu REI Osaka Hotel are equipped with a fridge and a hairdryer. En suite bathrooms come with bath amenities and a bathtub. Umeda Sky Building is a 20-minute walk away, and the hotel is a 30-minute train ride to Universal Studios Japan. Shin-Osaka Train Station is a 15-minute train ride away. Osaka Tokyu REI Hotel features a self-service laundry area and massage services. A daily breakfast buffet is available at Little Monster.

name: City Plaza Osaka
description: City Plaza Osaka features a free-use rooftop spa with open-air baths and massage chairs. It offers cosy accommodation with free internet access a 6-minute walk from Sakaisuji Honmachi Subway Station. Rooms at Osaka City Plaza feature a calm decor with bold splashes of colour. Each includes an electric kettle and en suite bathroom, and guests can relax after a long day by watching the satellite flat-screen TV. Osaka Castle is about a 15-minute walk from the hotel, and Dotonbori shopping street and Osaka International Convention Centre are a 10-minute taxi ride away. Guests can take a dip in the heated indoor pool, de-stress in the City Plaza’s sauna, or work out in the fitness room on the 13th floor. These facilities are accessible at an extra charge. Japanese specialities are available at the elegant Ooe Restaurant. Other dining options include relaxed buffet restaurant Rivage and 14th-floor Tatsumiya Japanese Restaurant.

name: Hotel Sunplaza 2 Annex
description: Open in September 2015, Hotel Sunplaza 2 Annex is only a 2-minnute walk from Shin Imamiya Station of the JR and Nankai Railway. Dobutsuen-mae Subway Station exit 6 is a 2-minute walk away. Guestrooms are air-conditioned and offer free WiFi access and a refrigerator. Guestrooms come equipped with free toiletries including face towels and tooth brushes. Bathrooms, shower booths and toilets are shared with other guests. The shared bathroom and shower booths offer free toiletries including body soap, shampoo and hair conditioning. There is a mixed powder room for male and female guests, as well as a female-only powder room on site. Hairdryers are available in the powder room.

name: Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2
description: Attractively set in the Osaka Station, Umeda, Yodoyabashi, Hommachi district of Osaka, Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2 is situated 700 metres from Tomishima Shrine, 700 metres from Catholic Osaka Umeda Church and less than 1 km from Nakatsu Shopping Street. The 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and free WiFi. The property is 2.3 km from the city centre and 400 metres from Toyosaki Shrine. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. At Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2 guests are welcome to take advantage of a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Tsunashikiten Shrine Otabisha, Eisho-ji Temple and Seibi Park. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 20 km from Toyoko Inn Osaka Umeda Nakatsu No.2.

name: Apa Villa Hotel Yodoyabashi
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Umeda, APA Villa Hotel Yodoyabashi promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, laundromat, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests, express check-in/check-out are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, linens, towels, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary). Access to the hotel's sauna, hot spring bath, spa, massage will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Osaka has to offer by making APA Villa Hotel Yodoyabashi your base.priceline.com

name: Dormy Inn Premium Namba Natural Hot Spring
description: Located a 5-minute walk away from Nihonbashi Train Station, Dormy Inn Premium Namba Natural Hot Spring offers modern accommodations with Wi-Fi. Relaxing massages are available for an extra cost and guests can refresh in the public hot-spring baths. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Sauna rooms are located by the hot-spring baths and guests can use the coin-launderette on-site. Dry cleaning and photocopying services are available at the front desk. Luggage storage is offered as well. A Western breakfast buffet is served at the restaurant. Namba Dormy Inn Premium Natural Hot Spring is a 5-minute walk away from Dotonbori and from Denden Town. The Shinsaibashi shopping area is within a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: Hotel Granvia Hiroshima
description: Hotel Granvia Hiroshima is directly connected to the JR Hiroshima Shinkansen (Bullet Train) Station. This Michelin 3-star rated hotel offers modern accommodation with 6 restaurants, massage services and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Guestrooms offer both air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room has a fridge, a trouser press and a flat-screen TV. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. The on site restaurant Dish Parade serves a buffet breakfast daily. Featuring views of the city, Sky Restaurant and Lounge L&R offers creative cuisine. Other dining options include Setouchi Japanese restaurant and Kouran-en Chinese restaurant. Granvia Hiroshima Hotel is a 20-minute tram ride from Hiroshima Memorial Peace Park. It is a 10-minute drive from Hiroshima Castle and Mazda Zoom-Zoom Stadium.

name: Urbain Hiroshima Central
description: Urbain Hiroshima Central offers modern accommodations with free wired internet access. Guests can relax in the spacious public baths and sauna rooms. The hotel is only a 3-minute walk from Hatchobori Tram Station. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels and a desk. Japanese room wear (Samue) is provided and guests can enjoy green tea using the electric kettle. Each room comes with a fridge and an en suite bathroom. Some bathrooms only feature a shower. Guests can borrow a Wi-Fi router with a deposit. Dry cleaning services is offered at the 24-hour front desk. A free-use launderette and drink vending machines are available on-site. Complimentary drinks are served at the lobby. Central Hiroshima Urbain Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Shukkei-en Garden and a 5-minute drive from Heiwa Kinen Park. Hiroshima Castle is a 15-minute walk and JR Hiroshima Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Apa Hotel Hiroshima-Ekimae Ohashi
description: Boasting spacious public baths, APA Hotel Hiroshima-Ekimae Ohashi is located a 4-minute walk from JR Hiroshima Station. Free WiFi is provided in all rooms. Rooms at Hiroshima-Ekimae Ohashi APA Hotel comes with a flat-screen TV with BBC world news, a fridge and an electric kettle. Each room has an original mattress optimising weight distribution and a private bathroom with a high-tech toilet and a hairdryer. There is a 24-hour front desk with luggage storage at the property. Photocopying services are available at a surcharge. Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park is a 15-minute tram ride away, while Shukkeien is a 10-minute walk from APA Hotel Hiroshima-Ekimae Ohashi. The popular Itsukushima Shrine can be reached in 60 minutes by train and ferry from the hotel.

name: Hilton Hiroshima
description: In the heart of Hiroshima City, our hotel just five minutes from Hiroshima Peace Memorial and Museum, Hiroshima Castle, and several transit stations. Heiwa-Odori’s shops, restaurants, and entertainment are 10 minutes away. Ideal for conventions, our hotel offers 24,780 sq. ft. of event space as well as four restaurants and excellent views from our skyline terrace.Hilton

name: Candeo Hotels Hiroshima Hatchobori
description: Candeo Hotels Hiroshima Hatchobori provides 3-star accommodation in Hiroshima. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and a sauna. The hotel provides a laundry service and luggage storage. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer local information. It also has its very own wellness centre, Skyspa. The rooms at Candeo Hotels Hiroshima Hatchobori are air-conditioned and offer slippers, a private bathroom and a refrigerator. They also feature a variety of entertainment options, such as a flat-screen TV. The on-site restaurant serves Japanese, Asian and international dishes in a modern setting. The hotel is close to Kamiya-cho-nishi Station, making it easy for guests to explore Hiroshima and its surrounding areas. The Hiroshima Children's Museum and the Hiroshima Castle are a brief stroll away.Revato

name: Grand Prince Hotel Hiroshima
description: -G7 Hiroshima Summit 2023 Venue- Overlooking the Seto Inland Sea, Grand Prince Hotel is located a 15-minute drive from central Hiroshima. The hotel offers 5 dining options, a outdoor pool (only summer) and hot spring baths. The hotel is featured in Michelin Green Guide Japan 2013. A free shuttle is available from Hiroshima Station, a 30-minute ride away. Luggage storage is available at its Welcome Counter at the station. Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park and the Atomic Bomb Dome are a 15-minute drive. Miyajima Island is 25 minutes away by high-speed boat from Motoujina Pier, located in front of the hotel. Air-conditioned rooms with a large picture window and a flat-screen TV await guests of the Grand Prince Hotel Hiroshima. Guests can unwind with a bath or watch satellite TV channels. Guests can use the on-site fitness and relaxation facilities such as the spa, sauna, jet bath, fitness centre or massage salon, all at an additional charge. The hotel also provides a business centre, travel desk and concierge services. Nadaman Restaurant offers Japanese dishes and 20th-floor views. Riho serves a Chinese menu, and guests can enjoy Hiroshima speciality Okonomi-yaki at Kakkun. A cafe, bar, buffet restaurant and steak & seafood restaurant are also on site.

name: Hotel Livemax Premium Hiroshima
description: Situated in the centre of Hiroshima, 600 metres from Hiroshima Station, Natural Hot Spring Hotel Livemax Premium Hiroshima features air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Hiroshima Danbara Shopping Centre is 2.4 km away and Katō Tomosaburō Bronze Statue is 2.5 km from the hotel. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk. Rooms are fitted with a TV, and some rooms at Natural Hot Spring Hotel Livemax Premium Hiroshima have a city view. The rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Myoei-ji Temple is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Chosho-in Temple is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Hiroshima Airport, 46 km from Natural Hot Spring Hotel Livemax Premium Hiroshima.

name: Dormy Inn Hiroshima Annex
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Hiroshima, Dormy Inn Hiroshima Annex is within less than 1 km of Myoei-ji Temple and a 12-minute walk of Chosho-in Temple. Featuring a restaurant, this 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Dormy Inn Hiroshima Annex rooms have bed linen and towels. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Dormy Inn Hiroshima Annex provides a range of facilities such as a wellness area including a sauna and a hot spring bath. With staff speaking English and Japanese, advice is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Hiroshima City Minami Ward Community Cultural Center, Hiroshima Danbara Shopping Centre and Katō Tomosaburō Bronze Statue. The nearest airport is Iwakuni Kintaikyo Airport, 45 km from Dormy Inn Hiroshima Annex.

name: Rihga Royal Hotel Hiroshima
description: Offering 6 dining options and a 24-hour front desk, Rihga Royal Hotel is 10 minutes from JR Hiroshima Train Station by car. Rooms include a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with bathtub. Free WiFi is available in all guest rooms. The hotel is 5 to 10-minute walk from the Atomic Bomb Dome and Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park. Hiroshima Museum of Art is a 2-minute walk from Rihga Royal Hotel Hiroshima, while Hiroshima Castle is approximately 6 minutes away on foot. Miyajimaguchi Station can be reached via a 50-minute train ride. The air-conditioned guest rooms at Rihga Royal Hotel Hiroshima come with a desk, trouser press, hairdryer and bathroom amenities. An air purifier is provided for guests as well. Serta beds are used in all rooms for a comfortable stay. All Day Dining LUORE offers a wide variety of dishes in a buffet style. Restaurant Chambord features French cuisine, while Naniwa serves Japanese specialties. Chinese food, teppanyaki, sushi and Continental dishes are also available. Dining Bar Rihga Top offers city views from the 33rd floor. At an extra fee, guests can swim laps at the pool or work out at the fitness centre (Age restrictions apply).

name: Nagoya Kanko Hotel
description: Established in 1936, Nagoya Kanko Hotel is located in the downtown area of Sakae and offers rooms with free wired internet, a fitness centre and a beauty salon. It features 5 restaurants, free WiFi and free parking. The air-conditioned rooms are bright and equipped with a TV, a minibar and an electric kettle. En suite bathrooms have a shower, a bathtub and amenities. Guests at Hotel Kanko Nagoya can relax with a massage treatment, or browse in the hotel’s shopping arcade. Services include a concierge and in-room dining. The hotel features international buffet dining, as well as Japanese and Chinese cuisine. Brasserie & Cafe Le Sud offers fresh pastries, while French restaurant Escoffier boasts over 200 fine wines. Nagoya Kanko Hotel is a 2-minute walk from Fushimi Subway Station and a 10-minute walk from Nagoya City Art Museum. Nagoya Castle is an 8-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Resol Nagoya
description: Renewed in April 2017, Hotel Resol Nagoya is a 5-minute walk from Nagoya Station and 3 km from the Nagoya Castle. It offers modern accommodation with 2 dining options and rooms with free WiFi. Each guest room is equipped with a fridge, electric kettle, tea and flat-screen TV. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. Nagoya Resol Hotel is 7 km from Atsuta Shrine. Chubu International Airport is a 30-minute train ride from the nearby Nagoya Station.

name: Ana Crowne Plaza Hotel Grand Court Nagoya, An IHG Hotel
description: Stay at the soaring ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Grand Court Nagoya for inspiring city views and proximity to Nagoya attractions. Friendly staff will greet you in the marble Lobby at the ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Grand Court Nagoya, where guests can relax among the soothing greenery. Take the lift to your room while overlooking Nagoya's retro TV Tower or Port of Nagoya or SUZUKA Mountains. By subway, it takes 5 minutes to get to the antique shops of Osu, or 10 minutes to the sloping tiled turrets of Nagoya Castle. Our Aquarium Package includes admission to one of Japan's biggest marine attractions, and we're the closest city hotel to the Japan Gaishi Sport Plaza and Nagoya Congress Center. At lunchtime, guests gather to our Kenzan restaurant for fresh sushi dishes seasoned with soy and wasabi. Drink a cold Japanese beer in the Lobby Lounge, or try our signature strawberry cocktail. For views over Nagoya's skyline, visit our Star Gate Bar and Restaurant located at the hotel's 30th floor. Book our 700-seater meeting room for your wedding or corporate event, where ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Grand Court Nagoya's dedicated Crowne Meetings Director will be hands on to ensure things run smoothly.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hilton Nagoya
description: Centrally located in Nagoya’s Fushimi area, just 5 minutes from Nagoya's main station, Hilton Nagoya offers convenient access to the city's transport, entertainment and business hubs. Exploring the city and local attractions is easy with a complimentary shuttle service to Nagoya station. Stay in a Deluxe Room for city views or choose an Executive Room for Executive Lounge access at Hilton Nagoya. Choose from five restaurants and bars and unwind in the Executive Lounge. Do business in one of 16 banquet rooms for up to 1200 delegates, all with WiFi. Swim in the 49-foot indoor swimming pool, work out in the gym and relax in the sauna and whirlpool. Browse designer boutiques at the Hilton Plaza and indulge in a Shiatsu treatment in the massage room or enjoy a game of tennis at this central Nagoya hotel. The hotel is close to the world’s largest planetarium of Nagoya City Science Museum and provides a complimentary shuttle service to nearby attractions such as Nagoya Castle and Nagoya station. Nagoya, one of Japan’s largest cities, makes a great base for exploring central Japan. Begin with the highlights of Nagoya's cultural and industrial heritage, excellent shopping and entertainment, as well as exploring the Ise Grand Shrine, the World Heritage sites of Shirakawa-go.Hilton

name: Nagoya Marriott Associa Hotel
description: We are ideally located in the heart of the city, easily accessible from the Chubu Centrair International Airport. Served by a wide array of transportation network, it is right above JR Takashimaya Dept Store and gourmet outlets. We have 8 outstanding restaurants and 17 meeting rooms to accommodate smaller groups to lager MICE groups. We have the largest, luxuriously-appointed guest rooms in Nagoya, featuring high-speed internet-access and panoramic views in its 769 guest rooms, Concierge rooms and Suites. It is no wonder that this is the most popular and convenient hotel for both business and leisure visitors!Marriott

name: Daiwa Roynet Hotel Nagoya-Ekimae
description: Only a 5-minute walk from JR Nagoya Train Station, Daiwa Roynet Hotel Nagoya Eki Mae offers simple Western-style accommodations with free Wi-Fi. Guests can request massages for an extra cost and watch video-on-demand channels on the flat-screen TV. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. A trouser press and humidifier are included in each room and nightwear is provided for all guests. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. A coin-launderette is on-site and guests can purchase late-night snacks at the convenience store located on the ground floor. Dry cleaning services are available at the front desk. A simple Western breakfast set with coffee is served at Moriba Coffee. Nagoya Ekimae Daiwa Roynet Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Nagoya Castle and a 10-minute drive from Sakae Station. Tsurumai Park is a 20-minute train ride away.

name: Apa Hotel Nagoya Nishiki Excellent
description: Located just a minute’s walk from Sakae Subway Station, APA Hotel Nagoya Nishiki Excellent features modern and well-equipped rooms and a beauty salon. Free WiFi is available in all rooms and massage services are offered at an additional charge. The hotel is conveniently situated in the downtown Nishiki area, and a 5-minute train ride from JR Nagoya Station. The local shopping area and a Don Quijote store is a 2-minute walk away. Ise Grand Shrine can be reached with a 2-hour drive. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with fine beddings, heating and air conditioning facilities. They feature a satellite TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. A yukata (casual summer kimono) is also provided for guests’ comfort. There are vending machines on site. Other facilities at the hotel include luggage storage and a coin-operated launderette.

name: Dormy Inn Premium Nagoya Sakae
description: Open from March 2015, Dormy Inn Premium Nagoya Sakae is just a 4-minute walk from Sakae and Fushimi subway stations. All guests can enjoy the natural hot spring bath on site. The hotel is ideally located in the downtown Nagoya, surrounded by lots of shops and restaurants. Decorated with modern interior, guest rooms offer a private bathroom, free amenities, a safety box and free WiFi. Nagoya Dormy Inn provides drinks vending machines, coin laundry facilities and free luggage storage. The hotel is a 3-minute subway ride from Nagoya Shinkansen (bullet train) Station. The Higashiyama Zoo is a 30-minute drive from the property, while Nagoya Castle is a 10-minute drive away. The restaurant offers breakfast buffet from 06:30 to 09:30.

name: Apa Hotel Nagoya-Sakae
description: Boasting a hot public bath, massage services and a restaurant, APA Hotel Nagoya Sakae is a 5-minute walk from Sakae Subway Station. Rooms have a 32-inch LCD TV, while free Wi-Fi acces is offered throughout the premises. All of the air-conditioned rooms at Nagoya Sakae APA Hotel come with an en suite bathroom and offer video-on-demand movies for free. A fridge, a Yukata robe and an electric kettle with green tea are provided. Guest can have a restful night's sleep with an original mattress optimising weight distribution. Nagoya Castle is a 5-minute subway ride away. Osu Kannon Temple is a 15-minute walk, and Toyota Automobile Museum is a 30-minute drive. The local shopping area and a Don Quijote store is a 10-minute walk away. The property is also only 180 metres away from a bus stop with buses bound for Chubu Centrair International Airport. The hotel has both indoor and outdoor baths. The 24-hour front desk can store luggage for guests.

name: Nagoya Tokyu Hotel
description: Just 500 metres from Sakae Subway Station, Nagoya Tokyu Hotel features a fitness centre with indoor pool, a sauna and 3 dining options. The spacious rooms include European-style furniture, a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Private parking is possible on site at an additional charge. The Nagoya Tokyu’s air-conditioned rooms feature imported European fabrics. Guests can put on the bathrobe and slippers and unwind with a pay TV programme. Each room has a tea maker, seating area and bathtub. JR Nagoya Train Station is a 15-minute subway ride from nearby Sakae Station. Higashiyama-koen Park (with Nagoya Zoo and Botanical Garden) is a 20-minute subway ride away. Nagoya Airport is about a 20-minute drive. Sightseeing help is available from the concierge. Loire Restaurant serves French cuisine, while Nadaman offers multi-course (kaiseki) Japanese meals, Edo-style sushi and tempura. Chinese and international cuisines are also available.

name: TIAD, Autograph Collection
description: Rest well at TIAD, Autograph Collection, a 150-room luxury hotel in Nagoya, Japan, that incorporates Biophilia Nest designs and blends traditional Japanese aesthetics with modern sophistication. Find our hotel nestled within the soothing greenery of Hisaya Odori Park. Spread out in one of 150 rooms, each more than 50 square meters in size, or select one of 13 hotel suites and or unique Japanese rooms with tatami flooring. Take in views of the Nagoya skyline and nearby MIRAI TOWER from the balcony or patio in select rooms. Sample authentic Japanese cuisine at our all-day dining restaurant with terrace seating or sip specialty cocktails in the Lobby Lounge. Maintain your fitness routine in Aichi Prefecture in our hotel's indoor infinity pool or 24-hour fitness center with traditional Japanese thermal baths. Host business and social functions in Japan in 1,000 square meters of dedicated event space, which includes a 173-square-meter multi-function room with a chapel. Experience the culture of Nagoya at TIAD.Marriott

name: the b nagoya
description: Located in the downtown area of Sakae facing the greenery of Hisaya Street, the b nagoya is a short 3-minute walk from Sakae Subway Station's exit 13. It offers massage services and free WiFi is available throughout the property. The air-conditioned guestrooms at the b nagoya are equipped with a fridge, a work desk and a TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom comes with Shiseido bath amenities and a bathtub. Guests can enjoy a breakfast at Iris from 07:00-10:00 for an extra fee. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. There is also a 24-hour convenience store on the ground floor, and complimentary coffee is available at the lobby at any time of day. Public parking is available off site for an additional charge. Nagoya Castle is a 20-minute subway ride from the b nagoya. The hotel is a 50-minute drive from Chubu International Airport. Exit 1 of Yabacho Subway Station is about a 4-minute walk away.

name: Richmond Hotel Nagoya Nayabashi
description: Richmond Hotel Nagoya Nayabashi is an awardee of 2014 TripAdvisor's Certificate of Excellence. Featuring a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi access throughout the property, the hotel is located just a 5-minute walk from Fushimi Subway Station. Simply decorated rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. Each comes with a seating area, a desk and a tea set. The private bathroom includes a bath, a hairdryer and free toiletries. A coin launderette, a paid massage service and a luggage storage service are available at Richmond Hotel Nagoya Nayabashi. Other facilities offered include vending machines and a communal internet PC. Breakfast is available. Nagoya City Science Museum is a 10-minute walk away, while JR Nagoya Train Station is a 15-minute walk away from the hotel. Guests can also visit the Nagoya Castle within a 15-minute walk and train ride.

name: KOKO Hotel Nagoya Sakae
description: Located in the lively Sakae area, KOKO Hotel Nagoya Sakae is just a 1-minute walk from Sakae Subway Station and a 5-minute subway ride from Nagoya Castle. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Don Quijote Nagoya Sakae is a 1-minute walk from the hotel, and the Nagoya City Science Museum is a 15-minute walk away. The Toyota Commemorative Museum of Industry and Technology is a 10-minute subway ride away, and Port of Nagoya Public Aquarium can be reached within a 20-minute subway ride. Each room at KOKO Hotel Nagoya Sakae is equipped with bath and toilet. A fridge and tea maker are also provided.

name: Kuretake Inn Nagoya Hisayaodori
description: Well situated in Nagoya, Kuretake Inn Nagoya Hisayaodori offers 3-star accommodation close to Oasis 21 and Nagoya Castle. Featuring a spa and wellness centre, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around less than 1 km from Sakae Station and around a 14-minute walk from Marunouchi Station. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, the units at the hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms will provide you with a seating area. All guest rooms will provide guests with a desk and a kettle. Nagoya Station is 3 km from Kuretake Inn Nagoya Hisayaodori, while Aeon Mall Atsuta is 5.7 km away. The nearest airport is Nagoya Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Meitetsu Inn Nagoya Nishiki
description: Meitetsu Inn Nagoya Nishiki is situated in central Nagoya, a 3-minute walk from Hisaya-Odori Subway Station. It offers modern accommodation with massage services, a European breakfast and rooms with free internet. Guestrooms offer both air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room equipped with an electric kettle, a fridge and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The lobby has a computer station with internet access. The hotel has a coin-operated laundrette on site. Fax and photocopying services are offered. Guests can enjoy a daily breakfast at the hotel’s breakfast corner. Nagoya Nishiki Meitetsu Inn is a 6-minute walk from Sakae Subway Station and a 5-minute drive from Nagoya Castle.

name: Capsule Hotel Anshin Oyado Premium Nagoya Sakae
description: No description found

name: Hotel S-plus Nagoya Sakae
description: Located a 5-minute walk from exit 5 of Sakae Subway Station, Hotel S-plus Nagoya Sakae offers free WiFi throughout the property and free wired internet in all rooms. Air conditioned rooms feature an en suite bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a telephone. Each comes with an electric kettle and a refrigerator. At Hotel S-plus Nagoya Sakae, a coin launderette, trouser press and drinks vending machines can be found on site. Guests can also get a massage at a surcharge. JR Nagoya Train Station is located a 12-minute taxi ride from the property, while Nagoya City Science Museum is located within a 20-minute walk away. Nagoya Castle can also be accessed within a 20-minute walk and train ride.

name: Sanco Inn Grande Nagoya
description: Ideally situated in the Nakamura Ward district of Nagoya, Sanco Inn Grande Nagoya -HOTEL & SPA- is situated 2.6 km from Oasis 21, 2.7 km from Nagoya Castle and 5.8 km from Aeon Mall Atsuta. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Nagoya Station. Nippon Gaishi Hall is 10 km from the hotel, while Nagashima Spa Land is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nagoya Airport, 12 km from Sanco Inn Grande Nagoya -HOTEL & SPA-.

name: Vessel Hotel Campana Nagoya
description: Well set in Nagoya, Vessel Hotel Campana Nagoya provides a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. Providing a restaurant, the property also has a shared lounge, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. Private parking is available on site. All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, certain rooms at the hotel also provide guests with a city view. At Vessel Hotel Campana Nagoya every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a spa centre. Around the clock guidance is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Japanese, Vietnamese and Chinese. Nagoya Station is 700 metres from Vessel Hotel Campana Nagoya, while Nagoya Castle is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Nagoya Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Venus Neo
description: Located in Nagoya, 1.5 km from Oasis 21, Hotel Venus Neo features free WiFi access and free private parking. Every room at this love hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and DVD player. Every room has a private bathroom with a bath and bidet, with slippers and free toiletries provided. You will find room service at the property. Nagoya Castle is 3.4 km from Hotel Venus Neo, while Nippon Gaishi Hall is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Chubu Airport, 35 km from Hotel Venus Neo.

name: Nagoya Sakae Washington Hotel Plaza
description: Located in the heart of Nagoya, Washington Hotel Plaza is a 7-minute walk from Sakae Subway Station. It features comfortable rooms with free Wifi, free wired internet, and drinks vending machines. Many shops and restaurants are also located nearby. Air-conditioned rooms offer a decor in basic colours with a lively detail like a patterned wall or floral-themed wall art. They are fitted with a fridge, an LCD TV and a bathroom. Guests at the Washington Sakae Nagoya can rent a laptop PC for in-room use, or unwind with a massage treatment in the privacy of the guest room. The hotel provides laundry service and delivery services at extra charge. Nagoya Sakae Washington Hotel Plaza is a 7-minute walk from Fushimi Subway Station, and a 10-minute drive from Nagoya Station. From Sakae Subway Station it takes just 14 minutes by subway and walk to Nagoya Castle, and less than 30 minutes to Higashiyama Zoo and Botanical Gardens.

name: Nagoya Kasadera Hotel
description: A 7-minute walk from JR Kasadera Station, Nagoya Kasadera Hotel features a restaurant, a café and free access to adjoining spa centre Utopia Takara. It offers a children’s playroom, rooms with free Wi-Fi and a free shuttle to/from Kasadera Station. Nagoya Kasadera Hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and it offers a limited number of PC and bicycle rentals upon advance request. Drinks vending machines and free parking are on-site, and laundry service is available. Guests can relax free of charge at the large spa & wellness centre Utopia Takara next door. Bright air-conditioned rooms come with a desk, an LCD TV and a fridge. Free toiletries are provided in the en suite bathroom. Breakfast can be enjoyed at restaurant Otakara-tei, in the Utopia Takara. Nagoya Kasadera Hotel is 30 minutes by train from the Nagoya city science museum. It’s a 40-minute drive from both Nagoya Castle and amusement park Nagashima Resort.

name: Hotel Regent Odaka (Adult Only)
description: 6.5 km from Nippon Gaishi Hall, Hotel Regent (Adult Only) is located in Nagoya and provides air-conditioned rooms. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Nagoya Castle is 18 km from the hotel and Nagoya Station is 19 km away. All units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Hotel Regent (Adult Only) all rooms include bed linen and towels. American and Asian breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. Aeon Mall Atsuta is 11 km from Hotel Regent (Adult Only), while Oasis 21 is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Nagoya Airport, 28 km from the hotel.

name: Jozankei View Hotel
description: Jozankei View Hotel offers breakfast/dinner buffets with a variety of dishes. Guests can enjoy an indoor hot-spring amusement park which includes in-door pools with water slides, spa baths and various hot-spring baths. A free shuttle is available from central Sapporo city, which is a 1-hour drive away and must be reserved at time of booking. All rooms are non-smoking rooms and the air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Japanese and Western buffets featuring seasonal and local ingredients are served at the restaurant. Japanese dishes are also served at the restaurant. Hotel Jozankei View is a 10-minute walk from Jozankei Gensen Park and a 45-minute drive from Sapporo International Ski Resort.

name: Premier Hotel Nakajima Park Sapporo
description: Located right next to Nakajima Koen Park in the heart of the city, the Premier Hotel Nakajima Park Sapporo features a top-floor Teppanyaki restaurant with sweeping city and park views. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi. The Premier Hotel Nakajima Park Sapporo is just a 3-minute walk from Nakajima Koen Subway station. It is a 5-minute walk from downtown area Susukino. Rooms feature a contemporary décor, with a large window overlooking the park or city. They are equipped with a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. Guests at the hotel can relax with a massage or aromatherapy treatment. The hotel houses Bistro La Provence, which serves all meals, and Wano Hassoan Japanese Restaurant, open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails are poured at Bar 21, which boasts top-floor views of Sapporo.

name: Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Sapporo
description: Located in Sapporo, 1.3 km from Sapporo Station, Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Sapporo provides accommodation with a restaurant, private parking and a spa and wellness centre. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The property is 13 km from Shin-Sapporo Station, and within 800 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. The daily breakfast offers American, Asian or vegan options. Popular points of interest near Solaria Nishitetsu Hotel Sapporo include Former Hokkaidō Government Office, Odori Station and Sapporo Clock Tower. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Frame Hotel Sapporo
description: Only a 3-minute walk from Susukino Subway Station, Frame Hotel Sapporo offers simple accommodations with free Wi-Fi. Guests can request relaxing massages for an extra cost or refresh in the spacious public baths. JR Sapporo Train Station is a 10-minute drive away, while Tanuki Koji Shopping Street is a 5-minute walk from the property. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. An electric kettle and trouser press can be borrowed for in-room use. Japanese Yukata robes are provided for all guests, and the en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Guests can read magazines and sit on massage chairs at the shared lounge. A coin-launderette is on site and dry cleaning services are provided as well. A Japanese or Western-style breakfast set is served at Fukinoto restaurant. Sapporo Frame Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Odori Park and a 10-minute subway ride from Nakajima Park. New Chitose Airport is a 1-hour train ride away.

name: Jozankei Tsuruga Resort Spa Mori no Uta
description: Boasting natural hot springs with views of surrounding greenery, Jozankei Tsuruga offers elegant rooms with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. It features a spa, buffet restaurant and reservation only free shuttles to Makomanai Station on the Sapporo Subway Lines. Jozankei Tsuruga Resort Spa Mori no Uta is 27 km from Sapporo Train Station and a 1.5-hour drive from Chitose Airport. Free parking is available. Featuring modern Japanese interiors, air-conditioned rooms offer spacious layouts and ample lounge area. They come with a hairdryer and a coffee maker. Dining options include hearty buffets meals served in the restaurant. Scenic forest views accompany fine teas at Mori Terrace. For leisure, guests can enjoy relaxing massages or make use of the free Wi-Fi available throughout. Added conveniences include 24-hour reception, a gift shop and cigar bar.

name: Hotel Emisia Sapporo
description: Conveniently located a 2-minute walk from Shinsapporo Station on the JR and subway lines, Hotel Emisia Sapporo offers free WiFi, rental bicycles and a 24-hour front desk and modern guest rooms. Guests can make a visit to popular tourist attractions such as the Sapporo Clock Tower and Odori Park within a 30-minute train ride. Sunpiazza Aquarium and the Sapporo Science Centre are a 6-minute walk away, while Mitsui Outlet Park can be accessed within a 15-minute drive. JR Sapporo Train Station is a 13-minute train ride away from the property and New Chitose Airport is a 28-minute ride on the airport express train. Each room is air conditioned and equipped with an electric kettle, a tea set and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can arrange for a soothing massage, or use the spa facilities. Emisia Sapporo Hotel also offers luggage storage, concierge and currency exchange services. Other facilities available at the property include room service and vending machines. A buffet featuring Japanese and Western dishes is served for breakfast. Guests can also enjoy dining at the restaurant Hareus, or the Chinese restaurant, Senun.

name: Jozankei Manseikaku Hotel Milione
description: Offering hot-spring baths, an indoor pool and Marco Polo Buffet Restaurant, Hotel Milione is 1 hour from Sapporo Train Station on the hotel’s free shuttle. Both Japanese rooms with tatami (woven-straw) flooring and futon beds and Western-style rooms are available at Jozankei Manseikaku Hotel Milione. All are air-conditioned and have a private bathroom with bathtub. Set in the wooded hills near Mount Asahi, the hotel is a 10-minute walk from Futami Tsuribashi Suspension Bridge. Hoheikyo Dam is a 10-minute drive, and Jozankei Dam is a 20-minute drive. Guests can enjoy the nightclub, sing karaoke or relax at the sauna. Massages are available, and a gift shop is on site. Breakfast and dinner are served at the hotel’s restaurant. A Japanese-style pub and relaxed bar are also on offer.

name: Sapporo Prince Hotel
description: Just a 3-minute walk from Odori Park and Nishi 11-chome Subway Station, Sapporo Prince Hotel offers rooms with city views and free WiFi. Hot-spring baths and a 28th-floor French restaurant are featured. Guest can benefit from free shuttle from/to JR Sapporo Train Station. The contemporary air-conditioned rooms at Prince Hotel Sapporo include a satellite flat-screen TV. The attached bathroom has a bathtub. A refrigerator and electric kettle are also provided. A 24-hour front desk offers luggage storage. The lively Susukino area is a 15-minute walk. Katsura Steak House serves teppanyaki with panoramic city views, sharing the top floor with Le Trianon Restaurant. Chinese fare is on offer at Fuyo-Jyo. Enjoy a relaxing drink at Sky Lounge. Guests can reach the property from New Chitose Airport in 60 minutes by car. The Airport Limousine Bus takes approximately 1 hour and 40 minutes to the property. JR New Chitose Airport Station is a 37-minute train ride from Sapporo Station.

name: Chateraise Gateaux Kingdom Sapporo Hotel and Spa Resort
description: Featuring several public baths and a sauna, the Chateraise Gateaux Kingdom Sapporo Hotel & Resort offers Western-style rooms with free wired internet access. Guests can work out in the fitness centre or enjoy the various indoor and outdoor swimming pools. JR Sapporo Station is a 45-minute drive, and the Shin-Chitose Airport is a 60-minute drive away. The air-conditioned rooms feature a TV, a refrigerator, and an electric kettle with tea bags. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and slippers. Guests can request for relaxing massages and facials, or get a haircut at the barbershop. The resort also has 9 kinds of hot spring baths and spas, as well as various types of saunas. The hotel provides 4 dining options. Vigne restaurant serves Western dishes, while Hyonmanro offers Chinese cuisine. Teppanyaki grill is available at the Kaiji, and Japanese food at the Daizen. Sapporo Hotel & Resort Chateraise Gateaux Kingdom is a 39-minute drive from the Sapporo Clock Tower, and a 41-minute drive from the famous Odori Park. Nakajima Park and Hoheikan is a 51-minute drive away.

name: Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen
description: Situated in Jozankei, within 32 km of Sapporo Station and 37 km of Shin-Sapporo Station, Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen features accommodation with a garden and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting room service, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a lift and luggage storage for guests. The ryokan will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot spring bath. Guests at Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen will be able to enjoy activities in and around Jozankei, like skiing. The ryokan provides a laundry service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Otaru Station is 48 km from Okujozankei Onsen Kasho Gyoen, while Otarushi Zenibako City Center is 48 km from the property. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 40 km from the accommodation.

name: Chalet Ivy Jozankei
description: No description found

name: Jasmac Plaza Hotel
description: With a stay at Jasmac Plaza Hotel in Sapporo, you'll be connected to a shopping center and minutes from Ramen Yokocho and close to Sapporo JR Tower. This spa hotel is within close proximity of Nijo Market and Sapporo Concert Hall.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 153 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have spring water baths and complimentary toiletries. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as hot springs, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional amenities include a hair salon, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.Dining Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 3 restaurants. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.Ticket Package

name: Hotel Gracery Sapporo
address: Nishi 4 Chome, Kita 4 Jo, Chuo, Sapporo 060-0007
description: Hotel Gracery Sapporo is connected to the Sapporo Train Station, a 10-minute walk from Sapporo Clock Tower. It offers modern accommodation with massage services and free internet. Guestrooms offer both heating and air-conditioning facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge, an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered at the hotel. Luggage storage can be found at the 24-hour front desk. Gracery Sapporo Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Odori Park. The Susukino district is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Sapporo Tokyu Rei Hotel
description: Sapporo Tokyu REI Hotel is located in Hokkaido, a 1-minute walk from Susukino Station. It offers modern accommodation with massage services, a restaurant and rooms with free WiFi. Air-conditioned guestrooms are fitted with a fridge, tea/coffee making facilities and a TV. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a bathtub. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered, and a relaxing massage can be arranged. The lobby features an internet corner for guests’ convenience. The Southwest Wine and Dine Restaurant serves Japanese and Western buffet dishes for breakfast. Sapporo Tokyu REI Hotel is within a 7-minute walk from the Odori Park. Susukino Minami-4 Nishi-3 Bus Stop for the airport limousine bus is just a 3-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Tenza Hotel & Skyspa At Sapporo Central
description: Set in the centre of Sapporo, Tenza Hotel & SKYSPA at Sapporo Central is situated 2 km from Sapporo Station and 13 km from Shin-Sapporo Station. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation offers a sauna, spa centre, restaurant and free WiFi. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is fitted with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. At the hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Tenza Hotel & SKYSPA at Sapporo Central include Odori Park, Susukino Station and Odori Station. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Keihan Sapporo
description: A 4-minute walk from JR Sapporo Station, Hotel Keihan offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and massage services. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Toiletries are also provided. Hotel Keihan Sapporo has a 24-hour front desk, and it offers luggage storage and laundry services. Breakfast is available at the hotel restaurant, which serves Japanese and Western food. The hotel also has drink vending machines. Hotel Keihan Sapporo is a 7-minute walk from Sapporo Subway Station, and a 6-minute walk from historical house Seikatei. Maruyama Zoo is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Sapporo Park Hotel
description: Overlooking Nakajima Park in central Sapporo and just a 1-minute walk from Nakajima Koen Subway Station, the Park Hotel offers comfortable rooms and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. The hotel features 4 dining options and bicycle rental. Guest rooms at Hotel Sapporo Park come with air-conditioning, heating and attached private bathroom. Each room is equipped with satellite TV, radio and minibar. Some rooms offer a view of the park. The Park Hotel houses its own shopping arcade, featuring a boutique and beauty salon. Aromatherapy and massage are available. The hotel offers concierge service and parking at a fee. Restaurants at Sapporo Park Hotel serve a variety of dishes, specialising in Italian, Chinese and local cuisine. The hotel features two terrace restaurants. Room service is also provided. JR Sapporo Station is a 5-minute subway ride from the property. New Chitose Airport can be reached within a 60-minute drive or a 50-minute train ride.

name: JR Inn Sapporo-eki Minami-guchi
description: Opened in October 2016, JR Inn Sapporo-eki Minami-guchi is located a 7-minute walk away from JR Sapporo Station. There is a 24-hour front desk. The property is a 15-minute walk from Odori Park, a popular location where the Sapporo Snow Festival is held. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All air-conditioned guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen LCD TV, electric kettle, and air humidifier. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are included in all rooms. Guests can chose a pillow from a selection of 21 variations at the ground floor. There is a shared library with over 500 books and Japanese-style comics, where guests can relax and enjoy free coffee and tea. There is a large public bath within the property. On-site parking is available for an additional fee. There is a 24-hour coin launderette provided on site. One of the popular nearby destinations is the Sapporo Clock Tower, only a 4-minute walk away. The Former Hokkaido Government Office is also a 8-minute walk from the hotel. The property is conveniently located just a minute away on foot from Sapporo Station on Toho Line.

name: Sapporo Grand Hotel
description: Sapporo Grand Hotel boasts a shopping arcade, a gym and a spa centre, a 5-minute walk from JR Sapporo Station via a connecting tunnel. It features 7 dining options, a concierge and free Wi-Fi at the entire property. Rooms at the Sapporo Grand Hotel are air-conditioned and equipped with a TV and a refrigerator. A work desk, slippers and toiletries are provided. Guests can enjoy a massage or a beauty treatment. The hotel has a Memorial Library, which also serves as a museum. Fresh seafood, fine wines and international specialities are available at Sapporo Grand’s restaurants. Northern Terrace offers breakfast and lunch buffet, while Lobby Lounge Mizar features a fireplace. Guests eating the buffet breakfast will receive a discount if they inform the front desk before going to the restaurant. Sapporo Grand Hotel is a 2-minute walk from Sapporo Clock Tower and the Oodori Park. Kokusai Ski Ground is a 1-hour drive away.

name: Keio Plaza Hotel Sapporo
description: Keio Plaza Hotel Sapporo is located in central Sapporo, a 5-minute walk from JR Sapporo Station. It offers modern accommodation with 7 dining options, an indoor pool and rooms with free Wi-Fi. The simply decorated guestrooms are fitted with air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with an air purifier, tea/coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Guests can enjoy massage services or unwind in the sauna rooms. Other facilities include a fitness centre which can be used at an additional cost. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Featuring views of the city, Japanese dishes can be enjoyed at Japanese Dining Miyama and Hokkaido Specialities restaurant. Drinks can be found at the Cross Vault Bar. Hotel Keio Plaza is 1 km from Sapporo Clock Tower and Odori Koen Park. Shin Chitose Airport is an 80-minute bus ride away, and an airport bus stops at the hotel.

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Sapporo
description: APA Hotel Sapporo offers luxurious facilities including a seafood restaurant and a variety of traditional body treatment areas like an Utatane-buro (nap bath) and a Rotenburo Bath (open-air bath). Free WiFi is available in all guest rooms. The hotel is about 7.2 km from Sapporo Art Park and 3.4 km from Sapporo Moiwayama Ski Resort. It takes 20 minutes by taxi from the hotel to Susukino Station and 15 minutes to Hitsujigaoka Observation Hill. There is a free bus which runs between the hotel and downtown Sapporo. The rooms at APA Hotel & Resort Sapporo are well equipped with heating and air conditioning facilities, a flat-screen TV with Video on Demand (VOD) system, and a work desk. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Enjoy fresh flame-grilled seafood in an authentic Hokkaido environment at Umie Restaurant. Drinks can be purchased at all times at vending machines. Guests can unwind in the sauna, enjoy a massage, or get active with a game of table tennis. Computers are available for rent, and there are internet terminals on site. Other facilities include a coin-operated laundry machine.

name: Apa Hotel Sapporo Susukino Ekinishi
address: Minami 4 Jo Nishi 7 Chome 1-1 Chuo-ku, Sapporo 064-0804
description: A 5-minute walk from Susukino Subway Station, the APA Hotel Sapporo Susukino Ekinishi offers comfortable rooms and free WiFi throughout the property. It features massage treatments, a coin launderette and drinks vending machines. The APA Susukino Ekinishi is a 10-minute walk from Sapporo Tokeidai Clock Tower. It's a 10-minute drive from JR Sapporo Station, and a 40-minute drive from the Jozankei Onsen Hot Springs. The New Chitose Airport can be accessed by a 70-minute bus ride. Decorated in neutral colours, rooms at the Ekinishi Susukino APA Hotel come with a 40-inch LCD TV with movies-on-demand, a fridge and a spacious bathroom. Free toiletries are provided, and some rooms come with a sofa. All rooms have free wired internet, while some also offer free Wi-Fi. APA Hotel Sapporo Susukino Ekinishi has a 24-hour front desk, which offers dry cleaning service and luggage storage. Breakfast and lunch buffet are served daily at the hotel's restaurants.

name: Vessel Hotel Campana Susukino
description: Conveniently situated in Sapporo, Vessel Hotel Campana Susukino provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. This 4-star hotel offers a spa and wellness centre. The hotel features a sauna and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Popular points of interest near Vessel Hotel Campana Susukino include Susukino Station, Odori Park and Odori Station. The nearest airport is Okadama Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Relief Sapporo Susukino
description: Opened in February 2015, Hotel Relief Sapporo Susukino provides a café, free WiFi and bicycle rentals, a 6-minute walk from Nakajima Metro Station. It also features a 24-hour reception, drinks vending machines and charged parking. The hotel is an 8-minute walk from Susukino Train Station. The Susukino Hotel Relief is a 7-minute walk from well-known noodle restaurant street Sapporo Ramen Yokocho, and an 8-minute walk from Higashihonganjimae Tram Station. Sapporo Tower and the Sapporo Beer Museum are both around a 15-minute walk away. Simple rooms feature a relaxing colour scheme, and come with a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an air cleaner/humidifier. The attached bathroom offers Pola brand shower gel and shampoo. A convenience shop can be found within a 5-minute walk. Sapporo Hotel Relief Susukino offers dry cleaning and laundry services, and luggage storage. A trouser press can be borrowed at the front desk.

name: Hotel Route - Inn Sapporo Chuo
description: Located in Susukino, Hotel Route Inn Sapporo Chuo is a perfect starting point from which to explore Sapporo. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, restaurant are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning, heating to ensure a restful night. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Hotel Route Inn Sapporo Chuo caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Dormy Inn Sapporo Annex
description: Located in front of Dormy Inn Premium Sapporo, the Annex offers guest rooms with free internet access. It features large public baths and sauna facilities. Both Susukino Station and Odori Subway Station are a short 5-minute walk from Dormy Inn Sapporo Annex. Guestrooms offer air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge, an electric kettle with green tea and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Guests enjoy free access to Dormy Inn Premium Sapporo’s public bath. Coin-operated washing machines are provided. Breakfast is available daily at Dormy Inn Premium Sapporo.

name: Dormy Inn Premium Sapporo
description: Dormy Inn Sapporo is located in Tanuki-Kouji shopping lane, a 5-minute walk from Susukino Subway Station. The modern hotel features a hot public bath, sauna facilities and free internet. Odori Subway Station on the Namboku Line is also a 5-minute walk. Guestrooms offer both air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is well-equipped with a fridge, a work desk and a TV with cable channels. Guests can relax at the outdoor bath or unwind in the sauna room. Free access to Dormy Inn Sapporo Annex's public bath is also offered. The hotel has coin-operated laundry machines. The on-site restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast. Drinks can be purchased from vending machines, and guests who crave an evening snack can enjoy a free portion of 'ramen' noodle soup between 21:30 and 23:00. Sapporo Dormy Inn is within 700 metres from the Sapporo Tower and the Susukino District.

name: Vessel Inn Sapporo Nakajima Park
description: Opened in February 2013, Vessel Inn Sapporo Nakajima Park is located just a 1-minute walk from Nakajima-koen Subway Station. It features free property-wide Wi-Fi and comfortable pocket-coil beds. The hearty breakfast buffet includes fresh seafood and local Hokkaido delicacies. JR Sapporo Station is a 5-minute subway ride away, and New Chitose Airport can be reached within a 40-minute train ride from the Sapporo Station. The lively Susukino area is a 5-minute walk from the property. Fitted with chic décor, each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. The en suite bathroom has a bath tub and free toiletries. While staying at Nakajimakoen Vessel Inn, guests can use internet PCs or bicycles for free. Coin launderette is available on site, and in-room massages can be arranged at an additional charge. The breakfast buffet is served in the dining room.

name: Jozankei Onsen Yurakusoan
description: No description found

name: Hotel Resol Trinity Sapporo
description: Hotel Resol Trinity Sapporo is located across Odori Park, a 1-minute walk from Odori Subway Station. The 3-star hotel offers stylish accommodation with a spa, an all-day restaurant and rooms with free Wi-Fi. Air-conditioned guestrooms feature modern interiors and furnishings. Each room is equipped with a fridge, a work desk and a TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom comes with toiletries and a bathtub. Laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Il Chianti restaurant serves Italian specialities for lunch and dinner. It also offers a buffet breakfast with close to 30 different local and Western food items. Sapporo Resol Trinity Hotel is a 6-minute walk from Sapporo Clock Tower. Ramen Yokocho, the famous street with noodle restaurants, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The airport shuttle bus to New Chitose Airport departs from in front of the hotel.

name: Daiwa Roynet Hotel Sapporo Susukino
description: Located in the Susukino district, Daiwa Roynet Hotels Sapporo Susukino offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. In-room massages are available for an additional charge. JR Sapporo Station is a 30-minute walk away. For an additional fee, you can enjoy VOD movies on the flat-screen TV and store your own food in the refrigerator. Slippers, pajamas and a trouser press are provided for everyone, and the private bathroom has a hairdryer. The 24-hour front desk provides cleaning services and luggage storage. Salvatore Cuomo Restaurant serves Italian cuisine, and there is a convenience store on the ground floor. Daiwa Roynet Hotels in Sapporo Susukino is a 10-minute walk from Odori Park and a 15-minute drive from Maruyama Zoo. Sapporo Dome is a 20-minute train ride away.

name: Hotel Sunroute Sapporo
description: Fully renovated in April 2013, Hotel Sunroute Sapporo is just a 3-minute walk from JR Sapporo Station, offering a relaxing massage service and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Rooms include a private bathroom and satellite flat-screen TV. The classically furnished guest rooms at Sapporo Sunroute Hotel have extra-long beds and a fridge. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with on-demand movies, an electric kettle and sleepwear. The en suite bathroom has a bathtub and toiletries. The hotel is 1 km from Sapporo Clock Tower and 2 km from Odori-Koen Park. The lively Susukino area and Nijo Fish Market are both 10 minutes away by taxi. Printing and photocopying services are available at the lobby for a fee. Culinare Restaurant serves a buffet breakfast made from fresh local foods. Coin-operated laundry machines are provided on the top floor. Internet terminals are available, for a fee.

name: The Westin Yokohama
description: Stay at The Westin Yokohama and let our signature wellness programs empower you. Offering a prime location in the Yokohama Minato Mirai 21 CBD we're the newest lifestyle wellness hotel in Kanagawa, Japan.
