From restful slumber on our Heavenly® Bed to nutritious, energizing dining cuisine on our Eat Well Menu, our hotel helps you be your best on the road. The 373 spacious rooms and suites at our hotel near Kawasaki, Kanagawa offer a relaxing retreat in the heart of Yokohama with replenishing amenities and views of Mount Fuji in select rooms. Host memorable meetings, weddings and social events in 1 of our 13 versatile function spaces accommodating up to 530 guests. Savor enticing cuisine at 5 distinctive restaurants and bars serving a variety of dishes sure to delight your palate. For the health-conscious guest, our integrated wellness floor will revive your senses with our original Heavenly Spa By Westin™ and WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. Stay Well no matter what brings you to Japan at The Westin Yokohama.Marriott

name: Yokohama Minatomirai Manyo Club
description: Located a 5-minute walk from Minatomirai Station, Yokohama Minatomirai Manyo Club features 13 natural hot spring baths sourced from Yugawara and offers Japanese-style and Western-style accommodation. The Cup Noodles Museum and Yokohama Cosmoworld are within a 2-minute walk from the property. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All rooms feature a TV, refrigerator, electric kettle, green tea, mineral water bottle and air freshener. All rooms have a high-tech toilet, slippers and free toiletries including toothbrushes, facial cleanser, skin toner and skin lotion. The Western-style rooms include a reading light, while the Japanese-style rooms feature tatami (woven-straw) floor, a table and futon mattresses. Yokohama Minatomirai Manyo Club features 3 men-only and 4 women-only outdoor hot spring baths and 3 men-only and 3 women-only indoor hot spring baths. There is a steam sauna, mist sauna and dry sauna, all with different temperatures. Guests can enjoy views of Minatomirai while dipping their feet in the outdoor foot bath located on the terrace. There are 5 different rooms of Japanese rock beds 'ganbanyoku', each with varying humidity, temperature and stones including rose quartz, jade, topaz and tourmaline. Luggage storage is available at the 24-hour front desk. Guests can choose from 9 massage options including Thai massage, body scrub, Chinese foot reflexology, seitai and amoi oil therapy. There is a games centre with air hockey, table tennis, karaoke and a kids play area available at an additional cost. There is also a manga comic book reading area. There are 2 relax rooms at the property featuring reclining chairs with TVs, as well as a women-only relax room. There is a 24-hour buffet offering Western-style, Chinese and Japanese cuisine. The on-site restaurant features Japanese cuisine including sushi, ramen and tempura. The Manyo Gozen menu includes sashimi, tempura and udon or soba noodles. There is a fruit juice and smoothie bar on site featuring Cold Stone ice cream, as well as a bar specialising in Kirin beer. A free shuttle service is available to and from Yokohama Station West Exit. Bashamichi Station is a 10-minute walk from Yokohama Minatomirai Manyo Club. Guests can reach Yokohama Red Brick Warehouse in 9 minutes on foot. Tokyo Haneda International Airport is located a 45-minute train ride away.

name: Yokohama Bay Sheraton Hotel and Towers
description: Easily access Yokohama Station and other public transportation options from Yokohama Bay Sheraton Hotel & Towers. Our luxury hotel offers a tranquil retreat away from the hustle and bustle of Yokohama. Reserve an elegant hotel room or suite overlooking Yokohama Bay in the four-story Sheraton Club and expect Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience bedding in all rooms. Recharge after a day of meetings in Japan with help from our indoor swimming pool and 24-hour fitness center. Explore the world-class dining and nightlife surrounding our hotel or experience our on-site restaurants and lounges, which offer a variety of local and international cuisines, live entertainment, craft cocktails and spectacular views. Find our Yokohama hotel steps from Yokohama Station and only 30 minutes from Tokyo International Airport, which makes us an ideal place to stay where you're attending a meeting, wedding or social event in Japan. Select Yokohama Bay Sheraton Hotel & Towers and make your visit to Japan a sensational one.Marriott

name: Yokohama Royal Park Hotel
description: Located above the 52nd floor of Yokohama Landmark Tower, all rooms at Yokohama Royal Park Hotel offer free WiFi and views of Yokohama City or the Yokohama Bay Bridge. Guests can take a swim at the indoor pool at the fitness centre with addtional charge, enjoy various cuisines at the 8 dining venues or request soothing massage treatments for an extra cost. Minatomirai Subway Station is a 3-minute walk and JR Sakuragicho Train Station is a 5-minute walk away. All spacious air-conditioned rooms are located between the 52nd and 67th floor, featuring carpeted floors and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each comes with a minibar and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and nightwear is provided for all guests. The 24-hour front desk provides dry cleaning services, luggage storage and daily newspapers. Guests can use the business centre or make travel arrangements at the concierge desk. Local gifts can be purchased at the hotel’s souvenir shop. Landmark Spa is located on the 49th floor, and above 18 years old guests can use the facilities at a surcharge. There is also a barber and beauty shop, as well as a photo studio at the property. Offering spectacular views from the 68th floor, restaurant Shikitei offers Japanese dishes, and French full courses are served at Le Ciel restaurant. You can enjoy a late-night cocktail with panoramic views of Yokohama Bay at the Sirius Lounge, located on the 70th floor. Royal Park Hotel Yokohama is a 20-minute walk from the Red Brick Warehouse and Yokohama Chinatown. The Pacifico Yokohama convention centre is an 8-minute walk away. Guests can take a 50-minute limousine bus ride to Haneda International Airport or a 2-hour limousine bus ride to Narita International Airport (charges apply).

name: Mitsui Garden Hotel Yokohama Minatomirai Premier
description: Mitsui Garden Hotel Yokohama Minatomirai Premier has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Yokohama. This 5-star hotel offers luggage storage space. The hotel features an indoor pool, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Mitsui Garden Hotel Yokohama Minatomirai Premier all rooms have bed linen and towels. Yokohama Marine Tower is 3.8 km from the accommodation, while Sankeien is 7.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda Airport, 17 km from Mitsui Garden Hotel Yokohama Minatomirai Premier.

name: Intercontinental Yokohama Grand, An IHG Hotel
description: The InterContinental Yokohama Grand soars magnificently above the transformed city centre like a sleek yacht under sail. You will find a host of attractions within easy reach of the hotel, including Yokohama Cosmo World, Motomachi, a famous Yokohama shopping street, and Yamashita Park. The Yokohama Cup Noodle Museum is just 5-minutes walk away. You'll find that this iconic business hotel in Yokohama caters to your every need, including a fitness centre, spa, lounge bar and five restaurants.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama
description: Ideally located in Yokohama, The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama, open from September 2020, offers lavishly-decorated air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This non-smoking 5-star modern hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, shops onsite, spa and fitness facilities for the guest's comfort. At The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama all stylish rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom offers both bath and shower with free toiletries. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Pacifico Yokohama, Cupnoodles Museum and Yokohama Museum. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International, 32 km from The Kahala Hotel & Resort Yokohama, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Apa Hotel Yokohama-Kannai
description: APA Hotel Yokohama Kannai is conveniently located just a minute’s walk from Kannai Subway Station and 3 minutes from JR Kannai Station. It has an all-day dining restaurant, massage services and well-equipped, air-conditioned rooms. Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire area. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from Yokohama China Town and 5minutes from Yokohama Stadium. Yokohama Minato Mirai Area is about 2 km away from APA Hotel Yokohama Kannai. All rooms have air conditioning and heating facilities. They are equipped with an original mattress optimising weight distribution, flat-screen TV, fridge and an en suite bathroom. A hairdryer and toiletries are provided for guests’ convenience. The hotel has vending machines on site. Other facilities include coin-operated laundry machines and microwaves.

name: Apa Hotel & Resort Yokohama Bay Tower
description: Situated in Yokohama, 1.8 km from Yokohama Marine Tower, APA Hotel & Resort Yokohama Bay Tower features a spa and wellness centre. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 500 metres from Yokohama Cosmo World and 600 metres from Cupnoodles Museum. The hotel has a restaurant, and Sankeien is 6 km away. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Speaking English and Japanese at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Nissan Stadium is 11 km from the hotel, while Red Brick Warehouse is 600 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 29 km from the property.

name: Best Western Yokohama
description: In the thriving port city of Yokohama, Japan's gateway to the world, lies a modern hotel that provides comfortable stays and exceptional connectivity for both long- and short-stay guests, traveling for business or leisure. The Best Western Yokohama is nestled in the Tsurumi ward of the city, just a few minutes' walk from Tsurumi Station which offers fast rail services into the center of Tokyo. It also takes just 10 minutes to drive to Yokohama Station and 20 minutes to Tokyo's Haneda Airport, making this an exceptionally well-connected hotel. It is also connected on the inside, with high-speed Wi-Fi free-of-charge throughout the hotel and international power outlets in the rooms. The hotel also houses a restaurant, laundry and conference and banqueting facilities.bestwestern.com

name: Intercontinental Yokohama Pier 8
description: A new era of luxury awaits at InterContinental Yokohama Pier 8 offering uninterrupted harbor views from nautically inspired rooms and suites. Evoking the spirit of the sea, serene Japanese gardens seamlessly blend with lively restaurants and bars making this an urban oasis in vibrant Yokohama. Savour internationally curated menus showcasing the finest seasonal produce and experience the warmth of Japanese hospitality as you watch cruise ships glide majestically into port.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Jal City Kannai Yokohama
description: Awarded the TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence in 2015, Hotel JAL City Kannai Yokohama offers modern rooms with free wired internet access. Free Wi-Fi is available at the public areas. Motomachi Chukagai Subway Station is a 5-minute walk away, while Yamashita Park and Yokohama Red Brick Warehouse are within a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Nihonodori Subway Station and a 10-minute walk from JR Kannai Train Station. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. Nightwear, slippers and toothbrush sets are provided for all guests. The en suite bathroom comes with a bathtub and a shower with adjustable water pressure. Laundry services and currency exchanges from Euro/USD dollars are available at the 24-hour front desk. Luggage storage and photocopying services are available as well. Featuring high ceilings and large glass windows, Silk Restaurant serves Japanese and Western dishes in a modern atmosphere. Kannai Yokohama JAL City Hotel is a 5-minute walk from Yokohama Stadium and Yokohama Chinatown. Sakuragicho Train Station is a 10-minute drive and Pacifico Yokohama Convention Centre is a 15-minute walk away. Airport Limousine Buses to Haneda Airport are available from Osanbashi Pier, which is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Associa Shin-Yokohama
description: Hotel Associa is located directly above Shin-Yokohama Station. The bullet train takes people to Tokyo Station in 17-minutes and to Shinagawa Station in 10-minutes. A direct bus to Haneda International Airport is a 35-minute ride. Yokohama, Nagoya and Osaka can be directly accessed from Shin-Yokohama Station. Warm and soundproof rooms made of natural materials feature modern decor and light colors with soft lighting. Floor-to-ceiling windows offer panoramic views of the city, and rooms come equipped with an LCD TV, air humidifier/purifier, a small fridge, personal locker and an en suite bathroom with a bathtub and free toiletries. All rooms feature free WiFi. The 24-hour front desk offers dry-cleaning and foreign currency exchange, as well as massage service that can be offered in guestrooms. A Japanese and Western-style buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property atrium. The Associa lounge exclusively available to staying guests offer coffee, tea, herb tea, soft drinks and various other beverages for free. Hotel Associa is located within the station building Cubic Plaza Shin-Yokohama. Guests can enjoy dining at the various restaurants located on floors 9 and 10, or enjoy shopping at stores such as Bic Camera or Uniqlo. Yokohama Arena and the Shin-Yokohama Ramen Museum are both within a 10-minute walk. Nissan Stadium is a 5-minute taxi ride away.

name: The Yokohama Bay Hotel Tokyu
description: In the heart of the Minato-Mirai area, just a minute's walk from Minato-Mirai Station, The Yokohama Bay Hotel Tokyu offers spacious rooms with a balcony, spectacular views of Minato-Mirai and free WiFi. It features 6 dining options. Concierge services are available. Rooms have a luxurious interior with floor-to-ceiling windows, a seating area and an LCD TV. Amenities include a fridge, a safe and nightwear. Guests sleep in 2 extra -long double beds. Guests at the Tokyu Bay Yokohama can unwind in the sauna or relax with a massage treatment. The hotel offers ticketing services, as well as currency exchange. Facilities include a 24-hour reception, a babysitting centre and a jewellery shop. French cuisine can be enjoyed at restaurant Queen Alice, while Japanese dishes are offered in a serene Japanese-style dining area at Oshima. The hotel also offers a café-restaurant and 2 bars. The Yokohama Bay Hotel Tokyu is located in the Queen's Square Yokohama complex, which includes a concert hall, shops and spacious gardens. It’s directly connected to Minatomirai Subway Station, and only a 30-minute drive from Haneda Airport or a 90-minute drive from Narita Airport.

name: Hotel New Grand
description: Situated right in front of Yamashita Park and looking out to the Yokohama Bay, Hotel New Grand is a renowned classic hotel with nearly a century of first-class hospitality. Motomachi-Chukagai Subway Station is just a 1-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Featuring chic ambience and large windows offering ocean or city views, rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, fridge and electric kettle. Minibar and an electric kettle are also provided. The en suite bathroom includes a bath tub and toiletries. While staying at New Grand Hotel, guests can receive massages at the aesthetic salons or purchase gift items at the Sundry Shop. Currency exchange and concierge services are offered. Luggage can be stored at the bell desk for free. Yokohama China Town is a 2-minute walk, Motomachi shopping area is a 5-minute walk away, and Osanbashi Pier is a 10-minute walk away. The lively Minato-mirai area and JR Yokohama Station are both within an 8-minute subway ride from the property. Le Normandie serves classic French cuisine in an elegant setting with antique interior. Il Giardino offers colourful Italian dishes, while delicately prepared Japanese meals can be enjoyed at Yugyo-an restaurant.

name: Hotel Yokohama Camelot Japan
description: Only a 5-minute walk from JR Yokohama Train Station, Hotel Yokohama Camelot Japan offers Western-style accommodations with free wired internet access. Massages can be requested for an extra cost. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toothbrush sets. Dry cleaning and currency exchange services are available at the 24-hour front desk and a coin-launderette is on-site. Local gifts can be purchased at the souvenir shop and laptop rentals are offered. Buffet breakfast are available daily at Ercolano. Chinese dishes are available at Tokaen restaurant. Hotel Yokohama Camelot Japan is a 15-minute drive from Yokohama Chinatown and Yamashita Park. Landmark Tower is a 5-minute drive away and the Yokohama Red Brick Warehouses are a 10-minute drive away.

name: Rose Hotel Yokohama
description: The Rose Hotel Yokohama is centrally located with the world-famous Yokohama Chinatown right outside the harbor within walking distance. One of the most convenient Yokohama hotels in the city centre, the Rose Hotel Yokohama is only 2 minutes' walk from the Minato Mirai subway line, which connects to 20-minute trains for Tokyo and Haneda Airport. Favored among gourmets, businessmen and tourists for its award-winning Chungking Restaurant, the Rose Hotel Yokohama has a great deal to offer guests. Diners can also enjoy the patisserie and cafe brasserie, while leisure facilities include an aromatherapy salon and rooftop pool. The Rose Hotel Yokohama is a wonderful choice among Yokohama hotels for weddings, with an on-site chapel, 1,000-capacity grand ballroom and a dress and kimono studio. The 184 modern twin and double rooms have been stylishly designed by renowned firm John Chan Design. To find and reserve the perfect room at the Rose Hotel Yokohama, why not look at our rates and availability?bestwestern.com

name: Narita Tobu Hotel Airport
description: Narita Tobu Hotel Airport is 10 minutes from Narita Airport via the hotel’s free shuttle. It features a fitness centre with a swimming pool, and offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Guests can also unwind in the sauna and hot tub. Note: Swimming pool (Fitness center) is closed on Monday and Tuesday. The air-conditioned rooms at Narita Tobu Hotel Airport feature contemporary furnishings and include a flat-screen TV, a fridge and an electric kettle. Each room is fitted with comfortable double beds. The attached bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel is a 10-minute bus ride away from AEON Shopping Mall and a 15-minute bus ride from Shinsho-ji Temple. JR Narita Train Station is 20 minutes away on the hotel’s free shuttle. Guests of Narita Tobu Hotel Airport can enjoy a buffet and a la carte meals including Chinese dishes at bright Oasis Restaurant, or sip an elegant drink at Compass Rose Tea & Bar Lounge.

name: Kobe Portopia Hotel
description: Offering 13 restaurants, cafes and bars and a 24-hour front desk, Kobe Portopia Hotel is conveniently located just a 5-minute walk from Shimin Hiroba Station on the Port Island Line. Free WiFi access is available throughout the property. A free shuttle service from JR Sannomiya Station and Shinkobe Station is also available. Rooms here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Rooms are equipped with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and a green tea set. En suite bathrooms come with free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bath. Portopia Hotel Kobe offers an indoor pool, a fitness centre and a tennis court. In addition, reception services such as a concierge service, currency exchange and luggage storage are also offered. A wide variety of Japanese, French, Chinese and Western cuisines are available at the many restaurants, cafes and bars on site. The Nankin-machi China Town area is a 10-minute train ride away, while Sannomiya Station is a 15-minute shuttle bus ride away. Kobe Kitano Ijinkai-gai can be accessed within a 25-minute train ride. Kansai International Airport is a 65-minute shuttle bus ride away from Sannomiya Station.

name: One Niseko Resort Towers
description: Offering 10-minute free shuttles to Niseko Moiwa Ski Resort and Annupuri International Ski Resort, One Niseko Resort Towers features spacious rooms with mountain views, a kitchenette and a balcony. It offers hot spring baths, skiing lessons and massages. Free Wi-Fi is available. Niseko Train Station a 15-minute drive away. The property is an 18-minute drive from Niseko Horse Riding Village. Guests at Resort One Niseko Towers can go rafting, rock climbing or canoeing in the area, or unwind in a soothing open-air hot spring bath shielded by trees. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk, and it provides concierge services. Luxurious rooms feature an interior in neutral colours, large windows and a living area with a sofa and a coffee table. Amenities include a flat-screen TV and a tea maker. Some rooms boast a Japanese-style seating area.

name: Jr Tower Hotel Nikko Sapporo
description: Offering direct access from JR Sapporo Train Station, JR Tower Hotel Nikko Sapporo offers accommodations with free Wi-Fi and wired internet. Guests can refresh in the hot tub and request relaxing massages for an extra cost. The hotel boasts 4 dining options, in which 2 restaurants are located on the 35th floor offering panoramic views of Sapporo city. The comfortable air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and a fridge. Guests can use the electric kettle to make green tea. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Laptop rentals and photocopying services are provided at the 24-hour front desk and a souvenir shop is available for purchasing small gifts. Luggage storage and dry cleaning services are provided as well. Guests can enjoy the public baths and various sauna rooms after a long day. Located on the 35th floor, Tancho Sky Restaurant offers Japanese dishes featuring seasonal local ingredients, while Western dishes and a spectacular night view is available at Sky J Restaurant and Bar. French cuisine is served at Mikuni Sapporo and light meals at The Lobby Lounge. Nikko Hotel Sapporo JR Tower is a 10-minute walk from Odori Park and a 20-minute walk from Sapporo Beer Museum. New Chitose Airport is a 40-minute train ride away.

name: Hotel Green With
description: Conveniently located just a 1-minute walk from lively Kokubuncho area, Hotel Green With offers compact guest rooms and property-wide WiFi. Guests can use laundry machines and tumble dryers for free, and complimentary coffee is available 24/7. Each room is simply decorated and come with facilities like a flat-screen TV and a fridge. An electric kettle and tea bags are also included. The private bathroom has a bathtub and free toiletries. Green With Hotel is a 4-minute walk from Hirosedori Subway Station and a 15-minute walk from Sendai Shinkansen (bullet train) Station. Both Rakuten Seimei Park Miyagi and Sendai Castle Park can be reached within a 15-minute drive. The hotel provides free luggage storage services at the 24-hour front desk. There are drinks vending machines on site, as well. A variety of international dishes including Japanese, Western and Chinese are on offer at the breakfast buffet, available at the restaurant on the ground floor.

name: Hotel Francs
description: Only a 3-minute walk from JR Kaihin Makuhari Train Station, Hotel Francs offers modern accommodations with free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy drinks at the BBB Lounge. Makuhari Messe is a 5-minute walk away. An airport limousine bus to and from Narita International Airport is available, and the ride takes approximately 50-minutes. The air-conditioned rooms feature carpeted floors, a satellite TV and a desk. Each includes sleepwear, a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toothbrush sets. Francs Hotel is a 30-minute drive from Tokyo Disney Resort and JR Makuhari Train Station is a 10-minute drive away. Mitsui Outlet Park Makuhari is within a 3-minute walk away. Guests can also enjoy shopping at the nearby Aeon Mall Makuhari New City, which is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Also, buses bound for Haneda International Airport depart from the north exit of Kaihin Makuhari Station. The bus ride takes approximately 50-minutes. The luggage storage is available at the 24-hour front desk. Drink and snack vending machines are on-site. A breakfast buffet is available at the lounge.

name: Hotel Springs Makuhari
description: Only a 3-minute walk from JR Kaihin Makuhari Station, Hotel Springs Makuhari boasts 4 restaurants, a bar, a seasonal outdoor pool, wedding/banquet facilities and a hot stone spa. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. Makuhari Messe is a 10-minute walk away, while Tokyo Disney Resort is a 20-minute train ride from Kaihin Makuhari Station. All the rooms at Makuhari Hotel Springs feature air conditioning/heating, free WiFi, a fridge, electric kettle and desk. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, towels and free toiletries. There is a 24-hour front desk that provides luggage storage and currency exchange services. Other services include dry cleaning, laundry, fax/photocopying and massage. Guests at Hotel Springs Makuhari can enjoy buffet dishes at Carmel and Chinese cuisine at Suiran. Genkai serves Japanese dishes, while Lounge Boulogne offers desserts and light snacks. Large shopping malls, a supermarket and a cinema are located within a 5-minute walk of Hotel Springs Makuhari. Aeon Mall Makuhari New City is a 7-minute drive away. The hotel can be accessed from Narita International Airport in 30 minutes and from Haneda International Airport in 50 minutes by limousine bus.

name: Jr Kyushu Hotel Nagasaki
description: Conveniently located to JR Nagasaki Station and Amu Plaza Nagasaki Shopping Mall, JR Kyushu Hotel Nagasaki features modern rooms with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and bathroom with bath, shower and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi is available at all areas. A relaxing massage can be arranged at an additional fee. Other guest facilities include a coin launderette and a beverage vending machine. Suwa Shrine and Heiwa Park are a 10-minute drive from JR Kyushu Hotel Nagasaki. A 45-minute drive leads to Nagasaki Airport. The hotel is located above Amu Plaza Nagasaki Shopping Mall, which offers various restaurant options.

name: Ki Niseko
description: Ki Niseko is ideally located less than 100metres from the high-speed gondola at Niseko Mt Resort Grand Hirafu. It boasts perfect ski-in ski-out access and ski storage, as well as indoor/outdoor hot spring baths. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Offering a great mountain or nature view, each room comes with a flat-screen TV, speakers, DVD player and air conditioning. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a bath tub and a hairdryer. At Ki Niseko you will find a 24-hour front desk, a hot spring bath, spa and ski/bike storage. Other facilities include a concierge desk, and a lobby bar and lounge where live music events are held. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site or in the surroundings, including skiing, golfing and hiking. The property is a 15-minute drive from JR Kutchan Station. Shin Chitose Airport is a 3-hour bus ride away.

name: Hakodate Kokusai Hotel
description: A 8-minute walk from JR Hakodate Train Station, Hakodate Kokusai Hotel's West Wing offers a coastal view, while the East Wing offers a view of Hakodate City. It features massage services and free WiFi. Guests can unwind in the natural hot spring bath with city views. Each air-conditioned room at Hakodate Kokusai Hotel includes a fridge and a private bathroom with a bathtub. All rooms have a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle with green tea bags. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel is 300 metres from Shiyakushomae Tram Station, and 500 metres from the Morning Market. Mount Hakodate Ropeway and the Motomachi area are 1.5 km away. The Kanemori Red Brick Warehouses are a 10-minute walk. Bicycles can be rented. Vuemer restaurant serves teppanyaki grill, while the Sky Lounge Le Mont Gagyu offers drinks with night views and Japanese cuisine Matsumae serves seasonal seafood. Tea Lounge Le HAVRE and Azalea Restaurant are also available, and a breakfast buffet featuring local menus can be enjoyed. Breakfast is a morning of high expectations, with original seafood bowls to choose from, steaks and omelets prepared in the lively kitchen, and much more. The hotel has a large natural hot spring bath, and there is also an outdoor bath for men. You can bathe while enjoying the night views of Hakodate.

name: Crowne Plaza - Ana Kobe
description: Step off the train at Shin-Kobe Station and into a haven of tranquility. Stunning panoramas transport you to new heights of inspiration. Experience a stay of sky high sophistication and relaxation. Stroll across the footbridge from Shin-Kobe rail station and into the spacious Lobby at ANA Crowne Plaza Kobe. Our friendly Guest Relations Manager will point you towards your modern room for views over Kobe, or to the hiking trail, Shin-Kobe Ropeway and Nunobiki Herb Garden that ascends behind the hotel. Celebrate at our 7 restaurants serving Italian, Chinese and local Japanese flavours, or upgrade to a Club room or Suite for access to the exclusive Club Lounge. ANA Crowne Plaza Kobe is only steps away from Shin-Kobe rail station where your shinkansen bullet train whizzes to Tokyo in 3 hours and Osaka in 15 minutes. It's also just 1 subway stop to downtown Kobe, where you can immerse yourself in the vibrant neon lights of this cosmopolitan city. Kobe Airport is 8km away. There's space for 2,500 people at events in our chic ballroom. Energize in the hotel's bright indoor pool and Fitness Centre. Views from the Level 36 restaurant stretch to Osaka, while seafood is lovingly prepared in Akashi. Marbled cuts of prime Kobe beef create a satisfying sizzle in our intimate Kitano teppanyaki restaurant. We aim for your stay at ANA Crowne Plaza Kobe to be equally fulfilling.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Mystays Premier Narita
description: HOTEL MYSTAYS PREMIER Narita provides a fitness centre with an indoor pool, outdoor tennis, sauna and public bath. The property offers free airport shuttle to and from Narita International Airport, 10 minutes away. On-site restaurants and a bar offers panoramic views of the city at night. Another free shuttle service is available between Narita International Airport and JR Narita Station. All soundproofed guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. All units at HOTEL MYSTAYS PREMIER Narita include air conditioning and a desk. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast featuring Western- and Japanese-style dishes. Guests can dine at Restaurant Gardenia overlooking a garden and serves breakfast buffet, Western-style lunch and dinner. Hourai serves Chinese cuisine, while Azuma serves authentic Japanese cuisine. The reception can provide advice on the area in order to help guests plan their day.

name: Urayasu Brighton Hotel Tokyo Bay
description: Located a 1-minute walk away from JR Shinurayasu Station, Urayasu Brighton Hotel Tokyo Bay offers free WiFi access in all rooms and private parking. The resort features a sauna, an indoor pool available for adults only, a bar and a variety of restaurants, ranging from Chinese to French, Italian and Japanese cuisines. Tokyo Disney Resort can be accessed by a free 15-minute shuttle-bus ride from the hotel. The property is 40-minutes by bus from Haneda International Airport, and 60-minutes by bus from Narita International Airport. Maihama Station is a 4-minute train ride away, and JR Tokyo Station is about 17-minutes by rapid-service train. Tokyo Bay Brighton Hotel features private parking space, a 24-hour front desk, a hair salon and several other stores on-site. All rooms are air-conditioned with a flat-screen TV and comes with a sofa. The en suite bathrooms feature a private bath, shower and free toiletries. A breakfast buffet is served at the Cache-cache restaurant on-site, between 07:00 to 10:00, 7 days a week. There are several other restaurants on-site, where guests can try teppanyaki, traditional Kyoto style cuisine, Chinese food and more.

name: Hilton Tokyo Narita Airport
description: The Hilton Tokyo Narita Airport hotel is centrally located near the heart of the city and just 15-20 minutes by free shuttle to Narita International Airport. Situated on the eastern side of Tokyo Bay, you can explore the scenic Boso Peninsula form this modern and luxurious hotel. Do business in the 18 meeting rooms for 5-1100 guests with WiFi access. Stay active on the jogging track and tennis courts or do laps of the indoor swimming pool. Unwind after a long day in the sauna or enjoy a meal in one of the 3 restaurants at this Narita hotel.Hilton

name: Kobe Meriken Park Oriental Hotel
description: Just a 3-minute walk from Kobe’s Meriken Park, Kobe Meriken Park Oriental Hotel features 4 dining choices. Rooms have free WiFi and a balcony with park or harbour views. Air-conditioned rooms with a satellite TV and pleasant earthy colours welcome guests at Kobe Meriken Park Oriental Hotel. Each has a private bathroom with a bathtub and slippers. Kobe Maritime Museum is a 5-minute walk from Kobe Meriken Park Oriental Hotel. JR Kobe Train Station is a 5-minute drive and Minato-Motomachi Subway Station is a 10-minute walk away. A free daily shuttle goes to JR Sannomiya Train Station. Shuttles from Shin-Kobe Train Station to the property are also available on weekends and holidays. The 14th-floor Oriental Steak House offers Kobe skyline views. Other options include Chinese and Western cuisine, buffet dining and the top-floor View Bar.

name: Watermark Hotel Nagasaki, Huis Ten Bosch
description: Situated within Huis Ten Bosch Theme Park, the classically European Watermark Hotel boasts views of Omura Bay, 2 restaurants and a bar. The spacious rooms have free WiFi and wired internet access. Rooms at Hotel Denhaag Bosch have warm lighting and wood furniture. Each includes a seating area and an en suite bathroom with bathtub. For entertainment, English-language cable channels are available on the flat-screen TV. The hotel is 2 km from Huis Ten Bosch Station, and a 15-minute drive from Saikaibashi Bridge. Nagasaki International Airport is a 50-minute drive away. Free on-site parking is available for guests staying at the Watermark Hotel.

name: JR Kyushu Hotel Kagoshima
description: Directly connected to JR Kagoshima Chuo Shinkansen (bullet train) Station, JR Kyushu Hotel Kagoshima offers modern guest rooms with free Wi-Fi in 2 separate towers. Local Kagoshima cuisine can be savoured at the on-site restaurant. All rooms at JR Kyushu Hotel feature an LCD TV, air conditioning, air purifier and a small fridge. A hairdryer and toiletries are included in the en suite bathroom. Free luggage storage services are offered at the front desk. In-room massages and dry-cleanings can be arranged. There are also coin laundrettes and free-use internet PCs on site. Ekitei Satsuma restaurant serves traditional Kagoshima specialties, as well as other Japanese dishes. A hearty breakfast buffet is also offered there. Guests can reach Sakurajima in 30 minutes by bus and ferry. The hotel is a 7-minute drive from Terukuni Shrine, and a 13-minute drive from Senganen Garden. Kagoshima Aquarium is a 6-minute drive away. Kagoshima Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Associa Shizuoka
description: Boasting a 15th-floor Italian restaurant, massage services and a spa, Hotel Associa is right next to JR Shizuoka Train Station. Rooms offer free wired internet, video-on-demand movies and a minibar. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Associa Shizuoka feature wood furnishings and a flat-screen satellite TV. The en suite bathroom includes a bathtub and hairdryer. Shizuoka Sengen-jinja Shrine and the Toro Iseki Village Ruins are a 10-minute drive away. Sunpu Park is a 15-minute walk. Shizuoka Prefectural Office is 1 km away, and has a free 21st-floor observation deck with Mount Fuji views. KYOTO TSURUYA Restaurant serves Kyoto-style Japanese specialities, and Lin-Ka offers a Chinese menu. Seafood and meat are freshly grilled before your eyes at Nakotei Teppanyaki. Pergola has coffee and light meals, while Estmare Bar offers drinks and top-floor views.

name: Sheraton Grand Hiroshima Hotel
description: Stay where all of Japan comes together at Sheraton Grand Hiroshima Hotel. Situated next to JR Hiroshima Station with direct access to the bullet train and bus terminals, our hotel is ideal for business trips, sightseeing visits and family stays. Stay in luxury as you explore Hiroshima's historic sites and architecture. Find total comfort in our 238 guest rooms, including five suites all of which feature the Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience. Guests staying in premium Club Rooms are welcome at the Club Lounge, offering breakfast, soft drinks and cocktails. Our hotel’s restaurants feature the finest and freshest cuisine and our bar is a great place to gather with friends both old and new.Marriott

name: Hotel Global View Hakodate
description: Boasting a hot spring bath, Hotel Global View Hakodate is a 10-minute walk away from JR Hakodate Train Station. Guests can relax in the sauna and enjoy massage treatments. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. The Hakodate Morning Fish Market, famous for selling fresh local delights, is just a 4-minute drive while the Goryokaku Fort can be reached with a 13-minute drive. The hotel is a 20-minute drive from Hakodate Airport and a 30-minute drive from Hakodate Ferry Terminal. Each air-conditioned room includes a fridge, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Hakodate Hotel Paco has a 24-hour front desk and offers dry cleaning, photocopying service and parking at an additional charge. A trouser press can be rented for free upon request. Guests can purchase drinks from the vending machine. The on-site restaurant Shun serves a Japanese-style buffet-style breakfast. Meals are prepared using fresh local ingredients. 旧ホテルパコ函館（Hotel Paco Hakodate)

name: Apa Hotel Ikebukuro Eki Kitaguchi
description: APA Ikebukuro Kitaguchi is situated a 4-minute walk from JR Ikebukuro Station and provides modern rooms and free Wi-Fi throughout the premises. It has a restaurant and massage services, as well as coin-operated laundry machines. The hotel is a 10-minute drive from Sunshine City. Ginza Station is about 12 km away from Ikebukuro Kitaguchi APA Hotel. Each elegant room features an original mattress optimising weight distribution, warm lighting and fine furnishings. They are equipped with a fridge, toiletries and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. Restaurant Kohaku serves breakfast and lunch daily. The hotel provides vending machines on site for guests’ convenience. Other facilities at APA Hotel include luggage storage at the 24-hour front desk.

name: Seaside Hotel Maiko Villa Kobe
description: Located in Bay Area, Seaside Hotel Maiko Villa Kobe is a perfect starting point from which to explore Kobe. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, chapel, daily housekeeping, wheelchair accessible, shrine are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary tea, mirror, slippers, sofa. Take a break from a long day and make use of outdoor pool, spa, massage, garden. Discover all Kobe has to offer by making Seaside Hotel Maiko Villa Kobe your base.priceline.com

name: Miyako Hotel Hakata
description: Open from September 2019, only 150 metres from JR Hakata Train Station, Miyako Hotel Hakata offers stylish rooms with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The famous Nanzoin Temple is a 30-minute train ride away. The air-conditioned rooms at Miyako Hotel Hakata come with pyjamas and slippers. Guests can relax in the bathtub or watch a pay TV programme. Miyako Hotel Hakata is a 3-minute walk from the popular electronic megastore Yodobashi Hakata, and it is a 15-minute walk from Tocho-ji Temple. The Tenjin area is a 5-minute subway ride from nearby Hakata Station, and Fukuoka Airport is just a 5-minute subway ride away. Fukuoka Castle is 5.5 km away, and the lively Nakasu area is 2.5 km from the property. A bar and cafe lounge are also on site.

name: Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono
description: Set in Niseko, 12 km from Hirafu Station, Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests also enjoy access to the indoor pool and fitness centre, as well as the sauna and hot tub. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms also offer a kitchen with a dishwasher, an oven and a microwave. All guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes continental, American and Asian options. At Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono you will find a restaurant serving Cantonese, French and Japanese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. At the accommodation guests are welcome to take advantage of a hot spring bath. Ski equipment hire and bike hire are available at Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono and the area is popular for skiing and cycling. Speaking Mandarin, German, English and French, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Kutchan Station is 5.7 km from the hotel, while Niseko Annupuri Hot Spring is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Okadama, 97 km from Park Hyatt Niseko Hanazono, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Country Hotel Takayama
description: Country Hotel Takayama enjoys a convenient location just across the street from JR Takayama Train Station. Offering a ground-floor 24-hour convenience store, it provides free WiFi in all areas. Rooms also come with free wired internet, and a yukata robe for each guest. On-site private parking is offered at an additional charge, on a first-come-first-served basis. The air-conditioned rooms at Takayama Country Hotel are compact and simply furnished. Each room includes a fridge and an electric kettle with green tea, and the en suite bathroom has a bathtub with a shower attachment. Slippers and a hairdryer are provided. Old Town, Takayama Jinya and the morning market is an 8-minute walk from the property. Hida No Sato Folk Village is just a 10-minute bus ride away. The bus terminal for Shirakawago Village is within a 1-minute walk from the hotel. You can unwind with a massage, or try out the coin-operated massage chair. The hotel has a coin-operated launderette and an internet corner, and the 24-hour reception lends out trouser presses.

name: Dormy Inn Kanazawa Natural Hot Spring
description: Dormy Inn Kanazawa is located in front of Kanazawa Station, a 2-minute walk from JR Kanazawa Station. It offers modern accommodation with an open-air bath, a natural hot-spring bath on the top floor, sauna facilities and free WiFi throughout the area. Guestrooms offer both air-conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Sauna and massage services are available at the property. There is a coin-operated laundrette for guests’ convenience. Complimentary coffee is available at the lobby between 15:00-21:00. The on-site restaurant serves Japanese dishes for breakfast. Free Ramen noodles are served between 21:30-23:00. Kanazawa Dormy Inn is a 40-minute drive from Komatsu Airport. Kenroku-en Garden, Kanazawa Castle and Myoruji Temple are all a 20-minute bus ride away.

name: Hotel Pacific View
description: Situated in Okinawa City, 6 km from Nakagusuku Castle, HOTEL PACIFIC VIEW（ホテルパシフィックビュー） features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is set 13 km from Yakena Bus terminal, 16 km from Zakimi Gusuku Castle and 20 km from Maeda Cape. The property is non-smoking and is located 10 km from Katsuren Castle. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and a hairdryer, all rooms at HOTEL PACIFIC VIEW（ホテルパシフィックビュー） have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also boast a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Tamaudun Mausoleum is 20 km from HOTEL PACIFIC VIEW（ホテルパシフィックビュー）, while Onna-son Community Center is 27 km from the property. The nearest airport is Naha Airport, 24 km from the hotel.

name: The Westin Sendai
description: Set on 28-36th floors of Sendai's tallest building, The Westin Sendai offers a luxurious accommodation just a 10-minute walk from JR Sendai Station. Guests can work out in the free-use gym or receive rejuvenating massages at the on-site salon. 2 restaurants and a bar are available on site. Wi-Fi is provided at an additional charge. Fitted with chic furnishings and floor-to-ceiling windows, rooms come with modern facilities like satellite LCD TV. A fridge, an electric kettle and minibar are included. The large en suite bathroom has a bath tub, a shower booth and free toiletries. Sendai Westin Hotel’s 24-hour front desk can arrange luggage storage and laundry services. The Flow Spa offers a variety of treatments, sauna and a relaxation lounge. Souvenir items can be purchased at the gift shop. Stylish Restaurant Symphony serves sophisticated Western cuisine, while traditional Japanese dishes can be savoured at Ichimuan restaurant, which is located on the top floor. Horizon Lounge & Bar offers afternoon tea, light meals and evening drinks. The Westin Hotel is a 10-minute drive to Rakuten Kobo Stadium Miyagi (formerly Kleenex Stadium Miyagi), and a 20-minute drive to Aoba Castle Park. Sendai Airport is located a 50-minute drive from the property.

name: Kanazawa Hakuchoro Hotel Sanraku
description: Conveniently situated right next to Kanazawa Castle Park and a 5-minute walk to Kenrokuen Garden, Kanazawa Hakuchoro Hotel Sanraku features a hot spring bath, meeting and banquet facilities, a Japanese restaurant and a tea lounge. There is free Wi-Fi in all areas. The air-conditioned rooms all come with a flat-screen TV, refrigerator and complimentary bottle of water. Each private bathroom is equipped with a bath, shower and hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a Japanese buffet breakfast. At Mahoroba, Japanese dishes including local cuisines and traditional multi-course meals are served. There are also 2 tea lounges. Kanazawa Hakuchoro is located 10 minutes’ walk from the Higashi Chaya Gai District. The JR Kanazawa Station is 10 minutes’ drive away and Komatsu Airport is a 40-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Tabino Hotel Hida - Takayama
description: Opened on May 2018, providing free WiFi, TABINO HOTEL Hida Takayama offers warmly-decorated wooden rooms in Takayama, 5 km from Hida Minzoku Mura Folk Village and 2 km from Sakurayama Hachiman Shrine. Attractively located in the Hida Takayama Onsen district, the property is located 2.1 km from Lion Dance Ceremony Exhibition Hall and 2.1 km from Takayama Festival Float Exhibition Hall. The property has a restaurant. The rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Every room has a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. At TABINO HOTEL Hida Takayama the rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. The accommodation offers a spa centre. Museum of Local History is 2.2 km from TABINO HOTEL Hida Takayama. The nearest airport is Matsumoto, 57 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel La Suite Kobe Harborland
description: Located at the waterfront of Kobe Harborland, Hotel La Suite offers spacious rooms with ocean views and a spa bath. It features concierge service, a French restaurant and massage treatments. Free Wi-Fi/wired internet and free videos on demand are available in the rooms. This hotel was selected as one of Top 25 Hotels in Japan by TripAdvisor's Travelers' Choice Award 2013. Luxurious rooms come with a large flat-screen TV, a DVD player and extra long beds. Bathrooms have a TV and a hot tub, some with sea views. Amenities include a bathrobe, a humidifier with aroma diffuser and Phytomer brand bath salt. Guests at La Suite Kobe can lounge on comfortable sofas on the rooftop terrace. The hotel offers laundry and baby-sitting services. Bicycle and laptop rentals are available, and a free internet-PC is provided at the lobby. Creative French cuisine is presented in a decor of soft carpeting and wide windows at restaurant Le Coeur, while cafe Grand Blue serves a wide range of drinks and light meals. Restaurant Kokoro offers contemporary Japanese cooking inspired on traditional dishes. Hotel La Suite Kobe Harborland is a 4-minute walk from Minato-Motomachi Station. It's only a 3-minute walk from Kobe Tower, and a 6-minute stroll from Meriken Park. Kobe Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

name: Okayama Koraku Hotel
description: Just a 5-minute walk from JR Okayama Train Station, Okayama Koraku Hotel offers modern rooms with free wired internet and a flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy massages and free-use bicycles. This hotel was selected as one of the Top Romance Hotels in Japan by TripAdvisor's Travelers' Choice Award 2015. The air-conditioned rooms at Koraku Hotel include a private bathroom with bathtub and amenities. Slippers, a fridge and a seating area are provided. Each room has a humidifier. Nishigawa Ryokudo Koen Tram Station is just a 1-minute walk from the hotel. Okayama Castle is 1.5 km away, and Okayama Koraku-en Garden is about a 15-minute walk away. The 24-hour reception offers luggage storage. A free-use microwave and coin-operated launderette are provided. TOMOE Restaurant offers a buffet-style breakfast featuring Japanese and Western dishes from 06:30-10:00.

name: En Hotel Hakata
description: Only a 7-minute walk from Hakata Station, EN HOTEL Hakata offers rooms with free WiFi, a restaurant and massage treatments. Coin-operated laundry facilities are available. Rooms at EN HOTEL Hakata feature a simple yet comfortable decor. They are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a refrigerator and a private bathroom(unit bath). The restaurant serves set menu of pancake. Luggage storage service is available at the front desk. EN HOTEL Hakata is just a 2-minute walk from entertainment complex Canal City Hakata.

name: Hida Hotel Plaza
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Takayama Station, Hida Hotel Plaza boasts a rooftop spa with mountain views, a heated swimming pool and 7 dining options. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Guests at spa hotel Hida Plaza can recline in spacious indoor and outdoor hot spring baths, a hot tub and a mist sauna. The hotel offers massages, karaoke, and bicycle rental. Hida Plaza’s rooms are elegantly furnished, featuring either a Western or a traditional Japanese decor. Amenities include a plasma TV, a personal safe and a refrigerator. Japanese Restaurant Takumi-Chaya serves delicious local breakfasts and dinners. Plaza Hotel also houses a French Restaurant, a Chinese Restaurant and a night pub. Hida Hotel Plaza is a 13-minute walk from the historical Old Private Houses, and a 20-minute walk from Higashiyama Temple. Hida Folk Village and Hikaru Muserum are a 10-minute drive away, while Miyagawa Morning Market is a 5-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Concerto Nagasaki
description: Set in Nagasaki, Hotel Concerto Nagasaki provides free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Nagasaki Atomic Bomb Museum and Peace Park. The hotel will provide guests with a microwave, a fridge, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and Blu-ray player. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom with a hair dryer, while some feature city views. Guest rooms at Hotel Concerto Nagasaki have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation offers a Japanese-style set meal for breakfast along with buffet of salads, fruits, and soft drinks. Hotel Concerto Nagasaki can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. Nagasaki Museum of History is 3.6 km from the hotel, while Urakami Cathedral is 1.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Nagasaki Airport, 38 km from Hotel Concerto Nagasaki.

name: Sasebo Washington Hotel
description: A 3-minute walk from JR Sasebo Train Station, Sasebo Washington Hotel offers Western-style rooms with both free Wi-Fi and free wired internet. It has a computer corner at the lobby, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Fitted with heating and air conditioning, all rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and an electric kettle. Private bathrooms all come with a bathtub, as well as a hairdryer and slippers. Sasebo Washington Hotel is a 2-minute drive from Sasebo-Minato IC (interchange) and a 17-minute drive from Kujuku Island. It is a 20-minute drive from Huis Ten Bosch theme park and Yumiharidake Observatory Tower. Guests can relax with a massage, or simply take a stroll around the area to enjoy the sights. The hotel also provides laundry services, luggage storage and a drinks vending machine. Presenting calming man-made waterfalls and fish ponds, Bonjour Cafe & Restaurant serves buffet spreads for breakfast. Fresh seafood prepared in a Japanese style can be enjoyed at Sakuragawa Restaurant.

name: Hida Takayama Washington Hotel Plaza
description: Right across from JR Takayama Station, Hida Takayama Washington Hotel Plaza provides basic rooms with free WiFi in the heart of the city. Facilities include internet PCs and drinks vending machines, while an in-room massage can be arranged. Guests at the Washington Plaza can borrow an air humidifier or a trouser press for in-room use (a limited number are available), or rent a laptop PC. The front desk is staffed 24 hours, and offers laundry and shipping services. Compact rooms decorated in light, neutral colours feature air conditioning, an LCD TV and an electric kettle. In addition, they have a fridge and a desk. A Japanese breakfast is offered at restaurant Roen, between 07:00 and 09:30. From the Hida Takayama Washington Hotel Plaza it's a 10-minute walk to the well-known Miyagawa and Jinya-mae morning markets. The historical Sanmachi-Suji (Furui Machinami) is just an 11-minute walk away.

name: Ana Crowne Plaza Narita, An IHG Hotel
description: ANA Crowne Plaza Hotel Narita is conveniently located just 10 minutes from Narita International Airport, one of Japan’s gateway to the world, and 5 minutes from the expressway, providing convenient access to both domestic and international destinations. Located nearby are Naritasan Shinshoji Temple, one of the Kanto Three Great Acala, as well as golf courses and other leisure facilities. Contemporary and relaxing. ANA Crowne Plaza Narita offers 390 comfortable guest rooms overlooking Narita Airport or the lush countryside of Narita, 3 onsite restaurants that serves an array of local and international dishes and 5 multi-purpose halls that can accommodate up to 500 guests, perfect for the modern traveler. Relax and recharge. The hotel offers a wide range of recreational facilities, including a swimming pool, fitness center, sauna, and massage services to help you relax after a long day.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Urban Hotel Kyoto Shijo Premium
description: Conveniently situated in Kyoto, Urban Hotel Kyoto Shijo Premium provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. Situated conveniently in the Shimogyo Ward district, this hotel offers a spa and wellness centre, as well as a sauna. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Urban Hotel Kyoto Shijo Premium each room comes with bed linen and towels. With staff speaking English and Japanese, guidance is available at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Kyoto Shigaku Kaikan Conference Hall, Kyoto International Manga Museum and Gion Shijo Station. The nearest airport is Itami Airport, 44 km from Urban Hotel Kyoto Shijo Premium.

name: Nishitetsu Grand Hotel
description: A 3-minute walk from Tenjin Station, the majestic Nishitetsu Grand Hotel offers 8 different dining options, a concierge and massage treatments. It features comfortable rooms, free WiFi and a bakery that sells freshly baked pastries. Compact rooms are decorated in neutral colours, and furnished with an LCD TV with satellite channels, green tea and a minibar with beer and soft drinks. Free toiletries are supplied in the bathroom. The Grand Nishitetsu has a 24-hour front desk, which offers safety deposit of valuables, dry cleaning services and currency exchange. French restaurant La Cascade offers a cosy, dimly lit setting with views of a waterfall fountain. Japanese cuisine can be enjoyed in an authentic Japanese decor at restaurant Matsukaze. Nishitetsu Grand Hotel is a 15-minute walk from entertainment district Nakasu, and a 7-minute drive from Ohori Park. Hakata Station is a 10-minute drive away, and to Fukuoka Airport it takes 20 minute by car.

name: Hilton Tokyo Bay
description: Enjoy panoramic ocean views from Hilton Tokyo Bay, the official hotel of Tokyo Disney Resort®. The iconic, crescent-shaped hotel is situated on the eastern shore of Tokyo Bay and is just 20 minutes from Tokyo Station. Enjoy a great family day out at the nearby Tokyo Disneyland® and Tokyo DisneySea®. Soak up the Japanese culture with a visit to the Imperial Palace or Asakusa. Spend the afternoon window shopping at downtown Ginza, Mitsui Outlet Park at Makuhari or one of Tokyo's largest malls, LaLaPort Tokyo Bay - destinations that are sure to delight all shoppers. In the evening, relax and enjoy Shanghai specialties at Dynasty restaurant, one of this Tokyo Bay hotel’s five restaurants and bars. Stay in one of the uniquely styled Tokyo Bay guest rooms. Enjoy the magical fantasy experience at Happy Magic Room or celebrate special occasions at our celebrio rooms. Our 16 elegant function rooms, which overlook the breathtaking Tokyo Bay, are modern and accommodate up to 1,400 guests. Hilton Tokyo Bay is the ideal choice for your next conference, meeting, corporate or wedding event.Hilton

name: Hotel New Otani Tokyo Garden Tower
description: Conveniently located just a 5-minute walk from Akasaka Mitsuke Subway Station, The Hotel New Otani Tokyo Garden Tower features a 400-year-old Japanese garden. In summer, guests can take a dip in one of the largest outdoor hotel pools in the city. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Spacious guest rooms provide all basic facilities during the stay, including a fridge and an electric kettle. Rooms are air conditioned. The New Otani Hotel Garden Tower has a wide variety of international restaurants. Bella Vista offers authentic Italian dishes as well as the Tokyo skyline view from the 40th floor. Kyubey, located on the lobby floor, offers a selection of fine sushi. The hotel provides various services like room service, a concierge desk and a currency exchange machine. The 24-hour front desk offers luggage storage for free. A gym facility is also on site. Nagatacho Subway Station is a 5-minute walk from the property. The Imperial Palace is a 10-mintue drive away.

name: Apa Hotel Kobe-Sannomiya
description: Just a 3-minute walk from JR Sannomiya Station and Sannomiya-Hanadokeimae Station, APA Hotel Kobe-Sannomiya features well-equipped rooms and free WiFi throughout the premises. It provides massage services and a coffee shop. The hotel is situated a 2-minute walk from Hanshin Sannomiya Station, while Kitano Ijinkan-gai is about a 15-minute walk away. It takes 15 minutes by train to Kobe City Oji Zoo and 20 minutes to Mosaic Garden. The rooms at Kobe-Sannomiya APA Hotel feature a fridge, a flat-screen TV and tea/coffee making facilities. An original mattress optimising weight distribution is provided in each room. They have an en suite bathroom equipped with a bathtub, a hairdryer and toiletries. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast daily at Seattles Best Coffee. It serves a selection of Western food. There are also vending machines on site.

name: Apa Hotel Kagoshima Chuo-Ekimae
description: APA Hotel Kagoshima Chuo-Ekimae offers free Wi-Fi and a bar and restaurant. Guests can unwind after a day of sightseeing with a relaxing massage. All air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a fridge and a desk. The bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, free toiletries, a yukata robe and slippers. A buffet breakfast is served daily at Kitchen Itsuki. Hotel Kagoshima Chuo-Ekimae is a 5-minute walk from the city centre and its attractions including Kagoshima City Museum of Art, Reimeikan and Museum of the Meiji Restoration.

name: Hotel Route Inn Takamatsu Yashima
description: Located in Takamatsu, within 3.2 km of Takamatsu Heike Monogatari Historical Museum and 3.2 km of Cormorant Shrine, Hotel Route Inn Takamatsu Yashima provides accommodation with a restaurant and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage space. Naritasanshodaiji Temple is 4 km from the hotel and Shiraha Shrine is 4.3 km away. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. At the hotel each room has bed linen and towels. Hotel Route Inn Takamatsu Yashima offers a spa centre. Asahi Green Park is 3.5 km from the accommodation, while Yakurishion Christ Church is 3.7 km away. The nearest airport is Takamatsu Airport, 21 km from Hotel Route Inn Takamatsu Yashima.

name: Dormy Inn Toyama Natural Hot Spring
description: Located at the heart of Toyama City, Dormy Inn Toyama Natural Hot Spring offers modern rooms with free WiFi and a public bath. JR Toyama Train Station is a 15-minute walk away. Complimentary welcome drinks are offered. Air-conditioned rooms at Dormy Inn Toyama Natural Hot Spring have a TV, refrigerator and private bathroom with shower. Hatago restaurant serves a breakfast buffet daily, and also offers free noodles between 21:30 and 23:00. Coin-operated laundry machines are also available. Toyama Castle is just a short 5-minute stroll away from Dormy Inn Toyama Natural Hot Spring. Fugan Canal Park is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Monterey Sendai
description: Located in central Sendai just a 3-minute walk from JR Sendai Train Station, Hotel Monterey Sendai features free broadband internet, 3 dining options and a spa with natural hot springs. The stylish guest rooms at Sendai Hotel Monterey boast a classic European decor, with antique furniture and wood floors. Guests can watch satellite channels on the flat-screen TV while enjoying a drink from the minibar. Spa Sala Terrena makes it easy to unwind with a range of face and body treatments. Laundry and dry-cleaning services are also available at the Sendai Monterey. Zuientei Restaurant serves Japanese specialities in a relaxed atmosphere. French cuisine is featured at Escale, and a Chinese restaurant is also located within the hotel. Sendai City War Reconstruction Memorial Hall is about 1.5 km from the hotel. Tohoku Gakuin University is 1 km away.

name: Hakone Yutowa
description: Situated in Hakone, 500 metres from Hakone Gora Park, Hakone Yutowa features accommodation with a restaurant, free private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is set 600 metres from Hakone Open-Air Museum, 5 km from Pola Museum and 5 km from Venetian Glass Museum. The property has a hot spring bath, free WiFi throughout the property and a 24-hour front desk. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the hotel. Guests can enjoy a 24-hour complimentary beverage service in the lounge. Owakudani Valley is 6 km from Hakone Yutowa, while Hakone Lalique Museum is 7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Oshima Airport, 82 km from the accommodation.

name: Kagoshima Sun Royal Hotel
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Kagoshima City South, Kagoshima Sun Royal Hotel promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, chapel, wheelchair accessible, 24-hour front desk, facilities for disabled guests are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including sauna, hot spring bath, spa, massage, steamroom. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Kagoshima, Kagoshima Sun Royal Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Richmond Hotel Aomori
description: A 15-minute walk from JR Aomori Train Station, Richmond Hotel Aomori features rooms with VOD channels and free Wi-Fi. Guests can request relaxing massages for an extra cost and use the on-site coin launderette. Rooms come with air conditioning/heating facilities, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. Featuring a shower, private bathrooms also come with a bath and free toiletries. A fridge and an electric kettle with green tea bags are included in each as room as well. An air purifier and humidifier is provided in each room. The 24-hour front desk offers luggage storage, photocopying services and concierge services. Drinks vending machines are on site and guests can use the shared microwave. The property offers children's amenities including slippers and toothbrushes. A Japanese and Western-style breakfast buffet including local specialities is served at Sky Dining Brillianterrace. Aomori Richmond Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Sannai Maruyama Site and Aomori Museum of Art. Aomori Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Apa Hotel Kokura-Ekimae
description: Conveniently located a 2-minute walk from Kokura Shinkansen (bullet train) Station, APA Hotel Kokura Ekimae features compact guestrooms with stylish décor and free WiFi. Each room comes with comfortable beds and facilities like a flat-screen TV with video-on-demand programmes. A fridge and an electric kettle are also included. The en suite bathroom features a bath tub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. All rooms are equipped with centrally-controlled air conditioning. Guests at Kokura Ekimae APA Hotel can request to receive in-room massages for a fee. The front desk is open 24 hours, and luggage storage services are available. Kokura Castle is an 8-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Vessel Hotel Campana Okinawa
description: Located right in front of Sunset Beach, Vessel Hotel Campana Okinawa boasts spacious guest rooms with a balcony and large public baths that overlook clear-blue ocean. It is situated next to the lively American Village complex. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Each bright room is fitted with large windows and a balcony. A flat-screen TV with channels such as CNN and KBC, a fridge and an electric kettle are provided. The en suite bathroom comes with a bath tub, a hairdryer and free toiletries. The 24-hour front desk at Campana Vessel Hotel offers free luggage storage services. Friendly staff can also arrange in-room massages and dry cleaning services. Bicycles can be rented to guests who want to explore the area on their own. Complimentary drinks are offered between 14:00 and 20:00 at the lobby. Children's amenities are available at the front desk free of charge. The hotel is a 40-minute drive from Naha Airport, and direct airport limousine buses are available to/from the hotel at an extra fee. Bokunen Art Museum is a minute's walk from the property, and Carnival Park Mihama is a 5-minute walk away. The Vessel Hotel serves a hearty breakfast buffet at the dining lounge every morning. It includes local Okinawa specialities and freshly baked bread.

name: Loisir Spa Tower Naha
description: Featuring 2 pools, a spa with hot springs, and 3 dining options, Loisir Tower is a 30-minute walk from Kokusai Dori. It offers rooms with a balcony, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. Colourful, air-conditioned rooms come with floor-to-ceiling windows, city or bay views and a seating area. They are fitted with an LCD TV, a fridge and a safety deposit box. A tea/coffee maker is provided. Guests can enjoy the only hot spring baths in Naha, relax with a massage, or unwind in the sauna. The spa hotel houses a launderette and a souvenir shop. Fitness centre is available. A buffet breakfast featuring local specialities is served at the on-site restaurant Fontaine. Guests can enjoy BBQ by the pool at Papillon. The bar Planete offers panoramic city views. Spa Tower Loisir is a 20-minute drive from World Heritage Site Shurijo Castle, and a 50-minute drive from Himeyuri Heiwa Kinen Museum. Naha Airport is just a 10-minute drive away.

name: The Knot Tokyo Shinjuku
description: Open from August 2018, Hotel The Knot Tokyo Shinjuku provides accommodation in Tokyo. 1.8 km from Meiji Jingu Shrine. Guests can enjoy city views. The units come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle and a desk. Rooms come with a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries. All units will provide guests with a fridge. Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden is 2 km from Hotel The Knot Tokyo Shinjuku, while NHK Studio Park is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Tokyo Haneda International Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Okura Kobe
description: Hotel Okura Kobe is located on the waterfront, 500 metres from the Motomachi shopping area. Featuring Western-style rooms with free WiFi access, the hotel offers 6 dining options. Guest rooms offer both air conditioning and heating facilities. Each room is equipped with a fridge and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The en suite bathroom comes with a hairdryer and a bathtub. Guests can request air-purifiers for in-room use. Guests can work out at the fitness centre, the indoor pool or unwind in the sauna rooms at a surcharge. The hotel also has a seasonal outdoor pool and a tennis court. Laundry and dry cleaning services are available. Overlooking a Japanese garden, restaurant Yamazato serves regional specialities. Other restaurants offer French cuisines, Western and Chinese food. Hotel Okura Kobe offers a free shuttle service from Sannomiya Station. The hotel is adjacent to Meriken Park and Kobe Port Tower, and a 5-minute walk from Chinatown.

name: Hotel New Otani Makuhari
description: Located within a 5-minute walking distance from JR Kaihinmakuhari Train Station, Hotel New Otani Makuhari offers guests the luxury of choosing from 10 restaurants to dine at and a variety of outdoor and indoor activities. The hotel is situated just next to the Makuhari Messe and the Tokyo Disney Resort is a 20-minute train ride away. Carpeted rooms feature a flat-screen TV, air conditioning/heating and an en suite bathroom. Rooms also come with a refrigerator, an electric kettle and free toiletries. Guests can relax in the seating area and enjoy the view of Tokyo Bay or of Chiba City. At Hotel Makuhari New Otani, guests can access the indoor pool, spa and fitness centre at a cost. At a surcharge, guests can also enjoy the sauna, get a relaxing massage or break a sweat playing tennis. A 24-hour front desk and a gift shop can be found on site as well. Guests can dine at the All-Day Dining Satsuki, the Chinese Restaurant Taikanen or get a taste of Teppanyaki at Keyaki or Keyaki Sky Salon. Guests can also feast at one of the 3 authentic Japanese restaurants Senbazuru, Isshin or Sazanka. The Lounge Café or Bay Court Café and the Patisserie Satsuki are also open for light meals and desserts. Narita International Airport is 40-minutes by limousine bus and Haneda International Airport can be reached with a 70-minute bus ride. Guests can also access the Odaiba shopping malls within a 45-minute train ride from the hotel. In addition, Aeon Mall Makuhari New City is a 6-minute drive or 13-minutes by train and walk.

name: Daikokuya Ryokan
description: No description found

name: Novotel Mumbai International Airport
description: The property is a contemporary edifice that provides an ideal combination of comfort, convenience and magnificence, situated close to Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport. The property features 268 well-appointed rooms and suites and the magnificent event and meeting rooms that span 16,500 sq. ft. Enjoy our progressive take on popular global and local cuisines at Gourmet Bar and Inventive Buffet Meals at Food Exchange.accorhotels.com

name: Fairfield by Marriott Mumbai International Airport
address: Plot No. 16-B Samhita Industrial Estate Andheri – Kurla Road, Mumbai 400 072
description: Explore the Central Business District of Mumbai, India, from Fairfield Mumbai International Airport. Our Mumbai, India hotel seamlessly connects you to key business and commercial offices on the Andheri Kurla Road, SEEPZ. Our hotel near Mumbai Airport is flanked on one side by the Bombay Exhibition Centre and Jio Convention Centre on the other, offering direct access to the Western Express Highway and Powai. Stay near Siddhivinayak Temple, Juhu Beach with short drives to Gateway of India and Victoria Terminus. Within easy reach of Bandra West, the entertainment hub of Mumbai known for signature restaurants and bustling nightlife, we offer our own on-site dining to match. Hotel amenities range from a rooftop infinity pool and 24 hour fitness center to event venues with state-of-the-art AV equipment. Land at Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and recharge in a matter of minutes from hotel rooms with plush beds, cotton linens and LED TVs. Enjoy a seamless stay at Fairfield Mumbai International Airport.Marriott

name: Itc Grand Central, A Luxury Collection Hotel, Mumbai
description: ITC Grand Central expresses its character through a fine blend of Raj era and contemporary design.With elegantly appointed rooms and luxury suites, guests enjoy a panoramic view of Mumbai and the sea. Nestled in our skyzone floors are the spacious Executive club,ITC ONE and The Towers Rooms,offering the finest in-room facilities and services through a highly trained team of dedicated butlers,with daily complimentary breakfast, tea, coffee, refreshments and cocktail hour, select guests have access to ‘Point of View’, the rooftop premium lounge reserved exclusively for in-house guests. This warm,split-level lounge offers a luxuriant retreat with a breathtaking 360-degree view of the city. Kaya Kalp –The Spa consists of treatment rooms, an indoor swimming pool, a gym and salon. The Executive Club rooms pioneer a tradition of corporate hospitality, and the specially designed EVA rooms cater to the needs of the single lady traveller. The Hotel houses 2 speciality restaurants,a 24*7 Coffee Shop and a BarMarriott

name: Taj The Trees, Mumbai
description: Located in Mumbai, 6.2 km from Phoenix Market City Mall, Taj The Trees, Mumbai provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a bar, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. All units will provide guests with a minibar. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the hotel. Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay is 8.1 km from Taj The Trees, Mumbai, while Powai Lake is 8.3 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Bawa Continental
address: Cts 891,Opp. Theosophical Society,Juhu Tara RD, Mumbai
description: Just 200 metres from famous Juhu Beach, Hotel Bawa Continental overlooks scenic waters of the Arabian Sea. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and in-room massage services. Hotel Bawa features rooms with warm wood furnishings. They are equipped with satellite TV, a work desk and seating area. The hotel provides a 24-hour front desk service and multilingual staff. Room service is available round-the-clock. A Starbucks is also present on the premises. Coffee and light snacks are available at the coffee shop. Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus is situated 5 km from Hotel Bawa Continental. Mumbai International and Domestic Airports are a 20-minute drive away.

name: Marriott Executive Apartments Navi Mumbai
address: D-33, Turbhe Midc Rd, Ttc Industrial Area, MIDC Industrial Area, Turbhe, Mumbai 400 705
description: Whether you're an expatriate, business traveler or resident seeking extended-stay accommodations, Marriott Executive Apartments Navi Mumbai is the perfect blend of residential-style luxury and hotel service. Overlooking the skyline and ocean, our serviced apartments offer a stunning setting for business and leisure travellers in Navi Mumbai Maharashtra. Choose from a diverse range of accommodations, from spacious rooms to studios and expansive one- and two-bedroom apartments with plush amenities and upscale décor. For business-minded travellers and guests celebrating special moments, we provide two state-of-the-art boardrooms with attached outdoor terraces. Dine at the Hillview Café with delicious cuisines and views of the surrounding Parsik Hills from the restaurant. Our outdoor pool boasts unmatched views, while our dedicated kids' play areas ensure entertainment for our little guests. Indulge in holistic treatments at our spa or keep up with your fitness regimen at our 24-hour gymnasium.Marriott

name: Trident Bandra Kurla Mumbai
address: C-56, G Block, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai 400 051
description: The 5-star Trident Bandra Kurla provides an outdoor swimming pool and full spa services. Concierge services and room service are available 24 hours. On-site parking is free. Complimentary WiFi is available in all rooms. Stylish with accents of red, the air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD Player and iPod connections. A well-stocked minibar and a personal safe are also included. En suite bathrooms come with either a shower or a bathtub. Trident Bandra Kurla is located in North Mumbai, a 15-minute drive from the domestic airport. It is a 20-minute drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and a 40-minute drive from Western Railway Terminus. Botticino restaurant serves fine wine and Italian dishes, while 022 restaurant offers an interactive sushi bar, as well as Western and Asian food. Other dining options include regional Indian food at Maya restaurant and salads at Trident Patisserie & Delicatessen.
