At Trident Spa & Fitness Centre, guests can look forward to relaxing massage treatments or a good workout at the gym. The hotel also provides a business centre and a souvenir shop.

name: Taj Lands End
address: Bandstand Bandra West Byramji Jejebhoy Road, Mumbai 400 050
description: Situated in Mumbai, this 5-star property is modern and contemporary. It also offers free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a sauna. Guests of Taj Lands End can begin their day at Jiva Spa, or use the various leisure amenities, such as fitness classes. The hotel's amenities, such as airport shuttle, business centre and photocopier, kids pool, babysitting services and supervised childcare services and activities, and massage make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. It also has a fitness centre with yoga classes and a swimming pool. After a day of sightseeing in the area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All have a mini bar, slippers and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at Taj Lands End's lounge bar and dine on international and Indian style food in the restaurant. In the evening, guests are invited to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Mumbai's attractions, such as the Walk of the Stars and Castella de Aguada, are easily accessible on foot from Taj Lands End. The hotel's multilingual staff are available to make sure that every guest has a comfortable stay.Revato

name: Ramee Techome
description: Situated in Mumbai in the Maharashtra region, Ramee Techome features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking, as well as access to a hot tub. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a safety deposit box, a satellite flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, desk and a seating area with a sofa. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with hot tub and free toiletries. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. At Ramee Techome guests are welcome to take advantage of a fitness room. The accommodation provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. In addition to a year-round outdoor pool, Ramee Techome also offers a shared lounge. Juhu Beach is 2.7 km from the aparthotel, while Prithvi Theatre is 5.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai, 4 km from Ramee Techome, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Lakeside Chalet, Mumbai - Marriott Executive Apartments
description: Lakeside Chalet, Mumbai - Marriott Executive Apartments sets the tone for an unforgettable visit. A fantastic choice for extended-stay travelers, our service hotel apartments are located on beautiful Powai Lake in Mumbai. Our one- and two-bedroom service apartments feature a well-stocked kitchen equipped with the latest appliances, complimentary Wi-Fi access, flat-screen TVs with international cable, an ergonomic desk and marble bathrooms. Refresh and rejuvenate at our signature spa, or maintain your workout routine at our 24-hour fitness center. Take advantage of an outdoor tennis courts and a lavish swimming pool. After your workout, treat yourself to delectable cuisine at one of our many dining options. We feature first-rate Indian and Italian specialty restaurants, as well as an American deli. Our hotel allows for convenient travel to celebrated Mumbai attractions. Discover the difference at Lakeside Chalet, Mumbai - Marriott Executive Apartments.Marriott

name: Taj Mahal Tower, Mumbai
description: The Taj Mahal Tower Mumbai provides 5-star accommodation in Mumbai. It also features a swimming pool, free Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests can enjoy a range of relaxing treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa and wellness centre, Jiva Spa. For those travelling with children The Taj Mahal Tower Mumbai offers babysitting/child services. The hotel has 258 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure an enjoyable stay. The Taj Mahal Tower Mumbai provides a range of dining options, including Shamiana and Aquarius. Places to dine at the hotel include Sea lounge and Souk. Mumbai's attractions, including the Prince of Wales Museum and Elphinstone College, are within easy walking distance of The Taj Mahal Tower Mumbai. Nariman House, Bombay Stock Exchange and Mantralaya are also found within a 20-minute walk away.Revato

name: Hotel Sea Princess
address: 969, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu Beach, Mumbai
description: Located along the Juhu sea coast, Hotel Sea Princess offers rooms with a flat-screen TV. This property boasts 3 dining options, an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Arabian sea and a well-appointed spa. Free parking is available. Complimentary wifi is available. Bathed in warm light, elegant rooms feature modern interiors. They are fitted with a sofa seating area and minibar. The en suite bathroom has shower facilities and free toiletries. Dining choices Jeon - the 24 hour Coffee Shop that serves Indian, Continental and Oriental Cuisine. The Hotel also has an Asian Bistro Restaurant called Khyma with a well-stocked Bar and The Beach Club overlooking the Arabian Sea. The property has a night club called ‘Tsuki’ that is spread over two levels, with luxurious and contemporary interiors. Indulge in a massage Saura Spa or exercise at the gym. This non-smoking hotel also has a business centre and a tour desk that provides car rental and currency exchange services. Mumbai’s domestic and international airports are a 30-minute drive away.

name: Meluha - The Fern
address: Central Avenue, Hiranandani Gardens, Powai, Mumbai
description: Located at a distance of 8 km and 12 km from the international and domestic airports, Meluha - The Fern is located in the heart of Powai, surrounded by Haiko, R City and D Mart Shopping Mall. Boasting a pool and spa, it offers free parking. The Fern is 5 km from Andheri Railway Station. Pleasant rooms at Meluha Fern are fitted with flat-screen TVs and laptop safe boxes. Minibars and tea/coffee makers are provided. En suite bathrooms offer toiletries and hairdryers. Guests can visit the business centre for their communication needs. Car rental services are available for those seeking to take a drive. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also provided in the hotel. A variety of international cuisine can be enjoyed at Tiara Restaurant. Drinks are served in the bar.

name: U Tan Sea Resort
address: Chowk Dongri Via Uttan, Bhayandar (West), District Thane, Mumbai
description: Situated in Thane, 26 km from Kanheri Caves, Utan Sea Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. The property is located 30 km from Bombay Exhibition Centre, 37 km from ISKCON and 37 km from Prithvi Theatre. Powai Lake is 38 km away and Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay is 38 km from the resort. Phoenix Market City Mall is 39 km from the resort, while Dadar Railway Station is 45 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 35 km from Utan Sea Resort.

name: Hilton Mumbai International Airport
address: Sahar Airport Road, Andheri East, Mumbai 400 099
description: Hilton Mumbai International Airport is an intimate hotel that blends the grace of a 19th Century summer palace with modern facilities. Just one kilometer from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport, the hotel offers proximity to prime business destinations, including Andheri Jio World Convention Centre, MIDC Industrial Estate, Bandra Kurla Complex, Bombay Convention & Exhibition Centre, MMRDA Ground, and Powai Bombay Exhibition Centre, all within about seven kilometers. The hotel also offers easy shopping destinations like Oberoi Mall and Phoenix Marketcity Mall, both within just 20 minutes. Choose from 171 spacious Guest Rooms, Executive Rooms, and Suites. In-room conveniences include, TV, telephone, personal safe, work desk, mini bar, tea/coffee maker, and Wi-Fi. The in-suite bathroom features bathrobe and essential toiletries. Hotel Facilities include a gym, swimming pool, spa, well-appointed meeting and function rooms, salon, business centre, safety deposit box, tour desk, and Wi-Fi. The hotel also offers fine dining onsite at IC and The Brasserie. Quality drinks and light snacks can be enjoyed at the on-site Crystal Lounge and Lounge Bar.Hilton

name: JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar
address: IA Project Road, Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport, Andheri, Mumbai 400 099
description: Unparalleled luxury and world-class service await you at JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar in India. Our Mumbai, India, hotel is conveniently located in Andheri East, just a short drive from Mumbai's international and domestic airports and is conveniently located near the area's business hubs. Sample a variety of cuisines, including authentic Italian and classic Indian, at our hotel's restaurants. Our well-appointed, indoor convention spaces are ideal for corporate gatherings, award ceremonies, social functions or weddings. Unwind at our luxury spa, our Andheri, Mumbai hotel's fitness center or our poolside lounge area with cabanas, perfect for soaking up the warm sun. Our 5-star hotel accommodations feature 588 spacious rooms with pillowtop beds, marble bathrooms and high-speed Wi-Fi, as well as generous work desks and 24-hour room service. Reserve your stay at the JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar for a luxury hotel experience.Marriott

name: The Oberoi Mumbai
description: Centrally located in Mumbai's business district, close to South Mumbai's shopping and entertainment areas, The Oberoi offers luxury and convenience with its outdoor heated pool, 24-hour spa, fitness and concierge service. It also features 5 food and beverage options offering a variety of cuisines. Complimentary WiFi is available in all rooms. The hotel's elegant rooms feature wooden floors, large windows offering beautiful views and en suite bathroom separated by a glass panel with electronic blinds. Rooms are equipped with an LCD TV, tea/coffee maker and iPod docking station. The Oberoi, Mumbai offers luxury and convenience with a wide range of 24 hour services like spa, butler service, laundry, concierge, business centre and travel desk. There are female butlers for the comfort of female guests travelling alone. Guests can enjoy shopping at the luxury retail arcade. The Oberoi Spa offers a variety of treatments and therapies. European, Asian and Indian specialities are featured on the menu at Fenix, alongside traditional Japanese delicacies. Vetro serves Italian dishes, while Indian cuisine can be savoured at Ziya. The Eau Bar overlooks the Arabian sea and features a live Jazz band. The Champagne Lounge serves an extensive selection of Champagne and teas. Situated at Nariman Point at the end of Marine Drive, The Oberoi Mumbai is 24 km from Mumbai's Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. Mumbai Central Railway Station is 6 km away.

name: The Leela Mumbai
description: Luxurious accommodation coupled with 6 dining options can be expected at The Leela Mumbai, just 5 minutes' drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. An outdoor pool, fitness centre and pampering spa are available. The Leela Mumbai is 4 km from Andheri Railway Station is 7 km from Powai IT and BPO District. Guests who drive enjoy free parking privileges. Stylish and spacious, the air-conditioned rooms feature large windows which overlook the landscaped gardens or tropical pool. The soundproof rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and minibar. The Spa features a relaxing menu of massage and beauty treatments, as well as special programmes designed for men. The hotel also provides a well-equipped fitness centre and 24-hour room service. The 24-hour Citrus Restaurant serves international food in a casual setting, while fine Indian dining can be enjoyed at Jamavar. Alternatively, Chinese cuisine, Italian delights and drinks are available at The Leela's 4 other dining options.

name: Trident Nariman Point
description: The 5-star Trident Nariman Point is located in Mumbai, overlooking the beautiful Arabian Sea from Marine Drive. Featuring a 24-hour business centre, the hotel has an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and pampering spa treatments. Complimentary WiFi is available in all rooms. Fitted with air conditioning, all rooms are equipped with a flat screen TV offering satellite channels, personal safe and minibar. Some rooms enjoy views of the sea. En suite bathrooms come with a shower or bathtub and offers free toiletries. Day trips and car rentals can be arranged at the tour desk. The hotel also provides daily newspapers and luggage storage at its 24-hour front desk. Mediterranean cuisine is served at Frangipani restaurant, while Southeast-Asian flavours and Japanese food are available at Indian Jones restaurant. Other dining options include buffet breakfast at Veranda and cocktails at Opium Den. Trident Nariman Point is 5.8 km from Mumbai Central and Western Railway Station Terminus. It is 24 km from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport.

name: Ramada Plaza by Wyndham Palm Grove
description: The Hotel has 115 spacious rooms some of which have a soothing view of the Arabian sea. The rooms also have amenities such as coffee/tea makers, electronic safes and free WI internet connectivity. Non smoking and accessible rooms are available on request. The Hotel also has 3 exquisite food and beverage outlets, The Oriental Bowl, The Tangerine and The Deck Bar and 24 hour room service. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily. Other facilities in the hotel include Swimming pool, Health Club, Beauty Parlour, and a business center with three meeting rooms. Situated in close proximity to the international and domestic airports, there are also shopping centers and discotheques within 2 kilometers from the hotel. Up to 11 years child stay (room only) free ( breakfast chargeable at a 50% discount). Up to 4 years child stay free with breakfast. 12 years and above charges applicable Rs 1250, including breakfastWyndham

name: Sofitel Mumbai BKC
description: The flagship of Sofitel Hotels & Resorts in India, Sofitel Mumbai BKC (approved and certified 5 Star Deluxe by Govt. of India, MoT, HRACC) is the gem of Mumbai's luxury 5-star hotels, celebrating a perfect mélange of the French way of life and warm Indian hospitality. Strategically located in the central business district of the city - the Bandra Kurla Complex, Sofitel Mumbai BKC is designed specifically for the global traveller, offering multifaceted experiences in cuisine, entertainment and relaxation.accorhotels.com

name: Le Sutra Hotel, Khar, Mumbai
description: Le Sutra is an Art hotel nestled in vibrant Mumbai, a 40-minute drive from Chatrapati Sivaji International Airport. Featuring Indian Artworks, this stylish hotel offers a spa, free parking and free Wi-Fi access. The themes of the rooms are inspired by Indian mythology and subtly composed through art. Rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Each room has a private bathroom with shower facilities. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk which provides luggage storage. Le Sutra also has a tour desk to assist guests with travel arrangements and ticketing services. Concierge service is available. The Out of the Blue Restaurant serves a variety of continental food. Mediterranean food is available at the Olive Restaurant. Le Sutra is a 2-minute walk from Carter Road. Chatrapati Sivaji Domestic Airport is a 20-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Courtyard by Marriott Mumbai International Airport
description: Perfectly situated in Andheri East, Courtyard Mumbai International Airport offers 4-star comfort and an ideal location. Travelers love our Andheri, Mumbai, hotel's seamless access to premier local attractions and business hubs, including events at the Bandra Kurla Complex. Organize events in our sophisticated indoor and picturesque outdoor venues, from lavish weddings to training sessions. Reinvigorate with a massage or wellness treatment at our spa, take a dip in the outdoor pool or work out in our gym. Afterward, indulge in creative international cuisine and custom cocktails at our MoMo Cafe, Ummrao restaurant and Ark Bar. Recharge in our hotel's upscale accommodations, featuring pillowtop mattresses, marble bathrooms, free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. Upgrade to an executive club-level room or suite to enjoy exclusive Club amenities. Join us in Andheri East at Courtyard Mumbai International Airport to experience the friendly service that earned our Andheri East hotel a TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence.Marriott

name: The St. Regis Mumbai
description: Enjoy luxurious staycations at The St. Regis Mumbai. We invite you to choose your favourite staycation package from our offers page. Situated in Lower Parel, our 5-star hotel brings the storied history and exceptional service of St. Regis to this vibrant area. Discover sophisticated elements crafted to make you feel at home, blended with luxuries such as on-call Butler Service, traditional Afternoon Tea and Champagne Sabering ceremony. Relax in beautifully designed rooms, suites and apartments, each with stunning vistas of the city or sea. Celebrate and dine around the globe in our award-winning specialty restaurants. If a meeting, wedding or social event brings you here, you will revel in our expansive ballrooms, banquet halls and outdoor venues, the perfect setting for any gathering. Nearby, discover Mumbai's attractions within minutes of our hotel. Whether traveling for work or on a vacation, we look forward to greeting you at our Lower Parel hotel in Mumbai.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai
description: In the heart of Worli, the business hub of India’s largest city, Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai creates a tranquil, chic haven filled with sincere Indian hospitality. The Four Seasons offers comfortable rooms offering sweeping views of the city. It has an outdoor pool, spa and fitness centre. The spacious air-conditioned rooms come with a DVD player, 42-inch LCD TV, an iPod docking station and a bar. The marble bathroom has a separate bathtub and walk-in shower. Guests at the Mumbai Four Seasons can enjoy the ice fountain or the steam bath and Ayurvedic treatments at the spa. The hotel offers a concierge, babysitting services, and an ATM. Spanning 2 floors, Asian restaurant San Qi has a wine bar and a menu offering Indian, Chinese and Japanese dishes. Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai is located in the Worli-Lower Parel commercial area. It is a 10-minute drive from Siddhivinayak Temple and a 15-minute drive from Shivaji Park.

name: The Fern Goregaon
address: 4/277 I.B Patel Road, Behind HP Petrol, Mumbai 400 063
description: The Fern - Goregaon is located in Mumbai, 1.2 km from Bombay Exhibition Centre. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar and refrigerator. Some rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Certain units have views of the mountain or city. The rooms have a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. The property offers a 24-hour front desk,car hire,room service and valet parking. Guests can also enjoy the on-site restaurant. ISKCON is 6 km from the property,while Powai Lake is 7 km away.The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 7 km from the property.

name: Itc Maratha, A Luxury Collection Hotel, Mumbai
description: Inspired by the Maratha dynasty, ITC Maratha, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Mumbai offers you world-class luxury that resonates throughout our luxurious hotel accommodation, diverse dining options and 5-star amenities. Find our hotel situated on 5.5 acres in the heart of Mumbai, India. Retreat to one of 380 spacious, elegantly appointed guest rooms, then sample the fine dining at our on-site restaurants, indulge yourself in our luxury wellness services and elevate meetings and events in majestic hotel settings. Our 5-star property in Andheri East pays tribute to both Mumbai’s colonial roots and the spirit of Maharashtra and the Marathas. Soak in the local culture, infused into all of our sustainable interiors and designs. ITC Maratha has been recognized as a LEED Platinum and LEED Zero Carbon Certified Luxury Hotel by the US Green Building Council in the existing building category. Our eco-friendly initiatives have received several national and international certifications.Marriott

name: The Resort
description: Located on the shoreline of the Arabian Sea, The Resort is a hotel offering modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is 1 km from the INS Hamla Naval Base. The air-conditioned rooms feature garden, pool or sea views. Each is equipped with a cable TV, wardrobe and desk. Private bathroom includes free toiletries and a shower. The Resort is 10 km from Malad Railway Station and 22 km from Chatrapathi Shivaji International Airport in Mumbai. Relax by the outdoor pool or enjoy a work-out at the fitness centre. The hotel has a 24-reception and travel desk. Available at an extra charge are laundry, dry cleaning and car rental services. The property also offers an Adventure Zone known as "Gravity" consisting of Burma Bridge, archery, air rifle etc. Indian, Chinese and European meals can be ordered from High Tide Restaurant. Bay Watch is a 24-hour coffee shop while a variety of drinks are available from the Upper Deck Bar. Bar timing is 11 AM to 11 PM

name: GCC Hotel & Club
address: 92/1, Off Mira Bhayander Rd,Mira Rd (e) Thane, Mumbai
description: GCC Hotel and Club features modern, spacious rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV. Located 1.5 km from the Western Express Highway, the hotel has an outdoor pool and 4 dining options. The air-conditioned rooms feature an electric kettle, minibar and seating area by the window. Private bathroom includes a shower and free toiletries. Mira Road Railway Station is just 2 km from GCC Hotel and Club. Attractions such as Essel World and Water Kingdom are 15 km away while Mumbai Airport is 18 km away. The busy NSE Nesco Complex is 15 km away. The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers luggage storage facilities. Guests can also relax with a massage at the hotel. Olivia, All Day Dining serves a variety of cuisines and coffee, while Namaste offers pure vegetarian dishes. Drinks can be enjoyed at The Oaks Lounge & Bar, as well as the pool-side cafe.

name: The Taj Mahal Palace Mumbai
address: Opp The Gateway of India Apollo Bunder Colaba, Mumbai 400 001
description: Set in Mumbai, The Taj Mahal Palace Mumbai is a five-minute walk from the Gateway of India and features a swimming pool. It provides free Wi-Fi, a beauty centre and a butler service. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. It provides an express check-in and check-out feature and valet parking, as well as fitness classes. It also has its very own wellness centre, Jiva Spa. After a day of exploring the local region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all include a refrigerator, a mini bar and slippers. Take pleasure in the quality 5-star bathrooms that accompany each room; these boast deluxe amenities such as a hair dryer and a shower. The hotel boasts convenient dining options, including Indian dishes at Masala Kraft and Chinese meals at Golden Dragon. Places to dine at the hotel include Shamiana and Souk. Guests are also able to try one of the many bars and cafés in the vicinity. Mumbai's attractions, including the Prince of Wales Museum and Elphinstone College, are within easy walking distance of The Taj Mahal Palace Mumbai. Nariman House, Bombay Stock Exchange and Mantralaya are also found within walking distance.Revato

name: Grand Hyatt Mumbai
description: Nestled amidst 10 acres of sprawling greenery, Grand Hyatt Mumbai is situated in the heart of the city. The hotel’s multidimensional lifestyle complex is home to award winning dining experiences, well-appointed wellness and recreation facilities and aesthetic rooms and apartments. The Hotel has two outdoor pools surrounded by sun loungers and palm trees. Rooms at Grand Hyatt Mumbai feature modern décor and floor-to-ceiling windows with courtyard or city views. Some rooms have a balcony. The en-suite bathrooms have a separate bath and come with free toiletries. Free private parking is available upon reservation and an airport shuttle service is provided. Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport is only 10 km away, while Bandra Kurla Complex is an 8-minute drive away. Grand Hyatt Mumbai is host to 4 award-winning signature restaurants. Indulge in an array of cuisines at our multi-cuisine outlet Fifty Five East, Italian cuisine at Celini, Sichuan cuisine at China House Restaurant, and Northwest Frontier cuisine at Soma. The Bar at the lobby level serves exclusive cocktails, and fine wines. Local and international produce can also be purchased at the hotel's delicatessen, the Gourmet Store. The hotel also offers extensive services that include the 24 hour Concierge, multi-lingual staff and babysitting, among others. The Concierge can assist with travel arrangements, limousine hire, sight-seeing and in many other ways to ensure a comfortable and memorable stay. Art enthusiasts can enjoy the finest collections of commissioned art by both established and upcoming artists of India displayed in all public areas of the hotel.

name: Ramee Guestline Hotel Khar
description: Set in a prime location of Mumbai, Ramee Guestline Khar Hotel puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Ramee Guestline Khar Hotel.Agoda

name: The Mirador
address: 131 / B, New Link Road, Chakala, Mumbai
description: The Mirador is a 5-minute drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji International & Domestic Airport, 500 Mtrs from the neartest Metro Station and a 10-minute drive from Andheri Railway Station. It features a fitness station and 4 dining options. Free Wi-Fi is available up to 2 devices per room. The Gateway to India Monument is 35 km from The Mirador. Juhu Beach is 5 km from the hotel. The rooms of Mirador have modern European furnishings are equipped with LED TV and tea making facilities. Guests can make travel arrangements at the tour desk or work at the well-equipped business centre. House of Asia serves international cuisine and refreshing beverages, while freshly brewed coffee can be found at Biscotti Cafe.

name: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach
address: Balraj Sahani Marg, Juhu Beach, Mumbai 400 049
description: Novotel Mumbai Juhu Beach is Accor's breathtaking beachfront property located in the financial capital of India. Offering an inventory of 204 guest rooms and suites along with 6 dining options serving Chinese, Indian, Italian and Continental cuisines.accorhotels.com

name: Wagoba Eco Lodge , Tadoba
description: Featuring a restaurant, Wagoba Eco Lodge, Tadoba is set in Mumbai in the Maharashtra region, 3.8 km from Dadar Railway Station and 4.7 km from Siddhi Vinayak Temple. With an outdoor swimming pool, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. All rooms include a balcony. At the hotel, rooms have a desk. At Wagoba Eco Lodge, Tadoba every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a Full English/Irish breakfast. Guests at Wagoba Eco Lodge, Tadoba will be able to enjoy activities in and around Mumbai, like cycling. The hotel can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area. High Street Phoenix mall is 7.6 km from Wagoba Eco Lodge, Tadoba, while Nehru Science Centre is 8.2 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Intercontinental Marine Drive Mumbai, An IHG Hotel
description: Located strategically in Mumbai’s Art Deco district and with a panoramic view of the Arabian Sea, InterContinental Marine Drive-Mumbai stands out with its large rooms and suites. Dining at the hotel is just as indulgent. Dome, our rooftop bar exudes the best things in life: wine, food, music, and the stars. L&S Bistro & Pizzeria brings the world to Mumbai with its global street food menu. History meets gastronomy at Kebab Korner where heritage recipes are given a contemporary touch.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Emerald Hotel & Service Apartments
description: Emerald Hotel & Service Apartments is centrally located in Juhu, just a 5-minutes walk from the beach. The Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport is less than a 20-minute drive. On-site parking is available. Free WiFi is offered. All rooms at Emerald Hotel & Service Apartments feature contemporary decor and include ergonomic work stations, high-speed internet access, and flat-screen TVs. The bathrooms come with deluxe Herbline toiletries. Guests can exercise in the Emerald’s fitness centre or relax in the outdoor garden area. The hotel’s restaurants feature international and authentic Indian cuisine, with many vegetarian options. The Emerald’s coffee shop is popular for its coffees, pastries and light snacks. The Santacruz railway station is 10-minutes from the Emerald Hotel. Many of Mumbai’s top attractions, including the Gateway of India and the Kala Ghoda district are a short drive away.

name: Aurika, Mumbai Skycity
address: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Int Airport, Mumbai 400 099
description: Set in Mumbai, 5.1 km from Phoenix Market City Mall, Aurika, Mumbai Skycity offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 5.4 km from ISKCON. All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, the units at Aurika, Mumbai Skycity have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a seating area. Guest rooms will provide guests with a minibar. A buffet, continental or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Prithvi Theatre is 5.6 km from the accommodation, while Bombay Exhibition Centre is 6.3 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 2 km from Aurika, Mumbai Skycity.

name: The Westin Mumbai Garden City
description: Designed to replenish your well-being, The Westin Mumbai Garden City is a scenic sanctuary for business and leisure travel. Find a restorative respite in our sleek, modern India, hotel's accommodations with floor-to-ceiling windows and award-winning Westin Heavenly® Beds. Ignite your senses with delectable Indian cuisine and sublime city views at our hotel restaurant. Enjoy a coveted location in Mumbai's thriving business district, near the Bombay Exhibition Center, Oberoi Mall and NESCO Convention Center. Reach higher success in our hotel's dynamic event spaces, featuring modern boardrooms, elegant wedding venues and a convenient location near Mumbai’s International Airport. After a full day in Goregaon East, pamper yourself with massage, beauty and wellness therapies at our Heavenly Spa by Westin™, or exhilarate your body with a workout at our WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio. A haven of refreshment and renewal, The Westin Mumbai Garden City is the perfect place to center your visit to India.Marriott

name: President - Ihcl Seleqtions
description: President - IHCL SeleQtions is set in Mumbai and is within a short walk of local attractions, such as Colaba Causeway and Dhobi Ghat. It also offers a sauna, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the in-house spa, Jiva Spa. It is pet-friendly and provides free private parking on site for guests with a car. It also offers superb options for business meetings and events. Those staying at the hotel can enjoy the stylish rooms that offer an in-room safe, tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV. They all have a desk and a telephone. Guests of President - IHCL SeleQtions are welcome to sample Italian cuisine at Trattoria, or try Thai meals at Pavilion. Breakfast is available daily and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. A wide selection of dining options are also found in the surrounding area. The hotel is situated in the popular tourist hub of South Mumbai. Staff can help plan excursions, and can assist with car rental.Revato

name: Lemon Tree Premier, Mumbai International Airport
description: Located in Mumbai, 4.1 km from Phoenix Market City Mall, Lemon Tree Premier, Mumbai International Airport provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Lemon Tree Premier, Mumbai International Airport every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, American or Asian options. The accommodation offers a sun terrace. Powai Lake is 5.7 km from Lemon Tree Premier, Mumbai International Airport, while Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay is 6.2 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 1 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Regal Enclave
description: Regal Enclave is near the Khar Railway Station, near various shopping arcades, and within easy reach of Mumbai’s business district. It offers an airport pick-up service, an internet café and free Wi-Fi is available. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV and personal safe. Tea/coffee making facilities and a minibar are included. Indian, Continental and Chinese cuisine is served daily at the hotel’s restaurant. A variety of drinks are available at the lounge. Free tea service in the morning can be delivered to rooms. The property offers 24-hour room service. Hotel Regal Enclave is 1 km from the Arabian Sea coast and only a short drive away from the international and domestic airport. It is 3 km to the business hub of Bandra Kurla Complex. Juhu Beach and Iskon Temple is within 6 km of Regal Enclave.

name: Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport
address: Sakinaka Junction, Andheri Kurla Rd, Mumbai
description: Enjoy the peaceful ambience of our uncluttered, glass-walled lobby before checking into your modern guest room. Stay at the contemporary Holiday Inn Mumbai International Airport for easy access to the airport terminals and north Mumbai businesses. From this accommodation near Mumbai airport, you can see planes jet off from the runway and the skyline of the city from the hotel's rooftop swimming pool. Our grand pillarless ballroom can hold up to 500 people for your social or corporate event & The Sky Terrace is the perfect sunset venue for a grand golden hour event or pool parties. We are close to businesses in commercial north Mumbai, such as corporate headquarters at the Bandra Kurla Complex, 8km away, the Accenture offices, 3.5km away, WNS Global Services, 6km away, Bombay Exhibition Centre at Goregaon, 8km away, SEEPZ, 4.8km away and the commercial hub of MIDC at 7km.See the colonial grandeur of the iconic Gateway of India archway at Mumbai Harbour, where ferries leave for the hand-carved Elephanta Caves on Gharapuri Island at 25km from the hotel. Your sophisticated guest room comes with an iPod docking station, complimentary Wi-Fi access and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. Unwind with a workout in the sunlit Gym and detox in the sauna's. Relax at the Tattva Spa or enjoy authentic Mumbai street food, and multi-cuisines at our elegant restaurant Saptami.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake
description: Focus on your well-being at The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake. Our 5-star, 600-room Powai Lake hotel offers a picture-perfect getaway in Mumbai, India. Stay focused throughout the day while you connect with the most energized and effective version of yourself. Awaken your senses with a multitude of wellness experiences, including our Heavenly Spa and WestinWORKOUT fitness studio. Take in views of Mumbai's verdant landscape and beautiful Powai Lake. We offer hotel guests a variety of dynamic meeting venues that balance individual and group needs with inspiring spaces for weddings, conferences, seminars and social events. The dining options at our 5-star hotel reflect India's rich and diverse culinary traditions. Sample global cuisines and curated menus designed to satisfy even the most discerning diner's palate. Rejuvenate yourself each night in Mumbai when you rest on award-winning Westin Heavenly® Beds in plush accommodations at The Westin Mumbai Powai Lake, one of Marriott’s largest hotels in Powai.Marriott

name: Svenska Design Hotel, Mumbai
address: F-73/74, Oberoi Complex, Off Link Road, Mumbai
description: Situated in Mumbai's Lokhandwala Complex, Svenska Design Hotel offers few dining options and rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi. Fitted with mood lighting and parquet flooring, rooms are all equipped with an iPod dock, flat-screen TV and rainshower facilities. Each room also comes with a personal safe and minibar. Svenska Design Hotel is 5 km from Andheri Railway Station and 8 km from Chhatrapati Shivaji Airport. Other dining options include international breakfast at Mesa Deli, Mediterranean cuisine at Miro Restaurant and Lounge, and sandwiches at Mesa Deli.

name: Sahara Star
description: The 5-star Sahara Star Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Mumbai. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, gift/souvenir shop, are at hand. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, bathroom phone, clothes rack, linens, locker. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Convenience and comfort makes Sahara Star Hotel the perfect choice for your stay in Mumbai.Agoda

name: Hyatt Centric Juhu Mumbai
address: Juhu Tara Road, Santacruz West, Mumbai 400 049
description: No description found

name: Taj Santacruz
address: Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport, T1, Off, Western Express Hwy, Navpada, Mumbai 400 099
description: Situated in Mumbai, Taj Santacruz provides direct access to Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport and features free Wi-Fi. It offers 5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Those staying at the hotel can unwind in the swimming pool. Convenient services include an express check-in/check-out feature and a luggage storage area. Rooms feature an en suite bathroom equipped with bathrobes, slippers and a shower. They are all soundproofed and include a seating area, a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. Taj Santacruz boasts convenient dining options, including Italian and French cuisines at Rivea and international food at Tiqri. Each evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. For guests wishing to dine out during their stay at Taj Santacruz, there are a variety of restaurants located nearby. It is within walking distance of Ville Parle Railway Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Mumbai.Revato

name: Gcc Northside Hotel
address: 1 Near Hotel And Off. Mira Bhayandar, 90, Gcc Club Rd, Hatkesh Udhog Nagar, Mira Road East., Mumbai 401 107
description: Located in Mumbai, 13 km from Kanheri Caves, GCC North Side features views of the city. With a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At GCC North Side each room has bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, American and Asian options. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving American, Chinese and Indian cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested. GCC North Side offers an outdoor pool. Bombay Exhibition Centre is 17 km from the hotel, while ISKCON is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 23 km from GCC North Side.

name: The Orchid Hotel Mumbai Vile Parle
address: 70-c Nehru Road, Vile Parle, East Mumbai, Mumbai
description: The Orchid Hotel is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Mumbai. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, gift/souvenir shop, private check in/check out. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms. To enhance guests' stay, the hotel offers recreational facilities such as hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, spa. For reliable service and professional staff, The Orchid Hotel caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Keys Select by Lemon Tree Hotels, Nestor, Mumbai
address: Makhwana Road, Off Military Road, Mumbai
description: Located in Andheri East, Keys Hotel Nestor - Mumbai is a perfect starting point from which to explore Mumbai. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. Facilities like 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, valet parking, car park are readily available for you to enjoy. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), air conditioning. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including fitness center. Convenience and comfort makes Keys Hotel Nestor - Mumbai the perfect choice for your stay in Mumbai.Agoda

name: Hotel Marine Plaza
description: Location This hotel is strategically located where Marine Drive meets Mumbai's business district. The nearest local railway station is Churchgate, which is within walking distance and the Victoria Terminus station is about 8-10 minutes away. Mumbai's domestic airport is located approximately 28 km from the hotel, whilst the international airport is some 32 km away. Facilities The hotel features 68 accommodation units. Guests can reach the upper floors quickly and easily using the lift. Amenities include a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access is available in public areas (for a fee). The hotel offers a range of amenities for a comfortable stay, including gastronomic options such as a restaurant, a café, a bar and a pub. Guests arriving in their own vehicles can park in the car park. Among the additional services available are medical assistance, room service and a laundry. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A safe and a minibar also feature. The accommodation units offer a range of amenities, including tea and coffee making equipment. Internet access, a telephone, a TV and wireless internet access are provided as standard. Some of the rooms are wheelchair-accessible. In each of the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment Guests can enjoy sport, leisure and relaxation options at the hotel. The hotel offers an outdoor pool. Leisure options available to guests include a gym. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast and B & B. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu
description: Nestled along Juhu Beach, JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu is a five-star haven where luxury reigns supreme. Upscale comfort awaits in stylishly appointed hotel rooms and suites showcasing featherbed mattresses, chic décor, high-speed Internet, marble bathrooms and 24-hour room service. Replenish your spirits with diverse fine dining at distinctive restaurants and bars or energize in our well-equipped fitness center. The sparkling waters of our outdoor infinity and saltwater pools are the perfect prelude to walks on the beach. Spark your imagination in our flexible event spaces, which are masterfully designed for flawless meetings, conferences, weddings and social affairs in Mumbai, India. After a busy day in Juhu Beach, attend to your well-being with luxury massages and therapies at our five-star Quan Spa. Frequented by celebrities and Bollywood luminaries, JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu is one of Mumbai's most elegant destinations along the glittering Arabian Sea.Marriott

name: Hotel Red Palms
address: 3rd Road, Guru Gobind Singh Marg.,Khar (West), Mumbai 400 052
description: Hotel Red Palms is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Mumbai. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the hotel are 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, fireplace. Designed for comfort, selected guestrooms offer locker, complimentary tea, towels, fireplace, mirror to ensure a restful night. Access to the hotel's fitness center will further enhance your satisfying stay. Hotel Red Palms combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Mumbai unforgettable.Agoda

name: The Fern Residency - Mumbai
description: The Fern Residency, Mumbai 4-star Hotel has 84 exquisitely designed guest rooms that showcase designs inspired by the Indian script. Adjoining the hotel is The Acres Club which has the best sports and entertainment in Chembur, the hotel is very well connected to Mumbai important business and entertainment hubs. The Fern Residency, Mumbai is ideal for Business travelers to Mumbai. Located at Chembur which is one of Mumbais fastest developing business hubs and is recognized as being truly central Vashi, Bandra (BKC), Sion, Kurla, Ghatkopar, Vikhroli, Powai, Thane almost everything is within 20 minutes drive from our location. With the new expressway the Hotel is now only a quick 20 min drive from South Mumbai. There is a modern business centre and a quiet library. Laundry services are also available. Guests can also play tennis, bowling, squash and visit the gym at the on-site Acres Club. The Art House offers Indian, Chinese and Continental dishes.

name: The Byke Suraj Plaza Veg Hotel, Thane
address: Saibaba Vihar Complex, Anand Nagar, Thāne 400 615
description: The Byke Suraj Plaza Pure Veg, Thane is set in Thane, 36 km from Mumbai. Guests can enjoy the on-site pure vegetarian restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. A flat-screen TV with cable channels, as well as a computer are available. Certain units feature a seating area for your convenience. Enjoy a cup of tea while looking out at the mountains or city. Every room has a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers and free toiletries. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers car hire. Navi Mumbai is 28 km from The Byke Suraj Plaza Pure Veg, Thane, while Thane is 8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: The Lalit Mumbai
description: The Lalit Mumbai is located along Sahar Airport Road, about 1 km from Sahar International Airport. The hotel offers an outdoor pool, flat-screen cable TVs and 6 dining options. The air-conditioned guestrooms are equipped with ironing facilities, a work desk and free coffee/tea facilities. A safety deposit box and minibar are provided. The hotel features a business centre, shopping gallery and fitness centre. Other facilities include a spa pool and massage services at the hotel’s spa. Indian and international cuisines are served at 24/7 Restaurant, Baluchi Restaurant and Trendz Restaurant. Other dining options include The Delicatessen Café, Beluga Bar and Kitty Su. The Lalit Mumbai is situated at the centre of Sahar business district and about 7 km from Powai Lake, a popular tourist attraction.

name: Radisson Mumbai Andheri Midc
description: Set in Mumbai, 5 km from ISKCON, Radisson Mumbai Andheri MIDC offers accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking and a fitness centre. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel every room includes air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Radisson Mumbai Andheri MIDC features certain units with pool views, and rooms come with a coffee machine. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At Radisson Mumbai Andheri MIDC you will find a restaurant serving African, American and Cantonese cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Bombay Exhibition Centre is 5.9 km from the hotel, while Prithvi Theatre is 5.9 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 3 km from Radisson Mumbai Andheri MIDC.

name: Radisson Mumbai Goregaon
address: Junction of S.V. Road & Veer Savarkar, Mumbai 400 062
description: Located 1 km from Oberoi Mall, Radisson Mumbai Goregaon offers a rooftop pool and a fitness room. Featuring modern rooms with a flat-screen cable TV, it provides free Wi-Fi throughout its premises. Radisson Mumbai Goregaon is 2 km from Mumbai Exhibition Centre and 9 km from Chatrapati Shivaji International Airport. Rooms at the Radisson Mumbai Goregaon come with air conditioning and a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Aside from a safety deposit box, a minibar and a tea/coffee maker are included. Musaafer restaurant serves a wide variety of Indian dishes, prepared in an open kitchen. 24-hour room service is available. Tipple offers drinks. Goma serves Pan Asian Cuisine. Firin all-day bakery and café. Guests of Radisson Mumbai Goregaon can make travel arrangements at the tour desk or use the business centre. The hotel also provides free parking.

name: Royal Orchid Central Grazia
description: Royal Orchid Central offers a 24-hour coffee shop and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Royal Orchid's rooms are equipped with a coffee/tea maker, minibar and a private bathroom with marble bath and hairdryer. 24-hour room service is provided. Royal Orchid Navi Mumbai's facilities include a fitness room, 24-hour business centre with secretarial services and currency exchange. Laundry service and 24-hour concierge services are available. Echo serves a buffet spread or a la carte selection of international dishes. CIDCO Exhibition Centre is 1.9 km, Fortis Hiranandani Hospital is 2.5 km, Apollo Hospital 9 km away and NeuroGen Brain and Spine Institute is 7.5 km from the property. Royal Orchid Central Grazia Navi Mumbai is a one-hour drive away from Mumbai International Airport. It is 44 km away from Nariman Point.

name: Sun N Sand Hotel Mumbai
description: Located on Juhu Beach, Sun-n-Sand Mumbai offers beachfront accommodation with an outdoor pool, a fitness centre and 5 dining options. Each room at the Sun-n-Sand Mumbai is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, an electronic safe and tea/coffee maker. Cookies, bottled water and a fruit basket are provided. The hotel’s health club overlooks the Arabian sea and features a fitness room, sauna, steam and spa pool facilities. Enjoy body treatments and massages at Sohum. A business centre and business lounge offering free cocktails and snacks during certain hours are available. The 24-hour AQUA coffee shop offers views of the Arabian Sea. Traditional Awadhi cuisine is served at The Kabab Hut. Haaochi, the new addition to the hotel speciality restaurant offers contemporary Chinese cuisine, an elaborate dim sum menu and a full service bar. Sun-n-Sand Mumbai is a 20-minute drive from Chhatrapati Shivaji International Airport. ISKON Temple and the Prithvi Theatre are both a 5-minute drive away.

name: Radisson Blu Mumbai International Airport
address: Marol Maroshi Road, Near Marol Metro, Mumbai 400 059
description: Located in Mumbai (Andheri East), Radisson Blu Mumbai International Airport is within a 5-minute drive of Shoppers Stop and Phoenix Market City Mall. Featured amenities include complimentary wired Internet access, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Lalco Residency
address: Kalpataru Estate - 1A, Jogeshwari Vikhroli Link Road, Andheri (E), Mumbai
description: Offering spacious and a fully furnished apartments with a well-equipped kitchen and separate living area, Lalco Residency is located in the heart of the Mumbai suburban district and features an outdoor pool. Fully furnished, apartments come with modern interiors and a dining area. Included in all units are a sofa, machine seating area and private bathroom. Guests can exercise at the gym, or play games in the activities room. Staff at the tour desk can assist with ticketing and concierge services. Lalco Residency is a 10-minute drive from Jogeshwari Railway Station and a 12-minute drive from Oberoi Mall. It is just 2.5 km from Goregaon Exhibition Centre. Mumbai’s domestic and international airports are a 20-minute drive way.

name: Fabhotel Prime The Thane Club
address: Mohan Kopekar Road The Thane Club, Teen Hath Naka, Opp- Raheja Garden, Thāne 400 601
description: Set in Thane and with Indian Institute of Technology, Bombay reachable within 11 km, The Thane Club offers an outdoor swimming pool, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking is available on site. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At The Thane Club every room has bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. At The Thane Club you will find a restaurant serving American, Chinese and Indian cuisine. Vegetarian and halal options can also be requested. Powai Lake is 11 km from the hotel, while Kanheri Caves is 13 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 16 km from The Thane Club.

name: Fariyas Hotel
address: 25, Off Arthur Bunder Road, Colaba, Mumbai
description: Located in Mumbai, Fariyas Hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Gateway of India. It features an outdoor swimming pool, 4 dining options and non-smoking rooms with free Wi-Fi. Offering modern décor and floor-to-ceiling windows, rooms at Fariyas have plenty of natural light. Each room is fitted with a safety deposit box and flat-screen TV with cable channels. A bathtub and toiletries are provided. Guests can work out at the fitness centre or enjoy relaxing body treatments at the spa. The hotel provides car rental and currency exchange services, while staff at the tour desk can assist with travel arrangements. Tamarind restaurant serves a fine selection of grilled international dishes. Other dining choices include refreshing beverages at Tavern -The Signature Bar and Tamarind PoolSide, which specialises in grilled meats. There is a coffee shop on premise as well. Hotel Fariyas is a 10-minute drive from Nariman Point and the World Trade Centre. Chhatrapati Shivaji Airport is approximately 1 to 1.5 hours away by road.

name: Country Inn & Suites By Umrb
address: 3 floor Andheri sport complex andheri west near azad nagar metro station 3 floor, Mumbai 400 053
description: Located in Mumbai, Country Inn & Suites By UMRB offers 3-star accommodation with private balconies. With a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel provides city views, a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. Guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. At the hotel each room has a seating area. Country Inn & Suites By UMRB offers an à la carte or vegetarian breakfast. Versova Beach is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while ISKCON is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Chhatrapati Shivaji International Mumbai Airport, 6 km from Country Inn & Suites By UMRB.
